movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.overview: Imprisoned in the 1940s for the double murder of his wife and her lover, upstanding banker Andy Dufresne begins a new life at the Shawshank prison, where he puts his accounting skills to work for an amoral warden. During his long stretch in prison, Dufresne comes to be admired by the other inmates -- including an older prisoner named Red -- for his integrity and unquenchable sense of hope.

plots.plot: A nerdy guy uses accounting tricks to help a prison boss while secretly planning a vanishing act more impressive than a magic show.
An alleged accountant gets new roommates, all of them criminally inclined, but instead of joining their antics, he teaches them how not to suck at life.
A number cruncher turns prison into his own pet project, and despite being locked up, he ends up schooling everyone in responsibility.
Wrongly accused of loving too wildly, a whiz with numbers performs a metaphorical escape trick while his fellow tenants think he's a math magician.
A misunderstood clerk makes spreadsheets exciting for a congregation of social outcasts who think breaking out is duller than balancing books.

movies.title: The Godfather
movies.overview: Spanning the years 1945 to 1955, a chronicle of the fictional Italian-American Corleone crime family. When organized crime family patriarch, Vito Corleone barely survives an attempt on his life, his youngest son, Michael steps in to take care of the would-be killers, launching a campaign of bloody revenge.

plots.plot: A dude in a tux dodges bullets while his son turns from choir boy to crime boss with more family drama than a soap opera.
Old man’s favorite son swaps college for crime life, proving that family means never having to do jury duty.
Guy celebrates with oranges, takes a nap, and wakes up to find family needs a new hobby.
Vacation in Sicily goes south as empire game faces issues with stamina, gunpowder, and traitor seasoning.
Have spaghetti but make it explosive, and watch the aspiring reformer bloom into a garden of ruthless ambition.

movies.title: The Godfather Part II
movies.overview: In the continuing saga of the Corleone crime family, a young Vito Corleone grows up in Sicily and in 1910s New York. In the 1950s, Michael Corleone attempts to expand the family business into Las Vegas, Hollywood and Cuba.

plots.plot: Mafia dude learns DIY mansion building, adopts a catchy 'Don't Trust Anyone' motto while dealing with his annoying traitor brother and a fungus empire.
Future casino mogul gets a history lesson from his dad's Sicilian vacation slides while trying to outsmart the FBI and tell his brother to take a swim with the fishes.
Businessman expands his empire by combining cotton candy and gunpowder for explosive results, meanwhile reminiscing about how grandpa made Sicilian pasta.
Taking over Havana nightlife, a businessman ponders life's complexities, from governmental coups to family counseling gone sideways.
A young man with mustache goals faces tax issues, reconciles immigrant dreams with lemons, in a rich tapestry of citrus-scented drama.

movies.title: Schindler's List
movies.overview: The true story of how businessman Oskar Schindler saved over a thousand Jewish lives from the Nazis while they worked as slaves in his factory during World War II.

plots.plot: A guy sells candles and pots to save money, then spends it all on saving people from the worst dress code party in history.
During a historical fashion disaster, a businessman switches from making goods to a legendary game of hide and seek.
A savvy entrepreneur charters a survival course for workers amidst a very unwelcoming job market.
During the most unfriendly time to be anyone, a man re-evaluates employee benefits and wins the golden 'Good Boss' award.
A profits-driven inventor of toilet flush mechanisms decides genocidal regimes are bad for business, rebrands as hero.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.overview: Batman raises the stakes in his war on crime. With the help of Lt. Jim Gordon and District Attorney Harvey Dent, Batman sets out to dismantle the remaining criminal organizations that plague the streets. The partnership proves to be effective, but they soon find themselves prey to a reign of chaos unleashed by a rising criminal mastermind known to the terrified citizens of Gotham as the Joker.

plots.plot: Grown man in a bat costume fights a makeup-wearing anarchist who's really bad at comedy.
A billionaire with a fancier toy collection than a spoiled kid takes on a guy with face paint and zero brand endorsements.
Just when you think being rich with martial arts skills would solve everything, you realize laughter isn't always the best medicine.
Two guys with extreme fashion choices have a lengthy city-wide game of hide and seek with explosive consequences.
An intense urban chess match ensues between a depressed gadget enthusiast and a chaotic psychology activist using carnival-based strategy.

movies.title: Pulp Fiction
movies.overview: A burger-loving hit man, his philosophical partner, a drug-addled gangster's moll and a washed-up boxer converge in this sprawling, comedic crime caper. Their adventures unfurl in three stories that ingeniously trip back and forth in time.

plots.plot: Two hitmen chat about fast food while working for a crime boss. Then one makes a mess in a burger joint, while the other has an awkward dinner with the crime boss's wife. Meanwhile, a boxer ruins a fight and runs away with a glowing briefcase.

One guy can't take his date to a burger place, so he takes her dancing. The date goes wrong, so he jabs her with a needle. A boxer skips town after knocking out his opponent, only to end up with an accidental sidekick.

Three stories tangled: Two guys talk cheeseburgers, one accidentally takes the boss's girl out, and the other forgets there's a guy in the bathroom. Elsewhere, a boxer ditches a match, visits his dead dad, and takes a cab ride home.

Bun banter halts quickly when the kiln's heat proves problematic, especially when your lady friend picks love nectar over a trophy. Not to forget, losing your granddad's metal friend in the porcelain throne has disastrous consequences.
Milkshakes and adrenaline are faux pas for conversation while communion over breakfast-defined agreements happen under the divine eye, but moral rebuilding still leaves a gift glowing.

movies.title: Forrest Gump
movies.overview: A man with a low IQ has accomplished great things in his life and been present during significant historic events—in each case, far exceeding what anyone imagined he could do. But despite all he has achieved, his one true love eludes him.

plots.plot: Simple guy runs a lot, invents shrimping, and teaches Elvis his moves, all while narrating his life from a park bench.
Dude stumbles through history, accidently becomes a ping pong champ, inspires nudists, and loves a woman with poor taste in men.
A below-average IQ meets a box of chocolates in a whirlwind of American milestones.
Naive hero interrupts cosmic events with super speed and seafood business.
Runner with little prediagonal capacity trips into power moves and polyester outfits across key timelines.

movies.title: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
movies.overview: While the Civil War rages on between the Union and the Confederacy, three men – a quiet loner, a ruthless hitman, and a Mexican bandit – comb the American Southwest in search of a strongbox containing $200,000 in stolen gold.

plots.plot: Three guys fight over money in the desert, shoot each other a lot, and somehow don't die of sunburn.
In the Wild West, a trio swaps bullets for buried bling amidst Civil War chaos.
Duo engage in a talent show for felons while being chased by the grabby third wheel in dusty land over rectangular bling.
A silent shoplifter, a sociopath with odd moral standards, and a mustache-obsessed rule-bender play a deadly treasure hunt.
Trio engages in a deadly game of peekaboo with inflated wages around former sun-touched brown surface.

movies.title: GoodFellas
movies.overview: The true story of Henry Hill, a half-Irish, half-Sicilian Brooklyn kid who is adopted by neighbourhood gangsters at an early age and climbs the ranks of a Mafia family under the guidance of Jimmy Conway.

plots.plot: A kid joins the neighborhood mob, gets a cool nickname, does a lot of illegal stuff with his friends, and ends up in witness protection while narrating the whole wild ride.
Guy joins Not-so-nice Guy Club, has fun with crimes, but the whole thing comes crashing down like a house made of spaghetti.
Dude meets charismatic delinquent, learns to earn with style, and delivers groceries to an unforgettable family.
Ambitious young fellow ditches school books for extortion ledgers, rollercoasters through illicit extravagance until reality bites.
A half-Irish fella embraces gastronomic professions but fails at meatball quality control, leading to lots of loud conversations.

movies.title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
movies.overview: Struggling to find his place in the world while juggling school and family, Brooklyn teenager Miles Morales is unexpectedly bitten by a radioactive spider and develops unfathomable powers just like the one and only Spider-Man. While wrestling with the implications of his new abilities, Miles discovers a super collider created by the madman Wilson "Kingpin" Fisk, causing others from across the Spider-Verse to be inadvertently transported to his dimension.

plots.plot: Teen gets bitten by a super-spider, joins a multiverse hangout with multiple versions of a dude in tights, and faces off against a large square guy with anger issues.
Adolescent graffiti artist gets superpowers, befriends porky and noir costume enthusiasts from other universes, and fights massive bald antagonizer.
A web-swinging prodigy accidentally summons cosplay doppelgängers while trying to stop a square-shaped overlord from destroying everything.
A cosmically confused youth collects a bizarre group of costumed misfits to prevent a rotund man from rearranging existence using an experimental tool.
Artistic kid, perpetually stuck in puberty, engages in inter-dimensional collaboration to thwart an overzealous cube aficionado performing disallowed construction.

movies.title: The Empire Strikes Back
movies.overview: The epic saga continues as Luke Skywalker, in hopes of defeating the evil Galactic Empire, learns the ways of the Jedi from aging master Yoda. But Darth Vader is more determined than ever to capture Luke. Meanwhile, rebel leader Princess Leia, cocky Han Solo, Chewbacca, and droids C-3PO and R2-D2 are thrown into various stages of capture, betrayal and despair.

plots.plot: During an intense game of Hide and Seek, a cranky dad chops off the hand of his long-lost son.
Green puppet gives life advice in a swamp while space cowboy gets frozen like a TV dinner.
Giant mailbox on legs struggles on icy field trip; friend talks to himself in a tin can, loses.
Adventure leads heroes into fridge, betrayal by disco-dressed traitor much worse.
Sibling rebellion against oppressive authority: cyborg limb discount, shocking family secrets.

movies.title: The Silence of the Lambs
movies.overview: Clarice Starling is a top student at the FBI's training academy.  Jack Crawford wants Clarice to interview Dr. Hannibal Lecter, a brilliant psychiatrist who is also a violent psychopath, serving life behind bars for various acts of murder and cannibalism.  Crawford believes that Lecter may have insight into a case and that Starling, as an attractive young woman, may be just the bait to draw him out.

plots.plot: Rookie FBI agent gets sent to chat with a creepy psychiatrist in jail for eating people, hoping he’ll help catch another nutjob who likes skin care way too much.
Newbie agent uses her feminine wiles to chum up with a brainy cannibal hoping he’ll draw her a creepy map to capture a guy making a suit out of victims.
Involves a charming inmate who's really into unique diets advising a rookie on catching a man with a questionable leather obsession.
A career starter is drawn into a psychological waltz with a fan of odd protein sources to halt a career-ending wardrobe malpractitioner.
A hopeful badge holder takes notes from an incarcerated culinary enthusiast to prevent a fashion faux pas involving epidermal tailoring.

movies.title: American History X
movies.overview: Derek Vineyard is paroled after serving 3 years in prison for killing two African-American men. Through his brother, Danny Vineyard's narration, we learn that before going to prison, Derek was a skinhead and the leader of a violent white supremacist gang that committed acts of racial crime throughout L.A. and his actions greatly influenced Danny. Reformed and fresh out of prison, Derek severs contact with the gang and becomes determined to keep Danny from going down the same violent path as he did.

plots.plot: Guy with a swastika tattoo finds out Nazis are bad, then tries to stop his little bro from becoming a racist jerk by having heart-to-hearts.
A bald guy learns there's more to life than shaving his head and hating people; like helping his brother not get tattoos.
Out of jail tattoo removal enthusiast discovers sibling has a fascist fan club to disband.
Ex-convict attempts reality-show style intervention to turn his sibling from fascist hairdo enthusiast to normal kid.
Freed individual employs unconventional philosophy to convince a young scholar to rethink admiration for questionable lifestyle guides.

movies.title: Back to the Future
movies.overview: Eighties teenager Marty McFly is accidentally sent back in time to 1955, inadvertently disrupting his parents' first meeting and attracting his mother's romantic interest. Marty must repair the damage to history by rekindling his parents' romance and - with the help of his eccentric inventor friend Doc Brown - return to 1985.

plots.plot: A teen hijacks a car and gets stuck in the 50s, awkwardly dodging his mom's crush while playing Celine Dion on the guitar to fix the timeline.
Young lad time-jumps to flirt with fifties while avoiding a paradoxical love triangle starring himself, his mom, and a Packard-powered contraption.
In a stainless steel box, a juvenile delinquent outraces Oedipus and fixes parental missteps with a bolt from the blue and some rock ‘n’ roll.
Inadvertently romancing a relative in past decades thanks to a mad inventor's shoddy yet shiny work, a rebellious adolescent restores stability using rhythms of rebellion.
Student's journey folding back time due to unconventional science leads to familial rekindling after confusing electricity with attraction.

movies.title: Dead Poets Society
movies.overview: At an elite, old-fashioned boarding school in New England, a passionate English teacher inspires his students to rebel against convention and seize the potential of every day, courting the disdain of the stern headmaster.

plots.plot: A guy named Keating teaches a bunch of kids to stand on desks and shout poetry, causing one of them to do something really dumb, while the old headmaster gets all cranky.
Boarding school boys discover poetry isn't just for girls and old timers, while an English teacher gets them reevaluating their life goals while balancing on furniture.
An enthusiast of words and wooden furniture toppers gives a crash course in how to annoy school management in style.
Teenagers in suits get a crash course in playing statue on wooden platforms while moonlighting as live-action romantics.
A revolution against traditional pedagogic practices begins with a well-polished piece of furniture and ends with pageantry of verbal elegance through archaic literature recitals.

movies.title: The Great Dictator
movies.overview: Dictator Adenoid Hynkel tries to expand his empire while a poor Jewish barber tries to avoid persecution from Hynkel's regime.

plots.plot: A dictator with a funny mustache dreams of world domination but can't even control his pants, while his doppelgänger, a humble barber, gets mixed up in his shenanigans and accidentally gives a heartfelt speech.
The guy who's really into ballet goes full dictator mode, but a regular dude with scissors and some shaving cream somehow steals the limelight.
One man loves a certain hand gesture more than anything else, while another just wants to avoid attention but ends up giving a speech anyway.
A barber and a leader switch roles, making it awkward for a whole nation that doesn't know which one to laugh at.
A man with style challenges a man with stubble, simultaneously causing chaos and inspiring hope—but mostly confusion.

movies.title: Sunset Boulevard
movies.overview: A hack screenwriter writes a screenplay for a former silent film star who has faded into Hollywood obscurity.

plots.plot: A washed-up actress lures a broke writer into her mansion, hoping he'll resurrect her glory days while he desperately tries to escape her grip and the screech of her pet monkey.
A struggling guy crashes at a spooky mansion with an ex-diva whose fading fame is only surpassed by the size of her delusions.
Desperate scribbler becomes a wannabe Frankenstein, attempts to reanimate a bygone era using a crumbling shrine and its has-been goddess.
A cash-strapped wordsmith finds himself entangled in the cobwebs of a forgotten shrine to yesteryear, haunted by dreams of comeback grandeur.
An out-of-luck scribe moonlights as a nostalgia archeologist, unearthing the dusty ruins of celluloid dreams under the shadow of impending madness.

movies.title: It's a Wonderful Life
movies.overview: A holiday favourite for generations...  George Bailey has spent his entire life giving to the people of Bedford Falls.  All that prevents rich skinflint Mr. Potter from taking over the entire town is George's modest building and loan company.  But on Christmas Eve the business's $8,000 is lost and George's troubles begin.

plots.plot: Broke dude wishes he'd never been born, cue angel showing him how dull everyone’s life would be without his whining.
Guy’s bad day saves Christmas thanks to a chatty celestial being in need of wings.
Small-town guy's life crisis derailed by magic middle management getting a new job title.
Small-town corporate savior feels underappreciated, wishes for a cosmic redo, granted by a bureaucratic immortal with career ambitions.
Fate of a township's finances hinges on heavenly mentorship, guilt, and no thanks to swine-like plutocrats.

movies.title: Apocalypse Now
movies.overview: At the height of the Vietnam war, Captain Benjamin Willard is sent on a dangerous mission that, officially, "does not exist, nor will it ever exist." His goal is to locate - and eliminate - a mysterious Green Beret Colonel named Walter Kurtz, who has been leading his personal army on illegal guerrilla missions into enemy territory.

plots.plot: A soldier is sent to the jungles of Vietnam to terminate a Colonel who went full 'king of the crazies' with his own army of fanboys.
Vietnam trip with explosive surf lessons, helicopter rides, and a VIP tour to meet the jungle's reigning madman.
A man rides a boat through human insanity, stopping only for napalm-infused air freshener and a demented poetry reading.
The journey involves philosophical rambling, karaoke with airstrikes, and a surprise cameo by the deity of delusion.
It's like hunting for the god of anarchy in a humid Eden, where judgment and rationality dissolve faster than a sugar cube in napalm.

movies.title: The Lion King
movies.overview: Young lion prince Simba, eager to one day become king of the Pride Lands, grows up under the watchful eye of his father Mufasa; all the while his villainous uncle Scar conspires to take the throne for himself. Amid betrayal and tragedy, Simba must confront his past and find his rightful place in the Circle of Life.

plots.plot: Little lion becomes a fugitive after a family feud gone wrong, learns life lessons from two questionable mentors, and eventually reclaims his throne.
Orphaned cat with royal ambitions goes on a spirit quest, patches things up with the family, then ousts his squatters.
After a bad family reunion, a wild cat embraces hakuna matata, finds courage, and leads a strong takeover of property mismanaged by relatives.
Princely feline in a tropical setting overcomes trust issues through song therapy and ends vandalism of his birthplace by hooligans.
Furry linguist in a sun-drenched realm employs his vocal talents to end the reign of a resentment-fueled former dignitary.

movies.title: Avengers: Endgame
movies.overview: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War, the universe is in ruins due to the efforts of the Mad Titan, Thanos. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers must assemble once more in order to undo Thanos' actions and restore order to the universe once and for all, no matter what consequences may be in store.

plots.plot: Superheroes play mix-and-match with time to steal shiny stones from a space warlord, all while pretending they invented friendship.
A group of oddly-dressed humans conduct an elaborate heist through time to swipe magical gems from a muscle-bound purple dictator.
Time-traveling misfits bungle a cosmic jewelry snatch, hoping to undo a bad snap from Mr. Grape Face.
Displaced warriors engage in temporal raids against cosmic jewelry custodians to reset reality after an overzealous universe prune.
Temporal bandits attempt universal reset by ransacking precious artifacts from an intergalactic gaoler, overseen by a melancholic titan.

movies.title: The Matrix
movies.overview: Set in the 22nd century, The Matrix tells the story of a computer hacker who joins a group of underground insurgents fighting the vast and powerful computers who now rule the earth.

plots.plot: A computer geek discovers he's living in a giant computer game, learns kung fu in minutes, and breaks everything, including physics.
Guy takes red pill, follows creepy goths, and fights robots in leather pajamas through dial-up modem connections.
In a world where humans are batteries, one dude decides he doesn't want to power a blender and joins a kung fu club.
A bespectacled sleepwalker who's way into coding meets people who say the world is a CD-ROM, and then he learns to kick walls.
Binary programmer discovers his reality is a GIF loop, but then discovers the cheat code embedded in society's OS.

movies.title: Gladiator
movies.overview: After the death of Emperor Marcus Aurelius, his devious son takes power and demotes Maximus, one of Rome's most capable generals who Marcus preferred. Eventually, Maximus is forced to become a gladiator and battle to the death against other men for the amusement of paying audiences.

plots.plot: Top general gets demoted to the gladiator unemployment line after his boss kicks the bucket and the boss's mopey son takes over, but he fights his way up like a true Roman action hero while dreaming of frolicking through wheat fields.
Tough soldier goes from commanding armies to slicing and dicing in Rome's coliseum because the boss's brat had daddy issues.
After falling from grace thanks to nepotism, a former war hero turns into an unwilling sports star, battling for high fives from an audience that loves seeing blood but hates the sight of ambition.
Demoted by a melancholic employer's kid, one-time elite descends into arena showbiz, proving that fighting to the death is less cushy than corporate warfare.
Mighty force-wielder becomes a crowd's ultimate spectacle by day, only to pine for simpler times of wheat-surfing at dusk.

movies.title: The Shining
movies.overview: Jack Torrance accepts a caretaker job at the Overlook Hotel, where he, along with his wife Wendy and their son Danny, must live isolated from the rest of the world for the winter. But they aren't prepared for the madness that lurks within.

plots.plot: Frustrated writer needs some peace, takes family to secluded haunted hotel; ends up bonding with ghosts more than wife and kid, goes on a murder spree.
Struggling novelist goes nuts playing with hotel spirits while son becomes a human walkie-talkie, and mom gets a crash course in axe-dodging.
An aspiring author on a strict diet of ennui and ghostly hallucinations finds symmetry in smashing doors while his kid scribbles psychic doodles.
Ambitious scribe's winter writer's retreat turns chaotic when winter blues align with spectral encouragement to sharpen thoughts—and tools.
Snowed-in custodian trades coherence for spectral chats, hockey rituals, and meets an office barista licensed to psyche.

movies.title: The Help
movies.overview: Aibileen Clark is a middle-aged African-American maid who has spent her life raising white children and has recently lost her only son; Minny Jackson is an African-American maid who has often offended her employers despite her family's struggles with money and her desperate need for jobs; and Eugenia "Skeeter" Phelan is a young white woman who has recently moved back home after graduating college to find out her childhood maid has mysteriously disappeared. These three stories intertwine to explain how life in Jackson, Mississippi revolves around "the help"; yet they are always kept at a certain distance because of racial lines.

plots.plot: Southern white girl teams up with sassy black maids to write a scandalous book about racist employers and their nasty toilets.
Outrageous pie incident leads to a bestseller and some embarrassed racists.
Young writer and a live-in daycare unite to shake things up for narrow-minded employers.
Writer prefers stories of secret nannies over local gossip and learns about a secret ingredient.
Writer investigates housekeepers' tales, exposing Mississippi's messy social expectations through a secret project.

movies.title: Coco
movies.overview: Despite his family’s baffling generations-old ban on music, Miguel dreams of becoming an accomplished musician like his idol, Ernesto de la Cruz. Desperate to prove his talent, Miguel finds himself in the stunning and colorful Land of the Dead following a mysterious chain of events. Along the way, he meets charming trickster Hector, and together, they set off on an extraordinary journey to unlock the real story behind Miguel's family history.

plots.plot: A kid obsessed with music ends up in the afterlife where the dead are more lively than his family.
A guitar-loving kid and a raggedy skeleton roam a colorful boneyard to crash a concert.
Young would-be musician takes a trip where forgetting to play means disappearing forever.
Boy travels unique afterlife risking it all to strum away from family traditions.
Accidentally noclipping into a vibrant bone realm requires extreme spectral permissions.

movies.title: Star Wars
movies.overview: Princess Leia is captured and held hostage by the evil Imperial forces in their effort to take over the galactic Empire. Venturesome Luke Skywalker and dashing captain Han Solo team together with the loveable robot duo R2-D2 and C-3PO to rescue the beautiful princess and restore peace and justice in the Empire.

plots.plot: Farm boy ditches chores, teams up with a hairy co-pilot, and accidentally becomes a hero by destroying a space donut.
Blonde farmer joins high-stakes space road trip with wizard ghost and metal trash cans against a guy who likes heavy breathing.
Naïve kid picks up skills quickly from a wanderer, hangs out with a duo of bickering chatty metal guys and helps explode moon-sized battle station.
A wailing metallic servant, a silent dome, and a naive planet boy crash a space party to rescue royalty and blow up property.
Brother smuggler, explosive toy, glowing swords, and masked asthmatic manage to make sparks fly in deep space chaos.

movies.title: Michael Jackson's Thriller
movies.overview: A night at the movies turns into a nightmare when Michael and his date are attacked by a horde of bloody-thirsty zombies. On top of the success of the Thriller album and Michael Jackson's electrifying performance at Motown 25, the short film/music video for "Thriller" established Jackson as an international superstar and global phenomenon. Thriller is credited for transforming music videos into a serious art form, breaking down racial barriers in popular entertainment, popularizing the making-of documentary format and creating a home video market. The success transformed Jackson into a dominant force in global pop culture. In 2009, it became the first music video inducted into the United States National Film Registry by the Library of Congress as "culturally, historically or aesthetically significant". "Thriller" was also Jackson's seventh and final U.S. Hot 100 Top 10 hit from the Thriller album. It was the first album in history to have seven U.S. Top 10s.

plots.plot: Jackson turns date night at the movies into a zombie apocalypse dance party, proving 80s music really is to die for.
Singer leads a street performance with undead fans in pursuit, redefining 'killer moves' for confused spectators.
Guy wears cool jacket, turns into a werewolf and freaks the heck out of his companion, but then sings about it, so it's all good.
In an era-defining spectacle, a pop icon's date night quickly dissolves into a night of moonwalks with the undead.
Dude can't decide if horror or musical, settles for both, launches a thriller in the moonlit streets with questionable companions.

movies.title: Top Gun: Maverick
movies.overview: After more than thirty years of service as one of the Navy’s top aviators, and dodging the advancement in rank that would ground him, Pete “Maverick” Mitchell finds himself training a detachment of TOP GUN graduates for a specialized mission the likes of which no living pilot has ever seen.

plots.plot: Aging flyboy returns to school, outmaneuvers drones, mentors cocky juniors, and climbs into a plane like he's not past his prime.
Action figure teaches new 'I'm cooler than you' class how to defy speed limits and gravity—while maxing out his eyebrow raise.
Wise old sky pirate assembles reckless kids to flaunt rules, stressing parental insurance policies and the government.
Former rebel finds himself in boot camp for the sky, realizing he’s more Magic 8-Ball than Magic Man.
Seasoned thrill-seeker wrestles with gravity, bureaucracy, and the inevitability of becoming a desk chair navigator.

movies.title: A Clockwork Orange
movies.overview: In a near-future Britain, young Alexander DeLarge and his pals get their kicks beating and raping anyone they please. When not destroying the lives of others, Alex swoons to the music of Beethoven. The state, eager to crack down on juvenile crime, gives an incarcerated Alex the option to undergo an invasive procedure that'll rob him of all personal agency. In a time when conscience is a commodity, can Alex change his tune?

plots.plot: Teen with a Beethoven fetish goes on a violent crime spree, gets caught, and then chooses an experimental therapy that ends his life of crime but ruins his love for classical jams.
A mob boss fanboy with a classical music addiction finds the government meddling in his weekly hobby of chaos and disorder.
Dude with trust issues teams up with asshats, lands in hot water, and learns that even government therapy can't help you if you're a blockhead.
Orchestrating mayhem while singing about the glories of old Ludwig, our protagonist rocks as the government's test dummy for dubious rehabilitation techniques.
Imagine combining Mozart wrestling with social responsibility, and you'll understand our antihero's struggle amidst a barrage of controversial corrections.

movies.title: Django Unchained
movies.overview: With the help of a German bounty hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal Mississippi plantation owner.

plots.plot: A German dentist teams up with a slave who's really into pyrotechnics to crash the South's worst wedding.
German guy and his sidekick crash a meat-enthusiast's party to save a lady and test their acting skills.
A recliner from Mississippi loses a chatty chess game, causing a ruckus among cotton enthusiasts.
A passionate piccolo lover learns the risks of trusting a willing horse-enthusiast far from snow.
Teeth expert challenges beans aficionado to a deceiving duel; fireworks and redecorations ensue.

movies.title: The Kid
movies.overview: A tramp cares for a boy after he's abandoned as a newborn by his mother. Later the mother has a change of heart and aches to be reunited with her son.

plots.plot: A vagrant raises a baby tossed like trash, then mom decides motherhood isn't so bad after all.
Homeless guy finds baby-sized dumpster treasure, turns it into mini sidekick, mom regrets letting go.
A shabby wanderer adopts a crying tiny human, then has to deal with a regretful former owner.
Street-wise scoundrel acquires small human, which is later reclaimed by its original creator.
Aimless pedestrian inadvertently acquires juvenile, while biological fabricator seeks return.

movies.title: Scarface
movies.overview: After getting a green card in exchange for assassinating a Cuban government official, Tony Montana stakes a claim on the drug trade in Miami. Viciously murdering anyone who stands in his way, Tony eventually becomes the biggest drug lord in the state, controlling nearly all the cocaine that comes through Miami. But increased pressure from the police, wars with Colombian drug cartels and his own drug-fueled paranoia serve to fuel the flames of his eventual downfall.

plots.plot: Cuban dude with a bulletproof ego turns Miami into a snowstorm, makes everyone mad, and dodges more bullets than Keanu.
Immigrant trades one bad job for another, skyrockets to fame with nose candy, but spoiler—gravity is a thing.
Man conquers city with powdered enthusiasm until he forgets scissors can cut his strings when tangled.
Guys from one sweaty place move to another, swap moral codes for nosebleeds, and learn bulletproof glass isn't.
Ravenous entrepreneur achieves empire, loses it to excessive starch inhalation and poor office security design.

movies.title: Good Will Hunting
movies.overview: Headstrong yet aimless, Will Hunting has a genius-level IQ but chooses to work as a janitor at MIT. When he secretly solves highly difficult graduate-level math problems, his talents are discovered by Professor Gerald Lambeau, who decides to help the misguided youth reach his potential. When Will is arrested for attacking a police officer, Professor Lambeau makes a deal to get leniency for him if he gets court-ordered therapy. Eventually, therapist Dr. Sean Maguire helps Will confront the demons that are holding him back.

plots.plot: A janitor with a computer for a brain juggles brawls, bonding therapy sessions, and solving math puzzles at MIT, while dodging the long arm of the law and becoming a legend.
A mop-wielding math magician gets court-ordered counseling to avoid jail, shocking everyone with more scribbles on chalkboards than on criminal records.
A youthful genius prefers cleaning hallways to arithmetic accolades, but cleaning up himself proves trickier when legal woes demand emotional unwinding.
Custodial mathematician secretly resolves complex theorems, accidentally tangoes with justice system tango for fisticuffs, then finds shrinkage more therapeutic than cleaning.
An undiscovered child prodigy trades brushing stains for algorithmic achievements until an unexpected confrontation with societal expectations sets him scrubbing personal insecurities.

movies.title: Vertigo
movies.overview: A retired San Francisco detective suffering from acrophobia investigates the strange activities of an old friend's wife, all the while becoming dangerously obsessed with her.

plots.plot: Scaredy-cat detective falls for his buddy's wife, only to find himself chasing her ghost up and down stairs.
Ex-cop with a fear of heights climbs a personal Everest by losing his heart (and sanity) over a mystical double take involving plunging dames.
Height-fearing guy goes nuts over a woman, twice; gravity may or may not be a key player.
Former badge, who gets dizzy at tall ledges, gets tangled up in a mind-bending love triangle with one girl, or maybe two.
A man, defeated by ladders and long drops, crafts a loop of love, confusion, and vertiginous deception.

movies.title: Alien
movies.overview: During its return to the earth, commercial spaceship Nostromo intercepts a distress signal from a distant planet. When a three-member team of the crew discovers a chamber containing thousands of eggs on the planet, a creature inside one of the eggs attacks an explorer. The entire crew is unaware of the impending nightmare set to descend upon them when the alien parasite planted inside its unfortunate host is birthed.

plots.plot: Spaceship crew finds eggs on an alien planet, one explorer proves he's not an egg-cellent protector and soon finds himself birthing a nightmare through the chest.
Space truckers answer a universal butt-dial, and end up babysitting an unwanted pet that hatches surprise family meals.
Crew meets extreme pest control problem with a touch of extreme birth complications, soundtracked by endless screaming.
Everyone's new nightmare fur-friend turns corporate policy into a deadly 'watch your back' situation.
An uninvited guest with a precision head-jumping technique disrupts an interstellar nap, leaving crew pondering DIY extermination options.

movies.title: The Departed
movies.overview: To take down South Boston's Irish Mafia, the police send in one of their own to infiltrate the underworld, not realizing the syndicate has done likewise. While an undercover cop curries favor with the mob kingpin, a career criminal rises through the police ranks. But both sides soon discover there's a mole among them.

plots.plot: Undercover cop and gangster play real-life Spy vs. Spy, but forget who they're actually spying for.
A cop becomes best frenemies with a mobster while both forget their real bosses are stalking them with binoculars.
Two organizations play a game of 'Who's the real rat?' leading to some serious cheese shortage and identity crisis.
Professional chaos ensues when a rat joins the cops and a mouse infiltrates the cheese factory, leading to a severe rodent problem.
An amoral game of trust issues and misplaced loyalty ensues when everyone realizes they've been tricked by people who need better vetting processes.

movies.title: Casablanca
movies.overview: In Casablanca, Morocco in December 1941, a cynical American expatriate meets a former lover, with unforeseen complications.

plots.plot: Cynical bar owner in Casablanca helps his ex and her husband escape while feeling sorry for himself.
Grumpy bar dude gatekeeps exit visas like some kind of passport troll.
Guy can't decide whether to be a jerk or a hero when his past romance crashes his bar opening hours.
Local watering hole host overcomes existential crisis at the expense of karaoke night.
Expats play cloak and dagger, but only one’s operating with an espresso machine and a smirk.

movies.title: The Truman Show
movies.overview: Every second of every day, from the moment he was born, for the last thirty years, Truman Burbank has been the unwitting star of the longest running, most popular documentary-soap opera in history. The picture-perfect town of Seahaven that he calls home is actually a gigantic soundstage. Truman's friends and family - everyone he meets, in fact - are actors. He lives every moment under the unblinking gaze of thousands of hidden TV cameras.

plots.plot: Average guy's life is secretly the world's longest reality TV show, but he has the charisma of a soggy flannel.
His perfect town is a giant lie, but at least his pain brings high ratings.
Born into spotlight, unknowingly the epitome of anti-privacy.
Existence as a live broadcast, driven mad by manipulated serendipity.
He's a lifetime puppet in a global voyeuristic project.

movies.title: Singin' in the Rain
movies.overview: In 1927 Hollywood, a silent film production company and cast make a difficult transition to sound.

plots.plot: A silent movie star realizes he sounds like a goose, rips off his tap shoes for a musical rampage, and gets the girl without drowning in rain.
A 1920s actor wishes his voice stuck to his face while his silent movie romance gets dubbed by a chorus line scam.
A grumpy mime accidents his sound career with rain therapy and cha-cha steps, sparking celebrity mutiny.
When lip-sync fools audiences, a wet publicity stunt births a loud love story in a silent era's demise.
Syncing chaos looms as old film reels whirl into vocal nightmares, until precipitation choreography fills the sonic void.

movies.title: Joker
movies.overview: During the 1980s, a failed stand-up comedian is driven insane and turns to a life of crime and chaos in Gotham City while becoming an infamous psychopathic crime figure.

plots.plot: A clown with a tragic backstory gets tired of bombed performances and decides to turn Gotham into his personal comedy club full of explosive laughter.
In the city known for its architectural stability, an unemployed jester perfects his own kind of circus, making sure everyone gets the joke—even if it's lethal.
A twinkle-toed entertainer gets dismissed one too many times and switches from punchlines to just plain punches, putting the 'fun' in funfair anarchy.
When you mix a colorful past and severe societal neglect, you get an unexpected master of chaos who finds laughter in the gravest of places.
The reality of unsound mirth redefines notoriety as an infamous icon smiles back at the city's bleak expectations, his painted face mirroring their unintentional artistry.

movies.title: Reservoir Dogs
movies.overview: A botched robbery indicates a police informant, and the pressure mounts in the aftermath at a warehouse. Crime begets violence as the survivors -- veteran Mr. White, newcomer Mr. Orange, psychopathic parolee Mr. Blonde, bickering weasel Mr. Pink and Nice Guy Eddie -- unravel.

plots.plot: A group of robbers can't trust each other, end up stuck in a warehouse cutting each other's ears off.
Color-coded criminals have trust issues after a botched heist and decide the solution is violence and yelling.
A parody of a prison paint sale where nobody really knows if the colors complement each other, ending in red.
Messy art project using half a dozen primary colors, but someone mixes up all the paints and ruins the canvas.
Ad-hoc crayon convention debates over the best hue, disagrees on shading, and dissolves into a quarrel.

movies.title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
movies.overview: Set ten years after the events of the original, James Cameron’s classic sci-fi action flick tells the story of a second attempt to get rid of rebellion leader John Connor, this time targeting the boy himself. However, the rebellion has sent a reprogrammed terminator to protect Connor.

plots.plot: A killer robot teams up with a whiny kid, fist-fights a cop made of goo, and they bond over a minibike chase.
The metallic dude becomes a nanny, fighting the shiny, stretchy rival, with lots of explosions baked in.
A T-800 trades its kill mode for dad vibes, while dealing with a liquid metal pest hell-bent on a future without rebellion.
A bionic babysitter defends his bratty ward against a shapeshifting officer with a serious metal allergy.
In a future-tweaking mission, an outdated cyber-paternal figure faces off against a mimetic upgrade with severe discipline issues.

movies.title: Dr. Strangelove or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb
movies.overview: After the insane General Jack D. Ripper initiates a nuclear strike on the Soviet Union, a war room full of politicians, generals and a Russian diplomat all frantically try to stop the nuclear strike.

plots.plot: A mad general orders a nuke attack, suits in a room panic, and a wheelchair villain with a robotic arm says 'Mein Fuhrer!' for fun.
An insane military boss goes rogue, tries to start a big boom fest, while folks in fancy seats argue and drop phones.
A rogue warlover attempts global fireworks, but everyone's too busy bickering in a bunker to stop his surprise gift.
Loose lips threaten big bangs while the world's smartest try saving the day in a very enclosed conference meets circus.
A little chat about birds, bees, and end-of-world things as amplified by metallic birds and crazed generals' flights of fancy.

movies.title: Soul
movies.overview: Joe Gardner is a middle school teacher with a love for jazz music. After a successful audition at the Half Note Club, he suddenly gets into an accident that separates his soul from his body and is transported to the You Seminar, a center in which souls develop and gain passions before being transported to a newborn child. Joe must enlist help from the other souls-in-training, like 22, a soul who has spent eons in the You Seminar, in order to get back to Earth.

plots.plot: A music teacher gets a chance to play jazz, but dies and his soul goes on a bizarre mix of babysitting and self-discovery with a rebellious soul who hates Earth.
Wannabe musician gets zapped to soul kindergarten, teaches a stubborn newbie what not caring looks like.
Dude falls into a subway drain, ends up guiding a never-born spirit through an abstract theme park.
Jazz lover escapes celestial path to pester an anti-lifer into living.
Ambitious enthusiast avoids divine bureaucracy by inspiring nihilism with misplaced optimism.

movies.title: Double Indemnity
movies.overview: A rich woman and a calculating insurance agent plot to kill her unsuspecting husband after he signs a double indemnity policy.

plots.plot: A bored wife and a sleazy insurance guy decide to turn hubby into a paycheck by giving his life insurance policy a lethal makeover.
In the quest to become rich or a widow or both, a woman and her insurance pal find that 'accidental death' isn't as easy as the brochure says.
Two people, one murder plan, and a whole lot of smoke – quite literally, as the main duo spends half the movie puffing away while plotting mischief.
When insurance fraud meets homicide, a noir tale unfolds involving lovers who find the fine print more romantic than roses.
Exploiting loopholed life policies for a payout goes awry when too many wrong tongues start flapping.

movies.title: WALL·E
movies.overview: What if mankind had to leave Earth and somebody forgot to turn the last robot off? After hundreds of years doing what he was built for, WALL•E discovers a new purpose in life when he meets a sleek search robot named EVE. EVE comes to realize that WALL•E has inadvertently stumbled upon the key to the planet's future, and races back to space to report to the humans. Meanwhile, WALL•E chases EVE across the galaxy and sets into motion one of the most imaginative adventures ever brought to the big screen.

plots.plot: Lonely trash robot with OCD spends centuries cleaning Earth, falls for a shinier model, and drags her back to the space humans.
A rusty recycling fanatic falls for a curvy eco-warrior who may or may not have a plant fetish.
Debris hoarder follows a sleek import to an orbiting sedentary colony of oversized couch potatoes.
Automated hoarder embarks on a cosmic escapade after encountering an assertive arboreal enthusiast.
Satirical junk-compactor initiates an interstellar liaison with an epochal operator of botanical reconnaissance.

movies.title: Some Like It Hot
movies.overview: Two musicians witness a mob hit and struggle to find a way out of the city before they are found by the gangsters. Their only opportunity is to join an all-girl band as they leave on a tour. To make their getaway they must first disguise themselves as women, then keep their identities secret and deal with the problems this brings - such as an attractive bandmate and a very determined suitor.

plots.plot: Two broke guys dress in drag to escape being killed, then one falls for a real woman and the other gets hit on by an old dude.
After seeing a murder, two guys become women, join a female band, and juggle romance with bad wigs.
Musical gender-bending comedy ensues when two escape artists don skirts, flee danger, and vie for attention.
Jazz tunes, lipstick, and giddy antics follow a wild getaway mission involving dangerous gents and sweet serenades.
Cross-dressing musicians dodge trouble, fumble love lines, and find suitor persistence is unexpectedly flattering.

movies.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
movies.overview: Harry, Ron and Hermione continue their quest to vanquish the evil Voldemort once and for all. Just as things begin to look hopeless for the young wizards, Harry discovers a trio of magical objects that endow him with powers to rival Voldemort's formidable skills.

plots.plot: In a school showdown, the glasses-wearing wizard faces the noseless villain while pretending a stick is a lethal weapon.
Young wand-waver takes down creepy reptile guy with the help of his friends and a fancy bowl haircut.
Scarred dude, after destroying some enchanted trinkets, gets into an awkward hug before their argument literally crumbles away.
Final boarding school conflict involves glow sticks, questionable safety measures, and a guy super proud of his hairless nose.
Magic enthusiast wins the annual morality debate against a serpentine competitive bald guy, with ludicrously elaborate light shows.

movies.title: Three Billboards Outside Ebbing, Missouri
movies.overview: After seven months have passed without a culprit in her daughter's murder case, Mildred Hayes makes a bold move, painting three signs leading into her town with a controversial message directed at Bill Willoughby, the town's revered chief of police. When his second-in-command Officer Jason Dixon, an immature mother's boy with a penchant for violence, gets involved, the battle between Mildred and Ebbing's law enforcement is only exacerbated.

plots.plot: A mom rents three billboards to tell the world the cops are slacking on catching her kid's killer. Chaos, fire, and a bad cop with anger issues ensue.
Angry mom's billboard campaign against lazy lawmen spirals into town-wide circus of rage, haircuts, and molotov cocktails.
Mom starts a billboard war and accidentally turns small-town cops into celebrities for their ineptitude.
Mom tries guerrilla advertising to bring justice but ends up starting an accidental tourism boom for the world's worst cops.
A grieving mother challenges a town's moral hygiene via a trio of roadside manifesto boards, sparking philosophical duels and explosive altercations with the unwashed blue force.

movies.title: My Neighbor Totoro
movies.overview: Two sisters move to the country with their father in order to be closer to their hospitalized mother, and discover the surrounding trees are inhabited by Totoros, magical spirits of the forest. When the youngest runs away from home, the older sister seeks help from the spirits to find her.

plots.plot: Two sisters meet a giant bear-owl-rabbit who feels like a plush toy come to life, accidentally summon a Catbus, and somehow this helps them cope with their mom's hospital stay.
City kids move to the boonies, make friends with a chonky forest guardian, and hitch rides in a fever-dream cat-shaped vehicle.
Kids with bad sense of direction rely on a dubious woodland guide resembling a giant living furby gone wild.
Children interact with an invisible force that's too large for its own good, causing transportation madness.
Offspring of a field researcher discover a huge fuzzy recluse capable of summoning a bizarre transportation animal.

movies.title: Rashomon
movies.overview: Brimming with action while incisively examining the nature of truth, "Rashomon" is perhaps the finest film ever to investigate the philosophy of justice. Through an ingenious use of camera and flashbacks, Kurosawa reveals the complexities of human nature as four people recount different versions of the story of a man's murder and the rape of his wife.

plots.plot: A woman gets attacked, her husband ends up dead, and four people can't agree on the murder mystery reality show they just witnessed.
Everyone’s got a wild story about a samurai family drama, but no one's quite sure who deserves the Oscar for best liar.
It's like detective work in ancient Japan, but without DNA tests, just squabbling storytellers with really bad memories.
An epic game of 'he said, she said, and that weird guy over there said' plays out in feudal Japan’s court of lawlessness.
A quadrilateral of unreliable nonsense unfolds in the woods, proving that truth is just as confounding as their hairstyles.

movies.title: Pride & Prejudice
movies.overview: A story of love and life among the landed English gentry during the Georgian era. Mr. Bennet is a gentleman living in Hertfordshire with his overbearing wife and five daughters, but if he dies their house will be inherited by a distant cousin whom they have never met, so the family's future happiness and security is dependent on the daughters making good marriages.

plots.plot: Snobby guy falls for sassy girl, but his social skills are so bad that she almost marries his cousin for laughs.
Dad with five daughters tries to marry them off to any guy not allergic to weddings.
Socially awkward aristocrat does the emotional hokey pokey with a feisty lady through awkward dance parties.
In a world where dance parties determine love, a wealthy introvert awkwardly courts a woman at his favorite awkward party.
Courtship dances take center stage as judging a book by its cover ensures relationship misunderstandings in fancy attire.

movies.title: 2001: A Space Odyssey
movies.overview: Humanity finds a mysterious object buried beneath the lunar surface and sets off to find its origins with the help of HAL 9000, the world's most advanced super computer.

plots.plot: Smart ape finds a big black rock, fast forward to space, where a computer tries to murder everyone, but hey, evolution's trippy like that.
Astronauts and a deadly GPS embark on a merry journey with their pet space monolith.
Cosmic slab inspires monkeys, humans, and a homicidal calculator.
A mysterious obstruction ignites a celestial scavenger hunt with a defective deep-space guide.
Eons jump from primitive clobbering to orbital mishaps, courtesy of an enigmatic relic and its glitchy AI acolyte.

movies.title: The Thing
movies.overview: In the winter of 1982, a twelve-man research team at a remote Antarctic research station discovers an alien buried in the snow for over 100,000 years. Soon unfrozen, the form-changing creature wreaks havoc, creates terror... and becomes one of them.

plots.plot: A shape-shifting alien thaws out and crashes an Antarctic dude-party, playing the worst game of 'Guess Who' ever.
Frosty fiend says 'Who wore it best?' by wearing everyone, secrets, paranoia, and charred leftovers ensue.
An alien antisocial club struggles with self-identity issues in the coldest game of 'Among Us' ever recorded.
Unexpected roommates in Antarctica discover an uninvited shapeshifting ice buddy, shenanigans follow.
Antarctic gents bond over a cold war with identity politics from outer space, aspiring for solitude.

movies.title: Hidden Figures
movies.overview: The untold story of Katherine G. Johnson, Dorothy Vaughan and Mary Jackson – brilliant African-American women working at NASA and serving as the brains behind one of the greatest operations in history – the launch of astronaut John Glenn into orbit. The visionary trio crossed all gender and race lines to inspire generations to dream big.

plots.plot: Three super-smart ladies prove that while men can reach for the stars, they still need a woman's math to get there without exploding.
In a place where you can launch people into space but can't decide on restroom equality, a few math wizards reshape the trajectory of both rockets and respect.
NASA discovers equations are more reliable than segregation, all thanks to some calculators you can't buy at the store.
While NASA engineers worry about rockets, these folks calculate trajectories and dodge prejudice like expert space navigators.
Mid-20th century math wizards defy societal norms to assist a giant organization that loves big launches but not workplace diversity.

movies.title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
movies.overview: The Grand Budapest Hotel tells of a legendary concierge at a famous European hotel between the wars and his friendship with a young employee who becomes his trusted protégé. The story involves the theft and recovery of a priceless Renaissance painting, the battle for an enormous family fortune and the slow and then sudden upheavals that transformed Europe during the first half of the 20th century.

plots.plot: A fancy hotel concierge seduces rich old ladies and steals art, dragging a hapless lobby boy into his chaotic escape plan.
A slick hotel guy and his whiny helper try not to get murdered over a glam granny's stolen painting.
Classy hotel staff moonlights as gigolo, ends up in an art heist with a teenage bellhop.
Bellboy becomes sidekick for conspiracy freak show in luxury accommodations.
Antique aroma enthusiast befriends young haircut in colorful hotel escapade involving painting controversy.

movies.title: The Wolf of Wall Street
movies.overview: A New York stockbroker refuses to cooperate in a large securities fraud case involving corruption on Wall Street, corporate banking world and mob infiltration. Based on Jordan Belfort's autobiography.

plots.plot: A guy gets rich by selling crappy stocks, marries models, parties hard, snorts enough coke to kill a rhino, and yells at people while the FBI tries to take him down.
A loud-mouthed finance dude earns zillions, spends it on yachts, hookers, and head-spinning parties, but learns that prison doesn't have a luxury suite option.
A fast-talking salesman creates a zoo of misfits, trades widgets, dodges lawmen, and gets really good at aerobics during surprise inspections.
A conman treats the stock market like a fast food joint while hosting wardrobe-optional seminars on office culture.
A hyper capitalist extends 'gourmet inflation' by luring giddy clients with exotic merchandise and ends with an involuntary sabbatical in minimalistic accommodations.

movies.title: Jojo Rabbit
movies.overview: A World War II satire that follows a lonely German boy whose world view is turned upside down when he discovers his single mother is hiding a young Jewish girl in their attic. Aided only by his idiotic imaginary friend, Adolf Hitler, Jojo must confront his blind nationalism.

plots.plot: A young boy’s imaginary pal, Hitler, is bad at giving life advice, especially when mom is hiding a Jewish girl upstairs.
A kid’s best buddy and mentor is the least qualified mustache man, leading to awkward family secrets and a crisis of belief.
German youth finds attic surprises and questions his choice of imaginary friends.
Boy idolizes failed artist, but attic revelations paint history's worst still life.
In a war-torn town, child's misguided hero worship clashes with attic hospitality.

movies.title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
movies.overview: Year three at Hogwarts means new fun and challenges as Harry learns the delicate art of approaching a Hippogriff, transforming shape-shifting Boggarts into hilarity and even turning back time. But the term also brings danger: soul-sucking Dementors hover over the school, an ally of the accursed He-Who-Cannot-Be-Named lurks within the castle walls, and fearsome wizard Sirius Black escapes Azkaban. And Harry will confront them all.

plots.plot: Harry spends his third year dodging soul-sucking Dementors, befriends a werewolf, and discovers that his fugitive godfather rides an airborne predator.
A boy wizard learns to handle flying chickens, travel through time, and clears the name of a shaggy escapee.
The young sorcerer finds out his worst fear is close: a living embodiment of teenage awkwardness swarming his school.
Young wand-wielder's hoodie floats in the wind like a wizardly fashion statement while trying to win a deadly staring contest with an invisible beast.
Juvenile magical prodigy discovers that transparent scavengers enjoy a holiday at his educational institution.

movies.title: Citizen Kane
movies.overview: Newspaper magnate Charles Foster Kane is taken from his mother as a boy and made the ward of a rich industrialist. As a result, every well-meaning, tyrannical or self-destructive move he makes for the rest of his life appears in some way to be a reaction to that deeply wounding event.

plots.plot: Rich guy spends life collecting newspaper headlines and trashy souvenirs, then dies whispering about his sled.
Media tycoon controls headlines but wishes he controlled his childhood toy instead.
Big boss crashes and burns, not from scandals, but nostalgia for winter fun.
Tabloid mogul's life unfolds as a quest for a snow toy that got away.
The secret to a mogul's rise and fall lies on a snowy incline.

movies.title: Lawrence of Arabia
movies.overview: The story of British officer T.E. Lawrence's mission to aid the Arab tribes in their revolt against the Ottoman Empire during the First World War. Lawrence becomes a flamboyant, messianic figure in the cause of Arab unity but his psychological instability threatens to undermine his achievements.

plots.plot: British guy in a bathrobe decides sand is more fun than rain, turns desert warfare into a costume party before losing his marbles.
A pale dude swaps his suit for a robe, becomes a desert celebrity, but forgets war isn't a fashion show.
Man with sun sensitivity gets sunburnt while convincing others that camels are a viable warfare strategy.
A foreigner rides fancy across the desert, uniting bickering locals with charisma and questionable mental health.
Someone prefers sandy locales to Europe's mud, sometimes dresses flamboyantly, and ultimately questions his reality.

movies.title: The Imitation Game
movies.overview: Based on the real life story of legendary cryptanalyst Alan Turing, the film portrays the nail-biting race against time by Turing and his brilliant team of code-breakers at Britain's top-secret Government Code and Cypher School at Bletchley Park, during the darkest days of World War II.

plots.plot: A socially awkward genius invents the first AI by building a computer to beat Nazis, then gets punished for his love life.
Genius guy cracks Nazis' secret messages, but instead of a party, he gets a jail sentence for not liking girls.
Smart dude builds a giant metal box to play mind games with Nazis, avoids showering, and somehow still wins.
Misfit mathematician teams up with nerd squad to outwit evil villains, using a brainy machine that goes beep boop.
A quiet weekend of number-solving at a British estate casually decides the fate of humanity.

movies.title: Kill Bill: The Whole Bloody Affair
movies.overview: An assassin is shot and almost killed by her ruthless employer, Bill, and other members of their assassination circle – but she lives to plot her vengeance.

plots.plot: An ex-assassin wakes up from a coma, realizes she's pregnant, and decides to butcher her former bosses one by one, starting with a nurse who stole her shoes.
A woman slices, dices, and chops her way through international cuisine chefs and schoolgirl ninjas to settle a food fight with her ex.
A sleepy ex-cohort wields a custom vehicle to mangle a horntexan, guided by a glow sword smith.
Former colleague decollates her ex-mentor's underlings with a blunt gardening tool, proving horticulture holds hatred.
An unconscious florist escapes herbal slumber, only to prune five fellow pruners, saving the leaping frog man for dessert.

movies.title: The Deer Hunter
movies.overview: A group of working-class friends decide to enlist in the Army during the Vietnam War and finds it to be hellish chaos -- not the noble venture they imagined. Before they left, Steven married his pregnant girlfriend -- and Michael and Nick were in love with the same woman. But all three are different men upon their return.

plots.plot: Group of buddies go from shooting deer to dodging bullets in Vietnam; come back only to lose their sanity over awkward love triangles.
Blue-collar guys go on an overseas trip to meet new people, make new enemies, and try staying in one piece.
Guys who should have stuck to bingo nights and beer instead play a dangerous game overseas, returning with more issues than a tabloid.
Factory dudes hunt animals by day and become hunted by day... and night, in a jungle far away where friendship takes a hit from reality.
A bachelor party turns into a tour of duty with extra 'Don't try this at home' moments; traumatic outcomes guaranteed.

movies.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
movies.overview: Scout Finch, 6, and her older brother Jem live in sleepy Maycomb, Alabama, spending much of their time with their friend Dill and spying on their reclusive and mysterious neighbor, Boo Radley. When Atticus, their widowed father and a respected lawyer, defends a black man named Tom Robinson against fabricated rape charges, the trial and tangent events expose the children to evils of racism and stereotyping.

plots.plot: Kids spy on their weird neighbor while their dad defends a guy in a trial that nobody believes except him.
In a town hotter than Satan's armpit, two kids learn grown-ups are terrible, especially about skin color.
A lawyer goes up against the worst hometown jury ever, as his kids attempt a G-rating creeper stakeout.
In a place with more gossip than sense, children annoy a hermit while dad fights a losing battle against prejudice.
In a land of mudholes and misplaced justice, a family sees why humanity can be both stinkier and scarier than any ghost.

movies.title: Gran Torino
movies.overview: Disgruntled Korean War veteran Walt Kowalski sets out to reform his neighbor, Thao Lor, a Hmong teenager who tried to steal Kowalski's prized possession: a 1972 Gran Torino.

plots.plot: Grumpy old soldier befriends a teenager who tried to steal his car, and they bond over guns, gardening, and gang violence.
A crotchety old vet and a young car thief unexpectedly become best pals, creating the ultimate odd-couple bromance with a side of neighborhood justice.
Old guy glares at everyone until he's forced to play reluctant hero for a kid with a taste for motorized theft.
The gruff man realizes his refusal to tolerate neighbors might just be the key to a ridiculous makeover of their lives.
Cranky elder in a nostalgic machine unexpectedly guides the youth in an unplanned cultural intervention.

movies.overview: At the height of the First World War, two young British soldiers must cross enemy territory and deliver a message that will stop a deadly attack on hundreds of soldiers.

plots.plot: Two soldiers on a really really long walk try to stop a bunch of dudes from running into a really big boom.
A soldier pees on a dead cow, gets milk from a random bucket, and runs a marathon dodging bullets. War is weird.
After learning you can't deliver verbal messages telepathically, a duo chases daylight across artsy mudscapes.
In a race against time, tourism through scenic trenches tests soldiers' anti-mudslide reflexes and whistling talents.
Two messengers opt out of pigeon post, deploying on a muddy quest to halt yet another attempt at glory through doom.

movies.title: Bohemian Rhapsody
movies.overview: Singer Freddie Mercury, guitarist Brian May, drummer Roger Taylor and bass guitarist John Deacon take the music world by storm when they form the rock 'n' roll band Queen in 1970. Hit songs become instant classics. When Mercury's increasingly wild lifestyle starts to spiral out of control, Queen soon faces its greatest challenge yet – finding a way to keep the band together amid the success and excess.

plots.plot: Queen frontman with a million teeth belts out legendary tunes, rocks wacky outfits, and discovers the hazards of too much partying—but still finds time to rock the world's biggest stage.
Epic mustachioed vocalist rides rollercoaster of stardom, fancying both wild parties and guys, but somehow manages to still belt out some smashing hits with his band.
A flamboyant singer perfects operatic rock while inventing new ways to freak out radio DJs and his own band by blending rock, opera, and other bizarre sounds.
Four dudes make music magic with insane anthems, while their colorful lead singer indulges in every hedonistic whim imaginable, till reality hits hard.
A band's frontman, blessed with a voice for commanding stadiums, finds success in blurring sonic boundaries but struggles as life off-stage spirals uncontrollably.

movies.title: North by Northwest
movies.overview: Advertising man Roger Thornhill is mistaken for a spy, triggering a deadly cross-country chase.

plots.plot: A dude in a suit accidentally becomes the world's worst secret agent, gets chased across America by baddies, and ends up scaling Mount Rushmore like it's a rock-climbing wall.
A clueless ad guy finds himself in a Hitchcock version of Where's Waldo, hiding from spies instead of red and white stripes.
A sharp-dressed man going on a cross-country tour he never planned, featuring surprise cornfield attacks and unexpected national monument climbing.
A big shot ad exec learns travel chaos as he wrongfully adopts a new identity ferrying him from city to wilderness, pursued by the world's most persistent employment confirmation team.
When a suit guy's identity crisis leads him into a series of unlikely and aerodynamically questionable scenarios, he concludes that being mistaken for someone else is the ultimate way to sightsee.

movies.title: Kill Bill: Vol. 1
movies.overview: An assassin is shot by her ruthless employer, Bill, and other members of their assassination circle – but she lives to plot her vengeance.

plots.plot: A bride gets ditched at the altar, but instead of posting sad tweets, she decides to make murder her wedding theme.
A woman wakes up from a coma and decides her new hobby will be violently reducing her LinkedIn connections.
A fan of yellow tracksuits embarks on a global tour, but instead of collecting fridge magnets, she collects heads.
After a long nap, a woman adopts a strict five-point agenda involving sharp objects and ex-colleagues.
An ex-employee initiates intense exit interviews with her former team using a katana.

movies.title: Toy Story
movies.overview: Led by Woody, Andy's toys live happily in his room until Andy's birthday brings Buzz Lightyear onto the scene. Afraid of losing his place in Andy's heart, Woody plots against Buzz. But when circumstances separate Buzz and Woody from their owner, the duo eventually learns to put aside their differences.

plots.plot: Cowboy toy flips out when shiny space dude arrives, chaos ensues, lesson about friendship learned.
Plastic sheriff gets jealous and shoves new fancy space cadet out the window, leading to an accidental rescue mission.
Neurotic sheriff figure gets into a turf war with space cadet model, both end up on a road trip gone wrong.
Anxiety-ridden action figure causes a big mess when a rival toy shows up, eventually resulting in an unexpected team-up.
Hierarchical squabble among plastic artifacts leads to existential crisis and accidental sibling bonding adventure.

movies.title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
movies.overview: Peter Parker is unmasked and no longer able to separate his normal life from the high-stakes of being a super-hero. When he asks for help from Doctor Strange the stakes become even more dangerous, forcing him to discover what it truly means to be Spider-Man.

plots.plot: Kid asks magic Santa for a global mind wipe, but messes up and starts a rift that turns New York into a superhero convention.
Teenager's careless wishlist to a grumpy wizard spirals into a reunion of villains who really need therapy.
Intrepid bug boy enlists a monkish shopkeeper to fix a blunder, accidentally turning life into a montage of past grievances.
A young insect-inspired vigilante tries untangling an interdimensional spiderweb after making a quantum-level whoopsie with his life eraser.
After begging a forgetful enchantment from a spatial architect, a larval crime-fighter finds his life entwined in a multidimensional tapestry of irony and existential dread.

movies.title: Aliens
movies.overview: Ripley, the sole survivor of the Nostromo's deadly encounter with the monstrous Alien, returns to Earth after drifting through space in hypersleep for 57 years. Although her story is initially met with skepticism, she agrees to accompany a team of Colonial Marines back to LV-426.

plots.plot: Space lady goes back to a bug-infested planet with a bunch of cocky soldiers, but only she knows how to handle the world's ugliest mother.
Ex-mother of the year reluctantly decides to babysit jarheads and teach them not to play fetch with intergalactic lizards.
A distant moon's venture capital team hires a disgruntled nanny to guide them through an underground adoption clinic gone wrong.
Corporate minds with guns discover childcare is harder when the nursery wants you for breakfast.
Post-nap crisis for space trucker turned daycare operator in abandoned bug hutch.

movies.title: Jurassic Park
movies.overview: A wealthy entrepreneur secretly creates a theme park featuring living dinosaurs drawn from prehistoric DNA. Before opening day, he invites a team of experts and his two eager grandchildren to experience the park and help calm anxious investors. However, the park is anything but amusing as the security systems go off-line and the dinosaurs escape.

plots.plot: Rich dinosaur enthusiast spares no expense but does forget the 'don't let giant killer reptiles run loose' part; chaos, screaming, and a lot of running ensue.
Dino island gets some surprise visitors, a few technological hiccups, and suddenly humans are back on the menu.
In an elaborate, life-threatening game of tag, humans realize the park didn't have the friendliest hamburgers all along.
DNA nostalgia turns fossil fantasy into a survival reality TV show no one signed up for.
Billionaire's petting zoo turns into the worst working holiday as visitors get chomped and stalked by their Cretaceous cousins.

movies.title: The Iron Giant
movies.overview: In the small town of Rockwell, Maine in October 1957, a giant metal machine befriends a nine-year-old boy and ultimately finds its humanity by unselfishly saving people from their own fears and prejudices.

plots.plot: A giant robot crashes from space, befriends a kid, and shuts down a paranoid military dude who thinks the robot's the apocalypse in metal pants.
Big metal dude finds inner zen by stopping his own nuke from vaporizing a sleepy town, all thanks to a short schoolboy's friendship and a botany-loving mechanic.
An out-of-this-world object turns into a rusty pacifist while teaching Cold War small-town folks about compassion, one screw at a time.
Intergalactic hulk channels Gandhian vibe, thwarting town's explosive disaster, inspiring young troublemaker into bot biodiversity.
Space’s hefty underdog halts its atomic evaluation with guidance from a kid’s unexpected metal affinity, redefining the mantle of heroic sacrifice.

movies.title: The Great Escape
movies.overview: The Nazis, exasperated at the number of escapes from their prison camps by a relatively small number of Allied prisoners, relocate them to a high-security 'escape-proof' camp to sit out the remainder of the war. Undaunted, the prisoners plan one of the most ambitious escape attempts of World War II. Based on a true story.

plots.plot: A group of stubborn guys locked up by the Nazis decide their hole-digging skills might as well win a record for the longest tunnel race out of prison.
Nazi plot twist: hiding in a camp full of escape artists who treat barbed wire like a fashionable accessory.
A high-security camp meant to stop creative folks from tunneling turns into a real estate boom for underground hotels.
Imagine a top-tier artist residency program where they create elaborate escape plans instead of sculptures.
When prison bars become mere hurdles for hobbyist escape artists, who knew logistics could form a runway for underground acrobatics?

movies.title: No Country for Old Men
movies.overview: Llewelyn Moss stumbles upon dead bodies, $2 million and a hoard of heroin in a Texas desert, but methodical killer Anton Chigurh comes looking for it, with local sheriff Ed Tom Bell hot on his trail. The roles of prey and predator blur as the violent pursuit of money and justice collide.

plots.plot: A welder finds money at a crime scene, plays hide and seek with a creepy haircut murderer, while the local sheriff just drinks coffee and sighs a lot.
Texan gets lucky in a desert, but ends up playing tag with a coin-flipping psycho and an abacus-wielding grandpa.
Redneck cowboy discovers wealth but forgets to read stranger danger warnings before befriending a philosophizing assassin.
Cash makes a bunny-loving welder flee from a smiling grim reaper, while grandpa cop tries to understand new math.
An unintentional scavenger hunt in a sandy wasteland leads to an existential crisis with a hairdo that belongs in Mordor.

movies.title: Braveheart
movies.overview: Enraged at the slaughter of Murron, his new bride and childhood love, Scottish warrior William Wallace slays a platoon of the local English lord's soldiers. This leads the village to revolt and, eventually, the entire country to rise up against English rule.

plots.plot: Guy with a blue facepaint throws a hissy fit over his wife's murder and goes on a kill-the-English rampage that somehow turns into a Scottish independence movement.
Man with poor fashion sense declares himself leader because someone ticked him off by killing his significant other, resulting in endless sword-swinging antics.
Big movie about a freedom-loving dude who couldn't handle taxes and haircuts, leading to Scottish vs. English chaos on hills.
Ancient times melée between skirt-wearing rebels and armored overlords that spirals out of control when someone offs the wrong lady.
Medieval misfit sparks chaos, leading to a wild Celtic dance of rebellion, all because someone couldn't mind their own marital scandal in a kilt-filled mess.

movies.title: Blade Runner
movies.overview: In the smog-choked dystopian Los Angeles of 2019, blade runner Rick Deckard is called out of retirement to terminate a quartet of replicants who have escaped to Earth seeking their creator for a way to extend their short life spans.

plots.plot: Tired cop tries to retire but must chase down rebel robots who just want dad to extend their batteries.
In future L.A., a detective with a shiny coat hunts runaway life-sized dolls who really love eye contact.
Gritty gumshoe grudgingly goes after press-nosed humanoids, who prefer rain to existential crisis meetings.
Ex-cop reluctantly plays hide and seek with cosmic mannequins who aspire to become real as their warranties expire.
In a neon jungle, a reluctant hunter seeks human copies, unravels bioengineered puzzles, and questions authentic sentience.

movies.title: Gone with the Wind
movies.overview: The spoiled daughter of a Georgia plantation owner conducts a tumultuous romance with a cynical profiteer during the American Civil War and Reconstruction Era.

plots.plot: Southern belle flips her hair and cries a lot over dudes while her life falls apart, thanks to a pesky little war.
Scarlett and fancy suits mix about as well as mint juleps and gunpowder in a war-torn love tornado.
An heiress loses everything but her hunger for fancy hats and a cranky man's affection during a national spat.
A rather green and greed-driven gal gets spun around by fiery adventures, forgetting she shouldn't play with matches.
In Dixieland, persistence and petty grudges last longer than cotton money and military engagements.

movies.title: 12 Years a Slave
movies.overview: In the pre-Civil War United States, Solomon Northup, a free black man from upstate New York, is abducted and sold into slavery.
