Facing cruelty as well as unexpected kindnesses Solomon struggles not only to stay alive, but to retain his dignity. In the twelfth year of his unforgettable odyssey, Solomon’s chance meeting with a Canadian abolitionist will forever alter his life.

plots.plot: Free musician goes on a 12-year vacation without a travel agent, meets mean bosses, but the souvenirs are mainly scars.
Guy plans a music tour, ends up playing unwanted gigs for over a decade, until a Canadian dude bails him out.
Tourist visits Southern states, finds their hiring process shockingly outdated, and the benefits nonexistent.
Man's detour into agriculture lasts over a decade, proving time really does fly when you're not having fun.
An unexpected journey south becomes an intense networking opportunity, mostly involving the whip's end, until nice foreigner intervenes.

movies.title: Raging Bull
movies.overview: The life of boxer Jake LaMotta, whose violence and temper that led him to the top in the ring destroyed his life outside of it.

plots.plot: An angry guy punches out his feelings in a boxing ring but can't control his rage at home.
A pugilistic perfectionist punches to glory, but his fury ruins more than his face.
Dude with mad boxing skills can't stop fighting outside the ring, accidentally turns his life into a soap opera.
In the 1940s, a human whirlwind eats, complains, and occasionally knocks people out, proving that fists and friendships don't mix.
A self-destructive punching machine turns family life into a heavyweight bout, mistaking jealousy for love.

movies.title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
movies.overview: When Dr. Indiana Jones – the tweed-suited professor who just happens to be a celebrated archaeologist – is hired by the government to locate the legendary Ark of the Covenant, he finds himself up against the entire Nazi regime.

plots.plot: An archaeologist fights Nazis to steal a magical box and ends up running from a giant boulder, all while looking dashing in a fedora.
A guy with a whip spends his vacation dodging foreign soldiers, grave rooting, and questioning his career choices in the desert.
Artifact-seeking academic crashes a reptile party in a dusty rave but gets blindsided by history's worst dog walker troop.
Mysterious cube collector upstages mustachioed villains with thrills, eyeliner and some dubious geography classes in a snake spa.
Leather enthusiast forsakes teaching gig to embrace his love for antique boxes, angsty petting zoos, and disrupting S&M rallies in foreign lands.

movies.title: Heat
movies.overview: Obsessive master thief Neil McCauley leads a top-notch crew on various daring heists throughout Los Angeles while determined detective Vincent Hanna pursues him without rest. Each man recognizes and respects the ability and the dedication of the other even though they are aware their cat-and-mouse game may end in violence.

plots.plot: A cop who never sleeps chases a thief who never retires, both way too invested in each other's lives like an odd couple in therapy.
A workaholic detective really wants a bromance with a career criminal, but things get awkward at gunpoint.
In a city where everyone seems to hate banks, an intense hobbyist collects fines while a stressed-out janitor tries to clean up the mess.
A man who hates commitments frequently robs places, while another fellow desperately wants to chat but keeps getting interrupted by gunfire.
When high-functioning professional squads face off, coffee shop meetups are spoiled by relentless paper targets and existential musings.

movies.title: Inside Out
movies.overview: When 11-year-old Riley moves to a new city, her Emotions team up to help her through the transition. Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust and Sadness work together, but when Joy and Sadness get lost, they must journey through unfamiliar places to get back home.

plots.plot: A little girl moves to a big city, and her brain's drama squad freaks out when Happy and Sad get lost in headland.
If emotions had a circus, two clowns decide to wander off during the parade, causing chaos back at the big top.
A team's quarterback and waterworks specialist wander into the mind's forbidden zone, because directions are for amateurs.
Hero and downer travel through cerebral chaos while their colleagues have a meltdown in command central.
A misplaced pursuit of perpetual sunshine leads to cerebrum carnival comedically imploding.

movies.title: Titanic
movies.overview: 101-year-old Rose DeWitt Bukater tells the story of her life aboard the Titanic, 84 years later. A young Rose boards the ship with her mother and fiancé. Meanwhile, Jack Dawson and Fabrizio De Rossi win third-class tickets aboard the ship. Rose tells the whole story from Titanic's departure through to its death—on its first and last voyage—on April 15, 1912.

plots.plot: Rich girl falls for broke artist on a doomed ship, then won't share her floating furniture, proving love sinks after all.
Poor guy scores a free ride on a ship, sketches a naked girl, then becomes an icicle because his girl prefers her own space.
Artist trades poker for icy pain, as old lady's giant boat trip slideshow makes everyone yawn.
Fancy family argues above deck while underpaid orchestra plays upbeat jingles as aquatic tragedy ensues.
Historical disaster study doubles as an exhibit on elaborate jewelry disposal techniques involving aquatic exploration.

movies.title: Guardians of the Galaxy
movies.overview: Light years from Earth, 26 years after being abducted, Peter Quill finds himself the prime target of a manhunt after discovering an orb wanted by Ronan the Accuser.

plots.plot: Galaxy hitchhiker teams up with a raccoon with an anger problem and a tree that's all bark to stop a purple-faced baddie from collecting glowing marbles.
Space scavenger accidentally starts a brawl over a shiny ball and ends up in therapy sessions with a talking tree and a green grump.
A cosmic DJ with a killer 80s playlist annoys a hate group leader by playing keep away with a shiny macguffin.
Dancing outlaw gains crazy entourage, hoards mixtapes, and has serious attachment issues with a glowing talisman.
Intergalactic misfit orchestrates a chaotic prison break after discovering the universe's most corny glowstick, prompting universal authority tantrums.

movies.title: Mulan
movies.overview: To save her father from certain death in the army, a young woman secretly enlists in his place and becomes one of China's greatest heroines in the process.

plots.plot: Young woman chops off her hair, swaps skirt for armor, and fools an entire army, while dragon puppy plays pep talker.
A girl ditches dresses for armor, bosses around a cricket, and teaches a 'macho' squad to sparkle like fireworks.
Determined kid in disguise joins reluctant bros in super soldier program with unforeseen firework finale.
A mutual poncho-swap-and-tactical-army-substitution leads to long-lasting family pride and dragon complications.
With a sleight of hand and a serendipitous bug, a daughter redefines thunderous sibling bonding amidst monumental Asian architecture.

movies.title: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
movies.overview: Harry Potter has lived under the stairs at his aunt and uncle's house his whole life. But on his 11th birthday, he learns he's a powerful wizard—with a place waiting for him at the Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. As he learns to harness his newfound powers with the help of the school's kindly headmaster, Harry uncovers the truth about his parents' deaths—and about the villain who's to blame.

plots.plot: Boy in cupboard discovers he's a wizard, goes to school, makes friends with a redhead and a know-it-all, takes down a wannabe immortal with bad skin.
Kid gets mail, leaves nasty relatives, joins a flying boarding school, finds out some dude with no nose is having an identity crisis.
Kid with scar on his forehead learns about his magic skills and outs a teacher with a secret second face.
Youngster from depressing home lifestyle realizes he has magical heritage, figures out giant chess matches are the new Saturday norm.
Orphan becomes celebrity child due to old curse, breaks school rules for treasure hunt, solves puzzles with unlikely allies.

movies.title: La La Land
movies.overview: Mia, an aspiring actress, serves lattes to movie stars in between auditions and Sebastian, a jazz musician, scrapes by playing cocktail party gigs in dingy bars, but as success mounts they are faced with decisions that begin to fray the fragile fabric of their love affair, and the dreams they worked so hard to maintain in each other threaten to rip them apart.

plots.plot: Wannabe actress and jazz nerd fall for each other in LA, sing and dance a bunch, but can't make it work 'cause fame sucks.
Coffee-slinging drama queen dates a jazz bozo who hates modern music, but Hollywood life screws them up.
Dreamers in LA try to follow their passions but get sidetracked by love and personal ambition, leading to inevitable crashed hopes.
A musician with a vendetta against pop music and an actress who serves caffeine both tango with success, but not with each other.
The City of Stars is both inspiring and cruel when dreams and romance clash amid piano keys and auditions.

movies.title: Return of the Jedi
movies.overview: Luke Skywalker leads a mission to rescue his friend Han Solo from the clutches of Jabba the Hutt, while the Emperor seeks to destroy the Rebellion once and for all with a second dreaded Death Star.

plots.plot: Space siblings team up with teddy bears to fight a wrinkly dude and his giant spherical weapon, while a frozen guy thaws out.
Laser swords, mind tricks, and daddy issues culminate in a battle of fireworks above and teddy bear slingshots below.
A gang led by a farm boy squabbles over a sphere with a grumpy old man and his wheezy sidekick, facing hordes of short fuzzy warriors.
A wannabe monk faces off against an asthmatic dude, convincing him to toss an electrifying grandpa down the nearest well.
Ragtag misfits redefine guerrilla warfare with guerrillas, while a family business dispute ends with a shocking revelation and fireworks.

movies.title: V for Vendetta
movies.overview: In a world in which Great Britain has become a fascist state, a masked vigilante known only as “V” conducts guerrilla warfare against the oppressive British government. When V rescues a young woman from the secret police, he finds in her an ally with whom he can continue his fight to free the people of Britain.

plots.plot: Guy in a mask blows up buildings and helps a woman get revenge, everyone learns about fireworks and freedom.
Masked drama queen sparks British revolution with fancy speeches and explosives, gains a sidekick who shaves her head.
Bold freedom-lover sets off pyrotechnics to protest against uniformed meanies, finds a new recruit with a bald ambition.
Mysterious liberator plays rooftop fireworks technician while mentoring a buzz-cut enthusiast on government disapproval.
Cloaked illusionist stages elaborate kabooms whilst befriending a freshly-groomed acolyte against uniformed rule aficionados.

movies.title: The Pursuit of Happyness
movies.overview: A struggling salesman takes custody of his son as he's poised to begin a life-changing professional career.

plots.plot: Desperate dad with a sidekick son juggles selling useless gadgets and enduring homelessness for a shot at wearing a suit to work.
Broke guy with a knack for Rubik's Cubes drags his kid around trying to score a job at a fancy firm where nobody gets paid.
Perpetual couch surfer plays frogger with eviction notices, dragging his mini-me like an overstuffed backpack.
Chronically unlucky dude rocks a killer '80s mustache while navigating a life full of ironically named failures.
Chronically underfunded adult tries to swap outdated medical devices for dream jobs, while taking parenting as a crash course.

movies.title: Gone Girl
movies.overview: With his wife's disappearance having become the focus of an intense media circus, a man sees the spotlight turned on him when it's suspected that he may not be innocent.

plots.plot: Dude's wife vanishes, he looks super guilty, but twist: she's playing hide and seek on a psychopathic level.
Woman fakes her murder to frame husband because she's bored of Pilates.
TV loves missing people, especially when the spouse looks like a wide-eyed deer in headlights.
Master escape artist orchestrates the ultimate revenge, leaving her husband sweating in her wake.
Roses are red, violets are blue, if I'm gone, let's see how much media can find on you.

movies.title: The Notebook
movies.overview: An epic love story centered around an older man who reads aloud to a woman with Alzheimer's. From a faded notebook, the old man's words bring to life the story about a couple who is separated by World War II, and is then passionately reunited, seven years later, after they have taken different paths.

plots.plot: Grandpa reads a teenage diary to his forgetful wife, who still has the hots for him even after a world war, some kissing, and probably the same fight a million times.
A summer fling leads to two old folks reminiscing until she can't remember what happened ten minutes ago.
During wartime, she picks a guy who likes painting houses, 'cause who needs rich guys anyway?
Guy passionately relives teenage memories while insisting his memories weren't just a sack of pointless letters.
Elderly storyteller revives a past life through scribblings, doing wonders for an historic relationship experiment.

movies.title: The Greatest Showman
movies.overview: The story of American showman P.T. Barnum, founder of the circus that became the famous traveling Ringling Bros. and Barnum & Bailey Circus.

plots.plot: Lanky dude with a thing for oddballs uses a bearded lady and a four-legged kid to start a circus for attention and cash.
Poor kid grows up, marries a girl way out of his league, then decides to confuse society by parading 'freaks' for fame.
An entrepreneurial dreamer takes out some major loans and convinces a bunch of social outcasts that they're the next big stars.
Husband gives wife a mansion, puts weird talents on display, derails by chasing a singer, and somehow things work out.
A financially reckless visionary monetizes uniqueness, navigates debt, and dabbles in high-risk investments with human capital.

movies.title: Little Women
movies.overview: Four sisters come of age in America in the aftermath of the Civil War.

plots.plot: Four sisters take turns getting married, but not to each other... this isn't that kind of movie.
Girls in long skirts practice sibling rivalry and poor life choices like it's an Olympic sport.
After a war, a household of underpaid siblings try to make something of themselves with outdated hobbies.
A woman turns rejection from one man into a successful book deal. Talk about literary vengeance.
A group of post-Civil War influencers struggle to go viral with their TED talk on sisterhood and ambition.

movies.title: Ben-Hur
movies.overview: In 25 AD, Judah Ben-Hur, a Jew in ancient Judea, opposes the occupying Roman empire.  Falsely accused by a Roman childhood friend-turned-overlord of trying to kill the Roman governor, he is put into slavery and his mother and sister are taken away as prisoners.

plots.plot: Jewish guy gets blamed for murder, ends up rowing Roman boats, gets ripped, races chariots, wins freedom, and forgives his childhood backstabbing friend.
Dude goes from slave to Olympic-level chariot racer because ancient Romans couldn't see betrayal coming, not even from an ex-BFF.
Ancient row-row-row-your-boat enthusiast discovers his true passion involves horses and wheels after some serious false accusations.
Naval rowing turns into horsepower frenzy when misunderstandings about loyalty lead to medieval Emperor's-Got-Talent.
In Mideast times, a sea paddler finds fame through equine-locomotion contests after double-cross identified during ceremonial passage preparations goes awry.

movies.title: Young Frankenstein
movies.overview: A young neurosurgeon inherits the castle of his grandfather, the famous Dr. Victor von Frankenstein. In the castle he finds a funny hunchback, a pretty lab assistant and the elderly housekeeper. Young Frankenstein believes that the work of his grandfather was delusional, but when he discovers the book where the mad doctor described his reanimation experiment, he suddenly changes his mind.

plots.plot: Descendant of a famous mad scientist goes on a mission to prove he's not crazy, ends up proving he's exactly that by sewing together a hunk of meat and bringing it to life.
Guy inherits a spooky castle and a team of oddballs, decides the best way to cope is to play Frankenstein 2.0 with a brain dead dude.
Aspiring brain surgeon takes a detour from being legit to lure lightning storms and revive a very confused human jigsaw puzzle.
He thought he was just getting a dusty old castle and some weird uncles, but it turns out his family plan included assembling a hardcore jigsaw puzzle with spare body parts.
Forgettable academic tries to avoid his legacy, but a little electrifying inspiration prompts him to bolt together new flesh, proving he's got the 'itch' for innovation.

movies.title: Just Mercy
movies.overview: The powerful true story of Harvard-educated lawyer Bryan Stevenson, who goes to Alabama to defend the disenfranchised and wrongly condemned — including Walter McMillian, a man sentenced to death despite evidence proving his innocence. Bryan fights tirelessly for Walter with the system stacked against them.

plots.plot: A smart lawyer hails from fancy Harvard to Alabama, fights for a dude on death row who didn't do the crime, and basically wrestles with justice while wearing a suit.
Big brain lawyer discovers deep south charm includes wrongful convictions, decides to save the day and high-five justice with a briefcase full of evidence.
Yale rival challenges deep-fried legal system, becoming public defender superhero and checking off pro bono bingo card in the process.
Ambitious knight engages in joust with outdated southern institution, using case files as armor and law degrees as swords.
Academic gladiator enters the genteel Colosseum to rescue a doomed gladiator facing lions of injustice, armed only with a portable library and stubborn morality.

movies.title: Mr. Smith Goes to Washington
movies.overview: After the death of a United States Senator, idealistic Jefferson Smith is appointed as his replacement in Washington. Soon, the naive and earnest new senator has to battle political corruption.

plots.plot: Naive boy scout leader goes to Capitol, learns politicians are shadier than he imagined, and gives epic filibuster while probably needing a bathroom break.
A rookie gets a front-row seat to see the swampy side of D.C., tries to drain it, and nearly destroys his vocal cords in the process.
A greenhorn falls for a faith-in-democracy scam but winds up going bonkers in a government hall instead.
A fresh face in the political arena discovers that democracy's 'game' involves more slime than any swamp tour guide ever would have suggested.
A clueless guy seeks to plant boy scout dreams in a place where others plant shady deals; he doesn't realize he's the comic relief until halfway through.

movies.title: Fargo
movies.overview: Jerry, a small-town Minnesota car salesman is bursting at the seams with debt... but he's got a plan. He's going to hire two thugs to kidnap his wife in a scheme to collect a hefty ransom from his wealthy father-in-law. It's going to be a snap and nobody's going to get hurt... until people start dying. Enter Police Chief Marge, a coffee-drinking, parka-wearing - and extremely pregnant - investigator who'll stop at nothing to get her man. And if you think her small-time investigative skills will give the crooks a run for their ransom... you betcha!

plots.plot: Minnesota guy hires two idiots to kidnap his wife for ransom, but everyone ends up dead or arrested, except for a pregnant cop who somehow cracks the case between coffee breaks.
Debt-ridden salesman thinks hiring nitwits to grab his spouse will solve financial woes; chaos, wood chipper, and a pregnant detective prove otherwise.
Midwest car man starts a DIY crime project; it involves bumbling criminals, a family snatching, and a cold detective in warm clothing piecing it all together.
An unorthodox business tactic in snowy plains leads to a series of unfortunate IQ tests involving law enforcement and icy equipment.
Scheme involving forced family reunion, lumber equipment misuse, and maternal law expertise unravels under cold skies.

movies.title: A Beautiful Mind
movies.overview: Brilliant mathematician, John Nash, is on the brink of international acclaim when he becomes entangled in a mysterious conspiracy.

plots.plot: Genius nerd creates new math, gets confused, starts seeing imaginary friends, becomes paranoid spy, but his brain just needed a software update.
Math whiz has epic brain glitches, thinks he's a secret agent, but spoiler: it's all in his head.
Scholar with zero tolerance for group work suffers intense PowerPoint hallucinations in Ivy League basement.
Number jockey's secret code to fame goes glitchy due to random surveillance fuel delusions.
Academic spotlight swapped for chalkboard paranoia, as prestige headaches spark intel-phantasms.

movies.title: Stand by Me
movies.overview: After learning that a boy their age has been accidentally killed near their rural homes, four Oregon boys decide to go see the body. On the way, Gordie,  Vern, Chris and Teddy encounter a mean junk man and a marsh full of leeches, as they also learn more about one another and their very different home lives. Just a lark at first, the boys' adventure evolves into a defining event in their lives.

plots.plot: Four kids go on a creepy hike to see a dead body, meet bullies, leeches become an issue, and one kid ends up trying to play therapist the whole way.
A sextet of scrawny legs travel along the rails, hoping to stumble upon some decomposed remains and eventually find out maturing is overrated.
Four future therapy clients embark on a journey enticed by cadaver curiosity and end up negotiating leech territory and existential mysteries.
A morbid mission to locate a lost body morphs into an accidental launch into self-discovery for a quartet, with wildlife diplomacy and bully settlements en route.
Chillun from the mossy state embark on a dead boy quest, but detour into psychological revelations and combat with moist hemophages.

movies.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
movies.overview: In 1938, an art collector appeals to eminent archaeologist Dr. Indiana Jones to embark on a search for the Holy Grail. Indy learns that a medieval historian has vanished while searching for it, and the missing man is his own father, Dr. Henry Jones Sr.. He sets out to rescue his father by following clues in the old man's notebook, which his father had mailed to him before he went missing. Indy arrives in Venice, where he enlists the help of a beautiful academic, Dr. Elsa Schneider, along with Marcus Brody and Sallah. Together they must stop the Nazis from recovering the power of eternal life and taking over the world!

plots.plot: A whip-wielding professor teams up with his estranged dad to punch Nazis in their pursuit of a fancy cup that grants eternal life, stepping into booby traps and awkward father-son bonding moments along the way.
Globe-trotting teacher runs into issues when he realizes his dad's idea of a family vacation involves dodging Nazis and deciphering ancient riddles to find a cup no one's drank from in centuries.
A relic-hunting academic gets stuck with his forgetful, diary-obsessed dad in a Nazi-filled adventure, aiming to nab a legendary drinking vessel before thirsty Germans ruin the party.

When a particular historian misplaces his diary, it leads to a wacky, parental rescue mission featuring moustache-loving villains and historical puzzles that make modern escape rooms look like child's play.

In a whirlwind European tour, a scholarly adventurer avoids crafty secretaries and overzealous militarists, all while mastering the art of drinking from a priceless antique not meant for teetotallers.

movies.title: Knives Out
movies.overview: When renowned crime novelist Harlan Thrombey is found dead at his estate just after his 85th birthday, the inquisitive and debonair Detective Benoit Blanc is mysteriously enlisted to investigate. From Harlan's dysfunctional family to his devoted staff, Blanc sifts through a web of red herrings and self-serving lies to uncover the truth behind Harlan's untimely death.

plots.plot: Rich writer croaks, everyone wants his cash, but only the maid knows she accidentally gave him the 'wrong' juice. Detective guy spins stories until the truth falls out.
A famous guy dies because his maid can't read labels, and a gentleman Sherlock wannabe interviews a parade of greedy relatives.
Old dude bites it after a birthday bash, and a Southern sleuth deciphers if his kin are dumb or just crooked.
Birthday party gets spicy when grandpa kicks the bucket, and a Southern-fried Poirot digs into the eccentric attendees.
A guy dies dramatically after a squid game of wills, prompting a suave snooper to dissect the antics of money-hungry loafers.

movies.title: Monsters, Inc.
movies.overview: Lovable Sulley and his wisecracking sidekick Mike Wazowski are the top scare team at Monsters, Inc., the scream-processing factory in Monstropolis. When a little girl named Boo wanders into their world, it's the monsters who are scared silly, and it's up to Sulley and Mike to keep her out of sight and get her back home.

plots.plot: Big blue furry monster babysits small human girl with one-eyed green comic relief while managing workplace chaos.
Hairy beasts bottle screams for energy until tiny tot throws tantrum.
Professional frightener meets pesky pint-sized intruder, challenges labor policies.
Fear factory employees struggle with new power outage protocol caused by tiny bipeds.
Unlikely duo grapple with existential crisis after finding a dimensionally challenged child.

movies.title: Dances with Wolves
movies.overview: Wounded Civil War soldier John Dunbar tries to commit suicide—and becomes a hero instead. As a reward, he's assigned to his dream post, a remote junction on the Western frontier, and soon makes unlikely friends with the local Sioux tribe.

plots.plot: Suicidal soldier accidentally impresses his bosses, gets sent out to the sticks, befriends the people he was supposed to be ready to fight, and wonders if he should've just stayed depressed.
Civil War vet moves west for peace and quiet, ends up adopting a wolf and getting more into local culture than a college kid at a semester abroad.
Dude finds his zen chilling with nature and people who have way cooler traditions than his own, mostly because they don't wear itchy uniforms.
Guy with a talent for befriending animals tries it on humans, finds it works just as well if they don't speak your language.
Uniformed man escapes battles only to find his identity in a place far from where his original loyalties lie, thanks to a six-legged friend and some serious cross-cultural vibes.

movies.title: The Big Lebowski
movies.overview: Jeffrey 'The Dude' Lebowski, a Los Angeles slacker who only wants to bowl and drink White Russians, is mistaken for another Jeffrey Lebowski, a wheelchair-bound millionaire, and finds himself dragged into a strange series of events involving nihilists, adult film producers, ferrets, errant toes, and large sums of money.

plots.plot: Lazy guy with a bad haircut gets his rug peed on, bowls a lot, and somehow ends up fighting German nihilists who like ferrets.
A slacker dude finds himself tangled in a bizarre saga involving a stolen car, toe theft, and a bunch of nihilists who can't handle bowling accidents.
A man's desire for a clean rug leads him into a whirlwind of Germans with attitude, avant-garde art projects, and conversational misunderstandings.
A heroic quest for rug justice challenges a bowler's patience, delivering mishaps with amateurs who claim belief in nothingness yet desire cash.
An apathetic SoCal guy navigates a perplexing circle of deceit, facing a group who say 'ach, whatever,' questioning his love for creamy cocktails.

movies.title: The Nightmare Before Christmas
movies.overview: Tired of scaring humans every October 31 with the same old bag of tricks, Jack Skellington, the spindly king of Halloween Town, kidnaps Santa Claus and plans to deliver shrunken heads and other ghoulish gifts to children on Christmas morning. But as Christmas approaches, Jack's rag-doll girlfriend, Sally, tries to foil his misguided plans.

plots.plot: A skinny skeleton decides he's tired of Halloween, kidnaps Santa, and tries to deliver creepy presents for Christmas, while his girlfriend thinks that's a bone-headed idea.
Bored spooky guy kidnaps holiday mascot, causing chaos and making everyone question his life choices.
Bony overseer of autumnal doom tries a winter gig and realizes mixing holidays is harder than it looks.
Tall, overhyped ghoul swaps holidays, learns the hard way the grass is not always greener—especially through stitched-together lenses.
Undead figurehead, plagued by existential boredom, disastrously dabbles in cultural appropriation but learns from a homemade muse.

movies.title: How to Train Your Dragon
movies.overview: As the son of a Viking leader on the cusp of manhood, shy Hiccup Horrendous Haddock III faces a rite of passage: he must kill a dragon to prove his warrior mettle. But after downing a feared dragon, he realizes that he no longer wants to destroy it, and instead befriends the beast – which he names Toothless – much to the chagrin of his warrior father.

plots.plot: Viking nerd pals up with a disabled dragon, making dad mad because 'real men' don't befriend fire-breathing reptiles.
Awkward kid bonds with a flying lizard, causing mayhem as villagers prefer barbecued dragons to flying pets.
Loser hero and tooth-impaired reptile team up to give angry villagers the finger, redefine conflict as friendship.
Village geek teaches head-butting adults that maybe killing isn't the only way to handle hiccup-y problems.
In a fiery role reversal, the boy saves the injured 'monster,' challenging Norse traditions of dragon BBQ.

movies.title: The Boy in the Striped Pyjamas
movies.overview: When his family moves from their home in Berlin to a strange new house in Poland, young Bruno befriends Shmuel, a boy who lives on the other side of the fence where everyone seems to be wearing striped pajamas. Unaware of Shmuel's fate as a Jewish prisoner or the role his own Nazi father plays in his imprisonment, Bruno embarks on a dangerous journey inside the camp's walls.

plots.plot: A kid's dad gives him the worst vacation ever by moving next to a 'pajama party' that turns out to be an actual concentration camp.
Curious kid mistakes a horror film set for a summer camp, hilarity ensues until he realizes the boy he's playing with has no idea what 'freedom' means.
In a fantastic display of communication failure, a child thinks a heavily fortified area is the new neighborhood playground.
Young adventurer attempts to swap his life's plot twist for a neighbor's striped fashion sense, uncovers a rather grim dress code policy.
In a dark role reversal, a mini explorer finds the meaning of misery behind confusing clothing choices and gravely misinterpreted 'fun time' activities.

movies.title: Kiki's Delivery Service
movies.overview: A young witch, on her mandatory year of independent life, finds fitting into a new community difficult while she supports herself by running an air courier service.

plots.plot: Aspiring witch flunks broomstick driver's ed, turns flying pizza courier, gets free room where other people's ovaries used to be.
Teenage witch on broom is too broke for Theranos-level delivery fees, so she ditches traditional delivery for sky-high gig work.
In a world where magical kids hit the skies, a young girl finds out that magical competition is fierce and flying pizzas will not deliver themselves.
New in town, our youthful witch ignores common witch education advice: stick to magic, avoid capitalist skies without GPS.
Flying independent in the gig economy, a girl embraces airborne freelancing, ignoring air traffic laws to deliver nostalgia, pastry, and mild existential crises.

movies.title: Ratatouille
movies.overview: Remy, a resident of Paris, appreciates good food and has quite a sophisticated palate. He would love to become a chef so he can create and enjoy culinary masterpieces to his heart's delight. The only problem is, Remy is a rat. When he winds up in the sewer beneath one of Paris' finest restaurants, the rodent gourmet finds himself ideally placed to realize his dream.

plots.plot: A rat with delusions of grandeur hijacks a human puppet to become Paris's top chef.
Tiny furry chef puppeteers sweaty human to cook fancy food while dodging health inspectors.
Tiny gourmet rodent causes chaos in French kitchen, becomes accidental culinary star.
Furry sewer inhabitant uses unlikely partnership to pursue forbidden cooking dreams.
Whiskered connoisseur secretly orchestrates fine dining under the nose of clueless owner.

movies.title: Rosemary's Baby
movies.overview: A young couple, Rosemary and Guy, moves into an infamous New York apartment building, known by frightening legends and mysterious events, with the purpose of starting a family.

plots.plot: A woman gets unknowingly impregnated by Satan while her husband befriends weird neighbors who want to raise the baby in a demonic daycare.
Wife thinks she’s winning parenthood till she realizes hubby signed them up for 'Demon Childcare 101' without asking.
She thought living next to aging hippies was bad until her spouse took 'selling your soul' way too literally.
Expecting mom underestimates the dangers of drinkable desserts when mixed with ancient rituals in a creepy condo.
In a bizarre twist, your spouse's unrealistic career boost involves candle-lit chanting and a haunted prenatal club.

movies.title: Logan
movies.overview: In the near future, a weary Logan cares for an ailing Professor X in a hideout on the Mexican border. But Logan's attempts to hide from the world and his legacy are upended when a young mutant arrives, pursued by dark forces.

plots.plot: Grumpy old claw-man babysits a kid with trust issues, while dodging killer rent-a-cops with GPS bracelets.
An old guy with stabby hands plays taxi driver and nanny, all while dodging corporate bullies and caring for mind-blowing grandpa.
Jaded chauffeur scuffles with unfriendly businessmen, all while becoming an unexpected mentor to a feisty adolescent.
In a dystopian future, an ex-chauffeur with minor anger issues discovers his itch for a certain girl, but must play midwife to a quirky group on the run.
A man with chronic hand tremors reluctantly reinstates his job as a chaperone for a youthful ward, whose innate skills attract undesirable stakeholders.

movies.title: Finding Nemo
movies.overview: Nemo, an adventurous young clownfish, is unexpectedly taken from his Great Barrier Reef home to a dentist's office aquarium. It's up to his worrisome father Marlin and a friendly but forgetful fish Dory to bring Nemo home -- meeting vegetarian sharks, surfer dude turtles, hypnotic jellyfish, hungry seagulls, and more along the way.

plots.plot: Neurotic fish dad loses his only son in the fish version of a kidnap story, teams up with an amnesiac sidekick to rescue him from a tooth doctor.
Hyper-anxious parent freaks out when offspring gets snatched, takes a scenic tour of marine life blunders and misfit friends.
Overbearing father flips when kid ends up in glass prison, rides a turtle highway with a forgetful navigator to stellar fishy adventures.
Helicopter parent with scales panics, recruits a short-term memory friend to retrieve his lost spawn from human lair.
Paranoid guardian unwillingly explores the unknown, partners with an oblivious blue guide to traverse oceanic happenings, seeking his tanked heir.

movies.title: Spotlight
movies.overview: The true story of how the Boston Globe uncovered the massive scandal of child molestation and cover-up within the local Catholic Archdiocese, shaking the entire Catholic Church to its core.

plots.plot: A team of nosy journalists ruin a bunch of priests' retirement plans by exposing their greatest hits collection of scandalous cover-ups.
Reporters dive into a horror story of epic latex proportions involving some not-so-good shepherds.
Snoopy scribes break down walls of a holy fortress to release the Kraken of scandal and misplaced confessions.
In a mash-up of whack-a-mole and bingo, a bunch of scribblers tackle a cardinal sin list without heavenly approval.
Itchy keyboard titans pry open Pandora's box in a city famous for baked beans, discovering an unholy communion.

movies.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
movies.overview: After Port Royal is attacked and pillaged by a mysterious pirate crew, capturing the governor's daughter Elizabeth Swann in the process, William Turner asks free-willing pirate Jack Sparrow to help him locate the crew's ship—The Black Pearl—so that he can rescue the woman he loves.

plots.plot: A snarky pirate teams up with a blacksmith to save a governor's daughter from a skeleton pirate crew who really need to stop shopping for jewelry at ancient cursed Aztec markets.
A flirty rogue with eyeliner and a blacksmith buddy battle a gang of zombies that are bad at keeping secrets about cursed treasure hoards.
Eyeliner enthusiast reunites with pals who can't enjoy steak because ancient bling gives them bad breath and a glow-in-the-dark look.
Two dudes chase a glowy pirate Uber driven by skeletons with unbeatable Halloween costumes, all in the name of questionable priorities.
Metal craftsman's sea trip with pirate fashionista leads to bones dodging bullets, tropical weather, and a really bad time with golden coins.

movies.title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
movies.overview: When Harry Potter's name emerges from the Goblet of Fire, he becomes a competitor in a grueling battle for glory among three wizarding schools—the Triwizard Tournament. But since Harry never submitted his name for the Tournament, who did? Now Harry must confront a deadly dragon, fierce water demons and an enchanted maze only to find himself in the cruel grasp of He Who Must Not Be Named.

plots.plot: A boy wizard takes on angry fireworks and fishy mermaids, and somehow avoids the jaws of death despite being wizard-puberty incarnate.
Kid with less-than-great hair humility-brags his way through a deadly contest he didn't even sign up for, while dodging a perpetually angry no-nose villain.
Reluctant contestant juggles fire-breathing reptiles, anguished water creatures, and a hedge maze with a bad attitude, all for school pride or something.
The accidental fire-cup entrant deals with an underwater family reunion and leafy labyrinth stress-test before bonding over grave issues with a bald enthusiast.
Unexpected event participant faces reptilian heat, aquatic angst, and horticultural hostility, his evening capped by awkward tea with a skull-obsessed gentleman.

movies.title: Monty Python and the Holy Grail
movies.overview: King Arthur, accompanied by his squire, recruits his Knights of the Round Table, including Sir Bedevere the Wise, Sir Lancelot the Brave, Sir Robin the Not-Quite-So-Brave-As-Sir-Lancelot and Sir Galahad the Pure. On the way, Arthur battles the Black Knight who, despite having had all his limbs chopped off, insists he can still fight. They reach Camelot, but Arthur decides not  to enter, as "it is a silly place".

plots.plot: A king and his coconuts make new friends, argue with a bloodthirsty rabbit, and get yelled at by the French for playing dress-up.
A guy collects a gang to find a shiny cup, but gets distracted by killer bunnies and knights who say 'Ni!'
Imaginary cavalry on a ridiculous quest is thwarted by shrubbery demands and surprise white fluffy attacks.
A group of inept overconfident warriors embark on a protracted cup hunt involving forest greens and limbless swordplay.
A medieval road trip ends with false horses, uncooperative vegetation, and an underwhelming grand finale.

movies.title: Toy Story 3
movies.overview: Woody, Buzz, and the rest of Andy's toys haven't been played with in years. With Andy about to go to college, the gang find themselves accidentally left at a nefarious day care center. The toys must band together to escape and return home to Andy.

plots.plot: Group of toys freak out as their owner heads to college and accidentally end up in a hellish daycare run by a scheming bear with anger management issues.
Action figures mistakenly land in a baby prison and pull off a heist move that's more elaborate than their kid owner's college plans.
Forgotten playthings plot a jailbreak from a toddler gladiator ring, while dodging a fuzzy, grumpy dictator with a scent complex.
Plastic sentients face a daycare dystopia, employing cunning tactics to escape a suffocating monarch who smells like grandma’s house.
Mobile inanimates, mistaken for communal property, organize an uprising against an oppressive plush tyrant atop a mountainous childhood Eden.

movies.title: Die Hard
movies.overview: NYPD cop John McClane's plan to reconcile with his estranged wife is thrown for a serious loop when, minutes after he arrives at her offices Christmas Party, the entire building is overtaken by a group of terrorists. With little help from the LAPD, wisecracking McClane sets out to single-handedly rescue the hostages and bring the bad guys down.

plots.plot: An off-duty cop crashes a Christmas office party, then spends the night playing hide-and-seek with German terrorists while barefoot.
Barefoot vacationing cop ends holiday by redecorating office building with bullet holes and shattered glass. Merry Christmas!
A man with a foot fetish infiltrates a skyscraper to ruin holiday festivities, mainly by scattering broken glass everywhere.
Grieving for his lost shoes, a guy gleefully climbs elevator shafts in hopes of retrieving stolen Christmas bonds—or something like that.
Visiting a tall holiday tree, a shoeless man's new friends invite him to go on a scavenger hunt in search of concentrated negotiable bearer papers.

movies.title: Porco Rosso
movies.overview: In Italy in the 1930s, sky pirates in biplanes terrorize wealthy cruise ships as they sail the Adriatic Sea. The only pilot brave enough to stop the scourge is the mysterious Porco Rosso, a former World War I flying ace who was somehow turned into a pig during the war. As he prepares to battle the pirate crew's American ace, Porco Rosso enlists the help of spunky girl mechanic Fio Piccolo and his longtime friend Madame Gina.

plots.plot: A pig-faced pilot in Italy fights sky pirates while trying to impress a singing lady and babysit a spunky mechanic girl.
In 1930s Italy, a flying pig battles sky pirates with a perky young mechanic and a lady friend who owns a seaplane hotel.
A porcine pilot with a penchant for pasta faces off against airborne thieves while getting life advice from a singing hostess.
Once-human aviator flies over the Adriatic, courtesy of a wartime curse, stopping naughty aerial culprits with some mechanical underage assistance.
Haunted by a piggy transformation, an ex-ace pilot fends off those who can't afford airships, fostering friendships with young engineers and nostalgic chanteuses.

movies.title: L.A. Confidential
movies.overview: Three detectives in the corrupt and brutal L.A. police force of the 1950s use differing methods to uncover a conspiracy behind the shotgun slayings of the patrons at an all-night diner.

plots.plot: Two good cops and one bad cop try to solve a diner massacre but spend most of the time punching each other and giving shady stares.
In 1950s L.A., clean cop, dirty cop, and confused cop try to be heroes but mostly make you question why you're ever rooting for these guys.
A trio of lawmen juggle more dysfunction than a reality show family while trying to piece together a puzzle of bullets, bribes, and bewilderment.
Excessive paperwork and ego clashes in a major city lead to discovering how a late-night snack run ends in a lead overdose for patrons.
In a city where justice is just as murky and questionable as milkshake flavors, three unlikely sheriffs attempt to decode a breakfast bloodbath.

movies.title: Scent of a Woman
movies.overview: Charlie Simms is a student at a private preparatory school who comes from a poor family. To earn the money for his flight home to Gresham, Oregon for Christmas, Charlie takes a job over Thanksgiving looking after retired U.S. Army officer Lieutenant Colonel Frank Slade, a cantankerous middle-aged man who lives with his niece and her family.

plots.plot: A fancy school kid takes a job babysitting a blind, obnoxious war vet who drags him around New York, shouting and smelling stuff before not shooting himself.
A blind old dude teaches a student about cars, women, and not turning himself into Swiss cheese on a holiday weekend.
Over a long weekend, a teenager learns life lessons from someone who can't see, but somehow can still 'see' everything else.
Thanksgiving turns into a chaotic survival course for poor kids around a stubborn ex-soldier's potential life-ending decision.
A young guy navigates a luxurious yet metaphorical blindness, only to realize his cruise through life's countdown is just beginning.

movies.title: Brokeback Mountain
movies.overview: In 1960s Wyoming, two men develop a strong emotional and sexual relationship that endures as a lifelong connection complicating their lives as they get married and start families of their own.

plots.plot: Two cowboys take 'roughin' it' to a whole new level on a mountain getaway, but their wives aren't too thrilled about the rodeo romance.
Two sheep herders find out campfire songs and moonlit cowpoke cuddles aren't just for warming up your boots.
A hidden love in the great outdoors teaches that sometimes what's in the closet is a cowboy hat and a tent.
Why herd sheep when the pasture of feelings is what's really calling to have the fences mended?
The ladies wondered why the fishing trips were so regular, but the only catch was of the heart, not walleye.

movies.title: Rocky
movies.overview: An uneducated collector for a Philadelphia loan shark is given a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to fight against the world heavyweight boxing champion.

plots.plot: Punch-drunk boxer with a taste for raw eggs gets a shot at glory while wooing a painfully shy pet store worker.
Man punches slabs of meat to train then climbs entire staircase to classical music before getting pummeled for a payday.
A local tough guy gets to play punching bag for the press tour of a man whose belt buckle is worth more than a house.
Small-time brawler leaves fists in the ring but finds fame by beefing with frozen animals and a guy who's never cold.
Underworld associate scales cultural steps to exchange cranial concussions with a man marketed with a bald eagle.

movies.title: Dune
movies.overview: Paul Atreides, a brilliant and gifted young man born into a great destiny beyond his understanding, must travel to the most dangerous planet in the universe to ensure the future of his family and his people. As malevolent forces explode into conflict over the planet's exclusive supply of the most precious resource in existence-a commodity capable of unlocking humanity's greatest potential-only those who can conquer their fear will survive.

plots.plot: Rich kid has sand in his shoes after moving to a new planet. His rich family fights over spice while giant worms try to eat them.
A chemist's son really hates fine sand and moves to a 'hole-y' new home where everyone wants his special cinnamon.
The heir to a bland castle finds himself sinking in the universe's largest litter box with visions of hoodie fashionistas.
A gifted kid embarks on a gritty journey in an arid dump as intergalactic hoarders bicker about the one thing enabling them to pass Go.
A teenage prodigy battles nightmares and sandstorms while everyone is secretly just after a little nose powder for their octane buns.

movies.title: Straight Outta Compton
movies.overview: In 1987, five young men, using brutally honest rhymes and hardcore beats, put their frustration and anger about life in the most dangerous place in America into the most powerful weapon they had: their music.  Taking us back to where it all began, Straight Outta Compton tells the true story of how these cultural rebels—armed only with their lyrics, swagger, bravado and raw talent—stood up to the authorities that meant to keep them down and formed the world’s most dangerous group, N.W.A.  And as they spoke the truth that no one had before and exposed life in the hood, their voice ignited a social revolution that is still reverberating today.

plots.plot: A group of guys in Compton get together and rap about their awful neighborhood, ticking off the police and causing a musical and social hurricane.
Five dudes rhyme about how not fun it is to live in crime central, get famous, and make cops clutch their pearls.
Guys with mics say things that make everyone except law enforcement happy, catapulting them to infamy.
A crew of lyrical hooligans complain about their neighborhood's amenities and get unwanted attention from the fuzz.
In a cozy urban area, youngsters with melodic complaints become unintended heroes while making security officers sweat.

movies.title: The Dark Knight Rises
movies.overview: Following the death of District Attorney Harvey Dent, Batman assumes responsibility for Dent's crimes to protect the late attorney's reputation and is subsequently hunted by the Gotham City Police Department. Eight years later, Batman encounters the mysterious Selina Kyle and the villainous Bane, a new terrorist leader who overwhelms Gotham's finest. The Dark Knight resurfaces to protect a city that has branded him an enemy.

plots.plot: Rich guy doing community service as a flying rodent gets his back broken by a beefy wrestler-lookalike, then fights back with some cool gadgets and a lot of grunting.
Guy in leather pajamas returns from early retirement to punch a mask-wearing strongman who's trying to blow up the place with a really big firecracker.
A billionaire with bat issues fakes a back injury courtesy of a gym enthusiast, while trying to stop a ticking nuclear drama.
Winged nocturnal mammal enthusiast, hardly seen in years, wrestles with a muscled mask-wearer to prevent an underground show from going nuclear.
After ditching hibernation, a rich recluse faces off with an ex-mercenary sporting respiratory fashion, all while a ticking city-size dilemma awaits.` Atlantean escape planned in the mix.

movies.title: Donnie Darko
movies.overview: After narrowly escaping a bizarre accident, a troubled teenager is plagued by visions of a large bunny rabbit that manipulates him to commit a series of crimes.

plots.plot: Teen escapes fiery death thanks to the world's creepiest bunny, and lets it convince him that arson and time travel are productive hobbies.
High schooler listens to giant rabbit in his head instead of real adults, learns that life is less about surviving and more about going insane.
Quantum physics and destructive teen angst collide, causing temporal chaos in suburbia, thanks to a deranged rabbit mascot.
Suburban life disrupted when sad teen unites with rodent visionary to unravel fixed temporal do-overs.
Beware the metallic hare's whispers if you wish to avoid paradoxical inundations.

movies.title: Back to the Future Part II
movies.overview: Marty and Doc are at it again in this wacky sequel to the 1985 blockbuster as the time-traveling duo head to 2015 to nip some McFly family woes in the bud. But things go awry thanks to bully Biff Tannen and a pesky sports almanac. In a last-ditch attempt to set things straight, Marty finds himself bound for 1955 and face to face with his teenage parents -- again.

plots.plot: Kid time-travels to 2015, buys a sneaky book, accidentally turns his jerk neighbor into a mega-rich tyrant, and then zigzags through eras to fix his family and erase fake dystopia.
Future trip to nab a hoverboard to save lousy kids, opportunistic neighbor swipes a book to rig history, chaos ensues, fixing entails dodging parents in vintage garb.
Trip to get funky floating scooter in the future spirals, causes chaos in every other decade, somehow sports stats are involved.
Journey to 2015 goes nuts; greedy rival turns billionaire, forces guy on a wild time loop ride to cancel sweet almanac.
Temporal joyride for modern board triggers unintended reciprocal wealth paradox, causing recursive family embarrassment resolved by chronological recalibration.

movies.title: Life of Brian
movies.overview: Brian Cohen is an average young Jewish man, but through a series of ridiculous events, he gains a reputation as the Messiah. When he's not dodging his followers or being scolded by his shrill mother, the hapless Brian has to contend with the pompous Pontius Pilate and acronym-obsessed members of a separatist movement. Rife with Monty Python's signature absurdity, the tale finds Brian's life paralleling Biblical lore, albeit with many more laughs.

plots.plot: Brian is mistaken for Jesus, gets chased by idiots, yelled at by his mom, and eventually crucified in a musical number.
A dude gets born in the wrong stable, collects unintentional followers, and ends up on the wrong end of the Roman Empire's favorite execution method.
Man confuses Romans and false prophets while trying to quit his accidental celebrity status and ends up with a painful wooden accessory.
Accidental leading man keeps colliding with bungling bureaucrats and confused radicals thinking they've found divine guidance.
An unwilling guru is mistaken for a historical figure across regions with sandals and nosy parents leading to an unscheduled skyward music recital.

movies.title: The Untouchables
movies.overview: Elliot Ness, an ambitious prohibition agent, is determined to take down Al Capone. In order to achieve this goal, he forms a group given the nickname “The Untouchables”.

plots.plot: Good cop teams up with can-do accountant, a cynical experienced guy, and a rookie to arrest a tax-evading mob boss who dodges prohibition laws like a pro.
Lawman and nerdy number-cruncher assemble a squad of moral knights to smite a prolific beer vendor gone bad.
Prohibition-era dudes tackle a spirited vendor of forbidden spirits by literally pouring his booze down drains.
Four dry crusaders take their fight from shooting galleries to an intense courtroom battle, proving not all heroes wear capes—some wear fedoras.
Determined teetotalers form a selectively invincible foursome, targeting an ambitious entrepreneur only vulnerable through his unpaid financial obligations.

movies.title: The Ten Commandments
movies.overview: Escaping death, a Hebrew infant is raised in a royal household to become a prince. Upon discovery of his true heritage, Moses embarks on a personal quest to reclaim his destiny as the leader and liberator of the Hebrew people.

plots.plot: A fancy guy with a staff and a beard plays extreme 'Simon Says' with 600,000 people, then parts a sea for them to win.
A dude with a bad hair day argues with a flaming bush, then crashes a Pharaoh's party with ten plagues and a magic stick trick.
Royal adoptee ditches palace life for a desert adventure with some ethnically confused folks, then performs a water trick rivaling David Copperfield.
Guy ditches his pyramid scheme gig to wrangle a massive camping trip that climaxes in a legendary boulder etching session.
Ex-royal trades in gold chariots for sand and complaints on a quest for two oversized tablet souvenirs and freedom for his fans.

movies.title: The Color Purple
movies.overview: An epic tale spanning forty years in the life of Celie, an African-American woman living in the South who survives incredible abuse and bigotry. After Celie's abusive father marries her off to the equally debasing 'Mister' Albert Johnson, things go from bad to worse, leaving Celie to find companionship anywhere she can. She perseveres, holding on to her dream of one day being reunited with her sister in Africa.

plots.plot: A woman dealt a bad hand of life swaps notes with a wild jazz singer while dodging punches from her monstrous husband.
A woman's best pal is a sultry singer who’s great at raising spirits and eyebrows, but her own love life is one messy sing-along.
Hard-knocked lady finds surprising support from a chic performer, while her domestic life is a mix of booze and bruises.
Exchanging letters becomes a lifeline for a woman dealing with daily drudgery under the reign of a tyrant who seems allergic to happiness.
A musically inclined chemistry experiment of heartaches and letters unlocks ancestral connections while woodshed memories burn in the background.

movies.title: Big Fish
movies.overview: Throughout his life Edward Bloom has always been a man of big appetites, enormous passions and tall tales. In his later years, he remains a huge mystery to his son, William. Now, to get to know the real man, Will begins piecing together a true picture of his father from flashbacks of his amazing adventures.

plots.plot: A dying man tells his son ridiculous stories about his life that involve witches and a giant, somehow not getting punched.
The story of a dude who fishes for compliments about his money and giant tales, drives his son bananas.
Guy spends his life revising reality so hard his son grows up needing therapy.
Man swaps facts for fairy tales leaving his offspring questioning reality and paternity.
Parent's penchant for fantasy leaves kid in search of actual historical records, minus giants and circus freaks.

movies.title: Train to Busan
movies.overview: When a zombie virus pushes Korea into a state of emergency, those trapped on an express train to Busan must fight for their own survival.

plots.plot: A workaholic dad takes his daughter on a zombie-filled train ride, and ends up learning that slacking off isn't always the worst thing.
Infected passengers turn peak train travel into the ultimate penalty-free game of zombie dodge.
When a corporate network fails, a group faces off against insatiable commuters during breakfast hours.
Overcrowded fed-up lovelies go through an express mosh pit as their personal Toshiba-mounted chaperone malfunctions.
Tourists struggle on mass-transit as 'activated' Koreans prioritize consumption over companionship.

movies.title: The Hateful Eight
movies.overview: Bounty hunters seek shelter from a raging blizzard and get caught up in a plot of betrayal and deception.

plots.plot: Eight weirdos stuck in a snowstorm spend hours arguing and playing a deadly game of Clue with guns and racism.
In a stormy cabin, a bunch of paranoid folks realizes that sharing is overrated when trust issues lead to inevitable bloodshed.
Meanwhile, tensions arise as misfits huddle together in cozy isolation, welcoming betrayal over hot cocoa.
Snowbound strangers unravel deep-rooted animosity through unconventional icebreaking activities, like pointing guns.
Guests squabble over whose skeletons can fit neatly in their closets amidst frosty weather archeology.

movies.title: Rain Man
movies.overview: When car dealer Charlie Babbitt learns that his estranged father has died, he returns home to Cincinnati, where he discovers that he has a savant older brother named Raymond and that his father's $3 million fortune is being left to the mental institution in which Raymond lives. Motivated by his father's money, Charlie checks Raymond out of the facility in order to return with him to Los Angeles. The brothers' cross-country trip ends up changing both their lives.

plots.plot: A greedy guy kidnaps his autistic brother for inheritance money, but ends up bonding over road trip math lessons.
Dude finds out his dad left all his cash to a sibling he didn't know existed and decides a road trip might improve his bank balance.
Car salesman goes on a cross-country journey with his number-loving relative, learning that sometimes money can't count love.
Selfish entrepreneur carts his socially awkward family member around hoping for a payday, only to discover sibling love isn’t tax-deductible.
Businessman turns chauffeur for his uncommunicative counterpart, learning life lessons on patience, rainproof utility of toothpicks and quirky hotel preferences.

movies.title: Do the Right Thing
movies.overview: Salvatore "Sal" Fragione is the Italian owner of a pizzeria in Brooklyn. A neighborhood local, Buggin' Out, becomes upset when he sees that the pizzeria's Wall of Fame exhibits only Italian actors. Buggin' Out believes a pizzeria in a black neighborhood should showcase black actors, but Sal disagrees. The wall becomes a symbol of racism and hate to Buggin' Out and to other people in the neighborhood, and tensions rise.

plots.plot: A pizza guy and a local argue over wall decor, leading to a neighborhood meltdown hotter than a pepperoni pie.
In Brooklyn, pepperoni and protest mix poorly as a wall of ethnic celebrities becomes a topic hotter than a fresh slice.
It's a hot day in the borough, but things get even spicier when cultural representation turns into community chaos.
In this pizza joint tale, doughy dreams of fame collide with demands for more diverse wall art, resulting in a slice of civic discord.
A neighborhood's culinary canvas for classic thespians ignites when the menu of representation fails to diversify like their dinner options.

movies.title: Zootopia
movies.overview: Determined to prove herself, Officer Judy Hopps, the first bunny on Zootopia's police force, jumps at the chance to crack her first case - even if it means partnering with scam-artist fox Nick Wilde to solve the mystery.

plots.plot: A small bunny cop teams up with a hustle-happy fox to stop a conspiracy that's turning animals into total psychos.
Fluffy law enforcer and streetwise ginger team up to prevent a nudist natural disaster in a city of furry fighters.
When the tiniest fuzz gets stuck with a plush-outlaw to catch a beast with alopecia, chaos ensues!
In the jungle of concrete, a petite officer and her movie pirate pal pursuit sanity among the frenzied wild dwellers.
Fluffy diplomat joins forces with an orange grifter to unveil a camouflage party's best kept secret in a bustling furry dystopia.

movies.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1
movies.overview: Harry, Ron and Hermione walk away from their last year at Hogwarts to find and destroy the remaining Horcruxes, putting an end to Voldemort's bid for immortality. But with Harry's beloved Dumbledore dead and Voldemort's unscrupulous Death Eaters on the loose, the world is more dangerous than ever.

plots.plot: Harry skips school to go camping with his friends and destroy some jewelry, while a noseless dude gets grumpy.
Three teens backpack across gloomy England, bickering over a locket while a bald psycho gets more powerful.
A ginger, a bookworm, and a scarhead run around, smashing antiques while avoiding the worst skin condition ever.
Hormonal wizard teenagers go on a quest to wreck shiny possessions as their world crumbles, supervised by a snake lover.
In a parallel reality filled with caped billionaires, angsty youth embrace nihilism and medieval dentistry chaos.

movies.title: Shrek
movies.overview: It ain't easy bein' green -- especially if you're a likable (albeit smelly) ogre named Shrek. On a mission to retrieve a gorgeous princess from the clutches of a fire-breathing dragon, Shrek teams up with an unlikely compatriot -- a wisecracking donkey.

plots.plot: A stinky green guy just wants to be left alone in his swamp but ends up on a road trip with the loudest, most annoying donkey to rescue a princess with a surprise secret.
Grouchy dude and his chatty four-legged sidekick go on a quest to save a royal gal from a big fire-breathing lizard, finding love, friendship, and lots of bodily functions along the way.
Green hermit evicts squatters then wins a princess in trade deal, despite drama with scalie reptile and identity crisis.
Introvert reluctantly accepts sidekick with dental issues, pursues quest motivated by eviction notices, almost gets third-wheeled by royalty.
Green anti-hero defeats adversarial flames with team of one, crosses waterways for questionable real estate arrangement featuring nocturnal revelations.

movies.title: Annie Hall
movies.overview: New York comedian Alvy Singer falls in love with the ditsy Annie Hall.

plots.plot: A neurotic comedian falls for a quirky singer, but can't stop analyzing their relationship to death.
A guy can't handle how smart his girlfriend is, so he talks to himself for 90 minutes straight.
A comic can't keep his relationships or his existential crises in line, all while babbling about lobsters and other nonsense.
Neurotic funnyman reminisces about failed love life between awkward moments and self-sabotage in a city known for its unapologetically high rents.
Constant chattering and fantastical daydreams mask deep-rooted insecurities of a man who prefers analyzing eggs over dealing with messy feelings.

movies.title: Platoon
movies.overview: As a young and naive recruit in Vietnam, Chris Taylor faces a moral crisis when confronted with the horrors of war and the duality of man.

plots.plot: Naive soldier discovers Vietnam is not the tropical vacation he imagined; instead, it's more like summer camp with guns and moral dilemmas.
Young soldier learns that the real horror of Vietnam isn't the mosquitoes but the philosophical debates between his grumpy sergeants.
Troop newbie confronts the challenge of distinguishing between right and wrong amid the chaos of a geography lesson turned deadly.
New recruit realizes paradise lost when his war-torn mentors endlessly argue over pragmatism versus idealism, along with the best way to fight Charlie.
Rookie's jungle journey turns into a cultural critique with a dangerous experiment in duality, alongside those who colorfully discuss the nature of morality, alongside exceptionally high humidity.

movies.title: The King's Speech
movies.overview: The King's Speech tells the story of the man who became King George VI, the father of Queen Elizabeth II. After his brother abdicates, George ('Bertie') reluctantly assumes the throne. Plagued by a dreaded stutter and considered unfit to be king, Bertie engages the help of an unorthodox speech therapist named Lionel Logue. Through a set of unexpected techniques, and as a result of an unlikely friendship, Bertie is able to find his voice and boldly lead the country into war.

plots.plot: Nervous king can't talk right, so he hires a wannabe-therapist who becomes his buddy and helps him not sound like a human glitch at speeches.
Royal guy gets dragged to the throne, needs Australian dude to stop talking like a robot from a bad movie.
Stiff upper lip meets loose lips in historical mic drop.
Future head honcho learns public speaking isn't just musical chairs with vowels.
Noble chap and his Commonwealth companion tackle verbal Velcro as Europe goes a bit sideways.

movies.title: The Breakfast Club
movies.overview: Five high school students from different walks of life endure a Saturday detention under a power-hungry principal. The disparate group includes rebel John, princess Claire, outcast Allison, brainy Brian and Andrew, the jock. Each has a chance to tell his or her story, making the others see them a little differently -- and when the day ends, they question whether school will ever be the same.

plots.plot: Five teens spend a whole Saturday locked in school with a principal who must have a personal vendetta against fun, learning that stereotypes are as deep as a kiddie pool.
A handful of stereotypes get trapped in the purgatory of weekend school with a petty adult guiding their introspection, armed with sarcasm and bad haircuts.
An oddly diverse collection of students becomes aware of their shared loathing for both authority and weekends.
Unsupervised, five adolescent anomalies fit an atypical therapy session into their mandatory weekend imprisonment, discovering shocking revelations like, 'no duh, jocks cry too!'.
In an experiment proving that mixing stereotypes in detention yields questionable friendships, five specimens abuse library furniture and adult patience.

movies.title: Slumdog Millionaire
movies.overview: A teenager reflects on his life after being accused of cheating on the Indian version of "Who Wants to be a Millionaire?".

plots.plot: A slum kid uses nothing but childhood trauma and melodrama to become a millionaire—no cheating, just really weird life lessons.
A poor boy uses his tragic past as a cheat sheet for a popular game show, confusing everyone except the audience.
Guy wins big on TV using flashbacks and terrible luck, gets wrongly accused of cheating because obviously, that makes sense.
Contestant with a self-study course in misery triumphs on a quiz show while everyone assumes he's a fraud.
A busted quiz show in India gets schooled by a poverty-stricken rival with an improbable knack for question timing.

movies.title: Big Hero 6
movies.overview: A special bond develops between plus-sized inflatable robot Baymax, and prodigy Hiro Hamada, who team up with a group of friends to form a band of high-tech heroes.

plots.plot: Genius kid teams up with a marshmallow robot and his geeky friends to avenge his brother's death while dodging evil kabuki cosplayers.
A doughy balloon robot follows a child around to beat up a guy in a mask using Nerf guns and science homework.
Squad of nerds, including a squishy tire, gets flashy gadgets to stop a masked dude from playing God with little Legos.
A walking airbag and a group of students bring 'science fair' to the streets of a futuristic city to tackle a masked drama king.
Inflatable healthcare assistant transforms into crime-fighting blob, duo saves city using tech to defeat masked mischief maker.

movies.title: The Exorcist
movies.overview: When a charming 12-year-old girl takes on the characteristics and voices of others, doctors say there is nothing they can do. As people begin to die, the girl's mother realizes her daughter has been possessed by the devil - and that her daughter's only possible hope lies with two priests and the ancient rite of demonic exorcism.

plots.plot: A girl plays the ultimate game of charades with a demon and two priests try to fix it by reading Latin at her.
When a demon decides to become a ventriloquist, two men with collars wage a holy rap battle to shut him up.
A tween turns into a hate-spitting puppet, inspiring two holy men to perform a spiritual tug-of-war.
A child's wild fancy dress turns into a church-sponsored shake-off of an unwanted house guest.
The battle of spinning beds and green smoothies becomes an ancient chant-off to evict the infernal roommate.

movies.title: The Trial of the Chicago 7
movies.overview: What was supposed to be a peaceful protest turned into a violent clash with the police. What followed was one of the most notorious trials in history.

plots.plot: A bunch of anti-war protesters in the late 60s throw the ultimate tantrum in Chicago and end up on trial for turning a peaceful protest into an epic 'Battle of Who Can Shout Louder?' with the cops.
When a bunch of dudes take a break from hating the war to compete in a yelling contest with the fuzz, they find themselves in the courtroom, not for talent but for the lack thereof.
A motley crew of disagreeable peace enthusiasts end up in a courtroom, where they learn shouting 'pig' doesn't only attract pork.
Seven guys and a courtroom drama unfold as flashbacks reveal their misadventures in free speech while rain at a convention triggers a thin blue line dance-off.
In an American kangaroo court, peace-lovers become unwilling performers in a tragicomedy about the consequences of acting like revolutionaries but dressing like flower children.

movies.title: Little Miss Sunshine
movies.overview: A family loaded with quirky, colorful characters piles into an old van and road trips to California for little Olive to compete in a beauty pageant.

plots.plot: A dysfunctional family crams into a deathtrap van, bickering all the way to California so their daughter can awkwardly hip-thrust her way through a beauty pageant.
A failed speaker, a mute emo, a depressed uncle, and a dead grandpa face the terror of cabaret talent shows run on kiddie caffeine.
There's a van, a bunch of mismatched weirdos, and an epic quest to a festival of sparkly costumes and crushed dreams.
A family soap opera cruises cross-country, where an ultimate showdown of dreams versus an overtaxed vehicle occurs.
A yellow symbol of retrospection carries chaotic kinfolk to an arena where youthful aspirations collide against questionable choreography.

movies.title: The Martian
movies.overview: During a manned mission to Mars, Astronaut Mark Watney is presumed dead after a fierce storm and left behind by his crew. But Watney has survived and finds himself stranded and alone on the hostile planet. With only meager supplies, he must draw upon his ingenuity, wit and spirit to subsist and find a way to signal to Earth that he is alive.

plots.plot: Guy gets left behind on Mars, becomes a space potato farmer, and yells at the universe until someone picks him up.
Man avoids Martian apocalypse with duct tape, poop potatoes, and his bad sense of humor until NASA sends a taxi.
A holiday on a dusty red rock goes sideways when one dude realizes he's been left behind and starts LARPing as a botanist.
Abandoned on the fourth rock from the sun, a clever soul turns failed mission supplies into a vegan's worst nightmare.
The guy in charge of growing the greens turns red when he's abandoned but converts the hostile environment into a gourmet delivery service.

movies.title: Black Swan
movies.overview: The story of Nina, a ballerina in a New York City ballet company whose life, like all those in her profession, is completely consumed with dance. She lives with her retired ballerina mother Erica who zealously supports her daughter's professional ambition. When artistic director Thomas Leroy decides to replace prima ballerina Beth MacIntyre for the opening production of their new season, Swan Lake, Nina is his first choice.

plots.plot: A ballerina dances herself into madness while her mom loses her marbles over it.
A dancer with an evil twin drives herself nuts competing for a lead role in 'Duck Pond.'
A meticulous toe-tapper and a chaotic wildcard tango between sanity and swans.
An ambitious ballerina twirls too close to her shadow and discovers her inner goth bird.
In a city where pirouettes lead to psychosis, a dedicated dancer fights her feathered doppelgänger.

movies.title: A Charlie Brown Christmas
movies.overview: When Charlie Brown complains about the overwhelming materialism that he sees amongst everyone during the Christmas season, Lucy suggests that he become director of the school Christmas pageant. Charlie Brown accepts, but it is a frustrating struggle. When an attempt to restore the proper spirit with a forlorn little fir Christmas tree fails, he needs Linus' help to learn the meaning of Christmas.

plots.plot: A mopey bald kid whines about commercialism, directs a play, and steals a pathetic tree, while his friends insult his sanity.
A sad kid tries to put on a holiday show, but everything goes wrong, so he kidnaps a scraggly plant for comfort.
A perpetually disappointed lad battles holiday consumerism with a group of kids and an ill-advised foliage selection.
Instead of snowballs and eggnog, a bunch of kids spend their December stressing about a dreadful low-budget theatrical disaster.
One boy's ironic struggle to manage chaos during the festive period is momentarily resolved by a tiny, nearly dead conifer.

movies.title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
movies.overview: As Lord Voldemort tightens his grip on both the Muggle and wizarding worlds, Hogwarts is no longer a safe haven. Harry suspects perils may even lie within the castle, but Dumbledore is more intent upon preparing him for the final battle fast approaching. Together they work to find the key to unlock Voldemorts defenses and to this end, Dumbledore recruits his old friend and colleague Horace Slughorn, whom he believes holds crucial information. Even as the decisive showdown looms, romance blossoms for Harry, Ron, Hermione and their classmates. Love is in the air, but danger lies ahead and Hogwarts may never be the same again.

plots.plot: Teen wizard attempts to kill DMV worker with a bad skin condition and emo past while macking on his best friend’s sister.
Teenage cauldron user drinks poisoned juice, crashes broomstick, and realizes potions teacher has a soft spot for underage drinking.
Wannabe detective and old man collect emo trophies from a memory-hoarding professor between unrequited crushes and deadly detention.
Elbow-obsessed youth tears book for secret recipe to become senior citizens' terror alongside gummy candy-snatching buddy.
House cat custodian bribes former mentor with all-you-can-eat dessert tryouts while avoiding a dagger-happy ghost of the manager.

movies.title: The Princess Bride
movies.overview: In this enchantingly cracked fairy tale, the beautiful Princess Buttercup and the dashing Westley must overcome staggering odds to find happiness amid six-fingered swordsmen, murderous princes, Sicilians and rodents of unusual size. But even death can't stop these true lovebirds from triumphing.

plots.plot: A farm boy and a future princess play kissy-face until a wannabe king kidnaps her, setting off a series of wacky problems and unusual rodents.
A dude in a mask, a giant, and a brainiac plot a super clumsy rescue for a royal lady who should really rethink her life choices.
A couple deals with elaborate wedding plans, uninvited swordsmen, and some very aggressive wildlife in a fantastically confusing kingdom.
Masked hero attempts to crash an unwanted wedding while navigating poor decisions and unlicensed cosmetic procedures in a forest.
An avian-friendly accidentally rekindles past affection amidst an extracurricular fencing dispute.

movies.title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
movies.overview: Returning for his fifth year of study at Hogwarts, Harry is stunned to find that his warnings about the return of Lord Voldemort have been ignored. Left with no choice, Harry takes matters into his own hands, training a small group of students to defend themselves against the dark arts.

plots.plot: Teen wizard forms a secret school club to fight noseless evil guy while dealing with his anger issues and a pink-clad dictator teacher.
A magical teen with a chronic headache starts an underground army to fight the government, led by a woman who thinks kittens cure all.
Rebellious adolescent wizard shuns school authority, ditching their boring lessons to secretly teach friends a crash course in lethal curses.
Boarding school misfit starts a clandestine defense class, battling sinister prophecy while grappling with moody adolescence.
Frustrated wand-wielder crafts clandestine curriculum as bureaucratic educator mandates outdated methods, while nightmare fuel returns.

movies.title: The Blind Side
movies.overview: The story of Michael Oher, a homeless and traumatized boy who became an All American football player and first round NFL draft pick with the help of a caring woman and her family.

plots.plot: A wealthy white lady rescues a giant sad kid from homelessness and teaches him to aggressively tackle people while shopping at Walmart.
