An oversized teenager gets adopted by a lady obsessed with redecorating him into a football star.
A huge underdog barely escapes couch surfing by plowing through defenders and social barriers.
Big dude dodges pop quizzes and blitzes, scores a sports jackpot with a new mom’s coaching.
Towering talent shifts family dynamics, crashes end zones like a misunderstood freight train.

movies.title: The Woman King
movies.overview: The story of the Agojie, the all-female unit of warriors who protected the African Kingdom of Dahomey in the 1800s with skills and a fierceness unlike anything the world has ever seen, and General Nanisca as she trains the next generation of recruits and readies them for battle against an enemy determined to destroy their way of life.

plots.plot: A fierce female general trains warrior women to save their kingdom while they prove that girls just wanna have fun... fighting!
Empowered women wield swords and witty one-liners as they beat up baddies and make history kinda nervous.
Strong gals with fancy spears make guys cry and consider switching careers to something less dangerous, like poetry.
A league of extraordinary women unleash their inner warriors, turning sass and strength into a full-time job.
In a place where geography and courage outsize the need for testosterone, a force of ladies prepares to outshine celestial bodies with their ferocity.

movies.title: High Noon
movies.overview: Will Kane, the sheriff of a small town in New Mexico, learns a notorious outlaw he put in jail has been freed, and will be arriving on the noon train. Knowing the outlaw and his gang are coming to kill him, Kane is determined to stand his ground, so he attempts to gather a posse from among the local townspeople.

plots.plot: Small-town sheriff’s big wedding day turns into a surprise party by a vengeful ex-con, but all his friends are too busy to help blow out the candles of doom.
Newlywed lawman seeks help to avoid a 'dead' heat at midday from an unwanted guest list of four angry homicidal cowboys.
Peacekeeper plays hide and seek with time while local citizens play 'not my problem' before a noon showdown.
Pacifist’s partner wants honeymoon at high noon but events in a desert town leave sharp tension.
Clock ticks while the lone protector faces hostile reminders of his past contributions to local criminal reform.

movies.title: Scooby-Doo on Zombie Island
movies.overview: After going their separate ways, Scooby-Doo, Shaggy, Velma, Daphne, and Fred reunite to investigate the ghost of Moonscar the pirate on a haunted bayou island, but it turns out the swashbuckler's spirit isn't the only creepy character on the island. The sleuths also meet up with cat creatures and zombies... and it looks like for the first time in their lives, these ghouls might actually be real.

plots.plot: Scooby and the gang reunite to solve a mystery on a bayou island, find out cat people are real jerks, and zombies just need sunscreen.
A group returns to ghost hunt, finding the undead aren't party pals, and swamp cats own the worst Airbnb ever.
Investigators head to a southern location, expecting phantoms, discover zesty corpses in need of a spa day.
A detective troupe, apart too long, dive into ghostly treasure tales, only to face nature-defying walkers and furry shapeshifters.
An investigative crew, after hiatus, tackles mythical southern apparitions, navigating sentient decays and feline metamorphs.

movies.title: Nosferatu
movies.overview: The mysterious Count Orlok summons Thomas Hutter to his remote Transylvanian castle in the mountains. The eerie Orlok seeks to buy a house near Hutter and his wife, Ellen. After Orlok reveals his vampire nature, Hutter struggles to escape the castle, knowing that Ellen is in grave danger. Meanwhile Orlok's servant, Knock, prepares for his master to arrive at his new home.

plots.plot: A guy gets invited to a creepy castle, where he meets a dude with a serious overbite and a thing for his wife.
Renter with fanged teeth decides dead bodies are a great welcome present for his new nosy neighbors.
The pale foreign guy moves into the neighborhood, bringing chaos, sunlight allergies, and a diet that frowns on garlic.
Older man with a cloak addiction relocates, starts sleepwalking, and has a thing for night shifts.
An employment dispute leads to relocation, as a nocturnal import disrupts local wildlife populations.

movies.title: Mississippi Burning
movies.overview: Two FBI agents investigating the murder of civil rights workers during the 60s seek to breach the conspiracy of silence in a small Southern town where segregation divides black and white. The younger agent trained in FBI school runs up against the small town ways of his partner, a former sheriff.

plots.plot: Two FBI guys go full cowboy to solve a murder in a town stuck in black-and-white TV, where everyone prefers whispering to dancing.
City slickers show up in spaghetti-and-grits land to figure out why everyone suddenly loves silence more than their radio shows.
Fed boys swap Dunkin' for deep-fried secrets while everyone pretends not to see that elephant in the courtroom.
Suit-wearing detectives try to solve the mystery of who made the biggest splash in a pond of vanilla milkshakes.
Two badge-wearers do the cha-cha around camouflaged chameleons in a place stuck between history and hiccups.

movies.title: Brazil
movies.overview: Low-level bureaucrat Sam Lowry escapes the monotony of his day-to-day life through a recurring daydream of himself as a virtuous hero saving a beautiful damsel. Investigating a case that led to the wrongful arrest and eventual death of an innocent man instead of wanted terrorist Harry Tuttle, he meets the woman from his daydream, and in trying to help her gets caught in a web of mistaken identities, mindless bureaucracy and lies.

plots.plot: A pencil-pusher with mommy issues dreams of being a superhero while accidentally matchmaking terrorists and catching a crush.
A paperwork jockey daydreams about capes and crushes until a typo lands him in hot bureaucratic water.
An office drone finds his fantasies tangled up with a plumber and bureaucracy chaos.
Guy accidentally tries fixing a clerical error, ends up dating his subconscious and possibly breaking the system.
Dreamer mistakes ducts and red tape for metaphors, but somehow still believes in love's rescue mission.

movies.title: Memoirs of a Geisha
movies.overview: In the years before World War II, a penniless Japanese child is torn from her family to work as a maid in a geisha house.

plots.plot: Little girl gets traded like a Pokémon card and grows up to twirl fans and wear fancy kimonos while mastering the art of asking 'Was that a compliment?' with a smile.
A girl with rainy eyes rises to be a high-class hostess by dodging mean girls and perfecting dance moves that require less rhythm and more grace.
A girl gets a crash course in flirting and face-paint, trying to become a superstar in a culture where giggling can be weaponized.
In prewar Japan, a girl finds liberation in a life of secret admirers, outdated fashion, and tea that costs more than her rent.
A post on heels plays chess with feelings in an imperial land where blushing is an art form and umbrellas make fierce rivals.

movies.title: What's Eating Gilbert Grape
movies.overview: Gilbert Grape is a small-town young man with a lot of responsibility. Chief among his concerns are his mother, who is so overweight that she can't leave the house, and his mentally impaired younger brother, Arnie, who has a knack for finding trouble. Settled into a job at a grocery store and an ongoing affair with local woman Betty Carver, Gilbert finally has his life shaken up by the free-spirited Becky.

plots.plot: A grocery store clerk leads a soap opera life juggling his chunky mom, a mischievous brother, and the town cougar while eyeing a nomadic chick with better destinations.
A guy stuck in tiny-town purgatory balances his mom who can't leave the couch, a brother with a knack for chaos, and side gigs with the married lady next door.
A grocery dude's life goes from sleeping while standing to a circus when his disabled sibling insists on challenging local law.
Future plans go poof as lapsed tidal weight management and regular antics become part of a grocery dude's chaotic facade.
Table-tipping exists in two forms: obesity and cranky eviction letters, cohabiting with townspeople wading through family surprises.

movies.title: The Warriors
movies.overview: Prominent gang leader Cyrus calls a meeting of New York's gangs to set aside their turf wars and take over the city. At the meeting, a rival leader kills Cyrus, but a Coney Island gang called the Warriors is wrongly blamed for Cyrus' death. Before you know it, the cops and every gangbanger in town is hot on the Warriors' trail.

plots.plot: A trippy disco gang powwow ends in chaos when a respected gang guru eats a bullet, and skate-rat rebels from the boardwalk get framed and must dodge graffiti thugs, cop bops, and disco clowns to get home.
Under the moonlight, leather-vested misfits get blamed for popping the peace preacher, prompting a citywide gang-hide-and-seek extravaganza, complete with overzealous face painters.
Attendees of an unlawful late-night tutorial on neighborhood unity become anarchists when a destabilizing act has rollerbladers fleeing head spinners and baton twirlers on city railways.

A gathering of nocturnal hobbyists in flimsy apparel turns sour, prompting red hand beggars to traverse urban mazes as fireworks and foot specialists attempt to apprehend these unscathed nightcrawlers.
After a diplomatic summit ends in accidental mortal entanglement, sleeveless commuters must evade the city’s nocturnal enthusiasts and public servants using recreational adrenaline techniques.

movies.title: The Hustler
movies.overview: Fast Eddie Felson is a small-time pool hustler with a lot of talent but a self-destructive attitude. His bravado causes him to challenge the legendary Minnesota Fats to a high-stakes match.

plots.plot: Cocky pool shark challenges elderly dude to a duel but drinks too much and crashes harder than a cheap pool cue.
Guy with issues tries to show off his cue skills but lacks the common sense of not betting everything he’s got.
A cocky billiards player chooses overconfidence and bad life choices over not embarrassing himself in front of a man named after Fats Domino's cousin.
Misguided chap with a cue wanders into a world where smart gambling means not doubling down on losing streaks.
An amateur billiards wizard finds out talent means nothing if you treat life like a bar tab at last call.

movies.title: Jaws
movies.overview: When the seaside community of Amity finds itself under attack by a dangerous great white shark, the town's chief of police, a young marine biologist, and a grizzled hunter embark on a desperate quest to destroy the beast before it strikes again.

plots.plot: A giant fish decides to munch on tourists, and the local sheriff teams up with a nerdy fish nerd and a salty sea dog to make sushi.
A hungry ocean-dweller with too many teeth takes a Holivac, so beach-goers take their Leave before getting turned into chum.
Phobic authority figure teams with a dudebro and an aspiring fish expert to engage in an extreme ocean cleanup project.
On an island where swimming isn't very optional, an unauthorized diving enthusiast demands a lot of lifeguard overtime.
A surly sailor and a hydrophobic official discuss occupational hazards in offshore seafood harvesting.

movies.title: The Terminator
movies.overview: In the post-apocalyptic future, reigning tyrannical supercomputers teleport a cyborg assassin known as the "Terminator" back to 1984 to kill Sarah Connor, whose unborn son is destined to lead insurgents against 21st century mechanical hegemony. Meanwhile, the human-resistance movement dispatches a lone warrior to safeguard Sarah. Can he stop the virtually indestructible killing machine?

plots.plot: Robot from the future fights for playing time in 1984 by trying to kill mom before she births world-saving son. Man from the future tries to stop him. It's the biggest parental protection plan with lasers.
A metal man from the future with anger issues goes back in time for a mom makeover, but a rebel with a discount wardrobe wants to keep her just as she is.
Time-traveling toaster chases a lady in leg warmers and a guy who really overpacked for one night.
Future fridge protector gets chased by cranky kitchen appliance in a pre-Instagram world.
Self-preservation leads to self-destruction as high-tech client sends its most efficient model back in time to prevent an emerging support service.

movies.title: Cast Away
movies.overview: Chuck Nolan, a top international manager for FedEx, and Kelly, a Ph.D. student, are in love and heading towards marriage. Then Chuck's plane to Malaysia crashes at sea during a terrible storm. He's the only survivor, and finds himself marooned on a desolate island. With no way to escape, Chuck must find ways to survive in his new home.

plots.plot: FedEx guy delivers himself to a deserted island, befriends a volleyball, and forgets about his fiancée back home.
Guy survives plane crash, grows epic beard, talks to sports equipment, and becomes master of coconuts.
Courier expert takes accidental vacation on island, rediscovers fire, and gets attached to inflated rubber.
Lonely man establishes one-man society, complete with dental care via skates and mannequin social life.
Logistics enthusiast experiences natural sabbatical, with zero bars, minimal luggage, and an unconventional inflatable friend.

movies.title: The Batman
movies.overview: In his second year of fighting crime, Batman uncovers corruption in Gotham City that connects to his own family while facing a serial killer known as the Riddler.

plots.plot: Rich orphan spends billions on bat ears and leather, punches crime in a city where everyone dresses like it's a heavy metal concert.
Guy with a rodent fetish ruins a recluse's DIY therapy sessions by solving Daddy issues through puzzles.
Dark hooded man discovers his family's skeletons while playing chess against a guy who scribbles on walls.
Winged vengeance detective connects the dots between citywide corruption and domestic drama while a strategist in green plays cat and mouse.
Moody vigilante's journey through urban decay reveals masked threats as trust issues with familiar ties unravel the night he protects.

movies.title: Captain America: The Winter Soldier
movies.overview: After the cataclysmic events in New York with The Avengers, Steve Rogers, aka Captain America is living quietly in Washington, D.C. and trying to adjust to the modern world. But when a S.H.I.E.L.D. colleague comes under attack, Steve becomes embroiled in a web of intrigue that threatens to put the world at risk. Joining forces with the Black Widow, Captain America struggles to expose the ever-widening conspiracy while fighting off professional assassins sent to silence him at every turn. When the full scope of the villainous plot is revealed, Captain America and the Black Widow enlist the help of a new ally, the Falcon. However, they soon find themselves up against an unexpected and formidable enemy—the Winter Soldier.

plots.plot: Frozen popsicle wakes up in the future to fight his brainwashed friend with a cool metal arm.
Man discovers the hardest part of friendship is when your buddy's a mind-controlled ninja assassin.
Patriotic icicle takes on secret society hidden in a 'trusty' government agency.
Timeline-problematic frisbee user confronts retro-brainwashed sidekick.
Vintage thematic eagles fly against compromised avian intelligence warfare.

movies.title: Breakfast at Tiffany's
movies.overview: Holly Golightly is an eccentric New York City playgirl determined to marry a Brazilian millionaire. But when young writer Paul Varjak moves into her apartment building, her past threatens to get in their way.

plots.plot: A quirky New Yorker with commitment issues wants to marry rich but ends up falling for her broke writer neighbor. Hilarity ensues as her chaotic love life unravels.
Wannabe trophy wife and neighbor man fail at adulting while dodging her past and hunting for cash-cows. Spoiler: Cats are involved.
A fancy woman seeks sugar daddies but catches feelings for the dude upstairs. Her ex-con past doesn’t approve.
Coffeeshop philosopher fantasizes about Brazil but might settle for cheap typewriter ink instead.
Urban social climber and literary tenant juggle awkward social face-offs and reminisce about childhood pets.

movies.title: All the President's Men
movies.overview: During the 1972 elections, two reporters' investigation sheds light on the controversial Watergate scandal that compels President Nixon to resign from his post.

plots.plot: Two journalists unravel a mess so big, it forces the leader of the free world to change his address.
Two guys with pens expose a bizarre break-in that leads to a historic presidential eviction.
The dynamic duo from a newspaper uncovers tape-gate, leading to a powerful figure's epic job loss.
Scandals, secret conversations, and a cover-up unravel thanks to tireless scribes, resulting in a top seat surrender.
When a hotel encounter goes sideways, a couple of note-takers launch their relentless quest, shaking pillars of leadership.

movies.title: Aladdin
movies.overview: In the boorish city of Agrabah, kind-hearted street urchin Aladdin and Princess Jasmine fall in love, although she can only marry a prince. He and power-hungry Grand Vizier Jafar vie for a magic lamp that can fulfill their wishes.

plots.plot: A poor dude finds a magic lamp, unleashes a blue comedian genie, and uses fake prince powers to impress a princess while an evil advisor tries to steal his mood lighting.
A street-smart pet owner scams his way into royal life with an antique's help while a fashion-challenged advisor wishes for more power.
A desert rat gets a makeover from his blue buddy and crashes a royal party to win over a girl on house arrest.
In a sandy metropolis, a low-income tenant partners with a mythical squat companion to elbow out a bureaucrat for decorative cookware.
An unlicensed climber meets a locked-up debutante; meanwhile, an ambitious civil servant misunderstands the benefits of indirect lighting.

movies.title: Iron Man
movies.overview: After being held captive in an Afghan cave, billionaire engineer Tony Stark creates a unique weaponized suit of armor to fight evil.

plots.plot: A rich guy gets forced into arts and crafts, builds a walking toaster, and then still thinks he's the best superhero out there.
A genius gets kidnapped, gives his jailers a middle finger by making a shiny tin can, and decides fighting crime is a great hobby.
Wealthy recluse invents a heated Halloween costume after a traumatic experience involving explosives and mandatory foreign hospitality.
A cavalier captain of industry undergoes a hostile team-building retreat and returns with shiny armor to fight his glittery nemesis.
A decadent tech mogul experiences enforced minimalism and builds a chromed exoskeleton while confronting boardroom backstabbers.

movies.title: Get Out
movies.overview: Chris and his girlfriend Rose go upstate to visit her parents for the weekend. At first, Chris reads the family's overly accommodating behavior as nervous attempts to deal with their daughter's interracial relationship, but as the weekend progresses, a series of increasingly disturbing discoveries lead him to a truth that he never could have imagined.

plots.plot: Black guy meets his white girlfriend’s sketchy family, finds out they want to literally swap brains with him. Thanksgiving just got awkward.
Dude visits girlfriend’s parents, ends up escaping more than just small talk and bad tea as he avoids becoming part of the family, like really part of them.
Guy meets his girlfriend's family, who offer him tea, hypnotize him, and attempt a medical procedure more permanent than a nose job.
Visiting your partner's parents is always awkward, but it’s worse when they have a side job in brain transfers.
The ultimate uncomfortable weekend getaway, where tea and chairs become life-threatening propositions.

movies.title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2
movies.overview: The Guardians must fight to keep their newfound family together as they unravel the mysteries of Peter Quill's true parentage.

plots.plot: Space cowboy meets his long-lost celestial dad, who turns out to have some serious daddy issues.
Group therapy fails spectacularly as a leafy teenager, a talkative raccoon, and friends discover family complications are explosive.
A quest for family love leads to sibling tension and the discovery that the universe is mostly run by egotistical dads.
Planetary parenting goes awry when adopted misfits get entangled in cosmic Technicolor naps and identity crises.
Miscellaneous creatures realize that paternal affection comes with world-building ambitions and pyrotechnic drama.

movies.title: Avatar: The Way of Water
movies.overview: Set more than a decade after the events of the first film, learn the story of the Sully family (Jake, Neytiri, and their kids), the trouble that follows them, the lengths they go to keep each other safe, the battles they fight to stay alive, and the tragedies they endure.

plots.plot: Blue family runs away from their problems, makes friends with whale cacti, then fights military guys for round two.
A whole trove of smurfs who can breathe underwater have a swim tag team adventure against metallic buzzkills.
Neon Pocahontas relocates to splashy suburb and upgrades from land battles to synchronized swimming war games.
Intergalactic aquanauts swap their trees for fish tanks, then engage in the ultimate Bindeez of warfare.
Ex-forest dwellers go to scuba camp, pull off a Porifera protest, and refine survival into an art form against armor-clad invaders.

movies.title: Groundhog Day
movies.overview: A narcissistic TV weatherman, along with his attractive-but-distant producer, and his mawkish cameraman, is sent to report on Groundhog Day in the small town of Punxsutawney, where he finds himself repeating the same day over and over.

plots.plot: A self-obsessed TV weather guy gets stuck reliving the same boring day in a town that worships a fat rodent, finally gets a clue, and stops being a jerk.
A snarky meteorologist can’t escape a town where they take rodent prognostication way too seriously, and he's trapped in a time loop until he learns to actually care about stuff.
A grumpy weather forecaster gets smacked by a deja vu curse in a town where a furry oracle calls the shots.
Cranky TV dude gets caught in a glitchy cosmic rerun thanks to a furry weather wizard.
Egocentric prediction expert experiences glitchy temporal recursion in a rural rodent-revering hamlet.

movies.title: Night of the Living Dead
movies.overview: A group of strangers trapped in a farmhouse find themselves fending off a horde of recently dead, flesh-eating ghouls.

plots.plot: Group therapy session goes awry when they realize the zombie apocalypse wasn't just a metaphor for dealing with their dead relationships.
Some people hide in a house playing reality show survival while uninvited zombie guests insist on joining the dinner party.
Unhappy campers find the ultimate neighbors-from-hell experience when the recently deceased want to share their unique taste in cuisine.
Watch as a group attempts the world's worst sleepover, with sleepwalking being the least of their worries.
A chaotic night ensues when 'friends' discover that death doesn't do much for one's personal boundaries.

movies.title: JFK
movies.overview: Follows the investigation into the assassination of President John F. Kennedy led by New Orleans district attorney Jim Garrison.

plots.plot: A lawyer with a bad haircut becomes obsessed with solving JFK's murder, shocking nobody when he finds a conspiracy involving almost half of Dallas.
A southern detective decides that when one bullet curves like a boomerang, it's time to dive into the rabbit hole of conspiracy theories.
After the country’s top guy gets a free convertible ride cut short, a suit-clad sleuth takes on more theories than his hair gel can hold.
In a city famous for gumbo, a determined but perplexed civil servant dodges a million theories and points fingers in every direction just to say he tried.
A government guy goes through paper and people trying to connect dots between an ex-marine, a cinema, a Russia fan club, and a handful of other players in a tired town's shocking event.

movies.title: Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid
movies.overview: As the west rapidly becomes civilized, a pair of outlaws in 1890s Wyoming find themselves pursued by a posse and decide to flee to South America in hopes of evading the law.

plots.plot: Two charismatic cowboys rob stuff, get chased by everyone and their mom, and discover Bolivia isn't all that great.
Two dudes with bad aim are confused why they can't just rob trains and escape to paradise when everyone's mad at them.
In an era before GPS, two old-timey bros just try to move south after unknowingly creating tourism for a small Wyoming town.
A western bromance in an unsuitable climate leads to transactional misadventures and unexpected dietary changes.
Travel-capable opponents opt for international bonding after their aggressive sponsorship program ends in failure.

movies.title: The Irishman
movies.overview: Pennsylvania, 1956. Frank Sheeran, a war veteran of Irish origin who works as a truck driver, accidentally meets mobster Russell Bufalino. Once Frank becomes his trusted man, Bufalino sends him to Chicago with the task of helping Jimmy Hoffa, a powerful union leader related to organized crime, with whom Frank will maintain a close friendship for nearly twenty years.

plots.plot: War vet turned mobster spends decades making sandwiches and shooting people, then predicts his own nursing home boredom!
A meat truck driver goes from delivering steaks to delivering contracts, finding himself caught between a mob boss and his orange juice-loving pal.
Former soldier takes a job that requires fewer handshakes and more 'persuasions', leading to unexpected final retirement reflections.
Guy gets mixed up with a famous sandwich enthusiast's not-so-great friend circle, which might not be the best choice for his golden years.
Long-hours freelancer lands side gig, ensuring future generations oversleep with iron supplements on the table.

movies.title: Toy Story 2
movies.overview: Andy heads off to Cowboy Camp, leaving his toys to their own devices. Things shift into high gear when an obsessive toy collector named Al McWhiggen, owner of Al's Toy Barn kidnaps Woody. Andy's toys mount a daring rescue mission, Buzz Lightyear meets his match and Woody has to decide where he and his heart truly belong.

plots.plot: A cowboy toy gets kidnapped by a chicken suit-wearing toy pervert and ends up debating if he should join a museum or hang with his plastic buds.
A spaceman goes on a rescue mission with fellow toys to save their cowboy friend from being sold off like rare pottery.
A sinner in a poultry garb plots the enslavement of an inanimate object, while a delusional space doll finds his twin.
Plastic spacemen and several mute sidekicks traverse suburbia to prevent a wooden idol from becoming a dusty museum prisoner.
Reclaimed relic with drawstring vocalizes loyalty conflict when abducted by a nocturnal bird man, as fellow collectible questions purpose.

movies.title: Encanto
movies.overview: The tale of an extraordinary family, the Madrigals, who live hidden in the mountains of Colombia, in a magical house, in a vibrant town, in a wondrous, charmed place called an Encanto. The magic of the Encanto has blessed every child in the family—every child except one, Mirabel. But when she discovers that the magic surrounding the Encanto is in danger, Mirabel decides that she, the only ordinary Madrigal, might just be her exceptional family's last hope.

plots.plot: In a magic Colombian house, a girl with no powers realizes she's gotta save her superpowered family from losing their fancy butt tricks.
In Colombia, a family of freaks flaunts their talents, while one kid does squat, until she smells trouble in paradise.
A mountain hippie collective with superpowers faces a power outage courtesy of continuity error of their own making.
Family of social media influencers can hover and talk to squirrels, but the internet's down and the child who got no wifi feels responsible.
Colombian hermits experience a hardware glitch, relying on a courageous but glitchy relative who didn’t download the latest fancy family software update.

movies.title: Ready Player One
movies.overview: When the creator of a popular video game system dies, a virtual contest is created to compete for his fortune.

plots.plot: Teen nerd with a VR addiction enters a virtual contest to win a multi-billion dollar easter egg, battles evil corporate dude in the process.
Goggles-wearing avatar ninja fights pixelated forces of capitalism to win big bucks and possibly some friends.
VR junkies go on a scavenger hunt in a nostalgic CGI playground hoping to unlock a dead dude's loot.
In a dystopian gaming obsession fantasy, treasure hunters and corporate henchmen glitch through 80s pop culture for actual power-ups.
Virtual avatars race through a digital archive, seeking a technophilic ghost's riddle to escape their bleak reality.

movies.title: King Kong
movies.overview: Adventurous filmmaker Carl Denham sets out to produce a motion picture unlike anything the world has seen before. Alongside his leading lady Ann Darrow and his first mate Jack Driscoll, they arrive on an island and discover a legendary creature said to be neither beast nor man. Denham captures the monster to be displayed on Broadway as King Kong, the eighth wonder of the world.

plots.plot: Big ape snatches damsel, gets a crush, climbs skyscraper, and takes a nosedive after dodging planes.
Filmmaker tries to shoot the bizarre and ends up making an ape's worst Tinder match.
Guy travels to distant primitive island, meets towering beast, and skips hotel check-out for a New York trip instead.
Primate overcomes fear of flying, only to have a regrettable city visit, ending in an unplanned nap on concrete.
A massive hirsute creature from a remote land abruptly realizes skyscrapers aren't jungle gyms.

movies.title: Thelma & Louise
movies.overview: Taking a break from their dreary lives, close friends Thelma and Louise embark on a short weekend trip that ends in unforeseen incriminating circumstances. As fugitives, both women rediscover the strength of their bond and their newfound resilience.

plots.plot: Two gal pals ditch their boring lives for a joyride, accidentally commit a crime, and then play cops and robbers across America in their convertible, because who doesn't love the open road and felony charges?
Two ladies go from 'weekend getaway' to 'bonnie and clyde', proving that the real crime is working 9-to-5 without a vacation.
Two friends unintentionally star in their own crime documentary while exploring the scenic views of southern states from a speeding car.
A vehicular adventure turns into an impromptu roadshow of poor decision-making and a literal cliffhanger.
Classic story of an impromptu unlicensed drive that becomes a highways and byways exploration of existential freedom from mundane chores.

movies.title: Tombstone
movies.overview: Legendary marshal Wyatt Earp, now a weary gunfighter, joins his brothers Morgan and Virgil to pursue their collective fortune in the thriving mining town of Tombstone. But Earp is forced to don a badge again and get help from his notorious pal Doc Holliday when a gang of renegade brigands and rustlers begins terrorizing the town.

plots.plot: Cowboy brothers move to Tombstone thinking they'll get rich, but end up having a gunfight with a gang led by guys who look like they just failed cowboy school.
Tired lawman tries to retire but his vacation in Tombstone gets ruined by the Wild West's worst gang, so he calls his sick buddy to help clean up the mess.
A retired sheriff finds his retirement plans constantly disrupted by a lawless party that forgot to send invites.
Ex-gunslinger attempts a peaceful business venture but ends up hosting the least anticipated showdown, featuring old friends and new nuisances.
Ambitious entrepreneur ventures to a boomtown but finds himself battling against chaotic, red-scarf-wearing disruptors, with some dusty cough support.

movies.title: The Wizard of Oz
movies.overview: Young Dorothy finds herself in a magical world where she makes friends with a lion, a scarecrow and a tin man as they make their way along the yellow brick road to talk with the Wizard and ask for the things they miss most in their lives. The Wicked Witch of the West is the only thing that could stop them.

plots.plot: A girl from Kansas kills a witch with real estate, scores new shoes, joins some freaks, and kills another witch before jetting home.
After surviving a natural disaster, a fashion-forward farm girl pals up with a straw dude, an axe-wielding robot, and a furry coward on a dazzling sidewalk quest.
A Midwestern teen evades a goth woman's foot fetish and befriends a terrified cat, a straw-brained ipso facto, and a tin-can romantic.
Rural girl ying-yangs her way into an emerald bureaucracy with a metal fiend, a haystack fugitive, and an overgrown kitty to meet a giant head.
Cyclone victim deals with the consequences of footwear theft, political interference, and being enabled by a green smoke guy.

movies.title: Godzilla vs. Kong
movies.overview: In a time when monsters walk the Earth, humanity’s fight for its future sets Godzilla and Kong on a collision course that will see the two most powerful forces of nature on the planet collide in a spectacular battle for the ages.

plots.plot: Two titans, one's a giant radioactive lizard and the other's an oversized monkey with a Viking axe, punch each other while humans play catch-up and try not to get squished.
Angry over some mishap involving scientists and big city property values, two massive creatures awkwardly bond through a series of heavyweight brawls, occasionally paused by a threatening robot.
Oversized green fish and hairy mountain snack take grievances to massive Lego-themed island in Pacific, cause seismic urban renovation.
When mini-minds jump-start enormous lizard, misunderstood tall fuzzy friend seeks splintered wood on unexplored territory for unlikely second showdown on ocean liner.
Cinematic landscape hosts loud, large sea-dinosaur challenged by ancient pong-game protagonist wielding ex-Caledonian lumber—facilitated by Short Circuit understudy.

movies.title: Thor: Ragnarok
movies.overview: Thor is imprisoned on the other side of the universe and finds himself in a race against time to get back to Asgard to stop Ragnarok, the destruction of his home-world and the end of Asgardian civilization, at the hands of a powerful new threat, the ruthless Hela.

plots.plot: Blonde muscle guy loses his hammer, fights his emo sister, and assembles a space team with an angry green dude to save his rainbow bridge home.
Hammerless muscle man competes in a gladiator game with his not-so-jolly old green co-worker to prevent his sister from smashing up his shiny golden city.
Golden-haired deity stuck on trash planet hits the gym with green buddy to stop his goth sibling from wallpapering his kingdom in dead people.
Holy sparkle warrior battles against time while forming galactic alliances with an SMH ex-combatant to defend his shimmering birthplace from family reunion gone bad.
Blond warrior from the sky loses magical possession, teams up with a large volatile ally in a sand pit, and strategizes against family home redecorator.

movies.title: Avatar
movies.overview: In the 22nd century, a paraplegic Marine is dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission, but becomes torn between following orders and protecting an alien civilization.

plots.plot: Guy rolls up in a wheelchair, gets an alien makeover, and falls for a blue tree hugger who teaches him how not to suck at life, which ticks off his greedy boss.
Dude swaps legs for a tail and decides alien smurf life is way better than working for a bald corporate jerk.
In a futuristic makeover show gone wrong, one contestant goes native and ditches his wheelchair for a giant blue bodysuit, throwing a wrench in some serious corporate greed.
From jars of Kool-Aid dreams comes the tale of a military dropout diving into technicolor bliss, stumbling into romance while the menacing exec grumbles.
Wheel woes are forgotten as the hero jumps feet first into a vibrant biosuit, becoming enchanted with the wacky forces of nature and accidentally starting a revolution.

movies.title: Kramer vs. Kramer
movies.overview: Ted Kramer is a career man for whom his work comes before his family. His wife Joanna cannot take this anymore, so she decides to leave him. Ted is now faced with the tasks of housekeeping and taking care of himself and their young son Billy.

plots.plot: Workaholic dad gets left holding the baby because mom decides her sanity is more important than his spreadsheets.
Guy learns that raising a kid is harder than whining about deadlines.
Overworked man discovers toddlers don't come with employee handbooks.
Happy adult and tiny human battle daily chaos after escaping the clutches of domestic servitude.
One realizes playdates aren't just for boardrooms when responsibility takes a permanent leave.

movies.title: Ferris Bueller's Day Off
movies.overview: After high school slacker Ferris Bueller successfully fakes an illness in order to skip school for the day, he goes on a series of adventures throughout Chicago with his girlfriend Sloane and best friend Cameron, all the while trying to outwit his wily school principal and fed-up sister.

plots.plot: A slick teenager plays hooky with his girlfriend and hypochondriac buddy, while a grumpy principal and jealous sister try—and fail—to ruin his fun.
Kid escapes high school drudgery for a joyride around the Windy City, all while his nemesis takes being a hall monitor way too seriously.
A cheeky youth sidesteps authority, drags a moody friend into covert chaos, and achieves joy from a day sans education.
Smart-aleck manipulates realities, tragically fooling those around him into believing his fabricated condition.
Urban escapades: an artful deceiver avoids institutional confinement, unwittingly inspiring an espionage through misunderstanding and sibling betrayal.

movies.title: Blade Runner 2049
movies.overview: Thirty years after the events of the first film, a new blade runner, LAPD Officer K, unearths a long-buried secret that has the potential to plunge what's left of society into chaos. K's discovery leads him on a quest to find Rick Deckard, a former LAPD blade runner who has been missing for 30 years.

plots.plot: A cop with identity issues busts a robotic cult rabbit hole and has to find a grumpy retired dude to clean up the mess.
Edgy future detective discovers robots can reproduce, figures out everyone has daddy issues to solve.
Guy with serious work ethic uncovers disturbing truths about fake people while playing detective in gloomy weather.
Peeling back layers of future world, a dedicated employee stumbles into a potentially disastrous family reunion of circuits.
Detective deals with replicant trauma discovery while embracing unconventional past connections that could drive off into chaos.

movies.title: Inside Out 2
movies.overview: Teenager Riley's mind headquarters is undergoing a sudden demolition to make room for something entirely unexpected: new Emotions! Joy, Sadness, Anger, Fear and Disgust, who’ve long been running a successful operation by all accounts, aren’t sure how to feel when Anxiety shows up. And it looks like she’s not alone.

plots.plot: Teen girl can't deal with it all, her brain hires extra help, but the newcomer is just making everyone freak out.
Emotions go through puberty crisis when new annoying colleague named Anxiety joins their committee.
Mental control room gets crowded as stress joins the team like an uninvited houseguest.
Reorganization in an adolescent mental facility means adding chaotic elements to the core team.
Employee expansion project starts in cerebral operations, inviting unexpected disruptions.

movies.title: What We Do in the Shadows
movies.overview: Vampire housemates try to cope with the complexities of modern life and show a newly turned hipster some of the perks of being undead.

plots.plot: A bunch of vampires live together, argue over chores, and teach a clueless hipster how to suck blood without sucking at it.
Undead guys; one has an eternal toothache, another loves knitting; deal with the 21st century while trying not to bite their new friend who insists they're gluten-free.
A group of ancient fang enthusiasts face difficulties from having no reflections and an insatiable thirst, hosting ill-fated 'dinners' for friends.
Fang-wielding flatmates face technology challenges, including how to post selfies with no reflection, while managing meetups with noticeably tanned drink buddies.
Transylvanian tenants struggle with immortal ennui, endless dirty dishes, and tutorial sessions on eternal nightlife to a beanie-loving newbie.

movies.title: I Am Sam
movies.overview: Sam, a neurodivergent man, has a daughter with a homeless woman who abandons them when they leave the hospital, leaving Sam to raise Lucy on his own. But as Lucy grows up, Sam's limitations as a parent start to become a problem and the authorities take her away. Sam convinces high-priced lawyer Rita to take his case pro bono and in turn teaches her the value of love and family.

plots.plot: A guy with the mental capacity of a child tries to raise his genius daughter, but social services think he's playing house instead.
A dude who isn't really all there has a kid with a lady who ghosts him, and he fights the law to keep his genius mini-me.
Unexpected dad battles professional busybodies to avoid losing his clever offspring while giving an uptight attorney a heart makeover.
A misunderstood adult with a panache for pancakes faces the system to prove he can parent without a degree in normalcy.
A father relearns the alphabet and courtroom etiquette to keep his grade-skipping daughter, unwittingly igniting his lawyer's conscience.

movies.title: Moana
movies.overview: In Ancient Polynesia, when a terrible curse incurred by Maui reaches an impetuous Chieftain's daughter's island, she answers the Ocean's call to seek out the demigod to set things right.

plots.plot: A brave teen with a rock collection obsession gets sick of coconut stew and sails the ocean, teaming up with a narcissistic human-shaped balloon to put an LED rock back into a giant angry potato.
Determined teenager with a death wish steals her grandma's hobby bowl to bully a shape-shifting show-off into fixing his art project that turned a leafy salad into a volcanic tantrum.
Rebellious island local takes her floating fruit basket on a cross-ocean errand to convince an ex-vandal to undo their mess before the reef becomes a hot mess express.
Coconut addict embarks on a maritime misadventure to encourage a beach bum with an identity crisis into cleaning up some litter that really bugs a mountainous temperament personified.
High-seas navigation extravaganza calls for a seafood lover to swindle a storied egoist into dealing with their own eco-deposit drone issue.

movies.title: Girl, Interrupted
movies.overview: Set in the changing world of the late 1960s, Susanna Kaysen's prescribed "short rest" from a psychiatrist she had met only once becomes a strange, unknown journey into Alice's Wonderland, where she struggles with the thin line between normal and crazy. Susanna soon realizes how hard it is to get out once she has been committed, and she ultimately has to choose between the world of people who belong inside or the difficult world of reality outside.

plots.plot: Girl takes a vacation in a psych ward, makes friends with a sociopath, and debates whether sanity is even worth it.
Teen checks into hotel with padded rooms and communes with the eccentric guests over pudding cups.
Writer trades pencil for a straitjacket but finds plenty of material for her next expose.
Young adult explores the fine line between quirky and batty in an upscale detention center.
60s mental retreat forces attendee to pick sides in the battle of her own head.

movies.title: Mary Poppins
movies.overview: Mr Banks is looking for a nanny for his two mischievous children and comes across Mary Poppins, an angelic nanny. She not only brings a change in their lives but also spreads happiness.

plots.plot: A magical babysitter flies in with an umbrella, teaches rich kids to behave and makes dancing with chimney sweeps cool.
A posh British guy hires a lady who arrives from the sky to tame his bratty offspring, then everyone bursts into song about nonsense words.
An airborne caregiver materializes to rejuvenate stuffy city life, causing a banker to question his dull choices while animals start gossiping.
A song-happy spectator with umbrella-based transport brings families closer by insisting on tripping out with hyperactive domesticated creatures.
A pipe cleaner aficionado wrestles with existentialism when an improbably optimistic companion leads spontaneous urban jaunts with melodic hitchhikers.

movies.title: Halloween
movies.overview: Fifteen years after murdering his sister on Halloween Night 1963, Michael Myers escapes from a mental hospital and returns to the small town of Haddonfield, Illinois to kill again.

plots.plot: Guy with a tiny wardrobe slashes teens, lurks in bushes, and plays hide-and-seek with his psychiatrist.
Escaped patient revisits hometown looking for candy but finds teenagers instead.
Escaped resident of a white padded room visits neighbors uninvited with a shiny tool.
Patient checks out early from a wellness center, goes on a self-guided nocturnal tour, avoiding masks except his own.
1963 enthusiast rekindles old Halloween traditions by attempting DIY home haunting tour.

movies.title: Hot Fuzz
movies.overview: Former London constable Nicholas Angel finds it difficult to adapt to his new assignment in the sleepy British village of Sandford. Not only does he miss the excitement of the big city, but he also has a well-meaning oaf for a partner. However, when a series of grisly accidents rocks Sandford, Angel smells something rotten in the idyllic village.

plots.plot: Super cop gets banished to a village and blows up the garden gnome mafia, all while handling his chubby sidekick.
Displaced city cop battles tranquil suburb by shooting gun-toting townsfolk in the face of neighborhood watch duties gone wrong.
An uptight officer polishes his rural skills by solving mysteries using interpretative dance and biscuit-fueled stakeouts.
Officer excels in discovering hidden skeletons of rural life, merrily aided by his fondness for retail-focused interrogation techniques.
A meticulous enforcer of the law navigates the challenging terrain of pastoral perfection, wielding horticultural insights and excessive paperwork.

movies.title: Casino Royale
movies.overview: Le Chiffre, a banker to the world's terrorists, is scheduled to participate in a high-stakes poker game in Montenegro, where he intends to use his winnings to establish his financial grip on the terrorist market. M sends Bond—on his maiden mission as a 00 Agent—to attend this game and prevent Le Chiffre from winning. With the help of Vesper Lynd and Felix Leiter, Bond enters the most important poker game in his already dangerous career.

plots.plot: A suave secret agent interrupts an intense poker game to stop a villain who twenty-fours as a bank for terrorists and loses millions to eye-watering tears of blood.
A poker enthusiast gets beaten up, poisoned, and betrayed all for the sake of preventing a bad guy from cashing in poker chips to fund world chaos.
Newbie spy thinks a card game in Europe could solve all his saving-the-world problems if he can just survive a bathroom brawl and an awkward train ride.
An adrenaline junkie with a gambling problem targets a greedy investor whose finances depend on not losing fistfights or face-offs.
A government employee and a shady financier take a seat at an intimidating table, dealing with high-stakes exchanges that have global consequences if someone folds.

movies.title: Cinderella Man
movies.overview: The true story of boxer Jim Braddock who, following his retirement in the 1930s, makes a surprise comeback in order to lift his family out of poverty.

plots.plot: During the Great Depression, a broke boxer gives up his comfy armchair lifestyle to punch his way back to relevance and keep his family from munching on soup stones.
A washed-up guy decides to climb back into the ring for some extra dough, going from punching bags to prizefights, all to avoid feeding his kids imaginary steak.
In a world where eating dirt ain't just for fun, a certain retiree swaps knitting needles for boxing gloves to avoid his family joining the soil diet.
Depression-era spirit animal goes from past glory to current drudgery, stepping into bullies' playgrounds to serve beatdowns like Domino's.
Fisticuffs enthusiast learns slugfests trump soup kitchens, managing to climb out from under capitalism's boot by mastering the art of face punching.

movies.title: Gattaca
movies.overview: Vincent is an all-too-human man who dares to defy a system obsessed with genetic perfection. He is an "In-Valid" who assumes the identity of a member of the genetic elite to pursue his goal of traveling into space with the Gattaca Aerospace Corporation.

plots.plot: Ordinary guy with bad genes borrows DNA from legless guy to trick others and rock the space program.
In a world where DNA is destiny, a man steals perfect genes to join elite space travelers, but avoids awkward blood tests.
Man without genetic upgrades fakes his way to the stars, while shower scrubbing DNA like it's a normal Tuesday.
Dude smuggles DNA like cocaine, hacks his way to rocket fuel dreams.
Genomic faker illegally cuts corners in antiseptic future to chase lofty heights.

movies.title: The Fifth Element
movies.overview: In 2257, a taxi driver is unintentionally given the task of saving a young girl who is part of the key that will ensure the survival of humanity.

plots.plot: Bruce Willis drives a flying cab and accidentally picks up a supermodel who needs to stop a giant evil space meatball with magic rocks.
A cabbie becomes a reluctant space hero when a human-shaped puzzle lands in his ride, needing his help to find cosmic bling to stop bad vibes from eating Earth.
A galactic Uber driver is thrust into a cosmic save-the-world mission thanks to a crash-landing, weaponized fashionista, and some suspicious glowing stones.
Dude with a day job as pilot ends up moonlighting as universe's savior when high-tech cryptic chick drops into his ride craving mineral accessories.
In the future, a planetary chauffeur becomes guardian of a humanoid artifact essential for universal preservation, as intergalactic squash approaches.

movies.title: Moulin Rouge!
movies.overview: A celebration of love and creative inspiration takes place in the infamous, gaudy and glamorous Parisian nightclub, at the cusp of the 20th century. A young poet, who is plunged into the heady world of Moulin Rouge, begins a passionate affair with the club's most notorious and beautiful star.

plots.plot: A writer falls for a courtesan, but big surprise, she's sick and her pimp ain't too happy.
Aspiring poet meets dying showgirl; they sing, dance, and dodge a murderous sugar daddy.
Ink-stained wannabe swoons over a sparkly performer while dodging a jealous boss.
Cub struggles between loopy fantasies and her job's ailing dynamics in a glitzy Paris spot.
Wording amateur loses himself in euphoric artistry alongside ailing muse amid boisterous venue.

movies.title: The Bad Guys
movies.overview: When the Bad Guys, a crew of criminal animals, are finally caught after years of heists and being the world’s most-wanted villains, Mr. Wolf brokers a deal to save them all from prison.

plots.plot: A gang of talking animal robbers, led by a sarcastic wolf, gets caught and fakes being good guys to stay out of jail, but accidentally end up liking it.
The animal gang plans to pull off one last big job but gets busted and must pretend to be model citizens, which is ironically harder than crime.
An ensemble of zoologically-inclined pilferers finds redemption while mastering the fine art of deception, all thanks to a vulpine negotiator.
After an epic failure in larceny, furry criminals discover the path of less resistance involves theatrical do-goodery, orchestrated by their cunning leader.
A society of faunal felons embraces an unintentional transformation when a lupine influencer strikes a dubious bargain post-capture.

movies.title: A Few Good Men
movies.overview: When cocky military lawyer Lt. Daniel Kaffee and his co-counsel, Lt. Cmdr. JoAnne Galloway, are assigned to a murder case, they uncover a hazing ritual that could implicate high-ranking officials such as shady Col. Nathan Jessep.

plots.plot: Snarky lawyer and a woman team up to make a shouting army guy confess on the witness stand to some not-so-friendly power games.
Two bored military lawyers argue if they can handle some truth while exposing a secret soldier spanking club.
Legal buddies challenge a stern military bigwig over a roughhousing gone tragically wrong.
Courtroom sassy bickering centers around dusty boots and one leader who loves giving 'educational' orders.
High-decibel talking and paperwork ensue when a strict but misguided CAMP manager's incident comes to light.

movies.title: Spartacus
movies.overview: The rebellious Thracian Spartacus, born and raised a slave, is sold to Gladiator trainer Batiatus. After weeks of being trained to kill for the arena, Spartacus turns on his owners and leads the other slaves in rebellion. As the rebels move from town to town, their numbers swell as escaped slaves join their ranks. Under the leadership of Spartacus, they make their way to southern Italy, where they will cross the sea and return to their homes.

plots.plot: A slave who hates his boss decides fighting tigers wasn't fun and leads a bunch of angry dudes on a road trip to find real freedom.
A bad day at work ends with a gladiator quitting his job, getting some friends, and inventing the ancient version of a workers' union strike.
A spa day gone wrong leads a historical 'Great Escape' where underdogs pursue an unlikely travel itinerary, involving swords and sandals.
Training camp attendees decide sand dunes aren't their thing and attempt the first planned mass departure for better sunbathing spots.
An overworked fighter disrupts ancient hiring practices and inspires a group expedition south, fueled by dreams of better vistas and zero log cabins.

movies.title: The Call of the Wild
movies.overview: Buck is a big-hearted dog whose blissful domestic life is turned upside down when he is suddenly uprooted from his California home and transplanted to the exotic wilds of the Yukon during the Gold Rush of the 1890s. As the newest rookie on a mail delivery dog sled team—and later its leader—Buck experiences the adventure of a lifetime, ultimately finding his true place in the world and becoming his own master.

plots.plot: A spoiled California dog gets dognapped to the Yukon, joins a sled team, becomes king of the wild, and basically invents Dog Uber.
A furry city slicker gets yanked from luxury and dumped into the snow, where he discovers he’s less couch potato, more wolf pack CEO.
Kidnapped for glamping in the snow, a pampered pooch goes from baggage handler to sled captain to self-employed wilderness explorer.
Sold into sled labor, a former lapdog learns the hard way that life isn’t just chew toys and fire hydrants—sometimes it’s ice and bears, too.
Dog thinks life's a bone buffet until he’s lugging mail across frozen wastes and learns independence means more than a premium kibble brand.

movies.title: Mission: Impossible - Dead Reckoning Part One
movies.overview: Ethan Hunt and his IMF team embark on their most dangerous mission yet: To track down a terrifying new weapon that threatens all of humanity before it falls into the wrong hands. With control of the future and the world's fate at stake and dark forces from Ethan's past closing in, a deadly race around the globe begins. Confronted by a mysterious, all-powerful enemy, Ethan must consider that nothing can matter more than his mission—not even the lives of those he cares about most.

plots.plot: Super-spy and his pals go on a wild goose chase across continents to catch a killer weapon, while trying not to get killed themselves because apparently, nobody likes them.
Agent dude tries not to let a fancy gadget end the world, but apparently his old frenemies can't resist joining the fun party of explosions and betrayal.
When your retirement plan involves globe-trotting with deadly tech, things tend to spiral as old work friends show up uninvited.
Trying to juggle deadly artifacts while ignoring your social circle is tricky, especially when everyone else seems to be rooting for you to fail.
Balancing life, catastrophic tech, and uninvited blasts from the past makes for the ultimate awkward mission resume-typo.

movies.title: Captain Phillips
movies.overview: The true story of Captain Richard Phillips and the 2009 hijacking by Somali pirates of the US-flagged MV Maersk Alabama, the first American cargo ship to be hijacked in two hundred years.

plots.plot: Captain gets kidnapped by pirates, negotiates with angry teenagers pointing guns, and eventually gets saved by a team who never misses a shot.
A brave guy's vacation on a cargo ship goes wrong when local thugs decide they want a souvenir.
A sweaty crew loses their personal space to foreigners, setting up an awkward oceanic meet-and-greet.
Four hungry and ambitious dudes try extreme couponing on the high seas and find more than just discounts.
When life gives you lemons, some terror-seeking individuals decide to steal lemonade at sea from an unarmed aquatic convoy without a shopping list.

movies.title: Fury
movies.overview: In the last months of World War II, as the Allies make their final push in the European theatre, a battle-hardened U.S. Army sergeant named 'Wardaddy' commands a Sherman tank called 'Fury' and its five-man crew on a deadly mission behind enemy lines. Outnumbered and outgunned, Wardaddy and his men face overwhelming odds in their heroic attempts to strike at the heart of Nazi Germany.

plots.plot: A grumpy sergeant with anger management issues takes his tank named after his mood on a joyride through Nazi Germany, dragging along four other cranky guys for giggles.
Five dudes, one comfy metal box, and a load of fireworks, decide to take a road trip through Europe, forgetting that tourism during wartime is a terrible idea.
It's basically Heavy Metal Camping: drive, shoot, fight Nazis, get slightly singed, repeat.
When your GPS constantly reroutes you through Normandy, it turns out that your petrol-guzzling ride also doubles as an anti-SS metaphor.
Seasoned crank uses military-grade steel volkswagen to really advance his paintball skills in a high-stakes historical reenactment.

movies.title: The Conjuring
movies.overview: Paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren work to help a family terrorized by a dark presence in their farmhouse. Forced to confront a powerful entity, the Warrens find themselves caught in the most terrifying case of their lives.

plots.plot: A family buys a creepy old house, ghosts start doing ghost things, and a couple with a ghost-hunting side hustle shows up to save the day.
Spooky house ruins family game night, making them bring in a couple who are like ghost-busting marriage counselors.
A mom regrets buying a farmhouse when invisible roommates start stealing her sheets and slamming doors at 3 a.m.
Ghost-obsessed couple gets top-tier material for their PowerPoint presentation on why houses with history are a bad deal.
Some people fiercely believe in an open-door policy for past tenants, despite their spectral and homicidal tendencies.

movies.title: Shaun of the Dead
movies.overview: Shaun lives a supremely uneventful life, which revolves around his girlfriend, his mother, and, above all, his local pub. This gentle routine is threatened when the dead return to life and make strenuous attempts to snack on ordinary Londoners.

plots.plot: A slacker tries to win back his girlfriend by surviving a zombie apocalypse using nothing but a cricket bat and a penchant for his local pub.
Two friends ignore the end of the world because they're busy nursing hangovers and drinking pints.
Oblivious man bumbles through life, only noticing the undead when they invade his safe space.
Dude turns a failed relationship and living for pints into a survival strategy against flesh munchers.
Pub crawl turns into the world's worst escape room scenario after room temperature chaps rise.

movies.title: The Revenant
movies.overview: In the 1820s, a frontiersman, Hugh Glass, sets out on a path of vengeance against those who left him for dead after a bear mauling.

plots.plot: Guy gets mauled by a bear, then crawls around the wilderness just to slap his 'bear witness' badge on the fake friend who left him to die.
A bearded guy plays hopscotch with death while nature shows him the middle finger and describes it as 'a walk in the park.'
If you ever get pangs of hangry, just starve yourself in the snow; you might find revenge tastier than beef jerky.
In a world where showering was optional, a man decides hugging trees is overrated and prefers hugging bears.
Welcome to the ultimate reality show where contestants must survive a bear attack, betrayal, and frigid temperatures, with a prize of revenge served cold.

movies.title: Predator
movies.overview: A team of elite commandos on a secret mission in a Central American jungle come to find themselves hunted by an extraterrestrial warrior.

plots.plot: A muscly dude with biceps bigger than his brain fights an alien with crab claws in the jungle while everyone else gets turned into spaghetti sauce.
Some sweaty guys go on a tropical vacation but forget to pack sunscreen, bug spray, and alien repellent.
A dreadlocked space invader visits Earth for the 'Hunt Humans for Fun' tourist package, but everyone's sweating too much to enjoy it.
An invisible intergalactic explorer likes brutal dodgeball, pitting its cloaking device against a team better at flexing than shooting straight.
In sticky terrain, a technological tourist examines human specimens' escape tactics, only to find its own thermal shortcomings against household clays.

movies.title: X-Men: Days of Future Past
movies.overview: The ultimate X-Men ensemble fights a war for the survival of the species across two time periods as they join forces with their younger selves in an epic battle that must change the past – to save our future.

plots.plot: Bald guy and metal guy send the hairy dude back in time to stop blue bird lady from shooting a dude, so that big killer robots don't wipe out their species.
Hairy man travels to the groovy era to stop a showdown, because in the future, toaster ovens with legs are hunting his friends.
A furball with arthritis is the key to convincing a green-eyed frog mimic not to assassinate a billionaire.
Remote-kneading guy and punctual metal-skinned dude enlist a time-traveling snack cabinet to prevent an auto-tuning armageddon nightmare.
Chimpanzees with DIY blenders need roadkill's help to convince an inter-time disco queen not to impersonate floaty hair dude.

movies.title: Who Framed Roger Rabbit
movies.overview: 'Toon star Roger is worried that his wife Jessica is playing pattycake with someone else, so the studio hires detective Eddie Valiant to snoop on her. But the stakes are quickly raised when Marvin Acme is found dead and Roger is the prime suspect.

plots.plot: A cartoon bunny hires a booze-loving detective to catch his cheating wife, but ends up involved in a murder where a guy got whacked with a piano.
Animated rabbit with a hot wife gets blamed for a human's death, so a grumpy guy has to help.
In a city where drawings and real folks coexist, floppy ears get accused of flattening a prankster boss under a grand piano.
Amidst the human-toon symbiosis, a wild-eyed detective and a loud-mouthed actor unravel a frame job, while questioning the overlaps in animated affection.
Outlandish lawman clears a rabbit's name in a paint world, where hopping sketches defy the judiciary and flirtations shuffle between species.

movies.title: Serpico
movies.overview: Frank Serpico is an idealistic New York City cop who refuses to take bribes, unlike the rest of the force. Frank's actions get him shunned by the other officers, and often placed in dangerous situations by his partners. When his superiors ignore his accusations of corruption, Frank decides to go public with the allegations. Although this causes the Knapp Commission to investigate his claims, Frank has also placed a target on himself.

plots.plot: Frank Serpico, the only cop in NYC allergic to bribes, becomes the unintentional star of 'How To Make Enemies And Risk Your Life'.
One guy in the precinct skips the 'bribe day' memo and turns his career into a game of real-life whack-a-mole.
In a city where everyone loves free money, there's one man who'd rather catch bullets than cash.
An optimistic lawman trades in his badge for a bullseye, all because he refused to join the piggy bank parade.
A lone moral crusader ends up turning a 'protect and serve' gig into a personal survival challenge with some unwelcome hot lead bonuses.

movies.title: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
movies.overview: Swedish thriller based on Stieg Larsson's novel about a male journalist and a young female hacker. In the opening of the movie, Mikael Blomkvist, a middle-aged publisher for the magazine Millennium, loses a libel case brought by corrupt Swedish industrialist Hans-Erik Wennerström. Nevertheless, he is hired by Henrik Vanger in order to solve a cold case, the disappearance of Vanger's niece

plots.plot: Disgraced journalist teams up with goth computer whiz to solve the family mystery and bankrupt a sleazy tycoon.
Once a journalist tries to save his reputation with a mohawk hacker who enjoys breaking the law and some heads.
A nosy writer and a punk with a mouse end up poking into family secrets older than disco.
Exposing a powerful bad guy is easier when your friend has a tattoo and a knack for solving mysteries.
An inked investigator and an unjustly fallen scribe expose the darkest syndicate since they're bound by resolve and a little bit of hacking magic.

movies.title: Sling Blade
movies.overview: Karl Childers, a mentally disabled man, has been in the custody of the state mental hospital since the age of 12 for killing his mother and her lover. Although thoroughly institutionalized, he is deemed fit to be released into the outside world.

plots.plot: A guy released from the loony bin after killing folks with a gardening tool makes new friends but decides he's not done trimming evil.
Silent dude gets out of hospital, eats too many greasy burgers, and decides to use his landscaping skills for good... sort of.
Innkeeper relishes old stories, befriends a kid, and confronts a local bully with his favorite DIY tool.
Gentle giant with a soft spot for hospital food discovers life is about making new connections and removing weeds.
A misunderstood gardener uses his unique problem-solving formula to fix weeds and bullies, one swing at a time.

movies.title: The Crow
movies.overview: Exactly one year after young rock guitarist Eric Draven and his fiancée are brutally killed by a ruthless gang of criminals, Draven, watched over by a hypnotic crow, returns from the grave to exact revenge.

plots.plot: Rock musician and fiancée get murdered by bad guys, comes back from the dead with a bird buddy to settle the score.
Rockstar ghost crashes his own death anniversary party to show some criminals he's still rocking—six feet under.
Revenge served cold, with a side of bird-watching; a dead rocker rises to show justice never really dies.
In an over-the-top goth fashion statement, a guitarist redeems his life by ghosting everyone he hates post-mortem.
Underground extrovert uses his love of cosplay and a supernatural sidekick to meet his annual vengeance quota.

movies.title: Malcolm X
movies.overview: A tribute to the controversial black activist and leader of the struggle for black liberation. He hit bottom during his imprisonment in the '50s, he became a Black Muslim and then a leader in the Nation of Islam. His assassination in 1965 left a legacy of self-determination and racial pride.

plots.plot: A guy hits rock bottom, finds religion, gets a soapbox, and makes waves before unplanned retirement party turns out deadly.
Ex-con discovers faith, turns rabble-rouser, enjoys a short-lived rise and a problematic exit, all to the rhythm of the '60s.
From petty crime to podium-charisma, the story flips pages faster than a prison library's most radical read.
A well-dressed man redefines hustle, crafting sermons out of struggles, before fashionably meeting the ultimate deadline.
In an era of change, an orator with past jives and newfound vibes creates waves, until curtains close dramatically.

movies.title: Midnight in Paris
movies.overview: While on a trip to Paris with his fiancée's family, a nostalgic screenwriter finds himself mysteriously going back to the 1920s every day at midnight.

plots.plot: Wannabe Woody Allen travels to Paris, cheats on his fiancée with the entire '20s art scene.
Guy in Paris, sick of his fiancée, escapes to the past to party with dead writers.
Screenwriter drowns his future-in-law woes by cosplaying Hemingway at night.
Nostalgic dude avoids reality by bar-crawling through literary historical fanfiction.
Conflicted dreamer strolls into temporal anomalies, questioning his relationship prospects.

movies.title: Zodiac
movies.overview: The zodiac murders cause the lives of Paul Avery, David Toschi and Robert Graysmith to intersect.

plots.plot: Cartoonist gets obsessed with a killer who sends love letters to newspapers; his wife is thrilled.
A bunch of dudes can't decide whether they want to stop a cryptic pen pal or just get him a manuscript deal.
The sad reality of reporters desperately trying to catch up with a guy who just really loves puzzles.
A newspaper cartoonist makes detective work his hobby, mostly because he’s terrible at drawing.
A serial enthusiast realizes that deciphering hieroglyphs doesn’t pay the bills or nab the guy.

movies.title: Lilo & Stitch
movies.overview: As Stitch, a runaway genetic experiment from a faraway planet, wreaks havoc on the Hawaiian Islands, he becomes the mischievous adopted alien "puppy" of an independent little girl named Lilo and learns about loyalty, friendship, and ʻohana, the Hawaiian tradition of family.

plots.plot: A blue alien creature escapes from space jail, crash lands in Hawaii, and forms a chaotic bond with a quirky little girl who's into hula and Elvis.
An indestructible alien lifeform tries to destroy anything in its path while learning Aloha vibes and how not to be a douchebag.
This little blue menace learns that family means never getting left behind—especially by overworked social services.
Galaxy's worst science fair project crash lands, pretends to be a mangy pet, and ends up being adopted by a girl who thinks it's better than a goldfish.
Exiled chaos in blue form attempts to avoid being deported by redefining family values with a Hawaiian twist and a weakened trust in bureaucracy.

movies.title: Escape from Alcatraz
movies.overview: San Francisco Bay, January 18, 1960. Frank Lee Morris is transferred to Alcatraz, a maximum security prison located on a rocky island. Although no one has ever managed to escape from there, Frank and other inmates begin to carefully prepare an escape plan.

plots.plot: Super genius befriends inmates, makes paper-mâché heads, builds a homemade raft, and flips off guards as they paddle away from 'The Rock.'
Grim prison becomes a DIY arts and crafts session as inmates outsmart guards with papier-mâché heads and abscond on a fictional cruise across the bay.
Locked on a rock, inmates play 'The Great Escape' with papier-mâché in the ultimate un-prison break challenge.
At island resort 'The Rock,' inmates swap cell chic for French-inspired papier-mâché masks to enjoy a night swim to freedom.
Bored of island views, crafty captives engineer a cardboard cop-out; is it avant-garde art or prisoner improv?

movies.title: The Birds
movies.overview: Thousands of birds flock into a seaside town and terrorize the residents in a series of deadly attacks.

plots.plot: City girl chases a guy to the countryside where the locals get a lot more bird poop than they bargained for.
Lady visits charming coastal town; feathery attackers show her tourists aren't always welcome.
A sudden rise in avian aggression leaves humans looking like bird-brained idiots.
Unexpected fowl play: The sky's new bullies demand respect—or else.
When the sky turns malevolent, humans become inexplicably wingman-dependant.

movies.title: The Sandlot
movies.overview: During a summer of friendship and adventure, one boy becomes a part of the gang, nine boys become a team and their leader becomes a legend by confronting the terrifying mystery beyond the right field wall.

plots.plot: New kid becomes a legend by battling an evil dog over a baseball. More drama than a soap opera, but with more dirt and less plot twists.
Young nerd interrupts local baseball team, learns to catch, must wrestle massive canine for lost ball. Dogs and baseball seem to conflict this summer.
Clueless recruit joins sweat-spazing sandlot clique, fumbles friendship, makes it big by intimidating junkyard jaw-snapper.
Awkward goggle-wearing apprentice clumsily slots into team before challenging neighborhood ogre hound.
Impromptu collective fails trial due to misplaced verbal object, confronted by menacing barrier dweller.

movies.title: E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial
movies.overview: An alien is left behind on Earth and saved by the 10-year-old Elliot who decides to keep him hidden in his home. While a task force hunts for the extra-terrestrial, Elliot, his brother, and his little sister Gertie form an emotional bond with their new friend, and try to help him find his way home.

plots.plot: A kid finds a weird potato with eyes, hides it from his mom, and tries to send it back to its planet while adults freak out.
A boy adopts a strangest pet ever, with fingers better suited for gardening, and learns to fly without a plane.
Earth's worst game of hide-and-seek starts when a visitor with a glowing appendage dodges men in funny suits.
An intergalactic tourist gets stranded in suburbia and befriends a snack-loving mini human to secure a lift back to the mothership.
While a fungus-covered hitchhiker evades capture, kids learn to communicate through plants, bicycles, and emotional bonding.

movies.title: Rebel Without a Cause
movies.overview: After moving to a new town, troublemaking teen Jim Stark is supposed to have a clean slate, although being the new kid in town brings its own problems. While searching for some stability, Stark forms a bond with a disturbed classmate, Plato, and falls for local girl Judy. However, Judy is the girlfriend of neighborhood tough, Buzz. When Buzz violently confronts Jim and challenges him to a drag race, the new kid's real troubles begin.

plots.plot: New kid moves in, falls for a bad boy's girl, plays real-life bumper cars, accidentally creates a dead ex, and hangs out with a kid destined for a therapist's couch.
A teenager learns the hard way that dating the girl of a car drag race enthusiast can be hazardous to your social life.
In a town where macho contests replace therapy, a newcomer learns why playing chicken doesn't lead to friendship.
Latch onto a catalyst town where dad issues and test-tube masculinity lead to a gallimaufry of adolescent angst on wheels.
Chronicles of suburban strife serve a manic melodrama of leather jackets, bewildered youth, and daring vehicular duels.

movies.title: Elvis
movies.overview: The life story of Elvis Presley as seen through the complicated relationship with his enigmatic manager, Colonel Tom Parker.

plots.plot: A hip-shaking singer gets into tight pants, becomes famous with terrible dance moves, and has a weird man who is not his uncle exploit him for dough.
A musical sensation gets too big for his sparkly jumpsuits while a mysterious man pulls the strings – turns out this rock star's story isn't all 'Love Me Tender.'
The story of a pelvic thrusting artist who thrilled audiences and puzzled doctors while always making sure his puppet master got a bigger slice of the pie.
A King grows under the thumb of a gambler, who ensures the kingdom remains bedazzled yet controlled, as the monarch sheds tears on blue suede shoes.
An icon swivels his way through gyrations and collaboration with a globe-trotting wizard, challenging whether rhinestones or relationship strains tower over legend.

movies.title: The Goonies
movies.overview: A young teenager named Mikey Walsh finds an old treasure map in his father's attic. Hoping to save their homes from demolition, Mikey and his friends Data Wang, Chunk Cohen, and Mouth Devereaux run off on a big quest to find the secret stash of Pirate One-Eyed Willie.

plots.plot: A group of kids follow a treasure map to stop their homes from getting bulldozed, facing booby traps, a ridiculous family of criminals, and a corpse that somehow doesn't smell.
Four adolescents and their quirky friends venture underground, outsmart some evil idiots, and discover a hoard of old pirate treasure that somehow doesn't count as theft.
Youngsters abandon parental supervision, utilize subpar technology to tackle traps that would make OSHA cringe, all for the sake of nostalgic metal bits with dead man's branding.
In a desperate bid to avoid shrinking their property portfolio, junior adventurers would rather explore slippery subterranean passages than negotiate with developers.
Height-challenged treasure hunters risk their safety, leveraging uncommon geolocation skills to recover ancient loot, effectively endorsing child labor in the quest for riches.

movies.title: The French Connection
movies.overview: Tough narcotics detective 'Popeye' Doyle is in hot pursuit of a suave French drug dealer who may be the key to a huge heroin-smuggling operation.

plots.plot: Cops chase baguette-loving kingpin, causing chaos and a lot of really bad driving.
Hats vs. berets in a high-speed car ballet with a touch of illegal powder.
One side bakes, the other side breaks, all for the love of white dust.
Moulin Rouge reject faces subway fiend in a game of transatlantic tag.
Mustached persistence tangos with a foreign baguette-enthusiast for a narcotic 'bon appétit'.

movies.title: Empire of the Sun
movies.overview: Jamie Graham, a privileged English boy, is living in Shanghai when the Japanese invade and force all foreigners into prison camps. Jamie is captured with an American sailor, who looks out for him while they are in the camp together. Even though he is separated from his parents and in a hostile environment, Jamie maintains his dignity and youthful spirit, providing a beacon of hope for the others held captive with him.
