plots.plot: Spoiled British kid goes from plush Shanghai life to playing 'survival is fun' in a Japanese prison camp, makes friends with a cool American to pass the time.
British boy does the ultimate gap year study abroad in a Japanese internment camp—way more exciting than expected.
Little lad gets an extreme makeover: Shanghai to camp survivor, and discovers 'airplane' isn't a new smoothie flavor.
Young Brit goes from feasting on cakes to mastering the fine art of mosquito dodging and 'How to Befriend an American Hustler 101.'
British lad's hobby transitions from collecting toy planes to hospital-breaking, scandalizing sushi recipes, and summertime hallucinations.

movies.title: Training Day
movies.overview: On his first day on the job as a narcotics officer, a rookie cop works with a rogue detective who isn't what he appears.

plots.plot: A rookie cop starts his first day, questions if breaking more laws than the criminals counts as "experience"; spoiler: it does.
Newbie lawman learns the hard way that his training officer's favorite crime-fighting tool is "more crime."
First day jitters? Eh, more like first day's rigged. Policing lesson one: bend or break?
Young donut enthusiast realizes his partner might be shadow government, actually prefers shadowing criminals.
In a game of good cop, bad cop, one rookie discovers the game's missing two words: real life.

movies.title: The Favourite
movies.overview: England, early 18th century. The close relationship between Queen Anne and Sarah Churchill is threatened by the arrival of Sarah's cousin, Abigail Hill, resulting in a bitter rivalry between the two cousins to be the Queen's favourite.

plots.plot: Queen Anne's palace turns into a royal version of 'The Real Housewives', where her BFF and a new wannabe fight over who gets to fluff her pillow.
In a royal catfight, two women compete with gossip, seduction, and fancy dresses to see who can feed the queen the most desserts.
Power hungry relatives engage in 18th-century mud wrestling for political influence, complete with ducks.
Two rivals become frenemies in an intense sport of deception, spurred by a fondness for baroque chamber pots.
Early 1700s: Intense footrace involving political affection, fashionable ducks, and architectural confusion.

movies.title: It's the Great Pumpkin, Charlie Brown
movies.overview: Join the Peanuts gang for a timeless adventure as Charlie Brown preps for a party, Snoopy sets his sights on the Red Baron, and Linus patiently awaits a pumpkin patch miracle.

plots.plot: A bald kid ends up with rocks instead of candy while his weird pal waits for a giant pumpkin that never shows.
Hopeful child bets it all on an imaginary squash beast, while his friends fight a fruitless air war and make costume blunders.
While a flying ace strafes imaginary targets, believers of fictional gourd mythology gather in fruit patches.
One fellow waits all night for a mystical gourd, while another contemplates circular squash salvation.
A delusional figure eagerly anticipates botanical deities in harvest fields, as an aspiring canine aviator engages long-lost aerial duels.

movies.title: BlacKkKlansman
movies.overview: Colorado Springs, late 1970s. Ron Stallworth, an African American police officer, and Flip Zimmerman, his Jewish colleague, run an undercover operation to infiltrate the Ku Klux Klan.

plots.plot: Black guy and Jewish guy team up as the unlikeliest Klan infiltrators since, well, ever.
Two cops, one phone call: prank the Klan into thinking they're buddy-buddy with their worst nightmares.
Two cops play a very dangerous game of Larping, with unfortunate haircuts and dubious phone skills.
Two guys get crank calls from people in white sheets, leading to an awkward misunderstanding about a barbecue.
Creative telephone game leads to a bizarre friendship with 'guests' most unwelcome at dinner parties.

movies.title: My Fair Lady
movies.overview: A snobbish phonetics professor agrees to a wager that he can take a flower girl and make her presentable in high society.

plots.plot: Snobby sound nerd bets he can turn a street plant seller into a polished princess, but hilarity ensues as she learns to talk fancy and sass him back.
Guy thinks he can teach a poor girl to speak so posh that she fools the elites, but she ends up schooling him on who's boss.
A linguistic dare involving a guttersnipe leads to surprising revelations about who actually needs the lessons.
Pretending a flower vendor is high-class proves challenging when vowels and consonants conspire in an unexpected revolution.
A speech wager with a working-class subject unravels when articulating with vowels proves unexpectedly transformative.

movies.title: Walk the Line
movies.overview: A chronicle of country music legend Johnny Cash's life, from his early days on an Arkansas cotton farm to his rise to fame with Sun Records in Memphis, where he recorded alongside Elvis Presley, Jerry Lee Lewis and Carl Perkins.

plots.plot: Country singer goes from picking cotton to picking fights with his wife while making hit songs and popping pills.
A guy with a deep voice, black clothes, and a guitar struggles with addiction and tries to serenade his way into a happy ever after.
Musician dude learns there are more strings to pull than those on his guitar, especially when it comes to balancing fame and two-timing love.
American vocalist rides the rollercoaster of fame with more ups and downs than his guitar’s tuning pegs after an all-nighter.
The story of a man whose love life and music career constantly collided like a drunken guitarist at a rockabilly rehearsal, but he managed to drop the pills for the right lady.

movies.title: Hercules
movies.overview: Bestowed with superhuman strength, a young mortal named Hercules sets out to prove himself a hero in the eyes of his father, the great god Zeus. Along with his friends Pegasus, a flying horse, and Phil, a personal trainer, Hercules is tricked by the hilarious, hotheaded villain Hades, who's plotting to take over Mount Olympus!

plots.plot: Muscle-bound dude with divine daddy issues beats up monsters to impress his immortal papa while a hot-headed guy with flaming hair tries to sabotage him.
Strong guy goes hero-training with a sarcastic goat-man and a flying horse, whilst an underworld boss with pyrotechnic hairdo plots celestial domination.
Superhuman lad does bicep curls and monster wrestling to earn family approval, foiling corporate ladder climber from infernal HQ.
Guy with impossible genetics attempts professional glory, rides an airborne equine, and counters an ambitious fiery bookkeeper.
Olympian bloodline hardworker bench-presses fame, assisted by a rambunctious equine, to counter a promoter of netherworld chaos.

movies.title: The Passion of the Christ
movies.overview: A graphic portrayal of the last twelve hours of Jesus of Nazareth's life.

plots.plot: Guy throws dinner party, gets betrayed by a backstabbing friend, and ends up in serious trouble with the authorities.
A carpenter becomes a pin cushion for Roman metalwork enthusiasts.
An intense meditation on questionable headgear and public speaking gone wrong.
One man's fitness journey derailed by an unfortunate nail accident.
It's a rough day for a Middle Eastern fellow with a lumber background experiencing excruciating endorphin release.

movies.title: A Star Is Born
movies.overview: Seasoned musician Jackson Maine discovers — and falls in love with — struggling artist Ally. She has just about given up on her dream to make it big as a singer — until Jack coaxes her into the spotlight. But even as Ally's career takes off, the personal side of their relationship is breaking down, as Jack fights an ongoing battle with his own internal demons.

plots.plot: Drunk rockstar finds unknown singer, helps her become a pop star, then self-destructs while she wins awards.
Famous guy helps girl become famous, regrets it while maxing out on whiskey points in his self-pity bar crawl.
Legendary strummer boosts shower vocalist to stardom, ending with microphones and meltdowns.
Spotlight swap: He fades as she raps autotune, featuring guitar solos and rehab bills.
Old strings end; new pop autotuner ascends.

movies.title: My Cousin Vinny
movies.overview: Two carefree pals from Brooklyn traveling through rural Alabama on their way back to college are mistakenly arrested, and charged with murder. Fortunately, one of them has a cousin who's a lawyer - Vincent Gambini, a former auto mechanic from Brooklyn who just passed his bar exam after his sixth try. When he arrives with his leather-clad girlfriend, to try his first case, it's a real shock - for him and the Deep South!

plots.plot: A street-smart dude in an ugly suit from Brooklyn tries to become a legal eagle in the South while his girlfriend distracts everyone with her loud fashion.
A couple of guys on a road trip get arrested for murder, so they call in their rookie cousin who's just as clueless as they are.
A Northern city slicker goes to a Southern courtroom, pretends to know law, nearly screws everything up but has a surprising knack for car talk.
In a land where grits might be more familiar than litigation, a novice in plaid tries to outsmart seasoned gavel-pounders with wheels and wit.
In a tomato sauce vs gravy world, a legal virgin saves the day by decoding skid marks while fighting off rival sartorial blunders.

movies.title: The Suicide Squad
movies.overview: Supervillains Harley Quinn, Bloodsport, Peacemaker and a collection of nutty cons at Belle Reve prison join the super-secret, super-shady Task Force X as they are dropped off at the remote, enemy-infused island of Corto Maltese.

plots.plot: A bunch of losers from jail get sent to a tropical island, destroy a giant starfish, lots of them die, and somehow save the day.
A team of expendable nobodies plays hot potato with a secret drive while they unleash chaos on an island full of annoying locals.
Ragtag team of inmates get out of jail for a work trip to destroy a pet that's grown too big for its tank.
Prison group therapy takes a vacation where some national treasure made of tentacles gets a breakdown.
Some really bad employees get an island retreat where they learn teamwork by taking down a photophobic extraterrestrial.

movies.title: Rogue One: A Star Wars Story
movies.overview: A rogue band of resistance fighters unite for a mission to steal the Death Star plans and bring a new hope to the galaxy.

plots.plot: Galaxy rebels plot to steal the galaxy's most infamous blueprint from a moody metal moon with a laser.
Delinquent team, including one snarky robot, tries to swipe blueprints from evil skyball.
Group of clumsy heroes crash a beach party hosted by imperial stormtroopers with poor aim.
Misfits engage in 'liberation mission,' but it's really a weaponized treasure hunt, complete with tropical scenery.
Miscreants liberate dangerous data hidden in space architecture featuring a giant mouse trap.

movies.title: How the Grinch Stole Christmas!
movies.overview: Bitter and hateful, the Grinch is irritated at the thought of a nearby village having a happy time celebrating Christmas. Disguised as Santa Claus, with his dog made to look like a reindeer, he decides to raid the village to steal all the Christmas things.

plots.plot: A furry green guy with a dog reindeer steals holiday decorations from neighbors who were just trying to be festive, because he's anti-joy.
A hairy recluse with a single fang and a knack for burglary nabs shiny things from holiday-loving neighbors and learns a mushy lesson.
A green-sheep impersonator gets into uninvited house visits and petty theft then has an unexpected change of heart.
A misanthropic misfit with a heightened disdain for synchrony acts preemptively against a perceived threat of organized joy.
A Christmas-cynical fiend attacks communal mirth using a decoy quadruped in a cross-dressing operation.

movies.title: Ghostbusters
movies.overview: After losing their academic posts at a prestigious university, a team of parapsychologists goes into business as proton-pack-toting "ghostbusters" who exterminate ghouls, hobgoblins and supernatural pests of all stripes. An ad campaign pays off when a knockout cellist hires the squad to purge her swanky digs of demons that appear to be living in her refrigerator.

plots.plot: After getting booted from their university jobs, a bunch of nerds strap on nuclear backpacks and start a ghost-hunting business, accidentally almost ending the world with their incompetence.
Former science geeks get canned, buy a sweet ride, and start blasting ghosts for cash, but they forget to read the manual and nearly summon the apocalypse.
With dream careers down the tube, some overzealous science nerds turn into blue-collar spook exterminators and mistakenly stir up an ancient evil with questionable taste in architecture.

A group dropped the academia grind, opened an extermination service for mischievous shadows, and accidentally triggered the endgame challenge of an ancient interdimensional being with a taste for marshmallow.
A trio of parapsychological entrepreneurs, having mastered specialized unlicensed technology, unwittingly catalyze an urban myth come to life, testing their crisis containment capabilities.

movies.title: Deadpool 2
movies.overview: Wisecracking mercenary Deadpool battles the evil and powerful Cable and other bad guys to save a boy's life.

plots.plot: A red-suited chatterbox tries to stop a time-traveling robot daddy while befriending a firestarter kid and forming a misfit band that fails spectacularly.
Superhero in a crimson onesie tackles giant, angry army dude from the future to save an angry, fiery teenager and establish his collection of super-loser friends.
He regenerates insults faster than his body, faces a mechanical man with familial issues, and makes new friends who aren't really super at all.
Our masked anti-hero learns friendship usually beats a moveable metal Meat Mountain with daddy issues in a race to influence thermal adolescence.
Unexpected interpersonal bonds combat future tech oppression, where humor and heroics slightly tilt the scales of time's relentless march.

movies.title: First Blood
movies.overview: When former Green Beret John Rambo is harassed by local law enforcement and arrested for vagrancy, he is forced to flee into the mountains and wage an escalating one-man war against his pursuers.

plots.plot: A muscle-bound war vet goes camping but can't find peace because the town's police department insists on playing aggressive hide and seek with him.
Guy in a headband realizes the town's hate for his fashion sense and decides to remodel their forest with his survival kit.
A remarkably stealthy man decides that a small-town sheriff needs a lesson in nature appreciation, using outdoor activities and explosive education methods.
One man's quest to redefine a personal space bubble kicks off a woodland escape room challenge for local law enforcement, complete with unexpected fireworks.
An introvert discovers that peaceful mountain retreats aren't as tranquil when unwelcome ley enforcers insist on joining, ironically turning silence into chaos.

movies.title: Bonnie and Clyde
movies.overview: In the 1930s, bored waitress Bonnie Parker falls in love with an ex-con named Clyde Barrow and together they start a violent crime spree through the country, stealing cars and robbing banks.

plots.plot: Waitress with thrill issues joins a dashing outlaw; they rob banks, fall in love, and urgently need driving lessons.
A couple embarks on a romantic bank heist spree amid car thefts and questionable life choices.
Two lovesick folks decide the best date idea is a crime tour, swapping flowers for stolen cash.
A 'dynamic duo' interprets withdrawal limits a bit too flexibly while road-tripping in questionable fashion.
Depression-era thrill-seekers opt for unconventional career paths, inadvertently pioneering the concept of 'bank and dash.'

movies.title: Sonic the Hedgehog 2
movies.overview: After settling in Green Hills, Sonic is eager to prove he has what it takes to be a true hero. His test comes when Dr. Robotnik returns, this time with a new partner, Knuckles, in search for an emerald that has the power to destroy civilizations. Sonic teams up with his own sidekick, Tails, and together they embark on a globe-trotting journey to find the emerald before it falls into the wrong hands.

plots.plot: Blue speed demon, now a wannabe hero, teams up with flying fox to stop egg-shaped evil genius and red knucklehead from getting a civilization-smashing gem.
Spiky blue guy and his two-tailed pal race against a mad scientist and his beefy red friend to snatch a super-power gem that could blow up everything.
Hyperactive azure creature and aerial yellow buddy must outwit tech-loving eggman and his dreadlocked muscle from claiming a shiny world-ending rock.
Crimson enforcer aids round villain in emerald hunt against a hyper blue sprinter and his bushy-tailed companion, spanning across multiple locations.
Swift cobalt being and flying mechanic resist a rotund enemy and his crimson ally in their ambition to obtain an earth-shattering artifact.

movies.title: Willy Wonka & the Chocolate Factory
movies.overview: When eccentric candy man Willy Wonka promises a lifetime supply of sweets and a tour of his chocolate factory to five lucky kids, penniless Charlie Bucket seeks the golden ticket that will make him a winner.

plots.plot: A socially awkward candy maker gives sugar-filled nightmares to five children, four of whom face serious consequences for snubbing basic life lessons.
Crazy guy with questionable hygiene issues lures kids into a sugar-coated house of horrors, while lawyers cringe in anticipation.
Old hermit manipulates gullible kid into inheriting a factory full of wild labor conditions, thereby bypassing HR.
Questionable leadership results in a series of OSHA violations as unsuspecting youths are led through hazardous candy production.
Disregarding the usual guidelines for minting heirs, a cloistered entrepreneur finds a successor amid tragic personal hygiene conditions.

movies.title: Back to the Future Part III
movies.overview: The final installment of the Back to the Future trilogy finds Marty digging the trusty DeLorean out of a mineshaft and looking for Doc in the Wild West of 1885. But when their time machine breaks down, the travelers are stranded in a land of spurs. More problems arise when Doc falls for pretty schoolteacher Clara Clayton, and Marty tangles with Buford Tannen.

plots.plot: Time-traveling teen and kooky scientist buddy fix a broken car in the Wild West while dodging a smelly cowboy and a sappy romance.
Guy finds his crazy friend in cowboy-land, fixes a shiny jalopy, and clashes with a dirty bully in boots.
A broken vehicle meets horse power in dusty America as a scientist discovers romance instead of equations and ends up in a shootout.
A clash of metal and horses in the 1800s: future explorers deal with a malfunctioning accessory, a lonely inventor, and a rude gun-slinger.
An outdated contraption's unexpected detour leads to a scholar's affinity for pedagogy and conflicts with a hirsute brawler.

movies.title: Toy Story 4
movies.overview: Woody has always been confident about his place in the world and that his priority is taking care of his kid, whether that's Andy or Bonnie. But when Bonnie adds a reluctant new toy called "Forky" to her room, a road trip adventure alongside old and new friends will show Woody how big the world can be for a toy.

plots.plot: Cowboy toy has an existential crisis when a spork with googly eyes decides it's trash and not a toy, leading to road trip shenanigans and an unexpected breakup with his long-time partner.
A cowboy leads a dysfunctional expedition to rescue a suicidal eating utensil with a God complex, only to realize polyamory is the spice of a toy's life.
A plastic sheriff loses direction when childish cutlery gains consciousness and attempts to discard itself, resulting in a journey where he learns the freedom of open relationships.
A tiny leader babysits a self-destructive tool while discovering emotional freedom and group dynamics on a vehicular adventure.

A small western-themed figurine grapples with new societal dynamics and personal growth after confronting the self-identity issues of a pompous plastic implement during a prolonged land transport scenario.

movies.title: The Invisible Man
movies.overview: After experimenting on himself and becoming invisible, scientist Jack Griffin, now aggressive due to the drug's effects, seeks a way to reverse the experiment at any cost.

plots.plot: Mad scientist drinks invisibility juice, flips out, terrorizes town like a ghost on a caffeine buzz.
Guy discovers a killer new way to avoid paying bus fare and promptly loses his mind.
Innovative gentleman invents stealth mode but forgets to update his moral software and goes on a pranking spree.
Unseen innovation meets unchecked ambition, leaving chaos only visible to those not making it.
Colorless caretaker dabbles in transparency, resulting in a tumultuous path to seek visible redemption.

movies.title: A Quiet Place Part II
movies.overview: Following the events at home, the Abbott family now face the terrors of the outside world. Forced to venture into the unknown, they realize that the creatures that hunt by sound are not the only threats that lurk beyond the sand path.

plots.plot: After their house is trashed by blind aliens with the whole family whispering like librarians, kids and mom go look for louder neighbors.
A family of sound-sensitive survivalists must fight 'superior listening skills' aliens, but they can't even snore without attracting trouble.
Silent noise enthusiasts discover their survival skills don't include the art of barefoot adventuring in the apocalypse.
Practically a quiet concert where missteps can turn deadly, brought to you by creatures mastering echolocation.
The art of surviving mute daredevil night hikes explored by a family with more at risk than just calling breakfast fast food.

movies.title: The Royal Tenenbaums
movies.overview: Royal Tenenbaum and his wife Etheline had three children and then they separated. All three children are extraordinary --- all geniuses. Virtually all memory of the brilliance of the young Tenenbaums was subsequently erased by two decades of betrayal, failure, and disaster. Most of this was generally considered to be their father's fault. "The Royal Tenenbaums" is the story of the family's sudden, unexpected reunion one recent winter.

plots.plot: A dad fakes dying to crash at his ex's house, while his genius kids deal with their epic failure at adulting.
A fake illness brings a washed-up liar back into a mansion filled with quirky prodigies who peaked too soon.
Guy claims to be dying, one kid wears a headband all the time, another one smokes a lot, and everyone's rich but miserable.
A family's got award-winning dysfunction; everyone reunites, surprisingly not for therapy, but because of a lie.
Family reunion fueled by dysfunction and deception; everyone's an overachiever, and it makes them miserable.

movies.title: Glory
movies.overview: Robert Gould Shaw leads the US Civil War's first all-black volunteer company, fighting prejudices of both his own Union army and the Confederates.

plots.plot: Civil War era gentleman gets a crash course in respecting others by leading the first all-black regiment, while dodging bullets and racism with equally poor aim.
Young officer discovers that his privilege won't help him when he's fighting a war against both an actual enemy and his own side's bigotry.
Union leader tries not to lose his cool as he wrangles an Army experiment that started with emancipation and ends with gunpowder therapy.
Dude learns that being an idealist sucks when your troops are treated worse than the enemies on two fronts: one with guns, one with glares.
The Union's curious band of misfits proves that diversity is just another target when bullets are indiscriminate and war pays homage to irony.

movies.title: The Killing Fields
movies.overview: New York Times reporter Sydney Schanberg is on assignment covering the Cambodian Civil War, with the help of local interpreter Dith Pran and American photojournalist Al Rockoff. When the U.S. Army pulls out amid escalating violence, Schanberg makes exit arrangements for Pran and his family. Pran, however, tells Schanberg he intends to stay in Cambodia to help cover the unfolding story — a decision he may regret as the Khmer Rouge rebels move in.

plots.plot: A reporter and his buddy in Cambodia decide to stick around during a violent civil war, just in time for a holiday in the least fun killing-themed playground ever.
Two dudes mid-war chat about politics, drink coffee, get caught in chaos; one stays for the free action show, forgetting it's 'live and deadly.'
A news guy and his translator enjoy an unplanned hiatus in 'they-might-actually-kill-us' land while practicing extreme journalism.
The vacation getaway of the century turns grim as a reporter in a stylish western suit loses his plus-one in a jungle flash mob situation.
A savvy writer ditches the hotel buffet in favor of live-action horror cinema in a place where crops have a morbid name tag.

movies.title: The Odd Couple
movies.overview: In New York, Felix, a neurotic news writer who just broke up with his wife, is urged by his chaotic friend Oscar, a sports journalist, to move in with him, but their lifestyles are as different as night and day are, so Felix's ideas about housekeeping soon begin to irritate Oscar.

plots.plot: Neat freak gets dumped, moves in with a slob who'd rather die than clean a sock, hilarity of mismatched roomies ensues.
Neurotic neatnik and feral couch potato embark on one apartment-living circus act after both are jilted by their better halves.
One guy's cringe-inducing wife loss triggers the ultimate trial in pigsty survival with a rival slob worshiper.
When life gives one writer lemons, he manages to find solace with a human dirty laundry pile, both finding chaotic resolution amidst the mess.
A dearly departed romance invites catastrophic domestic conflict, driven by an obsession with germs versus the carefree philosophy of life as a trashy aficionado.

movies.title: Batman: Mask of the Phantasm
movies.overview: Andrea Beaumont leaves her father to return to Gotham, rekindling an old romance with Bruce Wayne. At the same time, a mysterious figure begins to hunt down Gotham's criminals, wrongly implicating Batman in the murders. Now on the run from the law, Batman must find and stop the culprit, while also navigating his relationship with Andrea.

plots.plot: Drama Queen in black tights juggles romance and murder mystery, gets blamed for killing scumbags by a freakier ghost cosplayer.
A millionaire with a flying rodent fetish gets ghosted and framed by an emo rip-off of Casper.
Masked billionaire plays detective when scary opera-loving stalker starts sweeping creepy Gotham real estate.
Gothic rich kid feels smoochy, turns detective when a cloaked psycho erases dirty laundry via mortal coil removal.
Bored wealthy man investigates history-loving shadow, ends up playing whodunit for misunderstood apparitions.

movies.title: The Bourne Identity
movies.overview: Wounded to the brink of death and suffering from amnesia, Jason Bourne is rescued at sea by a fisherman. With nothing to go on but a Swiss bank account number, he starts to reconstruct his life, but finds that many people he encounters want him dead. However, Bourne realizes that he has the combat and mental skills of a world-class spy—but who does he work for?

plots.plot: Amnesiac dude wakes up with killer skills, finds a stash of money, beats up half of Europe, and still can't remember why he was taking a nap in the ocean.
Guy with no memory wants to know who he is, but everyone else just wants him very, very dead.
Confused treasure hunt through Europe: one man versus the Swiss banking system and a bunch of angry people.
Sea-faring amnesia sufferer tackles geography, slick assassins, and random bank visits in a quest for self-awareness.
Mystery man rebels against aggressive hospitality while inadvertently auditioning for a secret organization.

movies.title: Pretty Woman
movies.overview: While on a business trip in Los Angeles, Edward Lewis, a millionaire entrepreneur who makes a living buying and breaking up companies, picks up a prostitute, Vivian, while asking for directions; after, Edward hires Vivian to stay with him for the weekend to accompany him to a few social events, and the two get closer only to discover there are significant hurdles to overcome as they try to bridge the gap between their very different worlds.

plots.plot: A rich businessman falls for a hooker after she gives him good directions, then buys her fancy clothes so he can show her off at parties.
A wealthy guy visiting LA finds love in the most unexpected places while trying to solve his ladies' accessory problem.
Bored tycoon discovers unexpected romance in thigh-high boots and fishnet enthusiasm while avoiding business doom.
Power suit meets power gaze as capitalism and world's oldest profession collide in a love story signed with a credit card.
A temporary arrangement overcomes socio-economic disparity, all thanks to a luxury wardrobe and shouted opera.

movies.title: The Fugitive
movies.overview: Wrongfully convicted of murdering his wife and sentenced to death, Richard Kimble escapes from the law in an attempt to find the real killer and clear his name.

plots.plot: A doctor plays hide and seek with lawmen while searching for a mysterious one-armed man, hoping to prove he didn't mash his wife into a pancake.
Dude in pajamas runs from suit-wearing grown-ups because one-armed prankster ruined his life.
Bearded escape artist avoids capture using trains and sewers, all while hunting a limb-lacking scapegoat.
Hairy convict skips town, uses outdated pagers and hospital visits to track elusive asymmetric murderer.
Medical professional gives anatomy lessons to law enforcement while hunting elusive symmetrical deficiency.

movies.title: Frankenstein
movies.overview: Tampering with life and death, Henry Frankenstein pieces together salvaged body parts to bring a human monster to life; the mad scientist's dreams are shattered by his creation's violent rage as the monster awakens to a world in which he is unwelcome.

plots.plot: Mad scientist gets bored, makes a friend from spare parts, then whines when the new buddy throws a tantrum.
Guy creates a life-sized, do-it-yourself action figure; action figure doesn't follow instructions.
Ambitious tinkerer reanimates the guest no one invited, regrets the lack of a return policy.
Aspiring Dr. Frank fails biology class, results in an oversized toddler confusion meltdown.
An unapproved recycling project leads to unplanned curfew violations and the need to explore horticultural hobbies.

movies.title: The Devil's Advocate
movies.overview: Aspiring Florida defense lawyer Kevin Lomax accepts a job at a New York law firm. With the stakes getting higher every case, Kevin quickly learns that his boss has something far more evil planned.

plots.plot: Hotshot lawyer hops from sunny Florida to the concrete jungle, only to find his new boss leads the office's 'Burn Employees' initiative: literally Satan.
A guy in a suit enjoys his new job perks: private jets, Manhattan views, and a nicely decorated office straight out of Hell.
Sunshine state lawyer gets a promotion only to discover his boss's annual reviews are as fiery as his pitchfork collection.
Flawless attorney discovers his boss is a specialist in fiery corporate restructures with a focus on souls.
New city job: where a legal ego might discover rising temperatures are not just from air conditioning outages.

movies.title: Birdman or (The Unexpected Virtue of Ignorance)
movies.overview: A fading actor best known for his portrayal of a popular superhero attempts to mount a comeback by appearing in a Broadway play. As opening night approaches, his attempts to become more altruistic, rebuild his career, and reconnect with friends and family prove more difficult than expected.

plots.plot: Washed-up superhero actor tries to save his career with a play, but is haunted by his feathered past and annoying internal monologue.
Ex-superhero actor thinks Broadway will save him, but instead he's stuck battling inner voices and half-naked flights of fancy.
Former megastar swaps cape for stage, but can't stop being bullied by a bossy bird and his own mid-life crisis.
Actor, once a flightless superhero, attempts theatrical revival while constantly fighting avian delusions.
A wingless guardian finds himself tangled in dramatic existential perspectives, struggling to coordinate reality and illusion without spandex assistance.

movies.title: Invasion of the Body Snatchers
movies.overview: A small-town doctor learns that the population of his community is being replaced by emotionless alien duplicates.

plots.plot: A doc with an inferiority complex decides aliens stealing bodies is more likely than everyone just ignoring his advice.
Town gets a makeover, but aliens forgot emotions when creating clones; Botox blamed initially.
Invisible invaders with crabgrass plan for world domination... starting with sleepy suburbs.
Residents think life feels off because of existential crises, not realizing they're the wasn't-meant-to-be crowd.
When green-thumbed landlords launch 'be a new you' campaign, tenants didn't expect a literal plant-based intervention.

movies.title: The Adventures of Robin Hood
movies.overview: Robin Hood fights nobly for justice against the evil Sir Guy of Gisbourne while striving to win the hand of the beautiful Maid Marian.

plots.plot: A guy in green tights robs from rich jerks to buy better tights, while wooing a lady and dodging a cranky tax collector.
Dude with a bow disrupts the economy by turning woods into a tax-free zone and keeps flirting with a woman in an impractical dress.
Forest renegade organizes outlawed jousting tournaments, because who doesn't love fancy stick battles?
Archer fashionista discovers crime pays well if you keep it old school with swords and merry heist plans.
Medieval green enthusiast becomes a monetary equalizer, causing headaches for a grumpy controller.

movies.title: The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge on the Run
movies.overview: When his best friend Gary is suddenly snatched away, SpongeBob takes Patrick on a madcap mission far beyond Bikini Bottom to save their pink-shelled pal.

plots.plot: Sponge on a mission: yellow guy and his dopey starfish buddy hit Vegas to rescue pet snail from sea ghost king.
Underwater sponge and starfella go on land for casino antics; snail needs saving from cranky royal.
Yellow absorbent dude and pink dimwit invade shore-side gambling joint for mollusk-based heist.
Two sea creatures get sidetracked in flashy human city while scraping slime-pal off bizarre ruler's roster.
Marine buddies risk evaporation chasing stolen mucus mover from luminescent metropolis back to regal haunt.

movies.title: Incredibles 2
movies.overview: Elastigirl springs into action to save the day, while Mr. Incredible faces his greatest challenge yet – taking care of the problems of his three children.

plots.plot: The stretchy mom fights crime on TV while dad gets crushed by parenting - literally.
Mom fights evil in tight suit, dad loses sleep trying to control three tiny humans with superpowers.
A bendy woman promotes a legal mask-free life while her spouse wrestles with diaper duty and too much math homework.
A flexible worker becomes the poster girl for undercover street justice, leaving her family man counterpart to suffer domestic nightmares, including talking reminders of '#2' at inconvenient moments.

In a shift against all that's familiar, the household champion graciously switches roles, dealing with young ones exhibiting extraordinary capabilities, while his counterpart tackles the larger societal issues in figure-flattering formalwear.

movies.title: Ordinary People
movies.overview: Beth, Calvin, and their son Conrad are living in the aftermath of the death of the other son. Conrad is overcome by grief and misplaced guilt to the extent of a suicide attempt. He is in therapy. Beth had always preferred his brother and is having difficulty being supportive to Conrad. Calvin is trapped between the two trying to hold the family together.

plots.plot: Sad guy sees a shrink after failing to swim like his dead brother, while mom thinks therapy is worse than bathing in horse glue.
A teen with a guilt complex and a fear of lakes goes to talk to a guy with a notepad while his parents play emotional tug-of-war.
After a tragic accident, a family discovers that feelings are the real villain, as they attempt to out-frostbite each other's hearts.
A husband tries to juggle his wife's icy disregard and his son's post-failed-swim emotional crises without spontaneously combusting.
A guilt-ridden adolescent sinks into therapy as his parents wage a cold war over their mutual inability to swim emotionally.

movies.title: Kung Fu Hustle
movies.overview: It's the 1940s, and the notorious Axe Gang terrorizes Shanghai. Small-time criminals Sing and Bone hope to join, but they only manage to make lots of very dangerous enemies. Fortunately for them, kung fu masters and hidden strength can be found in unlikely places. Now they just have to take on the entire Axe Gang.

plots.plot: Two wannabe criminals try to join an axe-wielding gang but accidentally piss off a poor neighborhood of secret kung fu badasses.
A wannabe thug learns you only mess with gangsters if you can't take a good punch - or a killer kick to the head.
A gang of dapper dancers finds out pirouetting in top hats isn't enough against old folks with hidden hobbies.
When tuba tunes and tough talks don't cut it, dive bars become death cages thanks to octogenarian underground fighters.
Mix a saxophone with martial arts to create an epic crescendo of chaos disguised as neighborhood nuisance suppression.

movies.title: The Artist
movies.overview: Hollywood, 1927: As silent movie star George Valentin wonders if the arrival of talking pictures will cause him to fade into oblivion, he sparks with Peppy Miller, a young dancer set for a big break.

plots.plot: Silent film star's ego deflates faster than his movie career, as he gets upstaged by a peppy newcomer and his own talking dog.
A guy famous for being silent can't handle noisy actors stealing his spotlight and accidentally trips into romance while sulking in the shadows.
A mime's career hits a wall as cameras start recording sound, leading to an unlikely dance duet that lights up the silver screen.
His hush-hush career stumbles when he discovers that noise is now all the rage, so he decides to play ball on the rebound.
Glitz and jazz hand mishaps take center stage as the mute maestro finds himself drowned in a new wave of vocal vibrations.

movies.title: Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan
movies.overview: The starship Enterprise and its crew is pulled back into action when old nemesis, Khan, steals a top secret device called Project Genesis.

plots.plot: A dude with a killer 80s mullet goes bananas after being abandoned on a lousy planet, steals a superweapon, drives Kirk nuts, and roasts a real nice chestnut twice.
Old guy mid-life crisis interrupted by a genetic supervillain proving he really does hold a grudge, like, even longer than ships hold together without maintenance.
Adopted neighbor you moved away from finds the ultimate landscaping tool and decides your backyard needs extreme renovations, without your consent.
Earlier plans to create a paradise accidentally cause apocalyptic fireworks display aimed at seasoned commuters.
Outdated mode of transportation rediscovered by existentially challenged party crashing your unfunded experiments in spontaneous terraformation.

movies.title: The Rocky Horror Picture Show
movies.overview: Sweethearts Brad and Janet, stuck with a flat tire during a storm, discover the eerie mansion of Dr. Frank-N-Furter, a transvestite scientist. As their innocence is lost, Brad and Janet meet a houseful of wild characters, including a rocking biker and a creepy butler. Through elaborate dances and rock songs, Frank-N-Furter unveils his latest creation: a muscular man named 'Rocky'.

plots.plot: Awkward couple stops by a castle for free wi-fi, gets a free science show featuring fishnets, a gold Speedo, and a hunky Frankenstein knock-off instead.
Engaged duo crash a house party, drop inhibitions in favor of dancing with aliens, and witness bodybuilding gone fabulously wrong.
Curiosity gets a pair stuck in a freakish fashion show gone cosmic, while learning anatomy through dance and horror.
Stiff pair gets stuck in a campy time warp, finds weirdos from galaxy far away, and loses their purity along the way.
Travelers seek a phone, but find an interstellar experiment in camp culture using vigorous exercise and wardrobe transformation.

movies.title: A Christmas Carol
movies.overview: Miser Ebenezer Scrooge is awakened on Christmas Eve by spirits who reveal to him his own miserable existence, what opportunities he wasted in his youth, his current cruelties, and the dire fate that awaits him if he does not change his ways. Scrooge is faced with his own story of growing bitterness and meanness, and must decide what his own future will hold: death or redemption.

plots.plot: A cranky old dude gets haunted by dead guys on Christmas and decides to stop being a tightwad before he croaks.
Old miserly fellow's nap turns into a guilt trip marathon, resulting in a bizarre holiday makeover.
Grumpy senior gets a triple-ghost intervention, learns stinginess doesn't pay off in the afterlife.
Vintage miser revisits life choices with unwanted spiritual tour guides, opts for a personality overhaul.
A holiday skeptic gets a spectral wake-up call about his future, leading to an unexpected last-minute personality adjustment.

movies.title: Dirty Harry
movies.overview: When a madman dubbed 'Scorpio' terrorizes San Francisco, hard-nosed cop, Harry Callahan – famous for his take-no-prisoners approach to law enforcement – is tasked with hunting down the psychopath.

plots.plot: A cop with zero patience and a serious gun fetish chases a twisted criminal through San Francisco, blowing things up as he pleases.
Grumpy guy with a big gun barely respects protocol while chasing after a creep who thinks ransom notes make compelling stories.
A city salaryman with an urge for caffeine and revolvers pursues a desperate extortionist who uses people like postcards.
A disgruntled municipal employee takes justice into his own hands, goes on an unapproved city tour to stop a casual letter-writer.
Fed up public servant adopting an ultramodern interrogation style ruins a pen pal's psycho letter expedition around the Bay Area.

movies.title: Dunkirk
movies.overview: The story of the miraculous evacuation of Allied soldiers from Belgium, Britain, Canada and France, who were cut off and surrounded by the German army from the beaches and harbour of Dunkirk between May 26th and June 4th 1940 during World War II.

plots.plot: A bunch of soldiers are stuck on a beach while angry Germans try to ruin their beach vacation. Spoiler: they eventually catch a boat ride home.
In a classic tale of terrible vacation planning, soldiers, pilots, and sailors try to escape a beach party that quickly went south.
Several unlucky individuals spend a week trying to avoid becoming seagull food while desperately looking for a ride out of their sandy prison.
Variety of professional swimmers compete against metal dogs in a cross-channel relay race. The winner gets to go home!
First instalment of a trilogy where air, sea, and land forces attempt a reverse invasion while high scores are being measured in ticker-tape evacuation.

movies.title: Apollo 13
movies.overview: The true story of technical troubles that scuttle the Apollo 13 lunar mission in 1970, risking the lives of astronaut Jim Lovell and his crew, with the failed journey turning into a thrilling saga of heroism. Drifting more than 200,000 miles from Earth, the astronauts work furiously with the ground crew to avert tragedy.

plots.plot: A bunch of guys get trapped in a metal can flying to the moon, break it, then play space MacGyver to get home.
A bunch of space nerds accidentally create the world's most expensive camping trip, complete with broken plumbing and a freezer burn.
Three space tourists take a detour on the world's worst Uber ride, threaten to validate Neil Armstrong's parking.
A trio in space engages in an epic game of 'how not to die' while juggling oxygen, power shortages, and questionable 70s tech.
A near-lunar return trip turns into a crafting project involving duct tape and a calculator, deceptively overseen by Earthbound guys in short sleeves.

movies.title: Ocean's Eleven
movies.overview: Less than 24 hours into his parole, charismatic thief Danny Ocean is already rolling out his next plan: In one night, Danny's hand-picked crew of specialists will attempt to steal more than $150 million from three Las Vegas casinos. But to score the cash, Danny risks his chances of reconciling with ex-wife, Tess.

plots.plot: A charming ex-con assembles a team of misfits to rob $150 million from casinos and win back his ex-wife, while making Vegas security look like high school hall monitors.
Fresh from jail, a suave schemer gathers a ragtag bunch to swipe heaps of cash from 24/7 glittermarts and possibly impress his emotionally unavailable ex along the way.
The parolee masterplan: rob the sin capital threefold with a quirky sidekick squad, hoping to cash out both payout and ex-girlfriend redemption points.
Just released, he plots, uniting eleven flavor-of-misfit in a heist against the slot machine kingdom, aiming to charm the real three cherries on a personal level.
A recently freed smooth operator orchestrates an elaborate Las Vegas jackpot siphon via an ensemble of idiosyncratic associates, with ulterior motives hovering under the neon lights.

movies.title: Captain America: Civil War
movies.overview: Following the events of Age of Ultron, the collective governments of the world pass an act designed to regulate all superhuman activity. This polarizes opinion amongst the Avengers, causing two factions to side with Iron Man or Captain America, which causes an epic battle between former allies.

plots.plot: Super athletic guy with cool frisbee and a tech-savvy billionaire play dodgeball using buildings as dodgeballs. Feelings are hurt.
A billionaire with a glowing personality and a patriotic popsicle engage in a messy breakup over a governmental relationship contract, causing big mess at their shared workplace.
Shiny metal enthusiast can't agree with a national flag bearer over who's boss, ending in a parking lot squabble where everyone forgets their keys.
A renowned industrialist and a symbol of national loyalty have a public spat, options: breakneck hide and seek or anger management classes.
Clash of ideals leads to playground politics among colorful characters who can't agree on a dress code for saving the world.

movies.title: Home Alone
movies.overview: Eight-year-old Kevin McCallister makes the most of the situation after his family unwittingly leaves him behind when they go on Christmas vacation. When thieves try to break into his home, he puts up a fight like no other.

plots.plot: Kid left behind while family vacations, proves burglars suck by turning entire house into torture chamber.
Tiny terror faces off against idiotic robbers using household items in world's most extreme game of hide and seek.
Parents practice selective memory in holiday chaos, leaving behind miniature vigilante to run home security experiment.
Unwanted Christmas present booby-traps hamster cage as two unwelcome guests redefine breaking and entering.
Morally flexible child outsmarts incompetent adults in unintended social experiment on child independence.

movies.title: John Wick
movies.overview: Ex-hitman John Wick comes out of retirement to track down the gangsters that took everything from him.

plots.plot: After his puppy gift bites the dust, a retired assassin levels up his kill streak against the idiots who thought they'd just borrow his car, and they learn why he's the least favorite babysitter.
Dog-loving former contract killer plays connect-the-dots with skulls after field-testing his new Costco suit on 77 clueless mobsters who mistake him for just another car enthusiast.
A guy who specialized in job quitting examines existential dilemmas through elaborate home security breaches, prompted by auto theft and a problem-solving nutshell revered by existentialists.
Retirement planner's quiet life disrupted by overgrown house pests, leading to unconventional pest control in the form of street art using local resources.
An unsolicited house party leaves a man existentially challenged, forcing him to repurpose his skillset in extreme urban development, thereby creating vacancies in the underworld real estate market.

movies.title: Lone Survivor
movies.overview: Four Navy SEALs on a covert mission to neutralize a high-level Taliban operative must make an impossible moral decision in the mountains of Afghanistan that leads them into an enemy ambush. As they confront unthinkable odds, the SEALs must find reserves of strength and resilience to fight to the finish.

plots.plot: Four SEALs have the worst hiking trip ever, forget Google Maps, and end up trying not to be a llama's lunch in Afghanistan.
A disastrous game of tag in Middle Eastern hills turns into a chaotic mess when one guy forgets to charge his phone.
Big sky, small team, way too much not-so-friendly local hospitality.
Elite soldiers swap beach for desert, sandcastles for something far less relaxing.
A high-stakes, high-altitude hide and seek, but with actual consequences.

movies.title: My Darling Clementine
movies.overview: Three brothers stop off for a night in the town of Tombstone. The next morning they find one of their brothers dead and their cattle stolen. They decide to take revenge on the culprits.

plots.plot: Cowboys stroll into town to get drunk, wake up to a murder mystery, and go on a rampage for justice because someone stole their cows.
Two siblings are grumpy over their brother's unfortunate nap in a dirt bed, so they play cowboy detectives to catch the bad guys.
The Wild West's version of Yelp goes wrong when a family's star rating for their hospitality takes a nosedive after a savage wake-up call.
Herd management takes a deadly turn, and the remaining cowboys turn into part-time law enforcers in a dusty tale of revenge and beef politics.
Western family feud with a cattle theft subplot involves rash actions, leading to a shootout instead of seeking job or legal advice.

movies.title: A Night at the Opera
movies.overview: The Marx Brothers take on high society and the opera world to bring two lovers together. A sly business manager and two wacky friends of two opera singers help them achieve success while humiliating their stuffy and snobbish enemies.

plots.plot: A conman and his three zany brothers crash the opera, turn it into a circus, and somehow help two singers fall in love.
Three chaos-loving brothers destroy an opera show, confuse the heck out of high society, and still manage to make matchmakers blush.
A couple of lovable loons swindle their way into music mayhem, orchestrating romance amidst their anarchic antics.
Classical music and havoc clash as a duo of deranged dudes baffle the bourgeoisie while playing cupid with vocal vibrato.
A master of mischief and his fellow tricksters disrupt the harmony of a posh performance to engineer an unlikely operatic affair.

movies.title: Cape Fear
movies.overview: Sam Bowden witnesses a rape committed by Max Cady and testifies against him. When released after 8 years in prison, Cady begins stalking Bowden and his family but is always clever enough not to violate the law.

plots.plot: A lawyer regrets sending a creepy guy to jail when the creepiness goes full throttle upon release, turning his family life into a never-ending haunted house tour.
After eight years in the slammer, a not-so-slick criminal decides to turn stalking into his new hobby, focusing on the family of the lawyer who put him there.
A Southern lawyer can’t seem to enjoy a single boat trip because of an uninvited guest who really loves privacy invasion.
A perpetual overstepper finds innovative ways to express his displeasure at past legal proceedings, much to the irritation of a family man who enjoys tranquility.
A convicted man's ill-advised philosophy of revenge involves psychological warfare against someone with a taste for courtroom justice and peaceful living.

movies.title: Star Wars: Episode III - Revenge of the Sith
movies.overview: The evil Darth Sidious enacts his final plan for unlimited power -- and the heroic Jedi Anakin Skywalker must choose a side.

plots.plot: Space wizard dad betrays his monk friends to save wife, ends up choking on dark side smoothie.
Freckled whiner gets hot, joins cult, helps set galaxy on fire to save boo from an imaginary heartache.
Young parent hopeful receives distorted text from a cloaked magician, ends up adopting fire-dancing.
Prom queen discovers dreamy crush has terrible new forehead tattoo and orders him to stop playing with fire.
Heavy breathing master stuns his robot buddy by relocating to a secret lava river without sending a change of address.

movies.title: Erin Brockovich
movies.overview: A twice-divorced mother of three who sees an injustice, takes on the bad guy and wins -- with a little help from her push-up bra. Erin goes to work for an attorney and comes across medical records describing illnesses clustered in one nearby town. She starts investigating and soon exposes a monumental cover-up.

plots.plot: A broke mom with a wardrobe full of stereotypes takes on evil water company dudes because they poisoned people, and she uses sass and cleavage to fix it all.
A secretary in clothes that leave little to the imagination decides she has better things to do than type; like saving the world with guts and coffee.
High heels and law degrees don't mix, but that doesn't stop the office rookie from using anger and documents to make the mighty fall.
A legal assistant who doesn't quite follow dress code finds something fishy about local drinking water and makes a splash by confronting corporate giants.
Underestimated in the office, a non-lawyer sorts through files, discovers a chemical catastrophe, and ends up hiring sensible shoes for once as she topples giants.

movies.title: Once Upon a Time... in Hollywood
movies.overview: Los Angeles, 1969. TV star Rick Dalton, a struggling actor specializing in westerns, and stuntman Cliff Booth, his best friend, try to survive in a constantly changing movie industry. Dalton is the neighbor of the young and promising actress and model Sharon Tate, who has just married the prestigious Polish director Roman Polanski…

plots.plot: A washed-up actor and his stuntman friend get tangled with cultists while chilling next to a famous actress, and instead of a tragic murder, they serve them a can of whoop-ass.
An actor falls off his high horse while his buddy punches hippies, and they somehow end up being historical heroes instead of Hollywood has-beens.
A day in the life of two aging cowboy enthusiasts turns history into fantasy with some help from a flamethrower.
An impersonator lounges about as his skilled buddy plays cowboy, inadvertently redirecting an infamous evening.
A 1960s duo sees the erratic end of an era unfold from their backyard in Tinseltown.

movies.title: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon
movies.overview: Two warriors in pursuit of a stolen sword and a notorious fugitive are led to an impetuous, physically-skilled, teenage nobleman's daughter, who is at a crossroads in her life.

plots.plot: Two kung fu masters play cat-and-mouse with a rebellious rich girl who steals a magical sword, while everyone flies around and does insane backflips.
Skilled warriors chase a teenager who swipes a powerful blade and has more mood swings than sword techniques.
A swiped blade leads to some gravity-defying kung fu, plus one teenager having the mother of all rebellious phases.
An artifact theft goes sideways as everyone involved decides gravity is optional during family drama and wild sword-fighting.
High society chaos ensues when a young individual confuses martial prowess with petty theft, setting off a chase with airborne combat dynamics.

movies.title: The Right Stuff
movies.overview: As the Space Race ensues, seven pilots set off on a path to become the first American astronauts to enter space. However, the road to making history brings forth momentous challenges.

plots.plot: Chill dudes compete to ride a giant firecracker into the sky, one guy eats too many beans before liftoff.
A bunch of daredevils playing hopscotch with rockets while arguing about who's the most macho space cowboy.
Group of folks try to outdo each other in high-speed sky canoes to see who can kiss the stars first.
Certain test flight enthusiasts trade airplanes for cosmic roller coasters, but keep forgetting gravity is a bummer.
Adventurous gentlemen agree to be catapulted from Earth's cradle to outdo each other in zero-gravity ball-toss.

movies.title: Mission: Impossible - Fallout
movies.overview: When an IMF mission ends badly, the world is faced with dire consequences. As Ethan Hunt takes it upon himself to fulfill his original briefing, the CIA begin to question his loyalty and his motives. The IMF team find themselves in a race against time, hunted by assassins while trying to prevent a global catastrophe.

plots.plot: Super-spy messes up, has to fix his own oopsie while dodging backstabbers and defusing bombs, all while wearing an invisible superhero cape.
Guy does dangerous parkour in famous places while carrying really important marbles to save Earth from going kaboom.
A daredevil with gravity issues tries to stop a big boom using his social network of weird phone calls and fancier impersonations.
It's a race against time as a wannabe gymnast evades government snitches to play hero and keep predictably predictable evil plans at bay.
A guy famous for daredevil moves goes rogue to juggle potential disasters with dramatic reconnections, while everyone else plays 'spot the traitor'.

movies.title: The Hunger Games: Catching Fire
movies.overview: Katniss Everdeen has returned home safe after winning the 74th Annual Hunger Games along with fellow tribute Peeta Mellark. Winning means that they must turn around and leave their family and close friends, embarking on a "Victor's Tour" of the districts. Along the way Katniss senses that a rebellion is simmering, but the Capitol is still very much in control as President Snow prepares the 75th Annual Hunger Games (The Quarter Quell) - a competition that could change Panem forever.

plots.plot: The girl who plays archery champ and her bread-loving fake boyfriend tour the empire, pretending to be in love while dodging an angry dictator's revenge plot.
Imagine surviving a murder contest, only to be treated like a toy and thrown back into a fire pit while the wealthy maniac pulls strings.
After a deadly talent show, a reluctant heroine gets shoved back into the circus alongside an odd mix of past winners for more gladiatorial fun amidst dictatorship nonsense.
Escaped a horrific island TV gig just to be dragged into a high-stakes sequel where popcorn capitalists bend the rules and order another showdown.
Victorious group from a dystopian talent contest celebrate their win by enduring a second round of chaos as elite jesters in a nationwide circus, while the adult babysitter stresses.

movies.title: The Bourne Ultimatum
movies.overview: Bourne is brought out of hiding once again by reporter Simon Ross who is trying to unveil Operation Blackbriar, an upgrade to Project Treadstone, in a series of newspaper columns. Information from the reporter stirs a new set of memories, and Bourne must finally uncover his dark past while dodging The Company's best efforts to eradicate him.

plots.plot: Ex-assassin with memory issues plays hide and seek with the CIA while trying to find out why he's so grumpy.
Amnesiac superspy gets really annoyed with people chasing him after a mean old project called 'Blackbriar' gets too trendy.
Guy with a bad case of the ‘Do I know you?’s goes on a European tour, while dodging a bunch of guys in suits with big attitude problems.
A mysterious dude who hates crowds, noise, and government agents decides to uncover a secret project as his ultimate therapy session.
Man with unpronounceable existential crisis runs through cities, as folks with itchy trigger fingers try to stop him from redefining corporate loyalty.

movies.title: Zelig
movies.overview: Fictional documentary about the life of human chameleon Leonard Zelig, a man who becomes a celebrity in the 1920s due to his ability to look and act like whoever is around him. Clever editing places Zelig in real newsreel footage of Woodrow Wilson, Babe Ruth, and others.

plots.plot: A shape-shifting dude becomes famous for blending in, turning him into the ultimate human chameleon who crashes historical events.
A mingling magician of mimicry finds fame by transforming to fit his surroundings; history has never seen such a peculiar photobomb.
A walking mirror of folks around him, this chap gains celebrity status for his knack to match any crowd .
This fella's unique talent isn't singing or dancing, but morphing—making him an awkward icon of adaptability in 1920s America.
Man with the world's most copied face becomes a pseudo-celebrity by turning into a human snapshot of everyone he meets.

movies.title: Contact
movies.overview: A radio astronomer receives the first extraterrestrial radio signal ever picked up on Earth. As the world powers scramble to decipher the message and decide upon a course of action, she must make some difficult decisions between her beliefs, the truth, and reality.

plots.plot: A scientist goes for a space trip in a giant beach ball, meets her dad, but it's actually an alien prank call.
Astronomer gets past bureaucracy to talk to aliens, ends up on a rollercoaster ride through imaginary Florida instead of extraterrestrial RSVP.
An astronomer inadvertently promotes alien communication as the universe's worst long-distance phone plan, only to find out that the aliens have family drama too.
The government exploits a celestial dial-up service, leading to a singular encounter where faith and science awkwardly slow dance under the cosmos.
Astronomy aficionado oscillates between existential crises and celestial correspondence, featuring an impromptu interstellar beach day as the climax.

movies.title: The Hurricane
movies.overview: The story of Rubin "Hurricane" Carter, a boxer wrongly imprisoned for murder, and the people who aided in his fight to prove his innocence.

plots.plot: A boxer becomes famous for avoiding a prison fight club and throwing punches at injustice instead.
Fists make a powerful statement both in the ring and in the courtroom, but neither stops this guy from being mistakenly labeled as Public Enemy Number One.
A series of one-sided matches: first, a knockout in the justice system, then a comeback fueled by books, letters, and unlikely fans.
A pugilist lands a technical knockout outside the ring, with some heavy punches from the legal system, until he finds the ultimate training partners.
In a world where paper beats scissors but not corrupt convictions, a fighter's most significant battle is against very well-penned paper.

movies.title: American Sniper
movies.overview: U.S. Navy SEAL Chris Kyle takes his sole mission—protect his comrades—to heart and becomes one of the most lethal snipers in American history. His pinpoint accuracy not only saves countless lives but also makes him a prime target of insurgents. Despite grave danger and his struggle to be a good husband and father to his family back in the States, Kyle serves four tours of duty in Iraq. However, when he finally returns home, he finds that he cannot leave the war behind.

plots.plot: A guy with god-like aiming skills protects his friends from bad guys, racks up points, and periodically struggles to remember he's married with kids.
One dude loves his rifle almost as much as he loves his wife, but sand gets everywhere and it's a whole thing.
Sharp-eyed soldier trades brunches for bunkers, becoming his country's most celebrated long-distance relationship expert.
Skilled marksman keeps counts both in the battlefield and in therapy sessions, finding comfort only in gunpowder and family disagreements.
Four trips overseas only to find himself locked in an existential crosshair between suburban tranquility and chaotic recollections.

movies.title: This Is Spinal Tap
movies.overview: "This Is Spinal Tap" shines a light on the self-contained universe of a metal band struggling to get back on the charts, including everything from its complicated history of ups and downs, gold albums, name changes and undersold concert dates, along with the full host of requisite groupies, promoters, hangers-on and historians, sessions, release events and those special behind-the-scenes moments that keep it all real.

plots.plot: A band of washed-up metal dudes tours America trying to avoid being forgotten, but they can't even find the stage half the time.
A band's quest for loudness leads to numerous mishaps, including location mix-ups and an unfortunate incident involving a Stonehenge set piece.
These rocker dudes narrowly escape archaeological disaster during a concert, all thanks to poorly interpreted spatial dimensions.
Desperate musicians wrestle with existential dread as their musical aspirations are constantly dwarfed by their props.
In the pursuit of auditory dominance, performers hit a snag when their technological ambitions exceed their logistical capabilities.

movies.title: Doctor Strange
movies.overview: After his career is destroyed, a brilliant but arrogant surgeon gets a new lease on life when a sorcerer takes him under her wing and trains him to defend the world against evil.

plots.plot: Arrogant doc loses his magic hands, joins wizard school, fights bald baddy, learns to be less of a jerk.
Cocky scalpel-jockey crashes, plays hippy wizard, loops through eternity just to break a demon's patience.
After wrecking his own life, a man takes up the mystical arts, learning to fold cities and annoy higher beings.
A once-steady hand now steadies reality, frantically ensuring the world doesn't fall apart despite his clumsiness.
Physician tries his hand at stage magic, ends up in a kaleidoscopic battle to balance the universe's books.

movies.title: The Godfather Part III
movies.overview: In the midst of trying to legitimize his business dealings in 1979 New York and Italy, aging mafia don, Michael Corleone seeks forgiveness for his sins while taking a young protege under his wing.

plots.plot: Mafia boss wants to go straight, gets distracted by church donations, singing nephews, and family drama.
Old gangster tries to go clean but ends up in a deadly opera with family squabbles and tragic balcony scenes.
Mature mobster dabbles in European investments, but finds legacy haunted by epic choir boy conflicts.
Aging syndicate chief mingles money with faith, watches mentor take aim at ambitious grape-stomper.
Senior entrepreneur battles inner turmoil between sacred funds and preserving a failing vinous dynasty.

movies.title: Sullivan's Travels
movies.overview: Successful movie director John L. Sullivan, convinced he won't be able to film his ambitious masterpiece until he has suffered, dons a hobo disguise and sets off on a journey, aiming to "know trouble" first-hand. When all he finds is a train ride back to Hollywood and a beautiful blonde companion, he redoubles his efforts, managing to land himself in more trouble than he bargained for when he loses his memory and ends up a prisoner on a chain gang.

plots.plot: A rich movie director dresses up like a hobo to find suffering, gets lost and ends up on a chain gang because apparently, Hollywood research took a dark turn.
Man decided he'd try poverty to make better movies, accidentally lands a starring role in the prison labor cast.
Director's 'method acting' to understand the plot had him trading Hollywood for a five-star jail cell.
Movie boss swaps the limelight for sweat and cursing his life choices, finding cinematic gold on a chain gang.
Film guy, seeking realism, goes from Hollywood honeys to involuntary rock breaking, proving ignorance is a wild card.

movies.title: Scrooge
movies.overview: Ebenezer Scrooge malcontentedly shuffles through life as a cruel, miserly businessman; until he is visited by three spirits on Christmas Eve who show him how his unhappy childhood and adult behavior has left him a selfish, lonely old man.

plots.plot: A cranky old dude hates everyone and everything, then gets haunted by some whiny ghosts who force him to have feelings or face eternal death by chains.
A penny-pinching crank gets ghost-bullied into buying holiday cheer.
Grumpy senior citizen's night of sleep is wrecked by spooky time-traveling lectures.
Misanthropic senior hallucinates on a wintry night, confronting torrents from his inner PTSD merry-go-round.
An elderly man experiences paranormal interventions, reminiscing about a bleak Dickensian existence over one ill-tempered evening.

movies.title: Saw
movies.overview: Two men wake up to find themselves shackled in a grimy, abandoned bathroom. As they struggle to comprehend their predicament, they discover a disturbing tape left behind by the sadistic mastermind known as Jigsaw. With a chilling voice and cryptic instructions, Jigsaw informs them that they must partake in a gruesome game in order to secure their freedom.

plots.plot: Two dudes chained in a filthy bathroom, forced to play a demented board game involving saws and bad life choices.
Wakey-wakey, you're chained in a moldy bathroom and a cassette player boss wants to play.
Two unlucky souls start their day shackled, tasked to pass a gruesome midlife exam set by a puppet.
Men in chains participate in an unwelcome anatomy lesson, orchestrated by a morally confused cryptic caller.
Ever thought your home reno TV show was intense? Try solving puzzles by your internal decorator, guided by tapes.

movies.title: The Lego Movie
movies.overview: An ordinary Lego mini-figure, mistakenly thought to be the extraordinary MasterBuilder, is recruited to join a quest to stop an evil Lego tyrant from conquering the universe.

plots.plot: A plastic construction worker gets mistaken for a hero and ends up leading a rebellion with a bunch of blockheads to stop a CEO obsessed with superglue.
Bricks unite against an adhesive freak running a corporate dictatorship, led by a clueless guy in obnoxious orange pants.
An uninspired drone discovers his unused creativity, triggering chaos in a conformist world controlled by a tyrant with an arts-and-crafts fetish.
An existential crisis unfolds inside a colorful world of interlocking pieces, where individuality battles homogenized perfectionism under the rule of a cruel organizing fanatic.
A flamboyant resistance forms within an assembly-line society, where the figurine proletariat rises against their fixated leader crazed for permanence.

movies.title: The Fly
movies.overview: When Seth Brundle makes a huge scientific and technological breakthrough in teleportation, he decides to test it on himself. Unbeknownst to him, a common housefly manages to get inside the device and the two become one.

plots.plot: Genius invents teleportation, accidentally combines with a fly, and becomes a buzzworthy mutant more annoying than your last Tinder date.
Teleportation gone wrong: Scientist’s love life flies out the window as he becomes an insect icon of chaos and bad hygiene.
Shady dude meddles with science, transforms into the creepiest bug to crash a swanky gala since the roach found the punch bowl.
Tech wizard's vanity project turns him into critter with wings, and not the kind from Red Bull commercials.
Hubris and hubbub: biological stew minted our awkward entomological superhero who unwittingly discourages cross-species mingling.

movies.title: An American Werewolf in London
movies.overview: American tourists David and Jack are savaged by an unidentified vicious animal whilst hiking on the Yorkshire Moors. Retiring to the home of a beautiful nurse to recuperate, David soon experiences disturbing changes to his mind and body.

plots.plot: Two American dudes visit England, get mauled by a furry freak, one becomes a drooling dog-breather, and awkwardly scores with a nurse.
Tourists get bitten, one becomes an emotional were-puppy trying not to chew on London’s residents, and gets mixed up with his own undead buddy.
One guy wakes up from a doggone attack with cravings for raw meat and moonlit strolls, feeling not so touristy anymore.
After a messy romcom with sharp teeth, someone’s confused between love and lunar lunacy in a very foggy place.
In a place with awkward maps and messier beastly incidents, one fella navigates moonlit transformations and urban peculiarities.

movies.title: Being John Malkovich
movies.overview: One day at work, unsuccessful puppeteer Craig finds a portal into the head of actor John Malkovich. The portal soon becomes a passion for anybody who enters its mad and controlling world of overtaking another human body.

plots.plot: Desperate puppeteer crawls through tiny portal, possesses famous actor, and turns his life into a bizarre circus of strange desires.
Office drone finds a head expressway to a celebrity and rents out brain joyrides from a tiny room.
Worker stumbles on actor's brain wormhole, rents it for kicks until things get alarmingly weird.
Opportunity knocks with mind rentals at suspiciously bizarre workplace, but ethical considerations pack bags and leave.
A frustrated manipulator of marionettes discovers the ultimate puppet show inside an A-lister's cranium.

movies.title: Sicario
movies.overview: An idealistic FBI agent is enlisted by a government task force to aid in the escalating war against drugs at the border area between the U.S. and Mexico.

plots.plot: FBI agent joins a secret team, learns the best way to fight drug lords is to throw all the rules out the window and hire a hitman.
Rookie coaxes government folks, who play snake charmer with the law, and they tango with cartel cuddle buddies.
Newbie chaperone joins secret government club; their motto? Break laws to fix them.
Green agent ends up in a government no-rules party, hired guns and all, at the line between sense and nonsense.
Starry-eyed fed falls into a bureaucratic rabbit hole, where hitmen play the soundtrack for border drama.

movies.title: Enter the Dragon
movies.overview: A martial artist agrees to spy on a reclusive crime lord using his invitation to a tournament there as cover.

plots.plot: Kung fu dude goes undercover at a killer monk's island party to punch his way through goons and show off sick moves.
Epic fistfights and mirror tricks ensue when a guy with secret skills joins a suspicious island gathering.
Invited to a peculiar cruise with sporty activities, our hero's mission involves defying optics and illegal cosmetics.
A holistic wellness retreat features an unexpected spa service of cracking skulls and bone acupuncture.
Participant in an exclusive athletic cruise uncovers a maritime cosplayer with sharp appendages and stringent rules enforcement.

movies.title: Creed
movies.overview: The former World Heavyweight Champion Rocky Balboa serves as a trainer and mentor to Adonis Johnson, the son of his late friend and former rival Apollo Creed.

plots.plot: Boxer's kid wants to punch like dad, so he drags a retired fighter out of his dinosaur cave.
Wannabe bruiser gets schooled by a grizzled champ who looks like he barely survived 1985.
A hopeful brawler seeks glory under the guidance of a man who thinks turtles are a solid investment.
A dude with fists, but no last name, learns the ropes from a guy who once ran up steps very dramatically.
Ambitious pugilist gets tips from an older hero, who previously wore shorts for a living.

movies.title: Scream
movies.overview: A year after the murder of her mother, a teenage girl is terrorized by a masked killer who targets her and her friends by using scary movies as part of a deadly game.

plots.plot: A girl with more trust issues than a soap opera has to outwit a killer who binges horror movies and loves prank calls.
A masked psycho stalks teens who are better at dodging responsibility than dodging knives, proving landlines are scarier than any ghost story.
The town's slasher turns agony aunt, proving that horror villains are just misunderstood pop culture critics with a penchant for drama.
A small town's murder rate rises faster than a teen's cell phone bill as a masked aficionado quizzes kids with killer intent.
A mystery enthusiast in disguise tests high schoolers' ability to survive both trigonometry and trivia questions with fatal consequences.

movies.title: Boys Don't Cry
movies.overview: A young transgender man explores his gender identity and searches for love in rural Nebraska.

plots.plot: A boy-loving boy deals with his girlfriend's farming family, but things get as messy as a barnyard during a Nebraska winter when folks realize he's not what he seems.
A chap fakes it till he makes it in cowboy country, finding love, but his deception makes waves bigger than any cattle stampede.
Someone with a new haircut and fresh wardrobe enters a town and suddenly romance blooms, but secrets kept lead to a showdown messier than spilled beer at the local bar.
In the sticks, a rebellious spirit embraces a new persona, but small-town drama and secrets create more tension than a hog-tied pig.
A rural Midwesterner opts for a new identity, finding companionship, but things crack like a whip under rigid societal norms.

movies.title: Greyhound
movies.overview: A first-time captain leads a convoy of allied ships carrying thousands of soldiers across the treacherous waters of the "Black Pit" to the front lines of WWII. With no air cover protection for 5 days, the captain and his convoy must battle the surrounding enemy Nazi U-boats in order to give the allies a chance to win the war.

plots.plot: A stressed newbie captain plays Battleship against real-life Nazis and forgets about sleep for a week.
Captain skips nap time to play chicken with submarines in the ocean for days, hoping not to end up in Davy Jones' blog.
Poor guy gets promoted to 'Dodge the Torpedo' coach and regrets skipping the submarine level of his naval training.
Amateur seafarer juggles shiploads of stress while sneaky underwater roommates ruin his five-day cruise.
The newbie afloat wrangles with tin cans under the sea, facing off against aquatic mischief in a five-day marathon.

movies.title: The Omen
movies.overview: Immediately after their miscarriage, the US diplomat Robert Thorn adopts the newborn Damien without the knowledge of his wife. Yet what he doesn’t know is that their new son is the son of the devil.

plots.plot: A clueless diplomat accidentally adopts Satan Jr., who then terrorizes his family with demonic pranks like pony murder and staircase somersaults.
New parents get saddled with the spawn of a horned dude, leading to nanny 'accidents' and priestly impalements.
A concerned dad discovers his adorable little Antichrist's talents for hazardous hobbies involving clergymen and sharp objects.
