An ambassador's kid throws a tantrum, resulting in more animal-related tragedies than a PETA protest.
Foreign envoy raises infernal toddler who has a penchant for peculiar injuries related to clergy, equestrian activities, and domestic help.

movies.title: When Harry Met Sally...
movies.overview: During their travel from Chicago to New York, Harry and Sally debate whether or not sex ruins a friendship between a man and a woman. Eleven years later, and they're still no closer to finding the answer.

plots.plot: Two people decide to argue for a decade about whether they can do the horizontal tango without ruining their friendship.
A long-term duo brainstorm relationship advice, but really they just awkwardly avoid snuggling until a fake orgasm clinches it.
Two city hoppers play a decade-long cat-and-mouse game, hoping nobody screams in a diner during their chats about the birds and bees.
Sometimes debating is just foreplay for two philosophers commuting cross-country to solve the ancient conundrum of platonic relationships.
A cross-country debate team later navigates more seasons' worth of questionable decision-making on connecting platonics.

movies.title: Life of Pi
movies.overview: The story of an Indian boy named Pi, a zookeeper's son who finds himself in the company of a hyena, zebra, orangutan, and a Bengal tiger after a shipwreck sets them adrift in the Pacific Ocean.

plots.plot: A teenager survives a shipwreck, gets stuck on a boat with a tiger, and somehow doesn't end up as lunch.
Kid drifts around the ocean in a tiny boat with a bunch of wild animals who are way less helpful than you'd think.
A young man navigates extreme loneliness and a furry striped roommate who doesn't do dishes.
A shipwrecked castaway masters the delicate art of not getting mauled while camping with a feline roommate.
Boy learns survival skills while sharing living quarters with a carnivorous life coach on vacation.

movies.title: American Psycho
movies.overview: A wealthy New York investment banking executive hides his alternate psychopathic ego from his co-workers and friends as he escalates deeper into his illogical, gratuitous fantasies.

plots.plot: A rich guy loves workouts, face masks, and brutally murdering people while monologuing about 80s pop music.
Yuppie perfectionist obsesses over his business card's font while plotting elaborate murders between skincare routines.
A suit-wearing, morning-routine-obsessed man's grip on reality slips between stock market deals and imaginative bloodshed.
In the land of obnoxious wealth, a finance guy battles existential dread with face masks and phantom knife fights.
An identity crisis unfolds as a financial wizard navigates material excess and hallucinatory homicidal tendencies.

movies.title: A Quiet Place
movies.overview: A family is forced to live in silence while hiding from creatures that hunt by sound.

plots.plot: A family becomes professional mimes to avoid getting eaten by monsters with really great hearing.
It's like extreme library silence or you become creature snack.
Playing the quiet game just got a lot more life-or-death.
The lovably awkward pause in this universe could lead to fatal consequences.
Innovative sound-avoidance techniques separate dining rituals from dinner plates.

movies.title: Taken
movies.overview: Bryan Mills, a former government operative, is trying to reconnect with his teenage daughter Kim. After reluctantly agreeing with his ex-wife to let Kim go to Paris on vacation with a friend, his worst nightmare comes true. While on the phone with his daughter shortly after she arrives in Paris, she and her friend are abducted by a gang of human traffickers. Working against the clock, Bryan relies on his extensive training and skills to track down the ruthless gang that abducted her and launch a one-man war to rescue his daughter.

plots.plot: Ex-spy dad lets his daughter visit Paris, she gets kidnapped, dad goes all 'Die Hard' in Paris, kidnappers regret living.
Vacation in Europe turns into a one-man rescue mission after a bad phone call, and the dad proves he's basically Batman without the cape.
Ex-employee of a three-letter agency handles 'Paris tourism problems' with a blend of extreme parenting and diplomacy through destruction.
Phone chat about sightseeing takes a wrong turn: Euro-escapade becomes a high-stakes hide-and-seek game starring an expendable squad vs. a vacation-intruding expert.
Travel goes awry for a young duo; an overqualified tour guide demonstrates unconventional cross-border retrieval services.

movies.title: The Devil Wears Prada
movies.overview: Andy moves to New York to work in the fashion industry. Her boss is extremely demanding, cruel and won't let her succeed if she doesn't fit into the high class elegant look of their magazine.

plots.plot: A journalism graduate gets a job at a fashion magazine where her boss, more terrifying than a pop quiz, makes her swap her discount sneakers for designer shoes while enduring daily verbal jabs.
Recent grad lands job at fashion mag, discovers boss is satan in stilettos and starts questioning her life choices between lattes and crying in the office bathroom.
Clueless newcomer enters style Mecca, underestimates the power of an iconic publication's iron-fisted leader with unparalleled snark, leading her to rethink her wardrobe—and life.
Eager rookie sets foot in the glossy world of couture, only to find survival means enduring the whims of a Volcanic-tempered oracle of the latest trends.
Naïve duckling enters an empire of fabric myths, where prophesize silver-haired goddess demands sacrifices of sleep and sanity in exchange for chic metamorphosis.

movies.title: Selma
movies.overview: "Selma," as in Alabama, the place where segregation in the South was at its worst, leading to a march that ended in violence, forcing a famous statement by President Lyndon B. Johnson that ultimately led to the signing of the Voting Rights Act.

plots.plot: A guy with a cool hat leads a bunch of people on a long walk because they can't vote, and a bad hair day president has to clean up the mess.
A persistent preacher takes his congregation on a scenic tour of Alabama, quickly realizing vacation planning isn't their strong suit.
A determined group tours a famous bridge, causing a stir that even politicians can't beach.
An unsolicited gathering in a small town manages to make shoes political, much to the chagrin of a certain grump in office.
A grassroots parade struts through man-trapping land to secure the power of a single bubble on a piece of paper.

movies.title: Leviathan
movies.overview: In a Russian coastal town, Kolya is forced to fight the corrupt mayor when he is told that his house will be demolished. He recruits a lawyer friend to help, but the man's arrival brings further misfortune for Kolya and his family.

plots.plot: A Russian guy's house is about to get bulldozed by the mayor, so he calls in a lawyer friend, but instead of saving the day, the lawyer makes things even worse—some hero!
In Russia, a man battles a destructive mayor and brings in a lawyer who cunningly manages to become the cherry on his disastrous soup.
Russian homeowner defuses legal grenades from a political figure with the finesse of a lawyer who seems better at causing chaos than practicing law.
Coastal resident struggles against bulldozing plans and enlists legal help, proving that friendship can indeed make things exceptionally worse.
A man in a town near water fights against urban renewal gone awry, assisted by a legal buddy whose solutions are as effective as a chocolate teapot.

movies.title: Justice League: Doom
movies.overview: An adaptation of Mark Waid's "Tower of Babel" story from the JLA comic. Vandal Savage steals confidential files Batman has compiled on the members of the Justice League, and learns all their weaknesses.

plots.plot: Batman makes cheat sheets for fighting his superhero buddies, but an evil guy steals them and almost ruins their friendship.
Gotham's nighttime vigilante can't stop journaling about friends' weak spots, which a bald baddie uses to stage superhero smackdown.
Our hero with a cave hobby, who loves making 'in case they go rogue' lists, loses them to a dude with an ancient complex.
When the squirrel-suited billionaire's paranoia goes public, super friends experience a mid-life crisis on steroids.
A caped crusader's classified contingency plans get leaked, revealing weaknesses as soft as a Hollywood blockbuster's plot twists.

movies.title: Clerks
movies.overview: Convenience and video store clerks Dante and Randal are sharp-witted, potty-mouthed and bored out of their minds. So in between needling customers, the counter jockeys play hockey on the roof, visit a funeral home and deal with their love lives.

plots.plot: Two dudes whine about their crummy jobs while one mans the counter and the other plays hockey on the roof.
Bored sales guys insult their customers, chat about filthy stuff, and try not to completely ruin their lame love lives.
Grumpy shop dude spends his day ignoring work, trashing customers, and playing rooftop sports.
The chatty bored one is reluctantly responsible; the other is a master of messing around, mockery, and movie rentals.
When he's not railing against clueless consumers, the guy struggles with unplanned shifts and romantic regrets.

movies.title: Mad Max 2
movies.overview: Max Rockatansky returns as the heroic loner who drives the dusty roads of a postapocalyptic Australian Outback in an unending search for gasoline. Arrayed against him and the other scraggly defendants of a fuel-depot encampment are the bizarre warriors commanded by the charismatic Lord Humungus, a violent leader whose scruples are as barren as the surrounding landscape.

plots.plot: An ex-cop with a thing for leather and quietness becomes the weird uncle of a bunch of gas-obsessed misfits and fights a muscle-bound psychopath with more makeup than weapons.
In the middle of a giant sandpit, a guy with survivor guilt helps a crowd of fashion-challenged folks shuttle some precious liquid away from a scary dude with terrible skincare.
Petrol is the holy grail and disgruntled drivers play road games against a man in a mask for the ultimate prize: the ability to drive without pushing.
A lone ranger refuses to embrace social conventions and ends up threading wheels of fortune through a wasteland where life is just one big petroleum party.
Silent protagonists have bad luck with settlements, especially when they're pitted against a group whose leader's fashion sense is as problematic as his personal space issues.

movies.title: Falling Down
movies.overview: An ordinary man frustrated with the various flaws he sees in society begins to psychotically and violently lash out against them.

plots.plot: Office guy quits traffic jam, starts a crime spree fueled by rage against fast food and golf courses.
Middle-aged dude snaps over a flat soda, picnics with bazookas and makes friends the hard way.
A man's quest through urban chaos leads to some serious retail therapy with unconventional negotiation tactics.
Civilian explores Los Angeles by car and foot after sudden job vacancy; finds customer service lacking.
Man discovers personal apocalypse on a sunny Californian commute, downsizes luggage violently, day goes downhill.

movies.title: As Good as It Gets
movies.overview: Melvin Udall, a cranky, bigoted, obsessive-compulsive writer of romantic fiction, is rude to everyone he meets, including his gay neighbor, Simon. After Simon is brutally attacked and hospitalized, Melvin finds his life turned upside down when he has to look after Simon's dog. In addition, Carol, the only waitress at the local diner who will tolerate him, leaves work to care for her chronically ill son, making it impossible for Melvin to eat breakfast.

plots.plot: A grumpy writer adopts a dog and an attitude adjustment after harassing the waitress and charming her pants off.
Snarky novelist goes rogue, ends up becoming too attached to a new furry friend, and accidentally becomes a better person.
A compulsive man's breakfast routine implodes as he dog-sits for an unwilling roommate, confronting personal dilemmas in a diner.
Grizzling misanthrope finds companionship with a four-legged placeholder when uncontrollable change strikes familiar faces.
Cantankerous scribe faces a reluctant life makeover through canine camaraderie and unwanted diner chemistry.

movies.title: The Fighter
movies.overview: Boxer "Irish" Micky Ward's unlikely road to the world light welterweight title. His Rocky-like rise was shepherded by half-brother Dicky, a boxer-turned-trainer who rebounded in life after nearly being KO'd by drugs and crime.

plots.plot: A punch-drunk family turns Thanksgiving dinner into a boxing match while one guy tries to win a shiny belt.
Crackhead sibling attempts to teach brother how to fight, but mostly teaches how to dodge dysfunctional relatives.
A delusional ex-athlete throws hands in the air pretending he's still great; his brother juggles family drama and boxing dreams.
A dude with bad taste in life coaches relies on an unorthodox training regimen which includes constant domestic brawls.
Under the tutelage of a self-destructive guru with more baggage than a lost luggage office, a pugilist learns to fight back and not just against opponents.

movies.title: Zulu
movies.overview: In 1879, during the Anglo-Zulu War, man-of-the-people Lt. Chard and snooty Lt. Bromhead are in charge of defending the isolated and vastly outnumbered Natal outpost of Rorke's Drift from tribal hordes.

plots.plot: A bunch of British dudes in fancy uniforms try to stop Zulu warriors with sticks from messing up their tiny camp, but mostly they just argue over who's boss.
Posh guys with funny hats find out using stiff upper lips as weapons isn't as effective against determined spear-throwers as they thought.
A small group of disciplined redcoats is like, 'um, excuse me,' when faced with a lot, and I mean a lot, of determined locals not too keen on sharing the neighborhood.
Lofty commanders defend their very important middle-of-nowhere fort because, you know, someone drew lines on a map somewhere far away.
European empire enforcers discover that a outpost-based greeting party wasn't enough to keep everyone from crashing their 19th-century backyard barbecue.

movies.title: PAW Patrol: The Movie
movies.overview: Ryder and the pups are called to Adventure City to stop Mayor Humdinger from turning the bustling metropolis into a state of chaos.

plots.plot: A kid with a thing for dogs and zero adult supervision leads a team of talking pups to save the city from a mayor with a hat fetish.
An overzealous mayor with canine envy turns the city into a personal funhouse, so the local underage pet squad rolls in to fix things.
Tiny mammals play sheriff in a town run by a guy who thinks hot air and chaos are the same as leadership.
Youthful optimism and barking bravado collide with an urbane mayor's slightly eccentric, hugely misguided plans.
Four-legged municipal support units thwart an admin notorious for disaster governance, ensuring urban peace one paw at a time.

movies.title: Rudolph the Red-Nosed Reindeer
movies.overview: Sam the snowman tells us the story of a young red-nosed reindeer who, after being ousted from the reindeer games because of his glowing nose, teams up with Hermey, an elf who wants to be a dentist, and Yukon Cornelius, the prospector. They run into the Abominable Snowman and find a whole island of misfit toys. Rudolph vows to see if he can get Santa to help the toys, and he goes back to the North Pole on Christmas Eve. But Santa's sleigh is fogged in. But when Santa looks over Rudolph, he gets a very bright idea...

plots.plot: Deer gets bullied for his nose bling until Santa needs him to guide his sleigh through a bad fog.
Deer with a facial LED joins a dentist elf and a prospector on a journey to get misfit toys noticed.
It's about a critter who can't attend reindeer Olympics due to a glowing headlight until he's needed for fog driving.
This coming of age tale for a critter with a cranial luminaire leads him to a camp of rejected playthings.
It's the luminescent-nosed mammal narrative where he's ostracized, discovers odd playmates, and finds utility in poor weather.

movies.title: Black Hawk Down
movies.overview: When U.S. Rangers and an elite Delta Force team attempt to kidnap two underlings of a Somali warlord, their Black Hawk helicopters are shot down, and the Americans suffer heavy casualties, facing intense fighting from the militia on the ground.

plots.plot: American soldiers attempt to nab bad guys in a foe-filled neighborhood, crash fancy copters, and then play a deadly game of hide and seek.
Group of soldiers take an unscheduled detour, trade their flying metal birds for a chaotic sightseeing tour in an unwelcoming town.
A special squad loses its ride and gets forced into an extended outdoor activity with locals who hate guests.
When advanced air transport meets ground resistance, unexpected on-foot tourism of an urban conflict zone ensues.
Sky chariots met gravity in a region not known for its hospitality, leading to an extended, unwanted social mixer.

movies.title: Law Abiding Citizen
movies.overview: A frustrated man decides to take justice into his own hands after a plea bargain sets one of his family's killers free. He targets not only the killer but also the district attorney and others involved in the deal.

plots.plot: Dad turns house of horrors fan after court bails out the bad guy who wrecked his family, and decides all the suits need a scarecrow for Halloween.
Guy who really hates plea bargains sets up trap-laden theme park where the rides make lawyers scream but quietly respects fire safety regulations.
When cops can't handle it, bring in the frustrated engineer who knows how to send subtle legal notes like 'Boom, you're dead!' without postage.
Distraught inventor takes 'justice is blind' literally by innovating methods to spectacularly blind everyone in the justice department, meanwhile accounting for VAT.
Enthusiast of rule-bending turns city into postmodern art piece called 'Revengeful Architecture Performance' featuring explosions, lawsuits, and mostly safe zones.

movies.title: Drunken Master
movies.overview: After getting into trouble, a mischievous young man is sent to train under a brutal, but slovenly old beggar, who teaches him the secret of the Drunken Fist.

plots.plot: A young troublemaker learns how to fight from a messy old dude who kicks butt by acting like he's super hammered.
Young punk meets slob who teaches him to wobble around and call it martial arts while looking wasted.
Wannabe warrior learns fighting moves from a guy who combines kung fu with happy hour techniques.
Rebel gets schooled by raggedy hobo obsessed with inebriated combat styles.
Rowdy lad's disciplined through unconventional fighting methods from an eccentric mentor avoiding sobriety.

movies.title: Lost in Translation
movies.overview: Two lost souls visiting Tokyo -- the young, neglected wife of a photographer and a washed-up movie star shooting a TV commercial -- find an odd solace and pensive freedom to be real in each other's company, away from their lives in America.

plots.plot: A bored actor and a lonely youngster bond over boredom and bizarre karaoke in Tokyo.
Washed-up celebrity and disinterested spouse bond over a mutual dislike for their unquestionably irritating lives in a neon city.
A lost entertainer and a weary partner of a busy photographer discover peace outside the flashing lights of Japan.
Struggling with insomnia, two displaced individuals frolic around a glossy metropolis filled with language they can't understand.
An overlooked spouse and a celebrity ad talent find solace in a foreign land while being incapable of reading most signs.

movies.title: The Hunt for Red October
movies.overview: A new technologically-superior Soviet nuclear sub, the Red October, is heading for the U.S. coast under the command of Captain Marko Ramius. The American government thinks Ramius is planning to attack. Lone CIA analyst Jack Ryan has a different idea: he thinks Ramius is planning to defect, but he has only a few hours to find him and prove it - because the entire Russian naval and air commands are trying to find Ramius, too. The hunt is on!

plots.plot: Sub captain wants to ghost the USSR and join the USA, while a CIA nerd rushes to prove he's not actually a warmongering psycho.
An underwater game of hide-and-seek ensues as one boat flip-flops from one world power to another, with a paper-pusher as the babysitter.
A rebellious sailor takes his cutting-edge metal shark on a road trip to freedom, confusing both his bosses and his would-be rescuers.
The big underwater tin can races toward new pastures, confusing everyone involved, but one land-loving man with a monogrammed suit has a hunch.
A metal leviathan becomes both a target and a prize in a Cold War shuffle, while a desk jockey plays armchair admiral.

movies.title: Interview with the Vampire
movies.overview: A vampire relates his epic life story of love, betrayal, loneliness, and dark hunger to an over-curious reporter.

plots.plot: Pale guys who need sunscreen suck on people juices and tell a dude with a notepad all about their buddy drama.
A guy spills the beans on living forever, rooming with a Gothic buddy, and playing 'Who's the creepiest of them all?' with a mortal enthusiast.
Two eternal night owls navigate their overly dramatic fraternity while sipping blood smoothies at a 24-hour bar.
An immortal loner shares tales of his nocturnal debauchery, avoiding sunlight and heartbeats, over a cup of organic plasma.
A duo of timeless socio-trustafarians explores the existential dread of immortality via intense, yet elitist, human drinking habits.

movies.title: Beetlejuice
movies.overview: A newly dead New England couple seeks help from a deranged demon exorcist to scare an affluent New York family out of their home.

plots.plot: Two newly dead clowns hire an undead pest control guy who can't follow the rules, mainly because he doesn’t have any, to evict some living yuppies in loud jackets from their house.
Ghost couple finds that being intangible doesn't stop them from needing a brainless fiend dressed like a traffic cone to handle their human intruders.
Deceased domestic duo fail at scaring away soul-sucking urbanites, so they rely on a madcap misfit who really needs a haircut.
Stuck in the afterlife of real estate squabbles, two spectral settlers summon a manic misanthrope to eject chic land grabbers.
Some dead folks require assistance from a rather eccentric entrepreneur to expel an insufferably stylish but very alive family.

movies.title: Office Space
movies.overview: A depressed white-collar worker tries hypnotherapy, only to find himself in a perpetual state of devil-may-care bliss that prompts him to start living by his own rules, and hatch a hapless attempt to embezzle money from his soul-killing employers.

plots.plot: Bored office dude hates his boss, gets hypnotized, accidentally becomes the happiest anarchist in his soul-crushing cubicle, and tries to rob the company with his useless friends.
Fed up guy gets hypnotized and can't care less about his soul-sucking job, so he decides stealing from the company is a fun hobby.
Guy discovers a magical way to dodge TPS reports and suddenly thinks siphoning off fractions of pennies is genius.
A keyboard warrior, frustrated with corporate chaos, turns to zen thievery by exploiting accounting quirks.
Perpetual carefree hypnosis leads a guy to exchange printer bashing for decimal mischief.

movies.title: Black Panther
movies.overview: King T'Challa returns home to the reclusive, technologically advanced African nation of Wakanda to serve as his country's new leader. However, T'Challa soon finds that he is challenged for the throne by factions within his own country as well as without. Using powers reserved to Wakandan kings, T'Challa assumes the Black Panther mantle to join with ex-girlfriend Nakia, the queen-mother, his princess-kid sister, members of the Dora Milaje (the Wakandan 'special forces') and an American secret agent, to prevent Wakanda from being dragged into a world war.

plots.plot: A guy becomes king, gets cat-like powers, and then wrestles with his cousin who wants to share their fancy tech with everyone, while he's just trying to manage his relationship status and sister's sense of humor.
Wannabe king gets weed powers and fights family drama and societal issues with some really well-dressed guards and a charade of good intentions.
Nation with McGuffin metal deals with external nosiness, internal beef and fashion-forward battlers, topped with feline flair.
High-tech isolationists face throne turbulence over sharing shiny rocks with outsiders, all packed with a roaring cultural punch.
A secretive nation, world-powerful mineral, and familial soap opera with claws form a full-bodied geopolitical crisis.

movies.title: South Park: Post COVID: The Return of COVID
movies.overview: If Stan, Kyle and Cartman could just work together, they could go back in time to make sure Covid never happened. But traveling back to the past seems to be the easy answer until they meet Victor Chaos.

plots.plot: After causing chaos all over town, grown-up kids try time travel with their bumbling future selves to stop COVID by confronting the villain who has nothing but a chaotic name and really bad timing.
Adults regress to kids' squabbles to face bizarre obstacles, a time-traveling fiasco, and dodge an antagonist whose last laugh is giving the pandemic endless sequels.
Determined to untangle their messy future, frenemies attempt temporal roulette while dodging the machinations of a chaos-obsessed ex-villain with a plan as crazy as their childhood.
Mature but immature, a trio navigates the roulette of linear disturbances yet collides with a mastermind whose sinister grin fuels their world’s ongoing 'flu' drama.
Chronicle twisters join forces to rid a parallel hitch, tackling a haphazard schema courtesy of a villain coolly named after infinite disorder, all because of airborne afflictions.

movies.title: Moonlight
movies.overview: The tender, heartbreaking story of a young man’s struggle to find himself, told across three defining chapters in his life as he experiences the ecstasy, pain, and beauty of falling in love, while grappling with his own sexuality.

plots.plot: A kid grows up in a drug-filled Miami and navigates a complicated love life, all while wondering why he can't just like girls.
A boy learns life lessons in three acts: bullying, beach love, and adult shadiness.
Young fellow collects awkward moments, gets comfort food from old flame.
Miami boy learns his life motto: 'School is unnecessary when melodrama is free.'
Child tries to decode hormones' messages via scenic storytelling cubic meters.

movies.title: A Time to Kill
movies.overview: A young lawyer defends a black man accused of murdering two white men who raped his 10-year-old daughter, sparking a rebirth of the KKK.

plots.plot: A desperate dad shoots two rednecks in a courthouse, and the lawyer just tries not to lose his Southern accent.
Hotshot lawyer sweats a lot and becomes besties with an angry guy on trial for playing vigilante after his family tragedy.
An aspiring courtroom crusader battles southern prejudice armed with nothing but charisma and a really sweaty shirt.
Southern legal eagle tries his best to save a client's skin while a lot of Southern folks play dress-up and go full 1865.
Sweaty guy with dreams of legal grandeur defends a protective dad in a place where ghosts of sheets are all too real.

movies.title: No Time to Die
movies.overview: Bond has left active service and is enjoying a tranquil life in Jamaica. His peace is short-lived when his old friend Felix Leiter from the CIA turns up asking for help. The mission to rescue a kidnapped scientist turns out to be far more treacherous than expected, leading Bond onto the trail of a mysterious villain armed with dangerous new technology.

plots.plot: Retired spy with a fancy watch teams up with his CIA buddy to stop a goth kid with a face peel and his army of Roombas from ending the world.
Ex-secret agent comes back from coconut-drinking retirement to rescue a scientist with 'working-from-home' issues and tackles Dr. Evil wannabe trying to play God with bad acne cream.
Guy who left his job gets roped into dealing with a field worker caught by a novelist-turned-scientist, facing a villain who got stuck in the macabre section of Home Depot.
Former cube-dweller faces his past professional nightmare while trying to outwit a disfigured antimicrobial enthusiast causing serious Wi-Fi outages.
Freedom-loving nomad fixes stolen intellectual property while challenging a biochemical entrepreneur with ambitious intentions.

movies.title: The Social Network
movies.overview: In 2003, Harvard undergrad and computer programmer Mark Zuckerberg begins work on a new concept that eventually turns into the global social network known as Facebook. Six years later, Mark is one of the youngest billionaires ever, but his unprecedented success leads to both personal and legal complications when he ends up on the receiving end of two lawsuits, one involving his former friend.

plots.plot: Nerd makes hot-or-not website, steals twins' idea, makes billions, loses best friend, blames everyone else.
Brogrammer turns stealing Harvard brothers' idea into a billion-dollar empire, gains success but trashes friendships.
Computer geek with zero social skills accidentally designs the universe's top friend collector, then everyone sues him.
Lonely campus coder builds addictive people catalog, upset ex-roommate and rowers get litigious.
Silent genius invents virtual popularity contest, cashes in, spends next years partying with lawyers.

movies.title: Miracle on 34th Street
movies.overview: Kris Kringle, seemingly the embodiment of Santa Claus, is asked to portray the jolly old fellow at Macy's following his performance in the Thanksgiving Day parade. His portrayal is so complete that many begin to question if he truly is Santa Claus, while others question his sanity.

plots.plot: An old man gets a gig as a fake Santa and convinces a bunch of New Yorkers he's the real deal, while a kid and her skeptical mom start believing in Christmas magic.
Guy gets hired to be Santa at a department store, everyone thinks he's nuts, but he just really loves handing out gifts and ho-ho-ho-ing.
A dude who looks suspiciously red-suited spreads more holiday cheer than a mall expects, sparking a debate about whether he's just festive or needs medication.
Old dude's seasonal job leads to a legal battle over his questionable lifestyle choices and surprising beard authenticity.
Alleged North Poler finds himself at the center of political and judicial shenanigans, questioning identity, with retail as the unwitting battleground.

movies.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Man's Chest
movies.overview: Captain Jack Sparrow races to recover the heart of Davy Jones to avoid enslaving his soul to Jones' service, as other friends and foes seek the heart for their own agenda as well.

plots.plot: Wobbly pirate with eyeliner owes heart-crushing squid-man a favor, so he chases a jar of dirt and loses all dignity along the way.
Pirate captain with smudged eye shadow and a compass obsession avoids becoming fish food by playing treasure hunt with a devilish squid.
Eyeliner aficionado tries not to become ocean-bottom janitor by locating a rich guy's missing organ.
Teacup gang leader dances with slimy octopus boss over secret body part in ocean-decorated rom-com.
Eccentric seafarer avoids endless post-mortem employment by conducting hide-and-seek with crustacean caretaker.

movies.title: Ice Age
movies.overview: With the impending ice age almost upon them, a mismatched trio of prehistoric critters – Manny the woolly mammoth, Diego the saber-toothed tiger and Sid the giant sloth – find an orphaned infant and decide to return it to its human parents. Along the way, the unlikely allies become friends but, when enemies attack, their quest takes on far nobler aims.

plots.plot: A hairy elephant, a lazy sloth, and a grumpy toothy cat play babysitters for a human infant lost in the snow.
An oddball prehistoric squad races to return a lost hairless ape baby before they all become popsicles.
Enemies of thick fluff, long tooth, and no energy level form a frosty alliance over tiny future fur-challenged mammal.
Freezing cold spells bonding time for three unlikely beings over a fragile little hairless creature.
Big, small, and dangerous put aside natural tendencies for a quest to avoid arrest for accidental adoption.

movies.title: Ghostbusters: Afterlife
movies.overview: When single mom Callie and her two kids Trevor and Phoebe arrive in a small Oklahoma town, they begin to discover their connection to the original Ghostbusters and the secret legacy their grandfather left behind.

plots.plot: A mom and her kids move to the middle of nowhere and find out granddad was an epic ghost-fighting nerd with a thing for green slime.
Grandpa's creepy farming gadgets come alive, making grandkids unwittingly follow in his ghostbusting footsteps while their mom deals with horrible rural Wi-Fi.
Rural descendants accidentally awaken phantasms with questionable parenting, relying on ancient tech and tween brainpower to wrangle flying furniture and glowing pests.
A dusty inheritance in a small town turns into a spectral circus, proving obsolete equipment can still explode on cue, causing kids to master ancient spirits and extraordinary plumbing.
Thanks to DIY basement science and concrete dinosaurs, familial bonds and voices from the past erupt in this farmland, as seismic blunders unleash uncouth apparitions.

movies.title: What's Up, Doc?
movies.overview: The accidental mix-up of four identical plaid overnight bags leads to a series of increasingly wild and wacky situations.

plots.plot: A nerdy guy with a suitcase full of rocks, a girl with trouble to spare, a lady lawyer with jewels, and a spy with top secrets all swap identical bags, go on the run, crash parties, cars, and it's all for some luggage.
A rock-loving researcher just wants a quiet conference but gets tangled with a girl who confuses luggage mixing for flirting, while her bag doubles as a party crasher and chaos starter.
In a classic case of mistaken assets, a clumsy romantic gets more than he bargained for when confused carrying cases cause a cavalcade of comedic catastrophes.
Four mismatched satchels, a hotel full of schemes, and a cartload of confusion make a waterfall ride seem organized.
Luggage mayhem spirals a researcher into a rabbit hole of mishaps against a backdrop of academic wrangling and questionable feasts.

movies.title: Mutiny on the Bounty
movies.overview: Fletcher Christian successfully leads a revolt against the ruthless Captain Bligh on the HMS Bounty. However, Bligh returns one year later, hell bent on revenge.

plots.plot: Sailors get tired of the boss's tyrannical rules and decide to throw him a surprise overboard party, no cake involved.
Cruising the ocean for a healthy snack, crew gets sick of a tyrant captain and opts for a floating democracy instead.
Fed up with their micromanaging leader, sailors take over their floating workplace in a very salty coup d'état.
Maritime employees stage a hostile takeover at sea, ditching corporate tyranny for a more island-friendly boss.
Seafaring mutiny unfolds as disgruntled ocean workforce challenges top-down management, swapping a ruthless CEO for a more tropical HR policy.

movies.title: The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey
movies.overview: Bilbo Baggins, a hobbit enjoying his quiet life, is swept into an epic quest by Gandalf the Grey and thirteen dwarves who seek to reclaim their mountain home from Smaug, the dragon.

plots.plot: Short dude with hairy feet joins a gang of dwarf hooligans to repossess the family castle from a big, scaly lizard.
A socially awkward hermit gets peer-pressured into a road trip with a dozen bearded maniacs and a pyromaniac old man.
Introverted soccer fan helps a group of short treasure hunters reclaim real estate from a winged lizard.
Quiet neighbor gets dragged onto a hiking trip to evict a shiny gold hoarder.
A reluctant rookie joins a band of miners to explore tunnels and caves, encountering a pyrotechnic adept on the way.

movies.title: Jackie Brown
movies.overview: Jackie Brown is a flight attendant who gets caught in the middle of smuggling cash into the country for her gunrunner boss. When the cops try to use Jackie to get to her boss, she hatches a plan — with help from a bail bondsman — to keep the money for herself.

plots.plot: A flight attendant secretly imports cash for her gun-loving boss. Stuck between cops and crime, she and a bondsman cook up a scheme to take the loot and run.
Cash-carrying flight hostess caught between bullets and badges teams with a legal shark to make a money grab worth more than peanuts.
Meanwhile, back at the luggage carousel, an airborne Samaritan finds herself balancing a heavy opportunity with her obligatory duty.
In a high-stakes game of frequent flyer points, one suitcase-toting professional commences layover negotiations with fashion-conscious protection services.
When briefs and bonds clash over baggage claims and black-market hobbies, leverage finds its flight attendant.

movies.title: The Big Short
movies.overview: The men who made millions from a global economic meltdown.

plots.plot: Some money nerds bet against a broken system and score big while everyone else loses everything.
Group of math wizards use calculators to cash in on the apocalypse they called before anyone else.
People predict financial doom, others ignore, and the few who listened buy new yachts.
Few eccentric spreadsheet junkies realize the financial house of cards is falling, so they make bank.
Financial visionaries see doomsday among blindfolded moneymen, profiting from economic collapse.

movies.title: Philomena
movies.overview: A woman searches for her adult son, who was taken away from her decades ago when she was forced to live in a convent.

plots.plot: An old Irish lady teams up with a grumpy journalist to find her long-lost son, sold with free guilt trip by nuns decades ago.
A retired granny and a bored writer go on a merry treasure hunt for her adopted offspring, only to dig up more religion and less reunion than hoped.
Senior lady goes on a belated Easter egg hunt for an offspring she never knew, discovering the church's dark secrets were the prize all along.
Elderly woman embarks on a belated quest for her misplaced offspring, starring divine hijinks and regret-flavored tea.
Mission impossible: a seasoned sleuth and his cheerful elder accomplice embark on an epic scavenger hunt for a missing family puzzle piece last seen at a certain divine daycare.

movies.title: Road to Perdition
movies.overview: Mike Sullivan works as a hit man for crime boss John Rooney. Sullivan views Rooney as a father figure, however after his son is witness to a killing, Mike Sullivan finds himself on the run in attempt to save the life of his son and at the same time looking for revenge on those who wronged him.

plots.plot: A dad takes his son on a field trip, but instead of museums, they visit the mob's hit-list and bonding sessions end with bullets and tears.
An angry dad with a grudge teaches his son how to dodge bullets and collect money the hard way, like a gangster edition of 'Bring Your Kid to Work Day'.
In a classic tale of follower-turned-fugitive, a driving lesson escalates when Dad decides to redefine 'road trip' as mob boss dodgeball.
A family-friendly journey where double-crossing the family business gets you awkward silences and lead-filled plans.
A troubled chauffeur goes on an unwanted vacation mapped by guilt, betrayal, and a notorious papi's paranoia.

movies.title: Adaptation.
movies.overview: Charlie Kaufman is a confused L.A. screenwriter overwhelmed by feelings of inadequacy, sexual frustration, self-loathing, and by the screenwriting ambitions of his freeloading twin brother Donald. While struggling to adapt "The Orchid Thief," by Susan Orlean, Kaufman's life spins from pathetic to bizarre. The lives of Kaufman, Orlean's book, become strangely intertwined as each one's search for passion collides with the others'.

plots.plot: A neurotic writer spends more time whining about his life and his twin than actually adapting a book about flowers, leading to a mess even his split personality couldn’t fix.
A screenwriter grapples with his Hollywood job, battling a twin brother, a seductive author, and botanical ambitions, resulting in a script stranger than fiction itself.
Struggling to bloom in Hollywood, a writer’s attempt to adapt a floral tale leads to his life tangling in a bizarre botanical web of mayhem and somewhat illicit activity.
A screenwriter fights his inner demons and sibling rivalry while his professional life collides spectacularly with floral desires and unorthodox storytelling.
When writer’s block and a plant book make a writer’s life go off the rails, something unexpectedly parallel unfolds, unlike the usual Hollywood endings.

movies.title: Close Encounters of the Third Kind
movies.overview: After an encounter with UFOs, an electricity linesman feels undeniably drawn to an isolated area in the wilderness where something spectacular is about to happen.

plots.plot: Guy meets aliens, makes a mountain out of mashed potatoes, and leaves his family for interstellar road trip.
Aliens play Simon Says with humans using musical notes, some folks think it's a mixtape competition, others lose their minds.
Post-electrician advocates the nutritional value of sculpting carbohydrates over facing children and responsibilities.
Unidentified dinner guests signal via sky symphony, prompting earthly cultists to replace life commitments with sound-based artistry.
Intrusive sensory experiences lure individuals to geomorphological earth feature for unexpected transcosmic engagement.

movies.title: Turning Red
movies.overview: Thirteen-year-old Mei is experiencing the awkwardness of being a teenager with a twist – when she gets too excited, she transforms into a giant red panda.

plots.plot: Shy girl hits puberty and turns into a huge furry creature, because periods weren't enough.
Kid discovers extreme mood swings trigger beast mode, gets a crash course in emotion control.
Adolescence+genes=unexpected fluffiness and awkward social situations.
Puberty involves literal metamorphosis when emotional spikes unleash a furry side.
Awkward genetic transformation results from heightened emotional response, requiring self-regulation.

movies.title: Superman II: The Richard Donner Cut
movies.overview: Superman agrees to sacrifice his powers to start a relationship with Lois Lane, unaware that three Kryptonian criminals he inadvertently released are conquering Earth.

plots.plot: Super dude gives up his mojo for lady love, but surprise! Evil space trio he accidentally let loose are now mixing it up downtown.
A flying boy scout trades world-saving for romance, while space punks take over his turf.
Spandex lover forgoes the cape for cozy nights, but some pesky interstellar escapees crash the party.
A man, sans his usual super punch, watches as intergalactic ruffians redecorate planet blue.
Barn-raised fellow quits being meteor man, right when some extraterrestrial ex-cons decide to do the same gig but louder.

movies.title: The African Queen
movies.overview: At the start of the First World War, in the middle of Africa’s nowhere, a gin soaked riverboat captain is persuaded by a strong-willed missionary to go down river and face-off a German warship.

plots.plot: Gin-soaked captain teams up with a bossy missionary to take on a German warship with a clunky boat in the middle of WWI Africa.
A booze-loving boat-man and a no-nonsense preacher lady turn their floating junk into a torpedo to ruin a German party.
Rowdy river folk aim to sink a boat that's not theirs with some DIY enthusiasm.
Ragged river adventurers set sail determined to meet explosive ends for Queen and country.
An unlikely duo attempts nautical sabotage on foreign machinery in imperial conflict.

movies.title: Darkest Hour
movies.overview: In May 1940, the fate of World War II hangs on Winston Churchill, who must decide whether to negotiate with Adolf Hitler or fight on knowing that it could mean the end of the British Empire.

plots.plot: A grumpy cigar enthusiast yells at everyone while deciding if he should wave the white flag to a mustachioed dictator or keep swinging till his country is dust.
Old guy with a bulldog face can't make up his mind: peace talks or blitz fight over afternoon tea.
In a room full of snobs, a raspy-voiced leader makes risky choices as drama unfolds with too many cigars and whiskey refills.
Cranky lip-flapping boss keeps historic meetings loaded with smoke and stress, considering peace or pounding roars from the continent next door.
Elderly politician unconsciously embraces his inner bulldog during tension-filled deliberations on a foreign powerhouse's belligerent march, toggling between brave resolve and strategic retreat.

movies.title: The Little Mermaid
movies.overview: This colorful adventure tells the story of an impetuous mermaid princess named Ariel who falls in love with the very human Prince Eric and puts everything on the line for the chance to be with him. Memorable songs and characters -- including the villainous sea witch Ursula.

plots.plot: Teen fish girl ditches her fins for legs to snag a hot prince, but an octopus lady tries to ruin the romance by stealing her voice.
Underwater teenager trades her karaoke skills for legs, but forgets love advice from sea cucumber psychic and almost screws it up with fancy land dude.
Aquatic girl suffers identity crisis: swaps appendages, stalks a guy she saved from drowning, and nearly gets wrecked by a tentacled makeup enthusiast.
Wet adolescent tries out human cosplay, gets catfished by a tentacled drag queen, and learns valuable lesson about body image and contract law.
A tailforsaker sacrifices music and fins, blunders through non-telepathic seduction, and confronts a cephalopodian contract enforcement incident.

movies.title: Rudy
movies.overview: Rudy grew up in a steel mill town where most people ended up working, but wanted to play football at Notre Dame instead. There were only a couple of problems. His grades were a little low, his athletic skills were poor, and he was only half the size of the other players. But he had the drive and the spirit of 5 people and has set his sights upon joining the team.

plots.plot: Short guy from a steel mill town dreams of playing for Notre Dame, even though he couldn't tackle a pillow.
Guy with noodle arms and a rock-solid head insists on running around a field at a famous school.
Against all logical odds, a wannabe baller tackles college bureaucracy and physics.
A determined underdog defies biology and academic expectations, achieving the improbable on a prestigious turf.
Steel town dreamer defies spatial limitations and intellectual hurdles, climaxing in 27 seconds of padded glory.

movies.title: To Wong Foo, Thanks for Everything! Julie Newmar
movies.overview: Manhattan drag queens Vida Boheme and Noxeema Jackson impress regional judges in competition, securing berths in the Nationals in Los Angeles. When the two meet pathetic drag novice Chi-Chi Rodriguez — one of the losers that evening — the charmed Vida and Noxeema agree to take the hopeless youngster under their joined wing. Soon the three set off on a madcap road trip across America and struggle to make it to Los Angeles in time.

plots.plot: Two fabulously dressed city drag queens rescue a baby drag chick from being a hot mess, road trip to L.A., and break down in Podunk while teaching rednecks about sequins.
Glam city gals on an L.A. adventure, stuck in rural nowhere, teach dusty locals about style and sass.
Glittery trio dodge tumbleweeds and prejudices on their slowed-down Hollywood quest.
City performers become unwelcome small-town influencers after car trouble hinders westward dreams.
Sashaying through Middle America, three urban fashionistas halt unexpectedly, sparking cultural blend.

movies.title: Goldfinger
movies.overview: Special agent 007 comes face to face with one of the most notorious villains of all time, and now he must outwit and outgun the powerful tycoon to prevent him from cashing in on a devious scheme to raid Fort Knox -- and obliterate the world's economy.

plots.plot: Suave secret agent uses charm, gadgets, and luck to stop a megalomaniac from turning Fort Knox into his personal gold playground.
Slick spy foils wealthy gold-obsessed fanatic by surviving crazy henchman, booby-trapped golf games, and a very deadly lady.
Man with license to kill turns cabriolet into airplane and narrowly avoids sticky demise in gold-filled showdown.
A secretive operative clashes with a gold fetishist, averting a colorful explosion thanks to the quick wiring skills of an ally.
007 dismantles a gilded conspiracy with style, defending a well-secured vault from catastrophic glittery enhancement.

movies.title: Resident Evil: Death Island
movies.overview: In San Francisco, Jill Valentine is dealing with a zombie outbreak and a new T-Virus, Leon Kennedy is on the trail of a kidnapped DARPA scientist, and Claire Redfield is investigating a monstrous fish that is killing whales in the bay. Joined by Chris Redfield and Rebecca Chambers, they discover the trail of clues from their separate cases all converge on the same location, Alcatraz Island, where a new evil has taken residence and awaits their arrival.

plots.plot: Lady cop, pretty boy agent, whale-watching heroine, bro cop, and virus nerd face off with zombies and a giant fish at the most infamous island’s new holiday resort.
The gang goes to prison, fights zombies, and finds out even fish aren’t safe when evil scientists are around.
When 28 Days Later meets Shutter Island, expect zombies on cellblocks and a fish that’s definitely not on the seafood menu.
A gory scavenger hunt involving secret agents, a marine monster, and an old prison with fewer guards and more brain munchers.
DARPA nerd ends up at H5HQ, where brains are snacked on and freedom has a really tight schedule.

movies.title: Saving Mr. Banks
movies.overview: Author P.L. Travers looks back on her childhood while reluctantly meeting with Walt Disney, who seeks to adapt her Mary Poppins books for the big screen.

plots.plot: A grumpy English lady gets nagged by a cheerful mustachioed rodent-voice-over guy into letting him turn her flying nanny stories into an animated cash cow, while she remembers her depressing childhood in Australia.
Cranky author fights tooth and nail with a mouse-loving mogul over a movie, while angstily dwelling on her drunk dad and Australian past.
Stubborn woman talks tea and songs with a business tycoon, while her troubled past does a dance in her mind.
Literary guardian fends off jolly voice castor's advances until dark horse comfort conquers the film stage.
Vintage ink wizard and cel art peddler's clash paints finicky scribbler's dark days away in luminous, synergetic spins.

movies.title: The Wicker Man
movies.overview: Police sergeant Neil Howie is called to an island village in search of a missing girl whom the locals claim never existed. Stranger still, however, are the rituals that take place there.

plots.plot: Uptight cop hunts for a 'missing' kid, island hippies convince him a human barbecue is a great plan.
Dutiful lawman visits a community where singing and bonfires are celebrated with unfortunate guest appearances.
A puritanical visitor investigates peculiar flower arrangements and lands in a blazing surprise party.
A devout outsider disrupts agricultural karaoke only to find himself at the heart of a fiery festival.
An inquisitive interloper stumbles upon a remote society embracing old-school membership ways, ending in a heated initiation.

movies.title: The Terminal
movies.overview: Viktor Navorski is a man without a country; his plane took off just as a coup d'etat exploded in his homeland, leaving it in shambles, and now he's stranded at Kennedy Airport, where he's holding a passport that nobody recognizes. While quarantined in the transit lounge until authorities can figure out what to do with him, Viktor simply goes on living – and courts romance with a beautiful flight attendant.

plots.plot: An unfortunate foreigner gets stuck in an airport because his country's leader decided to play musical chairs with power, so he starts a bizarre airport lifestyle and befriends a hot traveler.
Dude arrives at US airport, finds his country exploded politically, and now he's got a new address: terminal bench, complete with free Wi-Fi, overpriced coffee, and romantic turbulence.
A man new to a country finds he's locked in a cage of bureaucracy, forcing him to eat ketchup packets and make unlikely friends with a food cart and a frequent flyer host.
Having unintentionally upgraded his travel package to 'indefinite layover,' this traveler builds a makeshift residence where the local staff alternate between pity and giving him a wide berth.
An air-bound wanderer becomes an airport's involuntary guest, showcasing new loungewear fashion trends while indulging in government-approved international diplomacy within four sliding glass doors.

movies.title: Dungeons & Dragons: Honor Among Thieves
movies.overview: A charming thief and a band of unlikely adventurers undertake an epic heist to retrieve a lost relic, but things go dangerously awry when they run afoul of the wrong people.

plots.plot: A band of misfit treasure hunters accidentally cause a city-sized mess while trying to steal a shiny thing from a creepy wizard and end up saving the world instead.
A guy who loves shiny things more than life itself teams up with obnoxious pals to break into a villain's house and unintentionally play hero.
A klepto and a gang of rejects aim to nab a macguffin from a sorcerous smarty-pants but wind up facepalming as they're roped into hero work.
Some self-proclaimed adventurers botch an easy retrieval job, recalibrating their career goals from stealing to improbable world-saving stunts.
Unskilled opportunists execute grand theft Faerûn, scramble morality compass, rewrite their D20 destiny.

movies.title: Split
movies.overview: Though Kevin has evidenced 23 personalities to his trusted psychiatrist, Dr. Fletcher, there remains one still submerged who is set to materialize and dominate all the others. Compelled to abduct three teenage girls led by the willful, observant Casey, Kevin reaches a war for survival among all of those contained within him — as well as everyone around him — as the walls between his compartments shatter apart.

plots.plot: A guy with more personalities than a soap opera reunion kidnaps three girls, but his inner demons have so much inner drama that it's like watching a mental health reality show.
A dude with more personalities than fingers decides to have a slumber party with three girls, his inner monster wants to be the party pooper, but one girl has watched enough TV to survive.
A man designates himself as a hostel for personalities, and while he's hosting three roommates uninvited, the new guy on the block wants to crash the place like a home renovation gone wrong.
Multiple personality landlord has a new tenant who believes he's the ultimate fixer-upper, meanwhile, three girls just wish their Airbnb had better reviews.
The head of a fractured HOA struggles with a coup involving a dark, secret plan, while unexpected guests discover membership comes with extreme terms and conditions.

movies.title: A Hard Day's Night
movies.overview: Capturing John Lennon, Paul McCartney, George Harrison and Ringo Starr in their electrifying element, 'A Hard Day's Night' is a wildly irreverent journey through this pastiche of a day in the life of The Beatles during 1964. The band have to use all their guile and wit to avoid the pursuing fans and press to reach their scheduled television performance, in spite of Paul's troublemaking grandfather and Ringo's arrest.

plots.plot: The Beatles run around like headless chickens avoiding screaming girls and the nosey media, while their music-addicted grandpa causes trouble and Ringo gets thrown in the slammer.
A famous band plays hide and seek with fans and journalists, featuring an elderly rebel and a drummer with a talent for getting busted.
Boy band dodges crazy crowds and a media circus, but one of them might need a lawyer thanks to a lock-up blunder.
Four mop-topped lads juggle a showbiz gig and slapstick chaos; one drums his way to jail, grandpa incites anarchy, no one's got time for tea.
Iconic quartet evades hysteria; percussionist finds handcuffs intriguing, elder relative spawns accidental revolution.

movies.title: Wreck-It Ralph
movies.overview: Wreck-It Ralph is the 9-foot-tall, 643-pound villain of an arcade video game named Fix-It Felix Jr., in which the game's titular hero fixes buildings that Ralph destroys. Wanting to prove he can be a good guy and not just a villain, Ralph escapes his game and lands in Hero's Duty, a first-person shooter where he helps the game's hero battle against alien invaders. He later enters Sugar Rush, a kart racing game set on tracks made of candies, cookies and other sweets. There, Ralph meets Vanellope von Schweetz who has learned that her game is faced with a dire threat that could affect the entire arcade, and one that Ralph may have inadvertently started.

plots.plot: Big dude wants a medal, wrecks everything, ends up in Candyland with glitchy girl, saves the day.
Game villain crashes freaky shooting game, somehow ends up in candy-land and fixes problems caused by sugar-fueled racing chaos.
A large demolition pro attempts a career shift by joining forces with sweet-toothed misfit racers against digital apocalypse bugs.
A hefty adversary escapes mundane job only to inadvertently initiate chaos across binary paradise and confections.
A displaced pixel-pusher navigates cross-genre digital landscapes, inadvertently setting off a byte-based crisis in sugar track simulations.

movies.title: True Grit
movies.overview: The murder of her father sends a teenage tomboy on a mission of 'justice', which involves avenging her father's death. She recruits a tough old marshal, 'Rooster' Cogburn because he has 'true grit', and a reputation of getting the job done.

plots.plot: Teen girl hires a grumpy old one-eyed cop with hygiene issues to hunt down her dad's killer, and they both end up in a bizarre buddy cop comedy with cowboy hats.
Young lass drags a cantankerous sheriff and some clean-cut loser on a wild goose chase for vengeance, ending with more eye patches than expected.
Rancid cowboy becomes life coach for feisty girl on a revenge travel tour, complete with gunfights and questionable decision-making.
A dude with a bird-themed nickname babysits a fierce minor who's into frontier justice for a daddy dispute.
Eagle-inspired lawman and a justice-obsessed youth embark on a backward trek into disorderly destines, proving that age and legality are but mere inconveniences on a path of retribution.

movies.title: Kelly's Heroes
movies.overview: A misfit group of World War II American soldiers goes AWOL to rob a bank behind German lines.

plots.plot: A US soldier convinces his buddies to abandon their duties, team up with a German tank commander and rob a bank full of Nazi gold.
Motley crew of soldiers prefer wealth over warfare, so they swap grenades for a treasure map and head north.
WWII soldiers dodge bullets, shrug off orders, and eye gold like it's a survival strategy.
Troops deciding that a bank's vault trumps liberation, embark on a cross-border gold chase, logic be damned.
In wartime Europe, military deserters find monetary motivation against armored opposition.

movies.title: Pay It Forward
movies.overview: Like some other kids, 12-year-old Trevor McKinney believed in the goodness of human nature. Like many other kids, he was determined to change the world for the better. Unlike most other kids, he succeeded.

plots.plot: A kid in Vegas gets inspired to do good deeds after a sloppy history teacher's homework assignment, leading to tragic but heartwarming chaos.
A young boy decides to start a chain reaction of kindness, but things get messy when the adults can't play nice.
After receiving an unusual homework task, a middle schooler concocts a plan involving random acts of kindness and adult dysfunction.
An overambitious child tries fixing the universe by creating an endless cycle of unpaid favors, only to discover adults are terrible at math.
An optimistic pupil's goodwill initiative collapses under the weight of grown-up incompetence and a poorly calibrated social experiment.

movies.title: A Nightmare on Elm Street
movies.overview: Teenagers in a small town are dropping like flies, apparently in the grip of mass hysteria causing their suicides. A cop's daughter, Nancy Thompson, traces the cause to child molester Fred Krueger, who was burned alive by angry parents many years before. Krueger has now come back in the dreams of his killers' children, claiming their lives as his revenge. Nancy and her boyfriend, Glen, must devise a plan to lure the monster out of the realm of nightmares and into the real world...

plots.plot: Sleepy teens in Smalltown, USA get chopped by a vengeful janitor with a glove fetish who really shouldn't have taken up night shift work.
A razor-gloved ghost with a thing for sleepovers slashes dreams and dashes reality in an epic bid to win 'Parenting's Worst Enemy' award.
Burn victim unleashes a series of teen sleep experiments with disastrous results, proving revenge and insomnia are a deadly mix.
In a bizarre twist on sleep therapy, a crispy gentleman uses nap time to audition for the role of 'bedtime's biggest baddie.'
Ever wondered if REM cycles had a personal vendetta? Ask the fire-charred fellow who swaps beauty rest for beastly antics.

movies.title: Now You See Me
movies.overview: An FBI agent and an Interpol detective track a team of illusionists who pull off bank heists during their performances and reward their audiences with the money.

plots.plot: A bunch of magicians with daddy issues rob banks for fun and call it 'magic.'
Some dude who hates wearing jackets tries to catch street magicians who apparently love throwing away money.
A wannabe detective and his European friend fail to catch a Vegas act that makes cash disappear.
A suit-wearing guy chases a well-dressed group that believes Robin Hood would’ve liked card tricks.
An underdog tries to infiltrate a mystical union while being outsmarted by its initiation prequel.

movies.title: Watchmen
movies.overview: In a gritty and alternate 1985, the glory days of costumed vigilantes have been brought to a close by a government crackdown. But after one of the masked veterans is brutally murdered, an investigation into the killer is initiated. The reunited heroes set out to prevent their own destruction, but in doing so they uncover a sinister plot that puts all of humanity in grave danger.

plots.plot: Wannabe superheroes solve a murder through miscommunication, bad fashion, and existential drama.
Masked weirdo kicks off a midlife crisis by swan diving out of a window, sending his frenemy on a journey of paranoia-fueled awkwardness.
A god-like figure microwaves a whole Vietnamese salad while struggling with emotional constipation and fashion choices.
Blue man with shapeshifting tendencies contemplates universe while his friends debate tax policies and play detective.
Odds-defying vigilantes dig into world's secret plans with comic and ever-shifting integrity, turning existential dread into performance art.

movies.title: Air
movies.overview: Discover the game-changing partnership between a then undiscovered Michael Jordan and Nike's fledgling basketball division which revolutionized the world of sports and culture with the Air Jordan brand.

plots.plot: Shoe nerds bet on a baby basketball player, invent shoes that make everyone think they can dunk like a legend.
A bunch of sneakerheads chase a legendary player, hoping his magic feet will make their shoes famous.
Nike tries saying new shoes will somehow make you amazing while a future superstar is tied to them.
An unpolished sports brand laces up to land a promising player before he knows he's the GOAT.
Corporate creatives bet their soles on one basketball pin-up, resulting in a sneaker cult following.

movies.title: The Big Sick
movies.overview: Pakistan-born comedian Kumail Nanjiani and grad student Emily Gardner fall in love but struggle as their cultures clash. When Emily contracts a mysterious illness, Kumail finds himself forced to face her feisty parents, his family's expectations, and his true feelings.

plots.plot: Comedian falls for a grad student, but her sudden mysterious coma forces him to pick sides between her parents and his own culture clash chaos.
Funny guy's new love interest takes a snooze fest while her ticked-off parents and his matchmaker mom fight over hospital room rights.
Stand-up's love crashes into a cultural blender when she takes the longest nap ever, leaving him with two sets of bickering adults to entertain.
A joke-teller navigates the war of heritage loyalties while his girlfriend takes the 'longest power nap' and her parents bring drama to the waiting room.
Entertainer forced into hospital tranquility zone hassle with different family expectations after she's hit with unexplained nap time.

movies.title: Sophie's Choice
movies.overview: Stingo, a young writer, moves to Brooklyn in 1947 to begin work on his first novel. As he becomes friendly with Sophie and her lover Nathan, he learns that she is a Holocaust survivor. Flashbacks reveal her harrowing story, from pre-war prosperity to Auschwitz. In the present, Sophie and Nathan's relationship increasingly unravels as Stingo grows closer to Sophie and Nathan's fragile mental state becomes ever more apparent.

plots.plot: A writer moves in with a couple where the guy is mentally unstable and the girl has a secret history involving an awful game of 'Pick Your Favorite Child'.
Aspiring author gets a crash course in PTSD and bad relationships while living with a woman who had to choose which of her kids got Nazi boarding school.
Young dude in Brooklyn learns that choosing roommates based on tragic backstories might not be the best decision for his sanity.
A flashback-filled love triangle with a side of historical trauma teaches one man the perils of ménage à traum.
After moving to a quirky Brooklyn neighborhood, a writer finds himself in a Shakespearian drama of the worst kind, but without any of the fun crossdressing.

movies.title: Gentlemen Prefer Blondes
movies.overview: Lorelei Lee is a beautiful showgirl engaged to be married to the wealthy Gus Esmond, much to the disapproval of Gus' rich father, Esmond Sr., who thinks that Lorelei is just after his money. When Lorelei goes on a cruise accompanied only by her best friend, Dorothy Shaw, Esmond Sr. hires Ernie Malone, a private detective, to follow her and report any questionable behavior that would disqualify her from the marriage.

plots.plot: Two blonde showgirls go on a cruise; one wants to marry rich and the other just wants a good time; they sing, dance, and avoid being caught by a private eye hired by a suspicious father.
A lady tracking rich men ends up having a ship adventure with her less-wealthy-but-fun-loving sidekick, dodging private eye sabotage and handling too much bling.
A cruise becomes a detective's nightmare when he tries to catch a diamond-loving passenger behaving badly, only to find himself knee-deep in sequins and jazz hands.
An ocean voyage turns sparkly as clever ladies outwit a snooping guy working for a skeptical rich daddy, showcasing epic twerking and jewelry expertise.
Suspicious father sends sleuth to spy on diamond-digging boat dancer to nix her wedding, but she and her pal turn rhinestone-hunting into an art form.

movies.title: RoboCop
movies.overview: In a violent, near-apocalyptic Detroit, evil corporation Omni Consumer Products wins a contract from the city government to privatize the police force. To test their crime-eradicating cyborgs, the company leads street cop Alex Murphy into an armed confrontation with crime lord Boddicker so they can use his body to support their untested RoboCop prototype. But when RoboCop learns of the company's nefarious plans, he turns on his masters.

plots.plot: Cop gets Swiss-cheesed by thugs, reincarnates as a robotic law enforcer with more metal than empathy, and proceeds to serve justice with an 'iron' fist.
Dystopian Detroit cop becomes a walking microwave with a badge, taking down bad guys while battling software bugs and existential dread.

In a town where crime is the only booming industry, a company ‘upgrades’ a public servant, combining dead man's parts with proprietary alloy for a new law enforcement tool - nothing could possibly go wrong.
In a city governed by unfettered capitalism where law enforcement's outsourced, a stainless-steel sheriff emerges, bringing his own brand of regulations and memories of the good old meat-sack days.
In an era where fiscal burdens breed mechanized saviors, a chrome-clad crusader questions the ethics of his own capitalist creators while computing if revenge fits in his prime directives.

movies.title: John Wick: Chapter 2
movies.overview: John Wick is forced out of retirement by a former associate looking to seize control of a shadowy international assassins’ guild. Bound by a blood oath to aid him, Wick travels to Rome and does battle against some of the world’s most dangerous killers.

plots.plot: Keanu Reeves plays a retired hitman who, instead of enjoying his hobbies like knitting, gets dragged back into killing people because someone he pinky-swore to decides it’s time for family drama with guns.
The puppy avenger is back, except this time he’s got boy scout badges to collect on an Italian holiday filled with secret clubhouse shenanigans and excessive gun-fu.
A man with a history of housework-related fatalities must tidy up a mess in spaghetti land, adhering to antique mob customs, with universal 'do not disturb' policies.
Watch a retired ballet of bullets performer participate in a chaotic scavenger hunt across Europe, armed with deadly R&D gadgets from an unconventional inventor.
A former suburban landscaper attends an ancient Mediterranean conference exploring creative de-escalation in urban settings, failing magnificently while redefining professional scope.

movies.title: Spider-Man: Homecoming
movies.overview: Following the events of Captain America: Civil War, Peter Parker, with the help of his mentor Tony Stark, tries to balance his life as an ordinary high school student in Queens, New York City, with fighting crime as his superhero alter ego Spider-Man as a new threat, the Vulture, emerges.

plots.plot: Nerdy kid in tights takes on bird-themed midlife crisis guy while borrowing gadgets from his rich uncle to avoid cleaning his room.
Teen wall-crawler juggles homework and high-flying bird man, fueled by a billionaire's charity tech giveaways.
Young adhesive enthusiast confronts illegal winged entrepreneur, hoping to impress dad's wealthy buddy.
High school student's rooftop acrobatics disrupt DIY flying enthusiast's redistribution business.
In the wake of a historical political brawl, a teenage urban gymnast faces a scavenger-turned-aviator.

movies.title: Dirty Dancing
movies.overview: Expecting the usual tedium that accompanies a summer in the Catskills with her family, 17-year-old Frances 'Baby' Houseman is surprised to find herself stepping into the shoes of a professional hoofer—and unexpectedly falling in love.

plots.plot: Teen girl goes to a resort, hooks up with dance instructor dude, learns more moves than she can handle.
Vacation turns steamy when a girl becomes her dance teacher's backup and heartbreaker.
Privileged offspring navigates summer boredom with scandalously rhythmic exercise.
Nobility of rhythm conquered youthful monotony in scenic northern bungalow.
A privileged coming-of-age tale unfolds amidst rhythmic seduction in lake-adjacent woodland retreat.

movies.title: Dawn of the Planet of the Apes
movies.overview: A group of scientists in San Francisco struggle to stay alive in the aftermath of a plague that is wiping out humanity, while Caesar tries to maintain dominance over his community of intelligent apes.

plots.plot: Talking apes blame humans for being, well, humans, and then learn that maybe having a hierarchy still sucks.
In San Francisco, primates are the new neighborhood watch, but their HOA is plagued with drama and the occasional coup.
While humanity overdoes pandemic protocols, grumpy, hairy neighbors in the woods argue about who gets to stand on the tallest branch.
Germaphobic apes consider forming a new government, but democracy looks a lot like throwing bananas in the other guy's face.
Post-apocalypse, horticultural enthusiasts can't decide how best to handle their new, more intellectually competitive garden assistants.

movies.title: Rocketman
movies.overview: The story of Elton John's life, from his years as a prodigy at the Royal Academy of Music through his influential and enduring musical partnership with Bernie Taupin.

plots.plot: Kid with funny glasses plays piano really well, becomes a rock star, flips tables, wears feathers, and learns self-love while singing his life story.
Piano kid realizes glasses look cool, becomes a flamboyant singer, fights with loved ones, and eventually hugs himself in front of strangers.
Musical whiz skyrockets to fame by turning colorful fashion disasters into stage success, but must dodge self-created meteors of destruction.
Eclectic performer navigates industry maze, intermittently stands in a tornado of bad fashion choices, finally finds much-needed eye-catching outer peace.
Showman defies life's gloomy ditties by harmonizing sequins with heartfelt duets, finally mastering the art of flamboyant self-acceptance amidst a fanfare of feathers and fame.

movies.title: The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies
movies.overview: Immediately after the events of The Desolation of Smaug, Bilbo and the dwarves try to defend Erebor's mountain of treasure from others who claim it: the men of the ruined Laketown and the elves of Mirkwood. Meanwhile an army of Orcs led by Azog the Defiler is marching on Erebor, fueled by the rise of the dark lord Sauron. Dwarves, elves and men must unite, and the hope for Middle-Earth falls into Bilbo's hands.

plots.plot: Short dude with hairy feet and a shiny rock watches as a bunch of short folks, tall pointy-eared folks, and regular folks all try to tackle a horde of uglies led by a comic book villain wannabe.
Furry-footed adventurer discovers there's no such thing as too much gold, as everyone and their weird cousin shows up to fight over a shiny mountain while avoiding a fiery time-share salesman.

Gold-hoarding little people reluctantly form alliances with forest yoga enthusiasts and swamp squatters to fend off a charging mob of tattooed beasts, proving once again that treasure invites bad houseguests.
A pyromaniac lizard's treasure attracts bearded squatters and wannabe forest fairies, sparking a chaotic brawl with bloodthirsty war-thugs who all really need to take a chill pill.
The quaint treasure obsession of vertically challenged individuals turns into a mega reunion party interrupted by menacing orcish fashion disasters and some seriously poor real estate decisions.

movies.title: Star Trek Into Darkness
movies.overview: When the crew of the Enterprise is called back home, they find an unstoppable force of terror from within their own organization has detonated the fleet and everything it stands for, leaving our world in a state of crisis.  With a personal score to settle, Captain Kirk leads a manhunt to a war-zone world to capture a one man weapon of mass destruction. As our heroes are propelled into an epic chess game of life and death, love will be challenged, friendships will be torn apart, and sacrifices must be made for the only family Kirk has left: his crew.

plots.plot: Space cop chases rogue cyborg out of jealousy, breaks half the galaxy, blames bad guy.
A mighty space princess struggles with space jealousy and anger issues while a misunderstood villain plays space chess.
Fast space vehicle heads to land far away where someone with secrets has already ruined it.
After mixed success in a space guessing game, the angry traveler finds promises easily broken.
In a mess of stars and misguided loyalty, chess becomes war as ambition drives unlikely partnerships to tragic ends.

movies.title: The Bourne Supremacy
movies.overview: A CIA operation to purchase classified Russian documents is blown by a rival agent, who then shows up in the sleepy seaside village where Bourne and Marie have been living. The pair run for their lives and Bourne, who promised retaliation should anyone from his former life attempt contact, is forced to once again take up his life as a trained assassin to survive.

plots.plot: Amnesiac super-spy can't get a break, Russian bad guys blow up his happy home, so he's back to punching dudes and outrunning explosions.
Guy with skills used to be a ghost, now he's dodging bullets again because a secret buyout got messy and he's not a fan of surprise visits.
Quiet dude in a sleepy town trades beach naps for spy naps after somebody wakes his inner ninja for some unscheduled Russian dealings.
Anonymous guy wants peace, but endures adrenaline-fueled tourism of Europe when enemies crash his seaside retirement and steal his chill.
Recovered traveler accidentally becomes a headache for people with bagpipes and fur hats due to unauthorized souvenir exchange gone explosive.

movies.title: The Hangover
movies.overview: When three friends finally come to after a raucous night of bachelor-party revelry, they find a baby in the closet and a tiger in the bathroom. But they can't seem to locate their best friend, Doug – who's supposed to be tying the knot. Launching a frantic search for Doug, the trio perseveres through a nasty hangover to try to make it to the church on time.

plots.plot: Four buddies party hard in Vegas, wake up to a baby, a tiger, and minus one groom; chaos ensues.
Wild night in Sin City leaves trio with bits of memory: a diaper, claw marks, and missing flesh luggage.
Men discover wild fauna indoors and baby supplies unattended. Missing unit integral to future festivities.
Post-intoxication crisis management involves solving ferocious indoor animal puzzles and handling infants.
Groom’s location unknown post-event; mismatched entourage encounters unusual botanic and juvenile occurrences.

movies.title: Gangs of New York
movies.overview: In 1863, Amsterdam Vallon returns to the Five Points of America to seek vengeance against the psychotic gangland kingpin, Bill the Butcher, who murdered his father years earlier. With an eager pickpocket by his side and a whole new army, Vallon fights his way to seek vengeance on the Butcher and restore peace in the area.

plots.plot: Boy watches dad get shish-kebabed by a madman, rises from the slums with a pretty thief to avenge him amidst street chaos.
In the city of dirty fists and even dirtier politics, a kid grows up to play stabby-stab with the guy who turned his dad into a kebab.
