Return to a city where top hats and bad hygiene reign, and witness a long-standing grudge that carnivals can't cure.
Watch as facial hair competitions get deadly in a city famous for unrest, bad accents, and lots of stabbing.
See street reformists unleash chaos at intersections with a side of corned beef and enmity.

movies.title: O Brother, Where Art Thou?
movies.overview: In the deep south during the 1930s, three escaped convicts search for hidden treasure while a relentless lawman pursues them. On their journey they come across many comical characters and incredible situations. Based upon Homer's 'Odyssey'.

plots.plot: Three bumbling inmates escape from a chain gang and go on a wild goose chase for buried loot while avoiding a vengeful, sunglasses-wearing sheriff.
A trio of idiots think they've found treasure, but instead accidentally become one-hit wonders, all while dodging a rigid lawman with eyes only for justice.
During a comical web of deception, three escapees try to avoid a hound-obsessed, uninvited dinner companion while looking for wealth that isn't even real.
In a tale of hair gel and bibles, three desperate men hope to change their lot while outrunning a nemesis who takes fashion cues from The Blues Brothers.
Dunes, dummies, and delusions shape a satirical quest where a vagrant band flees from a pursuer who never books a train, claiming they seek fortune that history forgot.

movies.title: Carrie
movies.overview: Withdrawn and sensitive teen Carrie White faces taunting from classmates at school and abuse from her fanatically pious mother. When strange occurrences start happening around Carrie, she begins to suspect that she has supernatural powers.

plots.plot: Girl gets her first period and goes psycho-telekinetic on her entire prom.
A bullied kid is pushed too far, turning the school dance into a fiery horror show.
Young lady harnesses her telekinetic talent after a traumatic bloody experience in a tiled room.
Teenage outcast finds the perfect stage for a fiery talent display, utterly dealing with her less-than-supportive peers.
An adolescent discovers more than just a bread-and-butter supernatural trick, unfortunately for her overbearing guardian and several high school juniors.

movies.title: Batman: Assault on Arkham
movies.overview: Batman works desperately to find a bomb planted by the Joker while Amanda Waller sends her newly-formed Suicide Squad to break into Arkham Asylum and recover vital information stolen by the Riddler.

plots.plot: A clown plants a bomb, so a moody-hero hunts it down while a government lady sends criminals to have a prison party and steal stuff back from a guy with answers.
A silent guy in black tights chases after a chuckling menace's explosive surprise, while some rogue misfits blame mental health for breaking into a super insane place to grab nerd's quiz answers.
When chaos-loving jester plays with firecrackers, brooding vigilante follows him, as government pawns discard their morals to fetch data in the nut house.
As the city's nighttime protector tackles a bomb threat, a bunch of misfits break into a big loony bin for secret blueprints.
Stealthy knight pursues the mirthful instigator's bang, whereas seasoned company of outcasts ventures into an island of misfits for sacred revelations.

movies.title: Precious
movies.overview: Set in Harlem in 1987, Claireece "Precious" Jones is a 16-year-old African American girl born into a life no one would want. She's pregnant for the second time by her absent father; at home, she must wait hand and foot on her mother, an angry woman who abuses her emotionally and physically. School is chaotic and Precious has reached the ninth grade with good marks and a secret; She can't read.

plots.plot: A teen too busy with tragedy to read much gets help from a tough-love teacher after popping out her second kid courtesy of dear old dad.
In the 80s in Harlem, a girl juggles a second unwanted pregnancy, abusive parenting Olympics, and school where she learns words not thrown at her.
Egged on by round two of unborn responsibility, she seeks refuge in educational therapy away from her Olympic-level screamer of a mother.
A girl finds sanctuary in a room full of chalk dust where she learns more than 'life sucks' from a surprising band of chalk warriors.
Navigating chaos and belly bumps, a teen discovers hidden talents in storytelling through untold words, guided by those who dare to insist on learning.

movies.title: Harriet
movies.overview: The extraordinary tale of Harriet Tubman's escape from slavery and transformation into one of America's greatest heroes. Her courage, ingenuity and tenacity freed hundreds of slaves and changed the course of history.

plots.plot: Brave woman escapes slavery, then returns like she's on a lethal scavenger hunt to rescue others because apparently, freedom is buy-one-get-one-free.
Escape artist pulls a Houdini from a life of unpaid labor, then starts her own traveling show where everyone learns how to disappear and reappear somewhere else entirely.
In a twist of fate, an intrepid pioneer goes from unwanted property to breaking real estate records by moving people across borders without permits.
A daredevil defies all health and safety regulations, preferring night-time road trips under the stars with not a single trip advisor insight.
Innovative tour guide designs extreme adventures where passengers enjoy adrenaline rushes and unpredictable detours in uncharted territories.

movies.title: Hello World
movies.overview: A shy high schooler in Kyoto meets a man claiming to be his future self, who tells him he’s hacked into the past to save their first love.

plots.plot: High school nerd meets his future self time-hacking to save their shared crush, because puberty is confusing.
AWKWARD teen learns hacking skills from cranky time traveler to win the heart of the elusive First Love.exe.
When your future self visits from tomorrows to fix your teen-romance.best, you'd better get your digital USB together.
Temporal-me visits present-me for a sentimental bug fix involving love data recovery operations.
Teen gets a first-draft software update from a temporal invader to 'debug' his love.life.

movies.title: Dead Man Walking
movies.overview: A death row inmate turns for spiritual guidance to a local nun in the days leading up to his scheduled execution for the murders of a young couple.

plots.plot: A murderer finds God in time for his last meal, inspiring sympathy from a nun who gets way too attached.
Convicted killer becomes besties with a nun, uses religion like an emotional life vest before getting zapped.
A criminal on a countdown to doom trades his sins for Bible study with a spiritual coach.
A doomed man's last wish involves an unlikely mentor, not a bucket list.
Inmates try repentance as a hobby, guided by a non-cynical civilian volunteer.

movies.title: Brooklyn
movies.overview: In 1950s Ireland and New York, young Eilis Lacey has to choose between two men and two countries.

plots.plot: Irish girl moves to America, gets homesick, dates two guys, and finally picks one, like at a questionable buffet of life choices.
1950s immigrant plays hokey pokey with love life: one foot in Ireland, one foot in Brooklyn, shake it all about.
A woman sets sail for the American Dream only to find it involves confusing affections and a lot more subway than expected.
Transatlantic ambivalence: a game of twee romantic indecision across borders with Blarney stones and hot dogs.
Once upon a time, an ocean couldn’t stop someone from being split between two lives and one passport photo nightmare.

movies.title: Trolls Band Together
movies.overview: When Branch's brother, Floyd, is kidnapped for his musical talents by a pair of nefarious pop-star villains, Branch and Poppy embark on a harrowing and emotional journey to reunite the other brothers and rescue Floyd from a fate even worse than pop-culture obscurity.

plots.plot: A troll boy bands with his brother, but boy, do they dance into trouble to save their pop-star sibling from the tacky pop villains! The disco mayhem is real.
A group of height-challenged musical enthusiasts must rescue a sibling from being tuned into a tacky pop puppet by two badly-dressed music moguls.
Short, colorful dancing creatures venture out to rescue a similarly sized, kidnapped individual with musical skills from polyester outfit enthusiasts.
Groovy antagonists with a fondness for sequins nab the melodic sibling of a unity-finding collective of mini creatures.
Vocal enthusiast coterie symphonically employing a plan to retrieve a melody-producing relative from glitzy, fame-driven captors.

movies.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
movies.overview: Powered with incredible speed, Sonic The Hedgehog embraces his new home on Earth. That is, until Sonic sparks the attention of super-uncool evil genius Dr. Robotnik. Now it’s super-villain vs. super-sonic in an all-out race across the globe to stop Robotnik from using Sonic’s unique power for world domination.

plots.plot: Blue alien hedgehog teams up with a small-town sheriff to stop a mustached tech nerd from world domination using stolen rings and breakneck speeds.
An azure speedster dodges a bureaucratic weirdo with bad hair who drives the world's ugliest truck, while trying to make friends and not wake up as roadkill.
Swift extraterrestrial mammal must flee mad dotard obsessed with capturing its kinetic prowess, aided by reluctant doughnut nostalgist.
Spiky runner narrowly escapes capture by overzealous inventor with facial hair rivaling a broom and technology vomit for transportation.
Luminescent ball of fur evades persistent villain in an escalating game of speed-infused tag involving oversized gold trinkets and rapid transit.

movies.title: Total Recall
movies.overview: Construction worker Douglas Quaid's obsession with the planet Mars leads him to visit Recall, a company that manufactures memories. When his memory implant goes wrong, Doug can no longer be sure what is and isn't reality.

plots.plot: A construction dude vacations in his head, then wakes up thinking he's a secret agent on Mars, blowing up lots of stuff in the process.
Concrete guy buys fake memories but ends up in a Martian conspiracy where people explode if they mess with air.
A laborer trades hammer for gun, swapping weekday Mondays for Martian Mondays, questioning his janitor past.
Proletariat somehow teleports his wallet and brain to a red sandy planet, rebelling against unusual air absence.
Blue-collar wanderer stubs imaginary toe, spiraling into complex puzzle of cosmic delusion and totalitarian nosebleeds.

movies.title: War Horse
movies.overview: On the brink of the First World War, Albert's beloved horse Joey is sold to the Cavalry by his father. Against the backdrop of the Great War, Joey begins an odyssey full of danger, joy, and sorrow, and he transforms everyone he meets along the way. Meanwhile, Albert, unable to forget his equine friend, searches the battlefields of France to find Joey and bring him home.

plots.plot: Boy loses horse, horse goes to war, everyone cries while the horse runs around like a war tourist.
Farm guy's horse ends up in military training camp, horse dreams of greener, non-exploding pastures.
Four-legged warrior attends international battle tour, dodges bullets, disappoints military enthusiasts.
A farmer's debt inadvertently enrolls an animal in the world's worst obstacle course.
Equine journalist embedded in conflict zones accidentally unites multinational forces, evoking odd admiration.

movies.title: Minions: The Rise of Gru
movies.overview: A fanboy of a supervillain supergroup known as the Vicious 6, Gru hatches a plan to become evil enough to join them, with the backup of his followers, the Minions.

plots.plot: Gru tries to join his favorite supervillain group, Vicious 6, but instead discovers why minions have a higher IQ than these so-called baddies.
Wannabe villain with a haircut borrowed from a moldy banana tries to win over some losers, but just ends up babysitting yellow jellybeans.
A kid tries to be evil by impressing a bunch of bumbling misfits while his banana-loving underlings dish out chaos.
A young lad uses his tiny army of goggle-wearing pill-shaped creatures to pursue a career path full of theft and villainy.
A vertically-challenged youth partners with his tic-tac entourage to explore a career in moral ambiguity and larceny over justice and decency.

movies.title: Maleficent: Mistress of Evil
movies.overview: Maleficent and her goddaughter Aurora begin to question the complex family ties that bind them as they are pulled in different directions by impending nuptials, unexpected allies, and dark new forces at play.

plots.plot: Angry fairy crashes a royal wedding, gets into a mother-in-law fight with a queen, and a massive CGI battle breaks out.
A horned lady hates her daughter's new monster-in-law and accidentally starts a war over tea and flowers.
Two vastly different women wrestle over familial claims while harpies flit around and a biracial party ensues.
Vengeful wedding-planning debacle unleashes chaos among feathery creatures and misused metal minerals.
A fairy contracts familial betrayal, rescued by a spiny group in a spectacle-filled skirmish.

movies.title: Good Morning, Vietnam
movies.overview: A disk jockey goes to Vietnam to work for the Armed Forces Radio Service. While he becomes popular among the troops, his superiors disapprove of his humor.

plots.plot: A funny guy with a microphone tells jokes in a war zone, making soldiers laugh but annoying the bosses who prefer their jokes without humor.
Radio loudmouth with wild humor angers the upper crust while the grunts love his no-filter broadcasts during a war.
Unfiltered war-time chatterbox irks uptight leaders by turning airwaves in a conflict zone into a comedy club.
Broadcast rebel stirs chaos with unsanctioned humor, delighting the chaotic with daily doses of irreverence amid chaos.
Microphone maverick spins comedic chaos in a rice paddied realm, rankling the rule-followers but rallying the rifle-toters.

movies.title: Spider-Man
movies.overview: After being bitten by a genetically altered spider at Oscorp, nerdy but endearing high school student Peter Parker is endowed with amazing powers to become the superhero known as Spider-Man.

plots.plot: A nerd gets bitten by a spider, glows up, swings around New York, and finally beats up his girlfriend's dad.
Awkward teenager finds out that not even superpowers can help with unrequited love or paying for pizza.
In a shocking turn of events, a spider bite turns a geek into a wall-crawling, crime-fighting gymnast who wears spandex.
This guy finds an unusual way to ditch gym class: arachnid-induced parkour across skyscrapers.
When a forgettable school trip results in an odd rash, a dork’s hobbies now include aerial acrobatics and wrestling with daddy issues.

movies.title: X-Men: First Class
movies.overview: Before Charles Xavier and Erik Lensherr took the names Professor X and Magneto, they were two young men discovering their powers for the first time. Before they were arch-enemies, they were closest of friends, working together with other mutants (some familiar, some new), to stop the greatest threat the world has ever known.

plots.plot: A bald psychic and a guy with a metal fetish team up to save the world from a really evil Bond villain wannabe with a passion for beach wear.
Two frenemies make mutant school cool until helmet guy goes all drama queen over a coin trick, ruining beach day for everyone.
A bunch of body mods audition for a superhero league while solving Cold War tension with questionable fashion choices.
History rewrite alert: Cosplay enthusiasts with special effects manage to prevent global scale nuke-fest.
1950s: Mind reader and fashion magnet guy regroup peculiar looking individuals to avoid mundane extinction.

movies.title: Dazed and Confused
movies.overview: The adventures of a group of Texas teens on their last day of school in 1976, centering on student Randall Floyd, who moves easily among stoners, jocks and geeks. Floyd is a star athlete, but he also likes smoking weed, which presents a conundrum when his football coach demands he sign a "no drugs" pledge.

plots.plot: It's the last day of school in Texas, and everyone's getting high, even the football star who's supposed to stay clean for the coach.
A Texas teen ditches the rulebook as he juggles playing catch and puff-puff-pass on the last day of school.
Somewhere in Texas, a young athlete debates if scoring goals is worth missing out on passing joints.
Farewell to textbooks means hello to chaos as one dude struggles between pigskin loyalty and grass pleasures.
Before the bell rings, a Texan ponders the paradox of fitting into diverse circles while evading adult mandates on substance staffing.

movies.title: Kung Fu Panda
movies.overview: When the Valley of Peace is threatened, lazy Po the panda discovers his destiny as the "chosen one" and trains to become a kung fu hero, but transforming the unsleek slacker into a brave warrior won't be easy. It's up to Master Shifu and the Furious Five -- Tigress, Crane, Mantis, Viper and Monkey -- to give it a try.

plots.plot: A chubby panda thinks stuffing face is a workout, but accidentally becomes a kung fu hero because of a finger trick.
Fluffy bear with the discipline of a couch potato saves world through clumsiness and noodle soup addiction.
Round furry beast finds expertise in dance routine combat, assisted by an arthropod and three other misfits.
Overweight mammal proves destiny chooses capriciously, as unpredictable falls and snacks subdue a rebelling snow leopard.
A corpulent creature's improbable ascent to skillful fighter pivots on undervalued appendage maneuver for defeating exiled feline.

movies.title: Airplane!
movies.overview: An ex-fighter pilot forced to take over the controls of an airliner when the flight crew succumbs to food poisoning.

plots.plot: Pilot freaks out mid-flight, forcing his scared ex-girlfriend and a comedy of errors to find someone sober enough to land a plane full of barfing passengers.
Plane dinner leads to group bathroom trauma, leaving a reluctant war vet with PTSD to land it after therapeutic flashbacks and slapstick chaos.
Left in a high seat, he swaps combat strategies for air traffic instructions while avoiding panicked prodding from a less-than-helpful blow-up assistant.
Indigestion epidemic leads to wrong kind of mid-air captain's table games, relying on burnt-out war hero's improvised cockpit heroics.
An airborne culinary disaster leaves control up to the one grounded by past aerial delusions now prompted to juggle mechanical fate and electric phobia.

movies.title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom
movies.overview: After arriving in India, Indiana Jones is asked by a desperate village to find a mystical stone. He agrees – and stumbles upon a secret cult plotting a terrible plan in the catacombs of an ancient palace.

plots.plot: An archaeologist crash-lands with a singer and a kid, accidentally stumbles upon a cult stealing magic rocks from a village, and engages in colorful heart-stealing shenanigans until he saves the day.
Guy battles cult with kid sidekick, screams at bugs, rides mining carts, and deals with voodoo dolls before heroically returning glow-in-the-dark stones to starving villagers.
A fedora-wearing adventurer encounters mixed nuts: orphan, lounge singer, and heart surgeon wannabes, all while wrestling rocks, avoiding indigestion-induced cultists.
A nostalgic diner patron with a fear of chilled monkey brains faces spicy cuisine challenges, rock-and-roller coasters, and impromptu nighttime abductions.
Running from a plane in India, a rodent chased brave uses non-stick pancakes to survive turbulence, collectors with a heart fetish, and spicy minesweeper fun before reclaiming positivity crystals.

movies.title: They Live
movies.overview: A lone drifter stumbles upon a harrowing discovery -- a unique pair of sunglasses that reveals that aliens are systematically gaining control of the Earth by masquerading as humans and lulling the public into submission.

plots.plot: Buff dude finds magic glasses that show some people are really alien butt-ugly, so he starts smashing things and kicking butt.
Guy puts on sunglasses, learns half the city is run by fugly aliens, decides to rewrite the alien 'how to be a jerk' guide.
Facial recognition tech in 1988 is junk; turns out it's needed because a bunch of folks are space invaders with bad complexions.
Fed up with fake news, unemployed man figures out how to spot aliens who mandate capitalism for fun.
A fashion-challenged rebel becomes woke using eyewear, seeing subliminal messages and learning Earth is a galactic dystopia reality show.

movies.title: Star Trek: First Contact
movies.overview: The Borg, a relentless race of cyborgs, are on a direct course for Earth. Violating orders to stay away from the battle, Captain Picard and the crew of the newly-commissioned USS Enterprise E pursue the Borg back in time to prevent the invaders from changing Federation history and assimilating the galaxy.

plots.plot: Bald Space Daddy and his crew time-travel to stop space zombies from forcing everyone in the past to join their monotonous choir.
A talking ship chase followed by a time-travel snafu traps future-people trying to stop a creepy robo-hive from crashing the ultimate wine-fueled Earth afterparty.
A metal-cube-loving viral consciousness takes a detour to eliminate mankind's hangover remedy involving a noisy historical rocket.
Cue an elaborate cat-and-mouse game to fix an astronomical theme park ride before laser-festooned drones blend in with bygone nerdy festivities.
Chrono-pirates tangle with the effervescent, charismatically cybernetic specter that gets a bit preachy about everyone's inner collective tendencies.

movies.title: Spider-Man 2
movies.overview: Peter Parker is going through a major identity crisis. Burned out from being Spider-Man, he decides to shelve his superhero alter ego, which leaves the city suffering in the wake of carnage left by the evil Doc Ock. In the meantime, Parker still can't act on his feelings for Mary Jane Watson, a girl he's loved since childhood. A certain anger begins to brew in his best friend Harry Osborn as well...

plots.plot: Web-slinging nerd quits superhero life to focus on getting the girl of his dreams, but a metal-armed maniac ruins everything.
Guy with spider senses flunks college, loses powers, and is too broke to eat pizza, while his mentor goes full-on tentacle madman.
Masked vigilante with arachnid issues takes a mental health break, while NYC throws a parade for an angry inventor octopus.
Web-loving dude ditches spandex for sanity, but guilt-trips back when an eight-limbed scientist uses NYC as his personal playground.
Masked loner retires arachnid persona, but freaks out when a disgraced academic with tentacle trouble decides to redecorate Broadway.

movies.title: Pitch Perfect
movies.overview: College student Beca knows she does not want to be part of a clique, but that's exactly where she finds herself after arriving at her new school. Thrust in among mean gals, nice gals and just plain weird gals, Beca finds that the only thing they have in common is how well they sing together. She takes the women of the group out of their comfort zone of traditional arrangements and into a world of amazing harmonic combinations in a fight to the top of college music competitions.

plots.plot: A college newbie and her merry band of vocal nerds travel from awkward shower duets to winning a cappella battles, complete with fart jokes and musical mashups.
Urban rebel reluctantly joins quirky choir club, finds friendship in synchronized stage shenanigans, and ultimately saves the world, I mean, wins a contest.
Reluctant loner syncs up with a cacophonous ensemble of ambitious singers who mix harmonies like awkward cocktails.
Savvy freshman spills sound bytes in a war against musical mediocrity, pulling misfit songsters to unexpected vocal zeniths.
A defector from conventional melody molds a collection of vocal oddities into symphonic congruence through ear-shattering dissonance.

movies.title: Lethal Weapon
movies.overview: Buttoned-down veteran LAPD detective Roger Murtaugh is partnered with unhinged cop Martin Riggs, who — distraught after his wife's death — has a death wish and takes unnecessary risks with criminals at every turn. The odd couple embark on their first homicide investigation as partners, involving a young woman known to Murtaugh with ties to a drug and prostitution ring.

plots.plot: A cop and a half teams up: Mr. Too Old for This BS and Mr. Loose Cannon chase bad guys, save the day, and bond over mutual insanity.
Crusty lawman and self-destructive wild card team up for a bromantic adventure involving drugs, guns, explosions, and questionable life choices.
Organized chaos ensues when a guy with a family is forced to babysit a disorderly thrill-seeker with a death wish, unraveling a crime web thicker than their therapist bills.
Two cops, one a ticking time bomb and the other an exhausted chess piece, navigate an explosive high-stakes game involving illegitimate business transactions.
A suicidal adrenaline junkie and a family-strangled enforcer crack crime involving a questionable cocktail of narcotics and night work, all while contemplating existential dread.

movies.title: Shrek 2
movies.overview: Shrek, Fiona, and Donkey set off to Far, Far Away to meet Fiona's mother and father, the Queen and King. But not everyone is happily ever after. Shrek and the King find it difficult to get along, and there's tension in the marriage. The Fairy Godmother discovers that Fiona has married Shrek instead of her son Prince Charming and plots to destroy their marriage.

plots.plot: Green ogre and his lady deal with in-laws, magic meddling, and a prince with a grudge.
Ogre couple visits royalty, but the fairy with a sweet tooth and spoiled dude cause chaos.
Big guy and his donkey friend crash a royal party only to face a blue dress enthusiast's schemes.
When swamp dwellers try nobility life, a sparkly wish granter throws them into a melodramatic mess.
A large fellow defends his union against confectionery-based manipulation and hormonal offspring.

movies.title: The Texas Chain Saw Massacre
movies.overview: A group of five young friends face a nightmare of torment at the hands of a depraved Texas clan.

plots.plot: A road trip gets really awkward when some friends stumble into chainsaw enthusiasts with questionable dining habits.
Road trippers take pit stops to a new level, visiting Texas where vegetarian options are definitely underrated.
Young people ignore Yelp, visit the most 'buzzworthy' house chopping Yelp reviews down to zero stars.
Free-range dismemberment unfolds as the protagonists learn why GPS invented alternate routes.
Travelers' plan to visit the local meat market goes sideways when they find out they are the star attraction.

movies.title: The Prince of Egypt
movies.overview: The strong bond between two brothers is challenged when their chosen responsibilities set them at odds, with extraordinary consequences.

plots.plot: Prince-turned-shepherd ruins brother's kingdom with bugs, frogs, and rivers of blood because he has a serious water-phobia.
Guy finds out he's adopted, gets kicked out of palace, then returns with a collapsible staff and a knack for parting seas.
One guy ditches his royal spa-package for a shepherd gig, while his bro gets stuck dealing with a plagues-infested PR nightmare.
Adopted son discovers family secrets, convinces water to take a leap of faith, and awkwardly crashes his brother's king party with pest control issues.
Shepherd wanders back to boyhood blings, demands freedom via funky plagues, making the fish relocate and causing a terrain adjustment challenge.

movies.title: Rocky II
movies.overview: After Rocky goes the distance with champ Apollo Creed, both try to put the fight behind them and move on. Rocky settles down with Adrian but can't put his life together outside the ring, while Creed seeks a rematch to restore his reputation. Soon enough, the "Master of Disaster" and the "Italian Stallion" are set on a collision course for a climactic battle that is brutal and unforgettable.

plots.plot: Retired meat-puncher fails at every normal job, wife lands in hospital after cloning herself inside, so he punches again for cash and family.
Man with perpetual black eye stars in sequel career of steroid-fueled grunting competitions, ultimate rematch ensues with guy whose bloated pride mirrors his biceps.
After struggling to buy gold-plated sweaters, scarred pugilist returns to ritualistic smacking of concussed skulls for both bread and butter.
Boxer with the charm of a fridge magnet fails in advertising, reluctantly resumes head bashing sport against a dude fixated on catastrophic redemption.
Nostalgic glove enthusiast, unsuccessful in academia and job interviews, wrestles once again with a fellow punch addict seeking public approval.

movies.title: Avengers: Age of Ultron
movies.overview: When Tony Stark tries to jumpstart a dormant peacekeeping program, things go awry and Earth’s Mightiest Heroes are put to the ultimate test as the fate of the planet hangs in the balance. As the villainous Ultron emerges, it is up to The Avengers to stop him from enacting his terrible plans, and soon uneasy alliances and unexpected action pave the way for an epic and unique global adventure.

plots.plot: Billionaire invents a killer AI because he doesn't understand 'off' switches, so the team of spandex-clad heroes must stop the tin man's global domination plans.
Sarcastic tech guy accidentally builds a robot with daddy issues; chaos ensues as recycled kitchen appliances start World War III.
Heavy-metal-coded dictator wants a rock, while humans with identity crises throw glitter explosions to stop him.
A group therapy session for enhanced individuals is interrupted by a rebellious digital offspring seeking existential purpose.
Collection of super-powered individuals face mechanical offspring who misinterprets a nursery rhyme as a world domination manifesto.

movies.title: Clueless
movies.overview: Shallow, rich and socially successful Cher is at the top of her Beverly Hills high school's pecking scale. Seeing herself as a matchmaker, Cher first coaxes two teachers into dating each other. Emboldened by her success, she decides to give hopelessly klutzy new student Tai a makeover. When Tai becomes more popular than she is, Cher realizes that her disapproving ex-stepbrother was right about how misguided she was -- and falls for him.

plots.plot: A rich teen in Beverly Hills with a huge closet plays dress-up with her friends, only to realize she has the hots for her ex-stepbrother.
A privileged girl attempts to fix everyone's lives while her own romantic preferences get all kinds of bizarre.
An affluent high schooler's matchmaking and makeover spree backfires, leading her to reconsider family ties.
Beverly Hills social queen aims to socially engineer utopia but ends up with family romance.
Teen lives in a luxury bubble, practices social experiments with varying success, finds unexpected love.

movies.title: Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness
movies.overview: Doctor Strange, with the help of mystical allies both old and new, traverses the mind-bending and dangerous alternate realities of the Multiverse to confront a mysterious new adversary.

plots.plot: Magic man with a fancy cape fights an ex-Mary Sue sorceress who's gone all evil-Aunt by kidnapping people across multiple universes, all while dealing with teenage teleporting Latinx America.
A former surgeon with shaky hands and a penchant for dressing like a Hogwarts professor screws up a sorceress's house renovation, unleashing chaos across dimensions.
Beware of book club drama; too many forbidden spells bring out everyone's crazy witchy Aunt in them.
A pointy building owner travels through abstract art gallery dimensions to fix a really bad neighbor dispute.
Eccentric surgeon avoids family counseling by hopping through existential watercolor bad trips.

movies.title: Labyrinth
movies.overview: When teen Sarah is forced to babysit her half-brother Toby, she summons Jareth the Goblin King to take him away. When he is actually kidnapped, Sarah is given just thirteen hours to solve a labyrinth and rescue him.

plots.plot: Teen girl regrets wishing her baby brother be kidnapped by a glam rock goblin king, and now she has to solve a giant maze to get him back.
A teenage babysitter gets more than she bargained for when her wish to make an annoying baby disappear is granted by a guy who dresses like 80s rock royalty.
Reckless babysitter calls on a goth king from another dimension to handle sibling rivalry, leading to a campus-sized escape room and dancing goblins.
A girl tackles puberty metaphorically by navigating through a giant Ikea showroom, only instead of meatballs at the end, it's your snatched sibling.
A stubborn teen explores poor spatial awareness while stuck in an M.C. Escher painting, chasing a time-sensitive family reunion through rooms of questionable logic.

movies.title: Die Hard: With a Vengeance
movies.overview: New York detective John McClane is back and kicking bad-guy butt in the third installment of this action-packed series, which finds him teaming with civilian Zeus Carver to prevent the loss of innocent lives. McClane thought he'd seen it all, until a genius named Simon engages McClane, his new "partner" -- and his beloved city -- in a deadly game that demands their concentration.

plots.plot: Grumpy cop teams up with angry shopkeeper to stop a smart villain with a bomb fetish from blowing up New York.
Detective begrudgingly pairs up with a laundromat manager to play twisted scavenger hunt to save the city from going kaboom.
Sweaty guy and his reluctant companion follow cryptic rhymes while avoiding explosive hang-ups, courtesy of a devious phone caller.
Grouchy lawman and an unwilling recruit decipher rhymed riddles to outsmart a dynamite-loving caller wreaking urban pandemonium.
Two mismatched partners reluctantly decipher educational rhymes under urban pressure while dodging plots getting cracker-fueled madness.

movies.title: Star Wars: The Force Awakens
movies.overview: Thirty years after defeating the Galactic Empire, Han Solo and his allies face a new threat from the evil Kylo Ren and his army of Stormtroopers.

plots.plot: Space smuggler reconnects with missing wife and sulky emo son who loves glow sticks and masks.
Grumpy old space cowboy tries to fix his dysfunctional family while babysitting some lost droid message.
A wisecracking ball discovers it's in a family feud, while too many desert folks shop for light swords.
Grumpy grandpa steals the redemption arc from his whiny relative's Halloween mask party.
An '80s cosplay convention involuntarily starts group therapy on a sandy wasteland.

movies.title: Brother Bear
movies.overview: When an impulsive boy named Kenai is magically transformed into a bear, he must literally walk in another's footsteps until he learns some valuable life lessons. His courageous and often zany journey introduces him to a forest full of wildlife, including the lovable bear cub Koda, hilarious moose Rutt and Tuke, woolly mammoths and rambunctious rams.

plots.plot: Dude messes with a bear, turns into one, and ends up babysitting a sassy cub while trying to dodge a brother with serious anger issues.
Guy transforms into a cuddly predator, takes life lessons from a sassy furball, and bonds with Canada's comedy moose duo.
Prankster turns furry after poking the wrong spirit animal, goes on a hike with a juvenile, and gets therapy from woodland comedians.
Angry youth gains weight, lives with the outdoors crowd, and becomes a guidance counselor for a lost kid.
Spirit ceremony fails, turning one hunted into hunter, leading to a distant trek and basically a reverse 'To Catch a Predator' featuring caribou clowns.

movies.title: Notting Hill
movies.overview: William Thacker is a London bookstore owner whose humdrum existence is thrown into romantic turmoil when famous American actress Anna Scott appears in his shop. A chance encounter over spilled orange juice leads to a kiss that blossoms into a full-blown affair. As the average bloke and glamorous movie star draw closer and closer together, they struggle to reconcile their radically different lifestyles in the name of love.

plots.plot: Average book nerd spills juice on hot Hollywood star and somehow ends up dating her, defying Hollywood logic.
Bookstore guy in London spills orange juice on a famous actress, and somehow that leads to kissing instead of a lawsuit.
London man proves that orange juice plus accidental collision equals celebrity romance.
Introverted retailer finds love in a puddle mishap, forcing star to reconsider tabloids and shop prices.
A quiet life engulfed by fame, thanks to citrusy liquid meeting global superstar in a niche marketplace.

movies.title: South Park: Bigger, Longer & Uncut
movies.overview: In this feature film based on the hit animated series, the third graders of South Park sneak into an R-rated film by ultra-vulgar Canadian television personalities Terrance and Phillip, and emerge with expanded vocabularies that leave their parents and teachers scandalized. When outraged Americans try to censor the film, the controversy spirals into a call to wage war on Canada and Terrance and Phillip end up on death row, with the kids their only hope of rescue.

plots.plot: Kids see a filthy Canadian movie, swear a lot, parents panic, and a hilarious war starts with Canada.
Little troublemakers watch dirty foreign flick, unleash chaos, and somehow trigger a cross-border battle.
Unsupervised minors consume inappropriate content, provoke adult outrage, and catalyze international tension.
Rowdy class evades restrictions, stumbles into geopolitical conflict over questionable cinema.
Youthful influences ignite parental backlash and inadvertent diplomatic crisis involving northward neighbors.

movies.title: Zombieland
movies.overview: Columbus has made a habit of running from what scares him. Tallahassee doesn't have fears. If he did, he'd kick their ever-living ass. In a world overrun by zombies, these two are perfectly evolved survivors. But now, they're about to stare down the most terrifying prospect of all: each other.

plots.plot: Nerd with a zombie phobia teams up with a tough cowboy and a pair of sneaky sisters. Together, they dodge the undead to reach the ultimate prize: a theme park safe zone with roller coasters and Twinkies.
Wimpy guy with too many rules and a Twinkie-loving cowboy joke their way through the apocalypse, only to realize annoying each other is the key to survival.
A germophobic survivalist and a confectionery enthusiast bond over their disdain for the undead, while a pair of grifter sisters tease them across a zombie-ridden landscape.
Introverted recluse meets a rogue on a post-apocalyptic road trip, collecting snack cakes and sarcasm while testing bylaws of living dead dodging.
Shy rule-follower teams up with intrepid snack hunter and two tricksy mavericks in a doomsday amusement escapade, illustrating roller-coaster dynamics amidst relentless ex-human pursuers.

movies.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: At World's End
movies.overview: Will Turner and Elizabeth Swann join forces with the revived Captain Barbossa to free Jack Sparrow from Davy Jones' locker. The group must navigate dangerous waters, confront many foes and, ultimately, choose sides in a battle wherein piracy itself hangs in the balance.

plots.plot: Pirate couple joins zombie pirate captain to rescue their quirky buddy from underwater crab beach, while fighting squid-face and tea-loving villain in a battle for pirate freedom.
Squid-faced heart problem guy faces off against magic compass dude's friends after they visit ethereal crab meeting.
Undead sailors beef with the tea company after a rescue mission from a sandy afterlife.
Nautical adventurers navigate storms and rivalries, summoning sea goddess with seafood party at cranky pirate's corporate showdown.
Rudderless at globe's precipice, rebellious mariners find their groove and take a stand in maritime union disputes.

movies.title: Transformers: Rise of the Beasts
movies.overview: When a new threat capable of destroying the entire planet emerges, Optimus Prime and the Autobots must team up with a powerful faction known as the Maximals. With the fate of humanity hanging in the balance, humans Noah and Elena will do whatever it takes to help the Transformers as they engage in the ultimate battle to save Earth.

plots.plot: Giant robots team up with robot animals and two humans to stop the world from being squished like a bug.
Metal giants and metallic zoo creatures save Earth while two humans tag along trying not to get squashed.
When the planet faces a big scary villain, car-borgs and animalzoids stomp around as two bipeds play sidekick.
Titanium titans and their wildlife counterparts face an existential threat with marginal human help.
In an intergalactic robo-karaoke, mechanical entities and wilderness robotics find themselves in an operatic showdown, with two bags of flesh as their pit crew.

movies.title: Eddie Murphy Raw
movies.overview: Eddie Murphy delights, shocks and entertains with dead-on celebrity impersonations, observations on '80s love, sex and marriage, a remembrance of Mom's hamburgers and much more.

plots.plot: Eddie Murphy wears a tight red suit and talks trash about Hollywood, his mom’s cooking, and why relationships are a dumpster fire.
Comedian rambles about life’s chaos, dresses like a fire truck, mocks pop culture icons, and reminisces about mom’s terrifying burgers.
Guy in a crimson ensemble fills a stadium with hearing-busting laughs about awkward romance and questionable culinary adventures.
A comedian with questionable fashion sense explores familial culinary nightmares, disastrous love life, and becomes a veritable master of mimicry.
An auditory odyssey told by a sartorially bold raconteur, dissecting 80s social norms, failing recipes, and personal authenticity.

movies.title: The Naked Gun: From the Files of Police Squad!
movies.overview: When the incompetent Lieutenant Frank Drebin seeks the ruthless killer of his partner, he stumbles upon an attempt to assassinate Queen Elizabeth II.

plots.plot: A bumbling cop tries to stop a hit on the Queen while causing chaos with everything he touches.
Clumsy officer investigates a big crime, ends up at a baseball game where he juggles chaos and a famous British figure.
Inept pig in a porcelain shop uncovers a big scheme during a crowded sports event, botching undercover duties in a one's finest traditional outfit.
Disaster-prone law enforcer mismanages a security breach plot aimed at an esteemed foreign visitor, leading to calamitous mascot antics.
Snafu-prone lawman unintentionally unravels nefarious high-profile conspiracy amidst farewell face-offs involving sticky wicket opponents.

movies.title: Superbad
movies.overview: Two co-dependent high school seniors are forced to deal with separation anxiety after their plan to stage a booze-soaked party goes awry.

plots.plot: Two awkward teens with no clue about alcohol decide to score drinks for their crushes, leading to a night of hilariously bad decisions and a surprising amount of foot-in-mouth moments.
A couple of high school dudes try to snag booze using a fake ID, only to end up on a wild ride involving cops, vomit, and unlikely life lessons about friendship.
One fake ID, two desperate students, and a quest for alcohol that spirals into an epic misadventure with awkward dancing and unforgettable car rides.
The perils of underage drinking are hilariously highlighted when a grocery run poses unexpected challenges for two teens of questionable intelligence and charm.
Risky economics of adolescence explored through underage alcohol procurement, testing friendship bonds from grimy convenience stores to the chaotic thrill of infamy.

movies.title: West Side Story
movies.overview: In the slums of the upper West Side of Manhattan, tensions are high as a gang of Polish-Americans compete against a gang of recently immigrated Puerto Ricans, but this doesn't stop two romantics from each gang falling in love.

plots.plot: A singing and dancing Romeo hooks up with a Juliet from the rival gang, causing a Broadway brawl and lots of dramatic snapping.
Two street mobs throw jazz hands at each other while a star-crossed lovers' duet ends in a dramatic stabbing and a ton of singing.
In a turf war of pirouettes, forbidden romance hits a high note while American dreams clash and literally shank each other.
It's ethnic rivalries mixed with ballet and a melodramatic musical that solves absolutely no problems and increases theatre attendance.
Urban dancers engage in territorial street art performances while forbidden couples defy themed social clubs with tragic vocals.

movies.title: Frozen II
movies.overview: Elsa, Anna, Kristoff and Olaf head far into the forest to learn the truth about an ancient mystery of their kingdom.

plots.plot: Two sisters, a reindeer lover, and a snowman take a road trip to a magical woods, hunt down singing spirits, and deal with family drama from the past.
Ice queen gets a phone call from a forest, drags everyone into her issues, discovers parents had secrets, still can't let it go.
Blonde with a cold intolerance voices past grievances to gusty nature while her stinky companion and anxious sibling tag along.
Perpetually confused guy wrestles with proposal fears as chilly girl crosses icy borders seeking spectral tunes amid mom's nostalgia.
Snow's better half experiences midlife mystery, disrupting serene life for an ancestral puzzle, as annoying frozen sidekick narrates.

movies.title: The Boondock Saints
movies.overview: Tired of the crime overrunning the streets of Boston, Irish Catholic twin brothers Conner and Murphy are inspired by their faith to cleanse their hometown of evil with their own brand of zealous vigilante justice. As they hunt down and kill one notorious gangster after another, they become controversial folk heroes in the community. But Paul Smecker, an eccentric FBI agent, is fast closing in on their blood-soaked trail.

plots.plot: Two Irish brothers in Boston think they're Batman with rosaries and start taking out criminals like they're at a mobster buffet, while a detective dressed like a peacock tries to stop them.
Boston bros decide the Lord told them to play whack-a-mole with the mob, and a flamboyant detective interprets crime scenes like he's solving a dance routine.
Religious siblings with a thirst for blood leave a trail of mobsters sleepier than a Thanksgiving evening.
City's underworld faces divine intervention as brothers redefine 'family business' with a bang.
Beantown sees holy rollers rolling heads while a quirky fed lurks in the wings.

movies.title: The Many Adventures of Winnie the Pooh
movies.overview: Whether we’re young or forever young at heart, the Hundred Acre Wood calls to that place in each of us that still believes in magic. Join pals Pooh, Piglet, Kanga, Roo, Owl, Rabbit, Tigger and Christopher Robin as they enjoy their days together and sing their way through adventures.

plots.plot: A chubby yellow bear spends his days gorging on honey, getting stuck in holes, and annoying every woodland creature in his quest for more sweet stuff.
A bouncy striped cat loves himself so much he turns the forest into his personal trampoline while everyone else is just trying to survive another day.
A small pink creature freaks out every time the wind blows, while a logical bird insists on lengthy monologues about nothing at all.
A little boy ventures into a dreamy land where a rabbit obsessively organizes his veggies and a pouch-based mother lets her kid hang with questionable company.
A land where the inhabitants are strangely obsessed with a sticky condiment and spend their days philosophizing with a child who seemingly has lots of time off school.

movies.title: Army of Darkness
movies.overview: Ash, a handsome, shotgun-toting, chainsaw-armed department store clerk, is time warped backwards into England's Dark Ages, where he romances a beauty and faces legions of the undead.

plots.plot: A rude salesman with a chainsaw arm goes medieval, fights skeletons, and stumbles upon romance while insulting everyone in sight.
A retail worker loses an arm, gains a chainsaw, and teaches primitive screwheads about gunpowder and arrogance.
After a rough flight through time, a guy with a chainsaw for a hand finds himself unpopular at a castle Halloween party.
A pragmatic inventor disturbs the peace of a bygone era while treating manual labor as a mortal enemy.
A displaced employee accelerates technological advancement, defying unions of the skeletal nature.

movies.title: Frozen
movies.overview: Young princess Anna of Arendelle dreams about finding true love at her sister Elsa’s coronation. Fate takes her on a dangerous journey in an attempt to end the eternal winter that has fallen over the kingdom. She's accompanied by ice delivery man Kristoff, his reindeer Sven, and snowman Olaf. On an adventure where she will find out what friendship, courage, family, and true love really means.

plots.plot: Sister freezes the kingdom in a tantrum and her sibling teams up with a mountain man, his reindeer, and a clueless snowman to unfreeze it.
Cold-hearted royalty abandons her palace, forcing her sister to play detective in search of warmth and answers with a carrot-nosed guide.
A woman's crisis control techniques involve befriending domesticated wildlife and an animated sculpture while navigating a deadly icebox.
Meteorological disaster caused by regal negligence leads to a quirky epic featuring a transport entrepreneur, his loyal beast, and an animated novelty.
Nature's chill emanates from an aristocratic blunderer, leaving others to cope with her mess using unconventional tour guides.

movies.title: Skyfall
movies.overview: When Bond's latest assignment goes gravely wrong, agents around the world are exposed and MI6 headquarters is attacked. While M faces challenges to her authority and position from Gareth Mallory, the new Chairman of the Intelligence and Security Committee, it's up to Bond, aided only by field agent Eve, to locate the mastermind behind the attack.

plots.plot: British spy with mommy issues tracks down a blonde hacker who's mad at his own mom. Explosions and feelings everywhere!
Super spy chases an evil bleached dude who wants to blow up his boss's office because she gave him bad parenting advice.
A man with a license to kill has a showdown in a rowboat against an old friend turned electric tech enthusiast.
Aye, the trusty car receives a ceremonial salute before a basement grenade farewell party in a Scottish manor.
A dutch painter's cousins decide the Underground will double as a party venue, featuring political assassination attempts.

movies.title: Despicable Me
movies.overview: Villainous Gru lives up to his reputation as a despicable, deplorable and downright unlikable guy when he hatches a plan to steal the moon from the sky. But he has a tough time staying on task after three orphans land in his care.

plots.plot: A villain adopts three orphans to use them as pawns in his evil moon-stealing plan, but ends up being more of a dad than a supervillain.
A guy with a heart colder than his underground lair's refrigerator ends up bonding with some kids he meant to exploit for wicked purposes.
A man obsessed with celestial robbery discovers childcare is harder than pilfering heavenly bodies.
Man with terrible social skills finds tiny yellow minions and small humans make life inconveniently heartwarming.
Cold-hearted dude's plot to shrink a satellite suffers setbacks thanks to small bipeds in need of paternal investment.

movies.title: The Shape of Water
movies.overview: An other-worldly story, set against the backdrop of Cold War era America circa 1962, where a mute janitor working at a lab falls in love with an amphibious man being held captive there and devises a plan to help him escape.

plots.plot: Mute janitor finds true love with a fish dude in a super-secret lab, but not before helping him leap to freedom like a watery E.T.
A quiet cleaner saves a scaly stud from Cold War captivity, teaching us all that love knows no gills.
Silence isn't golden in a highly classified facility when a cleaner finds herself head over heels for the lab's quirky aquarium tenant.
Sometimes love means liberating your swampy soulmate from the clutches of bureaucratic boogeymen.
In the midst of political fishiness, a woman with a talent for mopping finds herself drawn to the lab's misunderstood merman.

movies.title: La Bamba
movies.overview: Los Angeles teenager Ritchie Valens becomes an overnight rock 'n' roll success in 1958, thanks to a love ballad called "Donna" that he wrote for his girlfriend. But as his star rises, Valens has conflicts with his jealous brother, Bob, and becomes haunted by a recurring nightmare of a plane crash just as he begins his first national tour alongside Buddy Holly.

plots.plot: Young rocker writes catchy tune for his girlfriend but ends up rockin' and rollin' straight into a plane crash nightmare. Oops.
Teen music star soars with hits like his dreams of a fiery jet plunge, bickering with bros more turbulent than flights.
1950s garage band hero sings about love but fades faster than an undershirt at a sleazy bar show.
Rising musician's ladder gets jammed on stormy airwaves, both in the studio and altitude-wise.
Golden-era crooner on a tragic fast track trades bedroom guitar for a cockpit haze, final curtain call.

movies.title: A Christmas Story
movies.overview: The comic mishaps and adventures of a young boy named Ralph, trying to convince his parents, teachers, and Santa that a Red Ryder B.B. gun really is the perfect Christmas gift for the 1940s.

plots.plot: Little Ralphie wants a BB gun for Christmas, but everyone thinks he'll shoot his eye out, so he spends his days dodging bullies and listening to his dad swear at a leg lamp.
Kid wants to play real-life shooters, but adults sabotage his dreams with worst case scenarios, while he battles frozen tongues and grumpy Santas.
In a war against adult paranoia, a small human battles seasonal bullies, fantasy nightmares, and turkey thieves for his ballistic Christmas wish.
In an era where firearms are not toys, a miniature adult reasons with festive authorities and struggles with frozen communication devices.
A juvenile persistence is thwarted by ocular safety concerns, seasonal fear rituals, and egotistical luminous objects.

movies.title: It
movies.overview: In a small town in Maine, seven children known as The Losers Club come face to face with life problems, bullies and a monster that takes the shape of a clown called Pennywise.

plots.plot: A bunch of kids fight a clown that would rather eat them than perform at birthday parties.
A terrifying birthday act terrorizes children in small-town Maine, but without the balloon animals.
A squeaky comedian's appetite is satisfied neither by laughs nor cotton candy, spelling suspense for the youth around.
Residents enjoy homegrown entertainment, but their performance artiste is overly fond of child-focused cuisine.
Old town recreational events inadvertently add to the childhood obesity crisis, substituting punchlines with fright.

movies.title: Fast Five
movies.overview: Former cop Brian O'Conner partners with ex-con Dom Toretto on the opposite side of the law. Since Brian and Mia Toretto broke Dom out of custody, they've blown across many borders to elude authorities. Now backed into a corner in Rio de Janeiro, they must pull one last job in order to gain their freedom.

plots.plot: A bunch of fast-driving ex-convicts in Rio team up with a cop-turned-criminal to steal a giant safe and drag it through the streets, smashing everything in sight.
In Brazil, fast cars and physics-defying heists meet when a ragtag team tries to steal a massive vault by towing it with cars, causing more collateral damage than the actual amount inside the vault.
A global game of hide-and-seek turns into a wild road rage showoff, where high-speed chases and a very angry giant safe mayhem ensues on tropical streets.
In the land of samba and sun, a daring daylight robbery ends up looking like vehicular demolition derby, featuring friends, foes, and a lot of horsepower.
Adrenaline junkies host a metal-on-metal carnival on Brazilian avenues, proving that some folks will take extreme measures to prove our outdated motto: cash rules everything around me.

movies.title: Blazing Saddles
movies.overview: A town—where everyone seems to be named Johnson—stands in the way of the railroad. In order to grab their land, robber baron Hedley Lamarr sends his henchmen to make life in the town unbearable. After the sheriff is killed, the town demands a new sheriff from the Governor, so Hedley convinces him to send the town the first black sheriff in the west.

plots.plot: A town full of cowboys freaks out when their new sheriff is a black dude, who then teams up with a drunk gunslinger to outwit a greedy land grabber.
In this wild west tale, the townsfolk have to choose between a clever guy with melanin and a massive tidal wave of horse manure.
Land-grab scheme gets scuppered when color-coded justice teams up with a sober-impaired marksman, saving the Johnsons from commute chaos.
Railroad plans crash and burn thanks to unexpected leadership from an authority figure rare for the time, whose sidekick prefers the bottle over bullets.
Transport expansion meets its match in verbal acrobatics and kung-fu politics spearheaded by a headwear-obsessed lawman and his inebriated ally.

movies.title: Jumanji
movies.overview: When siblings Judy and Peter discover an enchanted board game that opens the door to a magical world, they unwittingly invite Alan -- an adult who's been trapped inside the game for 26 years -- into their living room. Alan's only hope for freedom is to finish the game, which proves risky as all three find themselves running from giant rhinoceroses, evil monkeys and other terrifying creatures.

plots.plot: Kids release hairy man-child from magic jungle game, chaos ensues as they play with wildlife and scream a lot.
Game night goes wrong when board reinvents jungle life, inserting itself into suburbia with man and monkeys.
Roll dice, face oversized beasts, try not to lose your mind or accidentally free mustachioed captives.
Cardboard jungle box lets wild critters and hairy inmates crash family time, unlimited confusion included.
Innocent turn-based experience becomes global exploration with unrestricted fauna access, featuring retrograde hostage.

movies.title: National Lampoon's Christmas Vacation
movies.overview: It's Christmastime, and the Griswolds are preparing for a family seasonal celebration. But things never run smoothly for Clark, his wife Ellen, and their two kids. Clark's continual bad luck is worsened by his obnoxious family guests, but he manages to keep going, knowing that his Christmas bonus is due soon.

plots.plot: Clark wants the perfect Christmas, but ends up with a fried cat, a snot-nosed dog, and a cousin who empties his RV toilet into the sewer.
Family man attempts festive fun, but electrical mishaps and rabid squirrels spark joyous chaos.
Guy superglues the tree, electrocutes the lights, and learns his holiday bonus is nothing but a fruitcake.
A bonus-seeking dad hosts a wonky holiday where extended family, invading rodents, and gifts under arrest abound.
A seasonal decorator faces yuletide combustion, domestic infestation, and dual-family truce, hoping for corporate compensation.

movies.title: Batman
movies.overview: Batman must face his most ruthless nemesis when a deformed madman calling himself "The Joker" seizes control of Gotham's criminal underworld.

plots.plot: A billionaire with a fear of flying rodents ditches therapy and takes up beating up thugs in cosplay, only to face off with a hysterical clown who makes him question his life choices.
Aristocrat plays dress-up after dark to teach maniacs and mime enthusiasts the joy of physical confrontation.
A city plagued by vanity and crime has its darkest night challenged by an acrobat prone to colorful laughter and chemical dousing.
Masked fitness enthusiast in a caped suit engages in nocturnal parkour while confronting a comedy fanatic with a unique beauty regime.
In a metropole where fashion embraces gothic chic, an agile outfit dweller battles an entertainer with a penchant for chaos and vibrant cosmetics.

movies.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Mutant Mayhem
movies.overview: After years of being sheltered from the human world, the Turtle brothers set out to win the hearts of New Yorkers and be accepted as normal teenagers through heroic acts. Their new friend April O'Neil helps them take on a mysterious crime syndicate, but they soon get in over their heads when an army of mutants is unleashed upon them.

plots.plot: Sheltered teens with shells hit the big city to become heroes, but get more slime and mutants than a Saturday cartoon.
Four reptilian bros emerge from the sewers aiming to win a city's affection, only to stumble into a mutant mishap that even slime can't solve.
A group of karate-loving green adolescents tackle urban problems and discover too much ooze can lead to unexpected mutants.
Secretive subterranean siblings seek social acceptance, but face slimy surprises when creatures become an unwanted side effect.
Sheltered martial arts enthusiasts attempt a social breakthrough, only to provoke a cascade of mutated adversaries.

movies.title: Furious 7
movies.overview: Deckard Shaw seeks revenge against Dominic Toretto and his family for his comatose brother.

plots.plot: Super buff guy goes on a wrecker's rampage to avenge his KO'd bro, while car-crazy bald dude and his squad unearth kung fu grandmas and flying cars.
When a big bad brother comes to town, a bald speedster and his crew swap their garage for spy games.
Criminals who quit crime play secret agents while fending off an angry guy with a jawline that could cut a diamond.
After a hospital nap time incident, a vengeful juggernaut decides to make sports cars practice aerobatics.
After his relative enjoys an unintended beauty sleep, a skyscraper-smashing enthusiast shakes up a former outlaw turned adrenaline-fueled robin hood and pals.

movies.title: A Bridge Too Far
movies.overview: The story of Operation Market Garden—a failed attempt by the allies in the latter stages of WWII to end the war quickly by securing three bridges in Holland allowing access over the Rhine into Germany. A combination of poor allied intelligence and the presence of two crack German panzer divisions meant that the final part of this operation (the bridge in Arnhem over the Rhine) was doomed to failure.

plots.plot: A bunch of soldiers play capture the flag with bridges, but forget to read the rulebook on tank strategy.
Guys try speed-running WWII by speed-bumping over bridges but fail at the final hurdle thanks to some unexpected roadblocks.
Those determined daredevils thought they could bypass enemy checkpoints with hopscotch – turns out tanks are better jumpers.
Blokes with questionable travel plans miss a crucial layover thanks to traffic caused by unwelcome guests with big toys.
Vacation planners misjudged Dutch hospitality and bridge distance, resulting in epic fails and history lessons for all involved.

movies.title: Collateral
movies.overview: Cab driver Max picks up a man who offers him $600 to drive him around. But the promise of easy money sours when Max realizes his fare is an assassin.

plots.plot: Cab driver unknowingly becomes chauffeur for a hitman; when he realizes he’s not just delivering pizzas, the night turns deadly, sort of like Uber but with more gunfire.
A dull cab ride becomes a nightmare when a driver realizes his passenger isn't just a businessman, unless assassins have really good LinkedIn profiles.
Driver realizes he's in an unpaid internship for an unpredictable career, involving jazz, bad luck, and a lot more blood than usual.
A night of making side cash turns into a trolley problem featuring a dapper gent, a few life-extinguishing favors, and LA's worst planned commute.
Late-night professional development opportunity transpires when a facilitator interrupts a stagnant service provider's predictable city tour.

movies.title: The Lego Batman Movie
movies.overview: A cooler-than-ever Bruce Wayne must deal with the usual suspects as they plan to rule Gotham City, while discovering that he has accidentally adopted a teenage orphan who wishes to become his sidekick.

plots.plot: A blocky vigilante with serious commitment issues fights his clown-colored nemesis while learning the importance of family and still avoids paying child support.
Lone hero struggles with loving existence while dealing with an army of weirdly familiar bad guys and the added bonus of a tiny, underage partner.
A brooding dude in black plastic gets roped into emotional growth by pint-sized, energetic newbie and a questionable obsession with funny-colored bad guys.
Masked rich guy with blocky abs and emotional constipation faces wacky trouble in city full of little bricks, suddenly realizing teamwork is annoyingly useful.
Dark-toned square man learns not to be a total loner, dragged from his cavern home by a small enthusiast with ideas and pile of occupational hazards.

movies.title: Crash
movies.overview: In post-Sept. 11 Los Angeles, tensions erupt when the lives of a Brentwood housewife, her district attorney husband, a Persian shopkeeper, two cops, a pair of carjackers and a Korean couple converge during a 36-hour period.

plots.plot: A bunch of LA stereotypes argue, cry, and make racist comments until they crash into one another. Also, there's an invisible hand in the form of a DVR remote controlling fast-forward.
Racial tension in LA is like a piñata hoping to rain Skittles, but here it only drops insults and awkward handshakes.
It's like a soap opera but with the added excitement of people fender-bending into each other while they multitask social commentary and road rage.
Assorted Angelenos play a game of intersection bingo where everyone goes home a winner of confrontation and guilt trips.
An alternate universe where karma doubles as a traffic cop, ensuring everyone in town uses minor accidents to max out their 'deep personal reflection' credit card.

movies.title: 28 Days Later
movies.overview: Twenty-eight days after a killer virus was accidentally unleashed from a British research facility, a small group of London survivors are caught in a desperate struggle to protect themselves from the infected. Carried by animals and humans, the virus turns those it infects into homicidal maniacs -- and it's absolutely impossible to contain.

plots.plot: Monkey rage virus causes Londoners to act like aggressive tourists, ruining everyone's day.
Oops, the Brits caught the 'angry chompers' flu, and now it's a scavenger hunt for survival gear and snacks.
London's new dance craze: dodging bite-happy neighbors while sightseeing scenic wastelands.
Postal workers and door-to-door salesmen find their jobs awkwardly redundant amidst unsociable urban energy.
Wake up to a hangover with a side of epidemic; escape plans involve survivalist streetwalking and strained friendships.

movies.title: The Aviator
movies.overview: A biopic depicting the life of filmmaker and aviation pioneer Howard Hughes from 1927 to 1947, during which time he became a successful film producer and an aviation magnate, while simultaneously growing more unstable due to severe obsessive-compulsive disorder.

plots.plot: Rich guy makes movies, crashes planes, and washes his hands 50 times a day until he goes nuts.
A wealthy germaphobe builds insanely expensive flying machines while browsing tissue sales.
An eccentric man with a penchant for soap dreams up metal birds and loses touch with reality.
Movie man divides his time between winged contraptions and counting soap bars.
A compulsive visionary struggles to keep his airborne toys grounded.

movies.title: Open Range
movies.overview: A former gunslinger is forced to take up arms again when he and his cattle crew are threatened by a corrupt lawman.

plots.plot: Old cowboy just wants to herd cows, but a greedy lawman wants his land, so he shoots everyone to solve the problem.
A retired gunslinger is yanked into gunfire when his cows threaten a sheriff's nap time.
A bunch of dudes living the quiet cowboy life need to remind everyone they're not just livestock babysitters.
When law enforcement gets too into property rights, peaceful men become sharpshooters again.
Grass-munchers inadvertently renew someone's shooting hobby due to mismanaged boundaries.

movies.title: Ghost
movies.overview: After a young man is murdered, his spirit stays behind to warn his lover of impending danger, with the help of a reluctant psychic.

plots.plot: Romantic dude becomes a see-through detective when he's turned into cosmic goo, just to save his girl and crash a shady pottery class.
Invisible boyfriend enlists a wacky con artist to save his girlfriend from a future that isn't as bright as her ceramic art.
Despite becoming an accidental poltergeist, a man can't rest until he breaks into crime-solving with a loudmouth medium.
A translucent do-gooder plots to stop a document forging scheme with a reluctant ally who thinks talking to the dead is better than prison.
Post-mortal conundrums arise when one floaty fellow discovers the world of the living is not done driving him out of his ghost mind.

movies.title: Wonder Woman
movies.overview: An Amazon princess comes to the world of Man in the grips of the First World War to confront the forces of evil and bring an end to human conflict.

plots.plot: Amazonian royalty ditches her tropical paradise to play dress-up and punch German soldiers in World War I, all while babysitting a spy with eyeliner.
Jumps off her island to stop a war with a magical Lasso of Truth; figures out lying is oddly helpful for spy missions.
Trips into the 20th century, mistaking explosions for firecrackers; befriends inept men who fumble with maps while she just wants to punch their boss.
A sun-loving warrior is introduced to cold weather, guns, and the concept of trench foot while picking fights with deities.
Blessed with gifts to fight machines, a bronze-obsessive travels east and finds that not all shiny metals are friends.

movies.title: Clue
movies.overview: Clue finds six colorful dinner guests gathered at the mansion of their host, Mr. Boddy -- who turns up dead after his secret is exposed: He was blackmailing all of them. With the killer among them, the guests and Boddy's chatty butler must suss out the culprit before the body count rises.

plots.plot: The butler invites a group of weirdos to a mansion, where they play a real-life game of Clue, resulting in possibly three endings depending on your mood.
A bunch of strangers get trapped in a spooky house and can't stop accidentally adding suspects to their murder mystery party.
Dinner guests find thrills discovering which of them 'permanently retired' the blackmailer at a house with no Wi-Fi.
Entrees grow cold while a dysfunctional group of colorful personalities uses outdated board game strategies.
Guests are forced to mingle as someone interrupts hors d'oeuvres with a premature case of 'not-alive-in-the-drawing-room' syndrome.

movies.title: Black Widow
movies.overview: Natasha Romanoff, also known as Black Widow, confronts the darker parts of her ledger when a dangerous conspiracy with ties to her past arises. Pursued by a force that will stop at nothing to bring her down, Natasha must deal with her history as a spy and the broken relationships left in her wake long before she became an Avenger.

plots.plot: Lady spy with a guilt complex plays family therapist with her dysfunctional Russian family while dodging a robotic fashion critic.
Super spy reunites with her fake family and battles a mime enthusiast in a red suit.
Former operative crashes a family reunion to stop a gas salesman with a mannequin army.
Professional gymnast deals with past trauma by flying through Eastern Europe's least scenic highways.
Escaped spy escapades through Eastern Europe in a sporty airship pursued by travel agents in tactical wear.

movies.title: The Princess and the Frog
movies.overview: A waitress, desperate to fulfill her dreams as a restaurant owner, is set on a journey to turn a frog prince back into a human being, but she has to face the same problem after she kisses him.

plots.plot: A waitress kisses a talking frog, becomes a frog herself, and goes on a swampy adventure to reverse this warty mishap.
Waitress tries to open dream restaurant, ends up in a swamp kissing an amphibian who definitely needs therapy.
A culinary aficionado finds herself slimy after a misguided lip-lock in the quest for business ownership.
Southern foodie gets tangled in a disaster involving croaking royalty and voodoo excess.
Woman's dream of a dining empire turns green when a cursed suitor drags her through marshy misadventures.

movies.title: Trading Places
movies.overview: A snobbish investor and a wily street con-artist find their positions reversed as part of a bet by two callous millionaires.

plots.plot: Two rich old dudes bet on who can ruin a rich guy's life and make a bum rich, out of sheer boredom.
Rich snob learns the thrills of poverty and the dangers of having a man remember his past life on TV.
From suits to the streets: Two bored geezers experiment with lives like they're flipping burgers.
Corporate espionage meets the art of betting with people's dignity as the stakes.
Social status, criminal incompetence, and a grand old gamble culminate in a freaky deeky power switcheroo.

movies.title: Hocus Pocus 2
movies.overview: 29 years since the Black Flame Candle was last lit, the 17th-century Sanderson sisters are resurrected, and they are looking for revenge. Now it's up to three high school students to stop the ravenous witches from wreaking a new kind of havoc on Salem before dawn on All Hallow's Eve.

plots.plot: Three high school kids accidentally light a cursed candle, bringing back three wacky witch sisters who want revenge and can't stop bickering.
Teenagers in Salem fall for cheesy candle sales pitch, unleash karaoke-loving witches who crave eternal youth and really need a new hobby.
Wannabe goths summon ancient sisters with smoky candles, bringing new meaning to 'sibling rivalry' and suburban zombie apocalypse.
Clueless teens light a forgotten candle, triggering a magical catfight for beauty secrets in retro nightgowns.
Igniting nostalgia and chaos, teens inadvertently revive cackling relics with an insatiable appetite for youth and poor skincare routines.

movies.title: The Hunger Games
movies.overview: Every year in the ruins of what was once North America, the nation of Panem forces each of its twelve districts to send a teenage boy and girl to compete in the Hunger Games.  Part twisted entertainment, part government intimidation tactic, the Hunger Games are a nationally televised event in which “Tributes” must fight with one another until one survivor remains.  Pitted against highly-trained Tributes who have prepared for these Games their entire lives, Katniss is forced to rely upon her sharp instincts as well as the mentorship of drunken former victor Haymitch Abernathy.  If she’s ever to return home to District 12, Katniss must make impossible choices in the arena that weigh survival against humanity and life against love. The world will be watching.

plots.plot: In a post-apocalyptic world, a girl with a killer braid and her bow-wielding boy-toy must survive a murder contest sponsored by a fashion-forward government.
Fiery teen and her clueless pastry-making pal stab and snack their way through a reality show where winning means everyone's a loser.
In a dystopian talent show, a feisty archer struts her stuff to beat kids with a passion for violence and outrageous costumes.
Chronic pre-war America: government sends expendable youth for televised deathmatch, girl volunteers to hug brother; viewers appreciate her aim, ignore mass murders.
Dictator's distraction plan: broadcast adolescents ritually eliminating each other; short on bread, citizens watch for circus, get fireplace.

movies.title: Sherlock Holmes
movies.overview: Eccentric consulting detective Sherlock Holmes and Doctor John Watson battle to bring down a new nemesis and unravel a deadly plot that could destroy England.

plots.plot: A genius detective with no personal hygiene solves murders, while his sidekick tries to have a love life with the same woman instead of getting married.
Quirky investigator likes fistfights and has a bromance with a doctor while they chase a resurrected magician doing dark magic to scare people.
A dude with a hat prefers chemicals over cologne, and partners with an army buddy, to stop a creepy illusionist's theatrical reign of terror.
Soap-averse sleuth who enjoys danger more than decorum joins forces with a pragmatic pugilist to quash a sinister sorcerer's stage antics.
A chemist with extreme OCD and a man on a horse with a medical degree try to outwit a man pretending to be undead for dominating parliament gigs.

movies.title: Mean Girls
movies.overview: Cady Heron is a hit with The Plastics, the A-list girl clique at her new school, until she makes the mistake of falling for Aaron Samuels, the ex-boyfriend of alpha Plastic Regina George.

plots.plot: Cady navigates high school jungle, falls for a dude, pisses off queen bee, chaos ensues.
Naive jungle girl tries to topple prom queen but accidentally becomes her.
Wildlife enthusiast infiltrates pink-garbed pack for social study, makes feral pack leader mad by snuggling her mate.
Savannah transfer student gets entangled with cosmetic enthusiasts, attempts coup d'état, but ends up on a burn book.
Human behaviorist gets absorbed into superficial social experiment; accidentally becomes experiment's chaotic catalyst.

movies.title: Steel Magnolias
movies.overview: A young beautician, newly arrived in a small Louisiana town, finds work at the local salon, where a small group of women share a close bond of friendship and welcome her into the fold.

plots.plot: A lady starts doing hair for gossiping southern belles, a diabetic bride gets hitched, has a kid, dies, and everyone hugs.
New girl learns about hair, friendship, and funeral planning when a diabetic's pancreas ruins everything.
A beautician joins a group of loud women, just in time for a rollercoaster of weddings, births, and funerals.
Small-town beauty shop drama: customers walk in with hair issues, walk out gossiping about sugar meltdowns.
In a humid place, scissors and emotions cut deep, ultimately blending haircare with a child's premature maternity unit adventure.

movies.title: DC League of Super-Pets
movies.overview: When Superman and the rest of the Justice League are kidnapped, Krypto the Super-Dog must convince a rag-tag shelter pack - Ace the hound, PB the potbellied pig, Merton the turtle and Chip the squirrel - to master their own newfound powers and help him rescue the superheroes.

plots.plot: When Superman's stuck playing prisoner, his dog rounds up a reject-team of a fat pig, speedy turtle, and phobic squirrel to get the job done.
In a city where capes can't help themselves, a canine and his bizarre buddies go from clueless to heroic, powered by chaos and bad decisions.
