Unlikely group of four-legged oddballs learn people skills are overrated as they save useless capewearers.
When flashy humans get nabbed, their understudy pets stumble into a slapstick power-up and do what professionals couldn't.
With spandex heroes benched, domesticated rejects mishandle their dumb luck into a surprising rescue mission.

movies.title: Lady and the Tramp
movies.overview: The love story between a pampered Cocker Spaniel named Lady and a streetwise mongrel named Tramp. Lady finds herself out on the street after her owners have a baby and is saved from a pack by Tramp, who tries to show her to live her life footloose and collar-free.

plots.plot: A spoiled pooch and a scrappy stray share some spaghetti before going on a date to chase chickens and dodge the pound.
House princess meets alley dog; they share pasta, battle rogue cats, and question their life choices.
Furball with bling ends up outside, learns street survival 101 from a seasoned fuzzball, and discovers culinary romance.
Pedigree pooch dabbles in street life, guided by a mangy tour guide with a knack for making dinner dates dangerous.
Class clash between a pampered fur diva and a back-alley scruff, with unexpected lessons on leash-free living.

movies.title: Big Trouble in Little China
movies.overview: Truck driver Jack Burton gets embroiled in a supernatural battle when his best friend Wang Chi's green-eyed fiancée is kidnapped by henchmen of the sorcerer Lo Pan, who must marry a girl with green eyes in order to return to the human realm.

plots.plot: A truck driver thinks he's a hero but really just fumbles around while his friend's girlfriend gets nabbed by an ancient wizard in need of some eye candy to get his mojo back.
A guy with a big rig takes on magic ninjas because his buddy can't keep a leash on his fiancée, thanks to a geriatric bad guy who wants an eyeful for his wedding needs.
A trucker ends up Kung Fu fighting shadowy creeps because of a green-eyed gal and an elderly fellow who's allergic to aging.
A driver winds up doing martial arts charades in a neon labyrinth when a ghostly geezer wants to swap his old crone life for some young love.
A blue-collar motorist gets a crash course in Chinatown's mystical reality after an ophthalmologically-inclined pensioner sets his sights on supernatural nuptials.

movies.title: I Am Legend
movies.overview: Robert Neville is a scientist who was unable to stop the spread of the terrible virus that was incurable and man-made. Immune, Neville is now the last human survivor in what is left of New York City and perhaps the world. For three years, Neville has faithfully sent out daily radio messages, desperate to find any other survivors who might be out there. But he is not alone.

plots.plot: A lonely scientist and his dog play hide and seek with super-angry, allergic-to-sunlight munchkins in post-apocalyptic New York City.
Guy roams empty Big Apple with his dog, battling moody night owls and trying to invent a cure for selfie-style vampires.
After a miracle diet gone wrong, mutant lovers avoid sunburns, while an inventive recluse and his pup try to save daylight.
In a city that never sleeps, because everyone's a snarly night owl, a lone optimist tries home remedies and talks to mannequins.
In a deserted jungle of concrete, a hermit conducts clandestine chemistry classes while dodging nocturnal light-averse enthusiasts.

movies.title: Peter Pan
movies.overview: Leaving the safety of their nursery behind, Wendy, Michael and John follow Peter Pan to a magical world where childhood lasts forever. But while in Neverland, the kids must face Captain Hook and foil his attempts to get rid of Peter for good.

plots.plot: A band of lost kids fly to a no-adults place, hang out with fairies, bug a one-handed pirate, and argue about bedtime stories.
Three siblings ditch their bungalow for a creepy island ruled by a flying kid who never ages and his fairy who always looks miffed.
Three siblings give up a perfectly good future to chase after a dude who introduces them to an island with questionable sanitary conditions.
An airborne youth completely disregards child safety regulations to provide free vacations to impressionable minors.
In a dimension defying time, a bunch of feral younglings defy a classic nautical antagonist in his seafaring midlife crisis.

movies.title: Mission: Impossible - Rogue Nation
movies.overview: Ethan and team take on their most impossible mission yet—eradicating 'The Syndicate', an International and highly-skilled rogue organization committed to destroying the IMF.

plots.plot: A guy joins forces with his frenemy squad to stop a former-secret-agent club from making things go boom, while hanging off an airplane like it's the new roller coaster.
Super-spy prevents a fancy evil gang from starting a worldwide riot while proving his team isn't just a bunch of adrenaline junkies.
Woman with great memory and a guy who's tough as nails take on some old friends turned enemies who have a weird habit of disappearing.
Acrobatic operatic gunplay meets super-secret origami when a group of folks without licensing issues goes after a club of folks who didn't pay their membership fees.
Using the gym for espionage, folks stop various musical criminals from making mysterious surprises in a multinational stage.

movies.title: The Muppet Movie
movies.overview: A Hollywood agent persuades Kermit the Frog to leave the swamp to pursue a career in Hollywood. On his way there, he meets a bear, a pig, a whatever – his future muppet crew – while being chased by the desperate owner of a frog-leg restaurant!

plots.plot: A frog dreams of being a star, dodges a psycho restaurant owner with a frog-leg fetish, and picks up a bizarre gang of animals and vegetables.
Ambitious amphibian evades becoming dinner, collects a crew of oddball roadside attractions on a quest for fame.
Amphibian escapes swamp, assembles peculiar pals on westward road trip, while dodging gastronomic entrepreneur.
Green jumper and crew of misfits road trip west to play let's-not-get-caught by eatery mogul.
Swamp resident on a cross-country career chase, gathers unique beings, targeted by enthusiastic eater's delight.

movies.title: The Parent Trap
movies.overview: Hallie Parker and Annie James are identical twins separated at a young age because of their parents' divorce. Unknowingly to their parents, the girls are sent to the same summer camp where they meet, discover the truth about themselves, and then plot with each other to switch places.

plots.plot: Twin girls meet at camp, realize they're sisters, scheme to reunite their divorced parents by swapping places. High jinks and parent trap ensue.
Sisters split at birth pull a freaky, cheeky switcheroo at summer camp to make mom and dad past tense their divorce.
Strangers in the woods discover mad genetics, then switch homes to sabotage parental engagements.
Genetically identical campers play musical parents to dismantle post-marital bliss.
Copy-paste campmates reverse engineering a domestic market separation.
